[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde na bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D133}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA pra t+yud pan ne bud d+ha sa ma mu kha a ba s+thi ta sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du 
[\[1b.2\]]bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[1b.3\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams 
[\[1b.4\]]cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par 
[\[1b.5\]]kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa sha 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong zhes bya ba rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[2a.2\]]lnga brgya tsam thams cad kyang khyim par gyur cing bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba sha stag dang lhan cig tu chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring byed par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong phye ma red kyi 
[\[2a.3\]]dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[2a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam po de dag kyang phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan 
[\[2a.5\]]bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig du 'khod do/_/dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag kyang phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[2a.6\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mnyan yod kyi 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]grong khyer chen por dbyar gnas nas dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu rim gyis yul rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa gang na ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2b.2\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par mdzad pas dge slong gang dag yul 
[\[2b.3\]]so so na rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2b.4\]]la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par mdzad do/_/yang de'i tshe smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par dge slong 'bum lhan cig tu 'dus te 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[2b.5\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba/_mngon par mdzad pas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mA+o gau ta mi la sogs pa dge slong ma sum khri rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[2b.6\]]la ba der song ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par mdzad do/_/de nas de'i 
[\[2b.7\]]tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_lid tsa bI gzhon nu nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[3a.2\]]la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phug sbas kyang grong khyer chen po tsam pa ya nas byung ste/_srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 
[\[3a.3\]]lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas 
[\[3a.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dam bus byin yang grong khyer chen po b+wa rA Na sI nas byung ste/_srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi 
[\[3a.5\]]grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[3a.6\]]kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong 
[\[3a.7\]]khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon chen po dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar 
[\[3b.2\]]nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum 
[\[3b.3\]]bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byin yang ko'u sham bi'i grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 
[\[3b.4\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_
[\[3b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu lha yang gnas bcas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi 
[\[3b.6\]]grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[3b.7\]]kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_srog chags sum khri tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi 
[\[4a.2\]]dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyang [,]bzang yang [}]lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[4a.3\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po yang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su 
[\[4a.4\]]bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_
[\[4a.5\]]lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi yang lha ma yin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig_/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig_/klu'i rgyal po ma dros kyang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig_/klu'i rgyal po 
[\[4a.6\]]gzi can yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig_/klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[4a.7\]]ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par mdzad do/_/yang de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/_'di nas steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad tha na 'khar ba'i rtse mo 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]gzugs pa'i sa khyon tsam yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma gang ba gang yang med par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[4b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa gal 
[\[4b.3\]]te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[4b.4\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems 
[\[4b.5\]]rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na thos pa rgya 
[\[4b.6\]]mtsho 'dra ba dang /_thos pa bstsags pa rnams su gyur pa dang /_nem nur ma mchis pa dang /_the tshom ma mchis pa dang /_yid gnyis ma mchis pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi nyams shing yongs su mi nyams pa rnams 
[\[4b.7\]]su 'gyur ba dang /_mi ngal ba rnams su mi skye ba dang /_skye ba dran pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_tha na rmi lam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug cing kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]su 'gyur ba dang /_rigs mtho ba dang rigs che ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_g.yog 'khor mang zhing g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_blo gros dang 
[\[5a.2\]]ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dpal dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_brtan pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[5a.3\]]ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_nga rgyal bcag pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_byams pa la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_ye shes dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_blo dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[5a.4\]]su 'gyur ba dang /_ma zhum pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_don gyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_zhi gnas kyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_lhag mthong gi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_bsam 
[\[5a.5\]]gtan gyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab kyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 
[\[5a.6\]]'gyur ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_g.yang sa chen por mi ltung ba'i steng du chos rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_chos smra ba chen po rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar sems kyis smon pa de dang der skye ba dang /_mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad kyis 
[\[5a.7\]]yongs su mi zin pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_rgyu'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur gyi rkyen gyi stobs can rnams su mi 'gyur ba dang /_bsam pa'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sbyor ba'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]dmigs pa'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_nges par sems pa'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_zhi gnas kyi stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par lta ba'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_mos pa'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_smon lam 
[\[5b.2\]]gyi stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_bsam pa yongs su mi zad pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_thos pa rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pas/_rgya mtsho chu gter lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas zla ba lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_mi shes 
[\[5b.3\]]pa'i mun pa bsal bas nyi ma lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_snang bar byed pas mar me lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_shin tu mi gos pas bar snang lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas mi gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos 
[\[5b.4\]]thams cad nges par rtogs pas rdo rje lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_mthu brtan pas ri lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_mi g.yo bas brtan pa'i chos rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_legs par gnas pas sgo'i them pa lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sems las su rung bas byi la'i 
[\[5b.5\]]pags pa lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_bya ltar gang dang gang du 'dod par 'gro bas yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_gdol bu lta bur nga rgyal bcag pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho 
[\[5b.6\]]brang 'khor la mngon par dga' ba mi skyed pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_spre'u dang mtshungs pas dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang lhan cig tu mi sten pas ma 'dres pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_tshogs yongs 
[\[5b.7\]]su sdud pas tshogs kyi ston pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_bdud thams cad kyis gdul dka' ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad shin tu nges par shes pas so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_byams pa chen po rab tu mi g.yo bas zil kyis gnan par dka' zhing bsam pa brtan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dmigs su med 
[\[6a.2\]]pa la spyad cing brjod du med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas lhag pa'i bsam pa zab pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi shugs kyi dga' bas bag yod pa mang zhing bsam pa mnyen pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro'i las bgyid 
[\[6a.3\]]pas lhag pa'i bsam pa rgya che ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs yang dag par bsgrubs pas lhag pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnam par dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_rdzun dang khong khro ba'i 
[\[6a.4\]]skyon spangs pas lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba thob pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sems dang zhing tha ba med la shes rab rgyas pa yongs su bzung bas yid bde ba'i lhag pa'i 
[\[6a.5\]]bsam pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnam par dag pas bkod pa chen po la spyad pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la bgyi ba dang bral bas/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 
[\[6a.6\]]rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_brtsams pa thams cad nyams su lon pas yi dam la brtan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos rjes su spyod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa rnams dang pha rol tu 
[\[6a.7\]]phyin pa rnams la yongs su mi 'jigs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_yid la byed pa rnams 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gzhog pas chos thams cad la mos pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la phar 'du shes pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad la snang ba skyes pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[6b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur pas shes pa sgrib pa med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad la rlom sems med pas sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_ma skyes ma 'ongs shing 'gro ba med pa'i chos dang ldan pas sprul pa lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[6b.3\]]dus gsum la rtog pas rmi lam lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi lus yang dag par ston pas gzugs brnyan lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'pho ba med cing mi gnas la rten pa med pa'i chos can pas brag ca lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba 
[\[6b.4\]]dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba thams cad la grib ma lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dngos po'i 'du shes spangs pas dngos po med par shes pa la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_gnyis la kun tu spyod pa med pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_byang 
[\[6b.5\]]chub kyi sems tshad med pas/_chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sems kyi rgyud mi g.yo bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mi g.yo ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mi chags pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa 
[\[6b.6\]]rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgor zhugs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du gyur pas chos kyi snod rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis brtan pas de 
[\[6b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pas bag tsha ba med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten pa thams cad yang dag par dga' bar byed pas 'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pas rmongs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing the tshom dang bral bas de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dris pa thams cad lung bstan pa la srid pa dang dus gsum 
[\[7a.2\]]ston nus pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_snying rje chen po thob pas phan pa 'dod pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sgyu med pas g.yo med pa 
[\[7a.3\]]rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron mar gyur pas drang po rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_khams gsum thams cad na tshad med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_tha snyad tsam du rnam par dpyod pas nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_gzhi med 
[\[7a.4\]]pa la dga' bas ma 'dres par gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos can pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa chen po la sems can thams cad gzhog pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i gtam yang dag par ston pa rnams su 
[\[7a.5\]]'gyur ba dang /_'jigs shing spu zing zhes byed pa thams cad dang bral bas mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_mdo sde'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa la mkhas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'khor thams cad kyi nang du 
[\[7a.6\]]nye bar 'gro bas bzhin kun tu ston pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa chen po la 'jig rten pa thams cad kyis mchod cing thams cad mkhyen pa ltar bsod nams kyi bdag po rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su gyur pas yon tan zad mi shes pa 
[\[7a.7\]]rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du dga' ba dang /_dad pa chen po rab tu rnyed pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su dri ba la dge ba'i spobs pa can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'khor gyi nang du 'jigs shing 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]bag tsha ba spangs pas yid spa mi 'gong ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pas smra ba'i stag lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol gyi phyogs thams cad 'joms pas dam bcas pa ma nyams pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[7b.2\]]cad kyis gnang bas chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir/_seng ge'i sgra sgrog cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa mang ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par brjod pa la 'jug pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pas/_'jig rten rgyang pan pa thams cad ma bstan pa 
[\[7b.3\]]rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rgyu la gnas pas dam pa'i chos smra ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring bgyid pas chos 'dod pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bgyid pas mi skyo ba rnams 
[\[7b.4\]]su 'gyur ba dang /_phyogs bcur rnam par rgyu bas gnas ma mchis pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pas smon lam 'debs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_rin po che'i mchog la ngal sos par bgyid pa la mkhas pas/_chos kyi 
[\[7b.5\]]rgya mtshor zhugs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mi g.yo ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa spyod pas cho 'phrul chen po myong ba 
[\[7b.6\]]rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas blta ba sems kyi skad cig gcig la rag las pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos la gus pa rnyed pas ye shes kyis bskor ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi sku dang 'dra bar rtogs pas nam mkha' lta bu rnams su 
[\[7b.7\]]gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par bgyid pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_legs par gnas shing myur ba'i cang shes 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]pas go ca chen po bgos pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i sa la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_bgrang ba'i tshul gyis chog shes pas 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad rab tu 
[\[8a.2\]]rtogs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_grangs kyi rnam pa thams cad nye bar rtogs pas 'jig pa dang 'chags pa thams cad la mkhas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_gtong ba thams cad la nan tan bgyid pas mi gnas shing len pa ma mchis pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'gyod pa 
[\[8a.3\]]med pa'i sbyin bdag chen por gyur pas gtong ba la mkhas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi skye ba'i gnas rnams don du mi gnyer ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs 
[\[8a.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong zhing chos kyang nyan la de yang 'dzin cing mi bskyud la/_lnga mngon par shes pa yang ma lags/_drug mngon par shes pa yang ma lags shing /_byang chub sems dpa' de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shi 'phos te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 
[\[8a.5\]]dag na gnas pa yang ma lags la/_byang chub sems dpa' de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong la chos kyang nyan cing /_de thams cad kyang kun tu shes te/_ji ltar bdag da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na mchis 
[\[8a.6\]]bzhin du the tsom dang nem nur ma mchis pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang tha na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas mthong zhing /_chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams su 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang lags/_bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste dang 
[\[8a.7\]]po'o//_//de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong legs so legs so/_/yang bzang skyong khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing /_bzang skyong khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/_/bzang skyong khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[8b.2\]]ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_chos don du gnyer ba chos 'dod pa mi dmigs par tshangs par spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par slob par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par dga' 
[\[8b.3\]]bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lung 'bog pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[8b.4\]]la sgrub par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par 'dod pa/_snying rje che ba/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_sangs rgyas mthong ba smon lam rgya che ba/_spyod yul zab pa/_thams 
[\[8b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa sems pa/_byang chub yang dag par 'dzin pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ston pa/_byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun tu spyod pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mngon 
[\[8b.6\]]sum du gnas pa ste/_bzang skyong khyod kyi yon tan brjod na lta mthar mi phyin to/_/bzang skyong da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_ting nge 'dzin de bzung zhing ma brjed la/_rna blags te nyan cing sems mi/_g.yeng ba rnyed na/_yon tan 
[\[8b.7\]]gyi khyad par de dag rnyed pa mi dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin de bshad par gsol/_de ni 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi'i don dang /_sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang snang ba chen 
[\[9a.2\]]po bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[9a.3\]]no/_/zhes gsol te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong chos 
[\[9a.4\]]gcig la kun tu bsten nges par bsten cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas/_lam du byas/_gzhir byas/_yang dag par bslang /_legs par byang ba byas/_shin tu yongs su sbyangs/_shin tu mnyam par bzhag_/shin tu yang dag par brtsams na yon tan thams cad khyad 
[\[9a.5\]]par du 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/_mang du thos pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong de la da ltar gyi sangs rgyas 
[\[9a.6\]]mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems yid la byed pa/_sems mi g.yeng ba/_dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang shes rab thob pa/_brtson 'grus mi gtong ba/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen 
[\[9a.7\]]bkur byed pa/_stong pa nyid la kun tu sten pa/_sgom pa mang du byed pa/_sgrib pa rnams spong ba/_rmugs pa dang gnyid rnam par spong ba/_gtam yongs su spong ba/_sdig pa'i grogs po rnams rnam par spong ba/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la nges par sten pa/_dbang 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]po rnams mi g.yeng ba/_zas kyi tshod shes pa/_nam gyi cha stod dang /_cha smad la mi nyal ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams la mi chags pa/_dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba/_lus la ched 
[\[9b.2\]]cher mi byed pa/_srog la mi lta ba/_lus gtong ba/_sems can la phan 'dogs pa/_gnyen rnams yongs su spong ba/_skyes pa'i sa ring du byed pa/_byams pa la kun tu sten pa/_snying rje thob pa/_dga' ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms sgom pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs 
[\[9b.3\]]pa rnams yongs su spong ba/_bsam gtan rnams sgrub cing /_de dag gi ro myong bar mi byed pa/_gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa/_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnyed pa/_dran pa mi g.yeng ba phung po rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa/_khams rnams la rlom sems med pa/_
[\[9b.4\]]skye mched rnams la mngon par mi chags pa/_rigs smra bas snyems par mi byed pa/_nga rgyal tshar gcod pa/_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa/_sems can la phan pa'i gzhir gyur pa/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_sems can thams cad mi gtong ba/_
[\[9b.5\]]sems can thams cad yongs su grol bar byed pa/_sems can thams cad la bdag tu 'du shes pa/_sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa/_phar 'du shes pa/_bur 'du shes pa/_gnyen du 'du shes pa/_sems can thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par 'du shes 
[\[9b.6\]]pa/_dngos po thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin pa/_tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa/_ting nge 'dzin la nges par sten pa/_mang du thos pa 'dod cing des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa/_tshul khrims kyi phung po la skyon med pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la g.yo ba med pa/_chos 
[\[9b.7\]]rnams la the tsom med pa/_sangs rgyas dang 'thun pa/_chos mi spong ba/_dge 'dun mi 'byed pa/_phra ma'i tshig spong ba/_'phags pa rnams kyi drung du nye bar 'gro zhing de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa/_byis pa rnams rnam par spong ba/_'jig rten pa'i gtam la mngon par mi dga' zhing 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]mi 'dod la ring du byed pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam la mngon par dga' zhing 'dod la 'dun cing sten pa/_gtam rgyud ma yin pa rnam par spong ba/_dga' bar byed pa'i chos drug la sten pa/_snyan pa rnams smra ba/_sgrib pa lnga spong ba/_rnam par grol 
[\[10a.2\]]ba'i skye mched lnga la sten pa/_phung po lnga yongs su shes pa/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par spong ba/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sgom pa stobs bcu sgrub pa/_kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu rnam par sbyong ba/_'du shes dgu rnam par 'jig pa/_le lo'i 
[\[10a.3\]]dngos po brgyad rnam par spong ba/_brtsams pa'i dngos po brgyad la nges par sten pa/_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad la kun tu sten pa/_rnam par grol ba brgyad sgom pa/_skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad thob pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 
[\[10a.4\]]'thun pa/_bsam gtan la mi chags pa/_thos pas rlom sems mi byed pa/_nga rgyal bcom pa/_chos nyan par 'dod pa/_chos 'dod pa/_chos don du gnyer ba/_chos la 'dun pa/_chos la phyogs pa/_chos la 'bab pa/_chos la gzhol ba/_chos la brtson 
[\[10a.5\]]pa/_bdag tu 'du shes pas rlom sems su mi byed pa/_sems can du 'du shes pa spong ba/_srog tu 'du shes pa mi dmigs pa/_gang zag tu 'du shes pa yongs su spong ba/_phung por 'du shes pa rnams sel ba/_dngos por 'du shes pa la mi gnas pa/_mya ngan las 'da' 
[\[10a.6\]]ba mi 'dod pa/_phung po rnams mi 'dod pa/_'khor ba la mi bzad pa'i 'jigs par 'du shes pa/_phung po rnams la gshed mar 'du shes pa/_khams rnams la sbrul gdug par 'du shes pa/_skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa/_khams gsum la mi bde bar 
[\[10a.7\]]'du shes pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta ba/_'dod pa rnams la mchil ma'i thal ba ltar spong bar 'du shes pa/_zas la mi 'thun par 'du shes pa/_mngon par 'byung ba la gzhol ba/_khyim na gnas pa la mngon par mi dga' ba/_bu dang bu mo rnams la dgrar 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]'du shes pa/_chung ma la sring mor 'du shes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi phyed par dad pa/_sems can thams cad dang mi 'thun pa med pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gnas pa med pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/_legs par 
[\[10b.2\]]bsnyen par rdzogs shing tshangs pa legs par spyad pa/_lus thams cad rtogs pa/_mos pa yongs su dag pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba/_sems las su rung ba/_mi rigs pa la brtson pa rnams rnam par spong ba/_rigs par brtson pa rnam par ston pa/_mtshan ma 
[\[10b.3\]]thams cad rnam par sel ba/_dus gsum mnyam pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang ba/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan la mngon par mi 
[\[10b.4\]]chags pa/_chos thams cad la mnyam pa/_'jig rten dang mi rtsod pa/_bya ba rnams la mi 'thun pa med pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pa/_nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la bzod pa thob pa/_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa/_nam 
[\[10b.5\]]mkha'i khams yongs su shes pa/_sems can gyi khams la mngon par mi chags pa/_mi skye ba/_mi 'gag pa/_gnas pa med pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings mngon sum du gyur pa/_shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba/_chos thams cad la gnyis su med pa/_
[\[10b.6\]]byang chub kyi sems la mtha' dang dbung med pa/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/_ye shes la sgrib pa med pa/_byang chub kyi phyir sems yongs su smin pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gzhan la rag 
[\[10b.7\]]ma las pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ston par 'du shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi 'byed pa/_bdud kyi las rnams rnam par spong ba/_'gro ba thams cad sprul pa dang mtshungs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la mig yor dang mtshungs pa/_
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]byang chub kyi sems yongs su tshol ba/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sems mnyam pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams blta ba la yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad la yon tan gyi chos thams cad mnyam pa 'di ni bzang 
[\[11a.2\]]skyong da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//bzang skyong chos de rnams ni ting nge 'dzin de yongs su skyed par 'gyur te/_bzang skyong de la ting nge 'dzin 
[\[11a.3\]]gang chos de rnams kyis yongs su skyed par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/bzang skyong da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de yang gang zhe na/_
[\[11a.4\]]bzang skyong de la dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par spyod par 'gyur la/_des gcig pu dben par song ste 'dug nas 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[11a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de phyogs gang rol na gnas te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston cing bzhugs snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/des ji skad du thos pa'i rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 
[\[11a.6\]]'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de/_da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bzhugs so/_/'tsho'o 
[\[11a.7\]]gzhes so/_/chos kyang ston to snyam du yid la byed de/_des kyang sems ma g.yengs pas de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed do/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na skyes pa'am/_bud med gang la la zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam du gzugs kyi rnam pa mthong ste/_dngul lam/_gser 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]ram/_mdza' bshes sam/_nye du'am/_snag gi gnyen mtshams sam/_mdza' bo'am/_yid du 'ong ba dang /_sdug pa dang mi 'thun pa med pa dag mthong la/_de rmi lam na de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod cing /_smra kun tu smra bar rmis pa las 
[\[11b.2\]]de sad nas ji ltar mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_smras pa dang /_kun tu smras pa de thams cad gzhan dag la yang brjod cing /_de rmi lam gyi mtshan ma rjes su dran pas mchi ma klog par byed pa de bzhin du/_bzang skyong byang chub 
[\[11b.3\]]sems dpa' khyim pa'am/_rab tu byung ba yang rung gcig pu dben par song ste 'dug la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med ji skad du thos pa'i rnam pas yid la byas te/_tshul khrims kyi phung po la skyon med cing dran pa 
[\[11b.4\]]g.yeng ba med par nyin zhag gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi'am/_lnga'am/_drug gam/_nyin zhag bdun du yid la bya'o/_/de gal te nyin zhag bdun du sems mi g.yeng bar de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la byed na de nyin zhag bdun 
[\[11b.5\]]yongs su tshang ste 'das nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong ngo /_/de gal te nyin mo bcom ldan 'das de ma mthong na/_de nyal ba'i rmi lam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i zhal ston to/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na 
[\[11b.6\]]bud med dam skyes pa nyal ba'i rmi lam na bdag nyid khyim na 'dug par yang mi shes/_phyogs na 'dug par yang mi shes shing /_de'i mig gi dbang po la rtsig pas sgrib par yang mi byed/_mun pa dang rab rib tu yang mi byed pa de bzhin du/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[11b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po de yang ji ltar 'jig rten gyi bar dag gis sgrib par yang mi byed/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_de bzhin du gzhan yang ri nag po rnams kyis mig gi dbang po la sgrib par mi byed pa de lta de ltar sems 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]bskyed de/_byang chub sems dpa' de lha'i mig thob pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yang ma yin/_lha'i rna ba'i khams thob pas/_dam pa'i chos nyan pa yang ma yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs thob pas/_'jig rten gyi khams der skad cig tu 
[\[12a.2\]]'gro ba yang ma yin gyi/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de mthong zhing bdag nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'dug pa snyam du yang shes la/_chos kyang nyan to/_/'chad pa 
[\[12a.3\]]thos nas kyang chos de dag kun 'dzin to/_/kun chub par byed do/_/'dzin par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de la bkur stir byed do/_/bla mar byed do/_/ri mor byed do/_/mchod par byed do/_/byang chub 
[\[12a.4\]]sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas kyang ji skad du thos pa dang /_ji ltar bzung ba dang /_ji ltar kun chub par byas pa'i chos de dag gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad do//_//bam po gnyis pa/_bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu 
[\[12a.5\]]zhig rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na 'dug pa las yangs pa can gyi grong khyer na smad 'tshong ma yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba zhig yod par thos so/_/skyes bu gnyis pas ni smad 'tshong ma a mra skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod par thos so/_/skyes bu gsum pas ni sngon gyi smad 
[\[12a.6\]]'tshong ma ud pa la'i mdog ces bya ba yod par thos so/_/de rnams kyis de dag thos nas so sor so so la sems chags par gyur mod kyi/_skyes bu de rnams kyis smad 'tshong ma de rnams mthong ba ni ma yin te/_ming dang gzugs dang kha dog tsam zhig thos pas 'dod 
[\[12a.7\]]chags kyi sems skyed par gyur to/_/de dag phyi phyir zhing de yid la byed bzhin du nyal ba dang /_rmi lam du yang smad 'tshong ma de dag gi drung du bdag cag dong ba snyam du shes te/_ji ltar skyes bu de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khod cing sngon ma nyal bar/_de lta de ltar 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa de bzhin du/_skyes bu de dag nyal nas kyang rmi lam na smad 'tshong ma de dag mthong zhing phan tshun sprad de/_'khrig pa'i chos la bsten nas/_'khrig pa la dad pa de dang yang bral bar gyur par yang rmis so/_/de dag sad nas ji ltar mthong ba 
[\[12b.2\]]dang /_thos pa dang shes pa dang /_rtogs pa'i rmi lam na myong ba rjes su dran nas bzang skyong khyod gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas khyod la don de dag brjod do/_/khyod kyis don de dag thos nas lung 'di nyid kyis ci nas kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 
[\[12b.3\]]phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/_/ngas kyang skyes bu de dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs par sad pa zhes bya ba rnams su 'gyur ro zhes lung ston to/_/skyes bu de 
[\[12b.4\]]dag bzod pa rnyed kyang da dung sngon gyi mtshan ma de dag mthong zhing rjes su dran no/_/bzang skyong de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[12b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de thos so/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang gzugs dang /_yon tan tsam zhig thos nas sems mi g.yeng bar/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[12b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de yang dag par rjes su dran par byed do/_/de phyi phyir zhing yid la byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo /_/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/_des de 
[\[12b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das chos gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar 'gyur zhes zhu ba zhu'o/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]zhu'o/_/de skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa kun tu bsten nges par bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas na 'jig 
[\[13a.2\]]rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa kun tu bsten nges par bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[13a.3\]]pa yid la byed pa ste/_'di ltar de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_
[\[13a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang gser gyi mdog lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/_gser gyi gzugs 'tsher zhing gsal la legs par gnas pa dang 'dra ba rin po che'i mchod sdong ltar shin tu brgyan pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi nang 
[\[13a.5\]]na chos kyang ston te ci nas kyang chud mi za ba de ltar ston to/_/ci zhig chud mi za zhe na/_sa chud mi gzon no/_/chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_'byung po dang /_lha dang /_bram ze dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po chud mi gzon to/_/gzugs chud mi gzon to/_/tshor ba dang /_
[\[13a.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa chud mi gzon to/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa rlom sems su mi byed/_mi dmigs/_mngon par mi chags/_yang dag par mi shes/_mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog_/yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_gang de 
[\[13a.7\]]ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs par yid la byed pas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa de ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin de bsgoms shing ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]bzang skyong khyod gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod do/_/bzang skyong de la khyod kyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to/_/de la ngas kyang skyes bu de ni ma 'ongs 
[\[13b.2\]]pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa rnyed pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston to/_/bzang skyong khyod nyid dang gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[13b.3\]]mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di las dbang du gyur pa yin te/_bzang skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na skyes bu gcig cig dgon pa'i mya ngam zhig tu song ba dang /_de bkres shing skoms nas 
[\[13b.4\]]rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non te de nyal ba dang /_rmi lam na bza' ba dang /_btung ba mang po zhig rnyed do/_/rnyed nas kyang ji tsam chog par zos te/_bkres pa dang skom pa de dag kyang med par gyur to/_/de sad pa dang yang lus dang lto ma rgyas par gyur nas/_de 'di snyam du 
[\[13b.5\]]'di lta ste/_rmi lam dang 'dra ba de lta bu'i chos shig yod do snyam ste/_de de ltar rtogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/bzang skyong de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[13b.6\]]khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba yang rung /_phyogs gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par thos pa'i phyogs de dang de logs su de bzhin gshegs pa de yid la byas na des sangs rgyas mthong ba thob po/_/des dngos po'i 'du shes su mi bya'i nam mkha'i 'du shes su 
[\[13b.7\]]bya ste/_de nam mkha'i 'du shes la shin tu gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su shin tu yid la byas pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa baidUr+ya'i sku gzugs lta bu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' des mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de lta bu de mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig rang skyes pa'i yul nas ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan zhig tu song ste phyin pa dang /_rang skyes pa'i yul de rjes 
[\[14a.2\]]su dran nas ji ltar mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_shes pa dang /_rtogs pa'i chos rnams yid la byed pa las rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non te/_de nyal ba dang rmi lam na rang skyes pa'i yul du song nas de na bdag nyid 'dug pa snyam du shes shing /_ji ltar sngon mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang 
[\[14a.3\]]bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de na 'gro zhing ldog pa dag kyang byed do/_/de sad pa dang gnyen 'dab dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams kyi nang du nga ni 'di ltar song song ngo /_/ngas ni 'di dag mthong ngo /_/
[\[14a.4\]]der ngas ni 'di dag myong ngo zhes don de dag kyang rjod do/_/bzang skyong de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba yang rung /_phyogs gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par thos pa'i phyogs de dang de logs su dran pa 
[\[14a.5\]]dang ldan zhing /_sems g.yeng ba med pas sangs rgyas mthong ba thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de yid la bya'o/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa baidUr+ya'i sku gzugs bzang por gnas par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste 
[\[14a.6\]]dper na dge slong mi sdug pa sgom pa zhig gis mdun na rnam par bam pa'i gzugs rnams mthong zhing rnam par sngos pa dang /_rnam par rnags pa dang /_rnam par dmar ba dang /_rnam par zos pa dang /_sha rnams 'phags pa'am/_sha dang khrag med pa'am/_dkar po 
[\[14a.7\]]'am/_kha dog dung dang 'dra ba'am/_keng rus shig mdun du mthong na rnam par sngos pa nas/_keng rus kyi bar du de dag gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_gang du yang ma song ngo /_/de dag sus kyang ma byas/_sus kyang ma bgags te/_bzang skyong 'on kyang dge slong de'i sems rtse 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]gcig pa'i dbang gis mdun na keng rus 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/bzang skyong de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa rnams phyogs gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs 
[\[14b.2\]]pa'i phyogs de dang de logs su sangs rgyas mthong ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yid la byed do/_/phyogs de dang de logs su yid la byas pas des phyogs de dang de logs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang 
[\[14b.3\]]skyong 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas mthong ba 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rgyu 'thun pa yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i phyir dang /_'di dag 
[\[14b.4\]]gsum tshogs shing 'dus pas/_des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na bud med dam skyes pa gang la la mgo 'khru zhing rgyan 'dogs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yod la/_de 'bru mar dang ba'i snod dam/_chu dang ba'i snod dam/_
[\[14b.5\]]yongs su phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor ram/_mthing bus bskus pa'i sa phyogs la/_bdag nyid blta bar bsams nas des der bdag nyid kyi gzugs mthong na/_bzang skyong de la ji snyam du sems/_'bru mar dang ba'i snod dam/_chu dang ba'i snod dam/_yongs su phyis pa'i me long 
[\[14b.6\]]gi dkyil 'khor ram/_mthing bus bskus pa'i sa'i phyogs de la/_gang skyes pa'am bud med kyi gzugs snang ba de skyes pa'am/_bud med gang yang de'i nang du song ba'am/_de'i nang du zhugs pa yod dam/_bzang skyong gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 
[\[14b.7\]]mchis mod kyi/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bru mar dang /_chab de dang zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pa'am/_me long gi dkyil 'khor de legs par yongs su phyis pa'am/_mthing bus bskus pa'i sa chen po de dag pa'i slad du gzugs brnyan mdun na mchis te/_chab dang /_
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'bru mar dang /_me long dang /_sa chen po de las skyes pa'am/_bud med kyi lus de byung ba'ang ma lags/_gang nas kyang ma mchis/_gang du yang ma mchis/_gang nas kyang ma skyes/_gang du yang ma 'gags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[15a.2\]]bzang skyong legs so legs so/_/bzang skyong khyod yang legs so/_/bzang skyong de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_gzugs rnams shin tu yongs su dag pa las gzugs brnyan rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de yang ting nge 'dzin 
[\[15a.3\]]'di shin tu bsgoms pas tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' des mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang zhu ba zhu zhing zhus pa lung bstan pas yi rangs par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ga zhig nas byon tam/_bdag ga zhig tu son 
[\[15a.4\]]tam snyam pa las/_des de bzhin gshegs pa de gang nas kyang ma byon par rab tu shes so/_/bdag gi lus kyang gang du yang ma song bar rab tu 'du shes nas/_de 'di snyam du khams gsum pa 'di dag ni sems tsam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bdag ji lta ji 
[\[15a.5\]]ltar rnam par rtog pa de lta de ltar snang ngo /_/sems de nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs te/_gzhan du na dmigs pa la brten nas skye'o/_/gang rten cing 'brel par byung ba de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/gang dngos po med pa de ni ma skyes 
[\[15a.6\]]pa'o/_/gang ma skyes pa de ni dmigs su med pa'o/_/gang dmigs su med pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa'o/_/gang rang bzhin stong pa de ni gdags su med pa'o/_/gang gdags su med pa de ni blta ba'am/_rnam par shes pa'am/_chags par bya ba'am/_bstan pa'am/_
[\[15a.7\]]chud gzan par bya ba'am/_rab tu gzhag par bya ba mi nus so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sems kyis sangs rgyas byed pa ste/_/sems nyid kyis kyang mthong ba'o/_/sems nyid nga yi sangs rgyas te/_sems nyid de bzhin 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]gshegs pa'o/_/sems nyid nga yi lus yin te/_/sangs rgyas sems kyis mthong ba'o/_/sems nyid nga yi byang chub ste/_/sems nyid rang bzhin med pa'o/_/sems kyis sems ni mi shes shing /_/sems kyis sems ni mi mthong ngo /_/sems su 
[\[15b.2\]]'du shes mi shes yin/_/sems su mi shes mya ngan 'da'/_/chos 'di dag ni snying po med/_/rlom sems las ni kun 'byung ste/_/stong pa nyid las gang rlom pa'i/_/rlom sems de 'dir stong pa yin/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste/_
[\[15b.3\]]gsum pa'o//_//bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i ye shes ni de lta bu yin no/_/bzang skyong chos bzhi dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i 
[\[15b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi 'phrogs pa'i dad pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa ste/_bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_
[\[15b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/
[\[15b.6\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du se gol brdab pa tsam yang bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed pa dang /_zla ba gsum gyi bar du se gol brdab pa tsam yang rmugs pa dang /_gnyid kyis mi non pa dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci ba byed pa ma gtogs par zla ba 
[\[15b.7\]]gsum gyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsams te 'chag pa la zhugs nas sa la mi 'dug pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang chos kyi sbyin pa rgya cher gtong ba'i steng du rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la mi re ba ste/_bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas blta bar sems can 
[\[16a.2\]]rnams la skul ba dang /_chos mnyan par sems can rnams la skul ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems skyed par sems can rnams la skul ba dang /_phrag dog med pa ste/_bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob 
[\[16a.3\]]bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du gzhug ste/_tha na ri mor yang 'drir 'jug pa 
[\[16a.4\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pas/_ting nge 'dzin 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin par legs par bris shing glegs bam sbyin pa dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi gang zag rnams mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[16a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir gnas pa ste/_bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/de 
[\[16a.6\]]nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/bde gshegs bstan pa la ni dad pa skyed/_/stong pa nyid kyi chos bshad ma smod cig_/brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnyid ni spangs byas te/_/zla gsum tshang bar nam yang ma 'dug shig_/
[\[16a.7\]]rnyed dang bkur sti tshigs bcad mi rten par/_/bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos ni bshad bya zhing /_/mtshungs pa med pa'i bstan pa rgyas par bya/_/rten pa med na chos 'di thob par 'gyur/_/phrag dog med cing khro ba bskyed mi bya/_/'dod chags spangs shing sems ni rnam 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]grol la/_/mnyam par gzhag cing bsam gtan dga' byas te/_/sbyor bar byed na chos 'di 'thob par 'gyur/_/gser mdog bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan mnga' la/_/mdzes shing kun nas yongs su rgyas gyur pa/_/gser gyi gzugs bzhin du ni lta sdug pa'i/_/
[\[16b.2\]]bsod nams mchog mtshan sangs rgyas dran par byos/_/sangs rgyas 'das pa'am yang na ma byon pa/_/thal mo sbyar te rjes su dran par byos/_/mi mchog gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa yang /_/de dag mchod phyir bde gshegs dran par byos/_/dang ba'i sems kyis me tog 
[\[16b.3\]]phreng ba dang /_/byug pa dag dang bza' dang bca' ba yis/_/bde bar gshegs pa la ni mchod pa byos/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog 'di 'dod pas na/_/sems ni rangs shing dga' ba 'dra med pas/_/rnga dung rdza rnga dag gi sil snyan dang /_/
[\[16b.4\]]dpe med ring bsrel la ni rol mo byed/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog ni 'dod pas na/_/ri mo legs par bris shing mtshan rdzogs la/_/gser gyi mdog 'dra rgya che skyon med pa'i/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang /_/dga' bar byed pa'i chos ni mdun bzhag nas/_/
[\[16b.5\]]tshul khrims yongs dag thos pa tshol byed la/_/le lo'i dngos po yongs su spangs byas na/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni ring por mi thogs rnyed/_/kun nas mnar sems su la'ang ma byed cig_/byams la gnas dang snying rje gnas pa dang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan btang snyoms byas na ni/_/
[\[16b.6\]]ting 'dzin 'di ni ring por mi thogs rnyed/_/chos smra ba la'ang de bzhin byams pa skyed/_/ston par 'du shes rtag tu nye bar zhog_/_nga rgyal ma byed chags pa spang bar byos/_/chos sbyin pa la nam kyang 'jungs ma gyur/_phan yon bzang po 'di dag blang bar byos/_/gdams ngag 
[\[16b.7\]]gnas ni bde bar gshegs pas bstan/_/'di ni sangs rgyas mang po'i bstan pa ste/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pas chos smra ba'i dge slong la gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par bya ste/_klan ka btsal ba med pa'i sems kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed la/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bzang skyong gal te byang chub sems 
[\[17a.2\]]dpa' des chos smra ba'i dge slong de la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gnas sam/_tha ba'i sems kyis gnas sam/_sems ma dad pas gnas na/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' des ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do/_/gal te chos smra ba'i dge slong 
[\[17a.3\]]de la ston pa'i 'du shes mi skyed na yang gnas de med do/_/bzang skyong de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar ma gus pas ni dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste/_dper na mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bu zhig gis nam thang zhing /_sprin med pa'i mtshan mo nam gyi gung thun la 
[\[17a.4\]]gdong gyen du bar snang la bltas na/_des der skar ma'i gzugs mang po rnams mthong ngo /_/bzang skyong de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa ni nam mkha'i 'du shes shin tu nye bar gnas 
[\[17a.5\]]shing sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgoms pas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du shar phyogs su bltas na/_tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas mang po rnams mig gi dbang po la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshegs 
[\[17a.6\]]chung ngus sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[17a.7\]]mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po tshegs chung ngus mig gi dbang po la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams bzhi dang /_'og gi phyogs dang /_steng gi phyogs rgyas par bya ste/_de ltar 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]phyogs bcur bltas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas mang po rnams mig gi dbang po la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag 
[\[17b.2\]]mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po/_tshegs chung ngus mig gi dbang po la snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[17b.3\]]bzang skyong de ltar sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa rnams ni tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas mang po rnams mig gi dbang po la snang bar 'gyur 
[\[17b.4\]]ro/_/tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya 
[\[17b.5\]]stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rnams tshegs chung ngus mig gi dbang po la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gang dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[17b.6\]]kyis thams cad thugs su chud pa dang /_thams cad gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan yod do/_/bzang skyong de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar 
[\[17b.7\]]gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa rnams ni tshegs chung ngus mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong 
[\[18a.2\]]ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[18a.3\]]kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/dper na mig ldan mi zhig mtshan mo dben pa'i dus/_/nam gyi gung thun ldang byas nam mkha' rnam dag la/_/des ni skar ma mang po brgya stong mthong gyur te/_/dran ldan bsams na nyin par du yang dran par 'gyur/_/de ltar byang 
[\[18a.4\]]chub sems dpas ting 'dzin 'di thob nas/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo mang po brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur/_/de las langs pa'i dus de na yang dran 'gyur zhing /_/'khor la 'jig rten mgon po 'di 'dra'o zhes kyang smra/_/ji ltar nga'i mig sangs rgyas spyan de rnam dag la/_/rab rib 
[\[18a.5\]]med cing yongs dag des ni 'jig rten lta ba ltar/_/de ltar rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan/_/rdul med ting 'dzin 'di yin des ni mi dbang mthong /_/stobs bcu rkang gnyis dbang po 'jig rten gtso lta'i tshe/_/thub rnams dngos po'i 'du shes nam yang mi skyed do/_/
[\[18a.6\]]dug bcom yongs dag dngos po'i 'du shes med pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo'i yon tan khyad par nyon/_chos mchog bsil ba de dag kyang ni mnyan par byos/_/stong pa nyid chos bde ba myur du dran par byos/_/ngas kyang rgyal ba'i byang chub rnyed nas skye dgu la/_/skye 
[\[18a.7\]]bo mang la bde ba'i chos 'di bshad par bya/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshe dpag med skyes nas/_/'jig rten mgon po brgya stong mang po mthong gyur pa/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo mang po brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dran ldan dge slong bzang po kun dga' bos/_/nga las thos pa rab tu bzung zhing de yang kun 'dzin pa/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpas ting 'dzin 'di thob na/_/chos mang thos shing de yang thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas yang dag dga' bskyed la/_/
[\[18b.2\]]'jig rten gsang tshig sna tshogs thams cad spang byos te/_/myur du dad par byos la chos kyi sbyin pa'ang byin/_/de ltar yongs dag zhi ba'i sa 'di thob par 'gyur/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//bzang skyong de la byang chub 
[\[18b.3\]]sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_yongs su bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir spro ba dang brtson 'grus chen po bskyed par bya'o/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i gru rin po ches yongs su gang ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po rgal te 'jigs pa thams cad 
[\[18b.4\]]spangs pa las/_tshu rol gyi 'gram du chag na/_de la 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams kyis sgra chen po dang /_skad chen po dang /_'o dod bod par bya'o/_/bdag cag ni rin po che 'di dag las nyams so zhes mya ngan chen pos smre sngags kyang gdon par bya'o/_/bzang skyong de bzhin 
[\[18b.5\]]du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'di lta bu 'di rna lam du grag par gyur la/_thos nas kyang glegs bam du 'dri bar mi byed/_ston par mi byed/_'don par mi byed/_
[\[18b.6\]]'dzin par mi byed/_klog par mi byed/_'chad par mi byed/_sgom par mi byed/_nan tan gyis sgrub par mi byed na/_bzang skyong de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis sgra chen po dang /_skad chen po dang /_'o dod bod par bya'o/_/'di ltar ting nge 'dzin zab mo rin po che 'di lta bu 
[\[18b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa/_sangs rgyas kyis bstod pa/_sangs rgyas kyis stod du bcug pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de thos nas yi ger 'dri bar mi byed/_ston par mi byed/_'don par mi byed/_'dzin par mi byed/_klog par 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]mi byed/_'chad par mi byed/_sgom par mi byed/_nan tan gyis sgrub par mi byed cing /_nga rgyal gyis non la mi shes te/_mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs pa mi 'dzin pa'i sems can de dag ni ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'di lta bu 'di las yongs su nyams so zhes 
[\[19a.2\]]mya ngan chen pos smre sngags kyang gdon par bya'o/_/bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan mi 'dod par 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni bzang skyong yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yin par ngas bshad do/_/bzang skyong gang ting nge 'dzin 
[\[19a.3\]]rin po che 'di lta bu 'di thos nas yi ger 'dri bar mi byed/_ston par mi byed/_'don par mi byed/_'dzin par mi byed/_klog par mi byed/_'chad par mi byed/_sgom par mi byed/_nan tan gyis sgrub par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni yongs su nyams pa ji tsam du 'gyur ba ltos 
[\[19a.4\]]shig_/bzang skyong sems can de lta bu de rnams la ni chos de lta bu dag ched mi che bar ngas bshad do/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu gang la la zhig byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhig la tsan dan dmar po sar pa zhig byin pa dang /_de de la mi gtsang 
[\[19a.5\]]ba'i 'du shes bskyed do/_/btsog pa'i 'du shes bskyed do/_/de la skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can tsan dan gyi tshong pa zhig gis 'di skad du kye skyes bu khyod tsan dan sar pa 'di la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes ma skyed cig_/btsog pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig_/kye skyes bu 'di'i dri ji tsam du 
[\[19a.6\]]dga' bar byed pa re zhig snoms shig_/kye skyes bu 'di'i kha dog ci tsam du blta na sdug pa yang ltos shig smras pa dang /_byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi skyes bu des tsan dan dmar po de mthong nas snom mi 'dod pa'i phyir rang gis kyang ma blangs/_lta mi 'dod 
[\[19a.7\]]pa'i phyir mig kyang 'dzums par byed pa de bzhin du/_bzang skyong ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_dge slong byang chub sems dpa' rlom sems can lus ma bsgoms pa/_sems ma bsgoms pa/_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/_shes rab ma bsgoms pa/_tshul khrims 'chal pa/_dam pa'i 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]chos nges pa'i don rin po che mi len pa/_dam pa'i chos nges pa'i don rin po che yongs su spong bar byed pa/_shes rab 'chal pa/_rab las yongs su nyams pa/_bsam gtan rnyed pas lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gang zag la rten pa/_gang zag tu lta ba/_gang zag tu gnas pa/_
[\[19b.2\]]chos su dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa/_stong pa nyid bshad pas skrag pa de dag da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad pa thos na/_rna blags te nyan par mi byed/_mngon par dad par mi byed/_'dzin par mi byed/_kun chub par mi byed/_'chang bar 
[\[19b.3\]]mi byed/_klog par yang mi byed na/_gzhan dag la rgya cher 'chad pa lta ci smos/_de dag de'i phyir byams pa dang dga' ba rgya chen po yang mi 'thob na/_de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta ci smos pa'i steng du thos nas kyang spong bar byed do/_/mngon par ma dad do/_/mi len to/_/mos par mi 
[\[19b.4\]]byed do/_/dpya ba'i bsam pa dang /_bsting ba'i bsam pa dang /_smad pa'i bsam pas tshig kyang 'di skad du gsung rab 'di dag 'bar dang /_'di ltar dge slong kun dga' bo 'dra ba 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang /_'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar to zhes zer zhing /_lkog tu dong nas 
[\[19b.5\]]kyang phan tshun du mdo sde 'di lta bu dag ni rang gis byas pa rang bzo byas pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba ma yin no zhes de skad kyang rjod cing smod par byed de/_skyes bu blun po de lta bu dag ni dam pa'i chos rin po che las yongs su nyams pa dang /_
[\[19b.6\]]dam pa'i chos rin po che yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can de tsan dan dmar po de mthong nas mi bsnom pa'i phyir sna yang 'gog pa dang /_mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir mig kyang 'dzums pa de bzhin du/_bzang skyong skyes bu blun 
[\[19b.7\]]po de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/_phyi phyir zhing mnyan par mi sems/_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_bcang bar bya ba dang /_bklag par bya bar mi sems pa'i steng du thos nas kyang 'di lta ste/_nyan mi 'dod pa'i phyir gnas de nas 'gro bar 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu rin po che 'tshong ba la la zhig gis skyes bu blun po'i rang bzhin can de rnams la nor bu rin po che baidUr+ya rin thang med pa zhig bstan par bsams pa dang /_de la skyes bu blun po'i rang bzhin can de dag 
[\[20a.2\]]gis nor bu rin po che de mthong nas/_de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu nor bu rin po che 'di'i rin ji tsam/_rin po che 'tshong ba des de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nor bu rin po che 'di'i 'od kyis sa phyogs ji tsam khyab pa de tsam gyi phyogs bzhir rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su 
[\[20a.3\]]gang bar byas pa de byin cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nor bu rin po che 'di'i rin thang tshang ba ni de yin no/_/sems can blun pa'i rang bzhin can de dag gis de las nor bu rin po che de'i rin thang thos pa dang /_gad mos 'debs shing 'phya bar byed/_sting bar byed la/_nor bu rin po che de yang 
[\[20a.4\]]lag pa gnyis kyis dpog par byed do/_/bzang skyong de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong rtog pa mang ba/_bsod nams chung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba ma byas pa/_nga rgyal gyis gzir ba/_phrag dog gis gzir ba/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_
[\[20a.5\]]tshigs su bcad pas gzir ba/_tshul khrims rnams yongs su ma dag pa/_ting nge 'dzin rnams ma thob pa/_shes rab rnams ma thob pa/_thos pa nyung ba/_slob dpon dang ma 'grogs pa/_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_gang zag la rten pa/_gang zag la gnas pa/_chos su 
[\[20a.6\]]dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams ni stong pa nyid bshad pas skrag par 'gyur te/_de dag da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rtog par mi 'gyur/_mngon par dad par mi 'gyur/_yid ches par mi 'gyur/_mos par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du 
[\[20a.7\]]thos kyang gad mos 'debs par 'gyur/_'phya bar 'gyur/_sting bar 'gyur ro/_/lkog tu dong nas kyang phan tshun nas smod par byed spong bar byed cing /_tshig kyang 'di skad du dge slong 'di dag ni spyi brtol can no/_/dge slong 'di dag ni mu cor smra ba ste/_'di ltar 'di dag ni sangs 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]rgyas kyis ma gsungs pa/_rang gis byas shing rang bzo byas pa/_tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs pa/_gtam tsam du bshad pa la mdo sde'i ming gis 'chad pa ngo mtshar to zhes zer zhing /_mdo sde 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes de dag skye bo rnams la yang de ltar 
[\[20b.2\]]shes par byed do/_/de ltar skyes bu blun po bsod nams chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba ma byas pa/_bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yongs su spangs pa chos rin po che las phyi rol tu gyur pa de dag bsod nams chung ba nyid la sten par 'gyur/_sgom par 
[\[20b.3\]]'gyur/_mang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong de na yang sems can gzhan kha cig sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas/_'di lta ste rgyas par bya ba'i phyir 'dzin par 'gyur/_
[\[20b.4\]]kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/_yi ger 'drir 'jug par 'gyur/_'chad par 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad par 'gyur/_lhag par dad par 'gyur/_rtog pa mang bar 'gyur/_mos pa mang bar 'gyur/_spyod 
[\[20b.5\]]lam dang bar 'gyur/_ngo tsha shes pa dang 'gyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_bslab pa 'dod par 'gyur/_zab mo la mos par 'gyur/_shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur/_mang du thos par 'gyur/_byams pa la gnas pa dang snying rje thob par 'gyur/_de dag ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 
[\[20b.6\]]gang la lar song ba der ston par 'gyur/_yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/_'di 'dra ba 'di ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas par gyur cig_/rgyas par gyur cig_/snyam du sems skyed par 'gyur ro/_/bzang 
[\[20b.7\]]skyong lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor 'di rnams kyi mdun du khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phul ba bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang rtog par byed/_mngon par dad par byed/_
[\[21a.2\]]yid ches par byed la 'di ni bden pa nyid do zhes mos par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin no zhes tshig tu yang brjod na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 
[\[21a.3\]]kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang gis stong gsum thams cad du/_/rin po ches ni bkang byas te/_/bla med byang chub btsal ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/_/gang gis sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i/_/mdo sde ting 'dzin 'di lta bu/_/
[\[21a.4\]]thos nas mos par byed na ni/_/de yi bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/sgyu dang gya gyu g.yo dang ldan/_/rgod cing dbang po ma bsdus la/_/sdig pa'i grogs pos zin gyur pa/_/blo ngan rnams ni dad mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims 'chal cing sdig chos can/_/nga zhes nga rgyal dam du 
[\[21a.5\]]gnas/_/phan tshun dag nas 'dus nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i bstan la gad mos 'debs/_/mdo sde de dag chos kyi rgyal/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni ma gsungs zhes/_/ma bsdams de dag de 'dra ba'i/_/tshig dag kyang ni brjod par 'gyur/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin mdo 'di la/_/thos nas rtog 
[\[21a.6\]]par mi 'gyur ba/_/ma rungs chud zos mi shes shing /_/lta ba ngan la dmigs can no/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa yi/_/mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di dag la/_/bsod nams chung zhing dmigs gnas pas/_/dad par bya ba mi nus so/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dra ba/_/thos nas dga' 
[\[21a.7\]]bar 'gyur ba ni/_/mi mchog tu ni mi 'gyur snyam/_/de la the tsom ma byed cig_/gang zhig tshul khrims yongs dag cing /_/lta ba'ang rtag tu drang ba dang /_/chos 'di la ni gus bcas pa/_/ngas ni de la chos bshad do/_/gang gis dpa' chen 'jig rten mgon/_/'od byed pa ni mthong 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]gyur pa/_/de dag don du bshad par byas/_/de dag kyang ni chos 'dzin shog_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//bam po gsum pa/_bzang skyong da ltar nga ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad pa'i tshe gang gis nga la mnyes par 
[\[21b.2\]]byed pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba'am/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas spong ba'am/_smod par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do/_/bzang skyong 'di na dge ba'i bshes 
[\[21b.3\]]gnyen gyi lag tu song ba las kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas mngon par dad par mi byed/_yid ches par mi byed/_mos par mi byed na/_gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bzang skyong de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mang du thos pa de ni de 
[\[21b.4\]]ltar bsgrub par dka'o/_/sangs rgyas blta ba de ni de ltar rnyed par dka'o/_/bzang skyong sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos par bya ba ni de ltar dka'o/_/bzang skyong sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed par byed pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[21b.5\]]'di yang de ltar bsgrub par dka'o/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba gang la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur/_gad mos mi 'debs/_'phya bar mi byed/_sting bar mi byed/_spong bar mi byed pa'i steng du thos nas kyang 
[\[21b.6\]]rjes su yi rang bar byed/_mngon par dad par byed/_yid ches par byed/_'dun par byed cing ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_yi ger bri ba dang /_bshad pa dang /_bsgom pa'i phyir 'dod pa skyed pa ni bzang skyong 
[\[21b.7\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de lta bu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to/_/bzang skyong skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs shing /_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen ce na/_
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]gang dag ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_kun chub par byed par 'gyur ba dang /_'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /_klog par 'gyur ba dang /_yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang /_ston par 'gyur ba dang /_sgom par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag ni bzang skyong 
[\[22a.2\]]tshul khrims 'chal par mi 'gyur/_dad pa med par mi 'gyur/_chos mi 'dod par mi 'gyur/_log par lta bar mi 'gyur/_dmigs pa la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur gyis/_bzang skyong rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de lta bu de dag ni dad pa can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste chos 
[\[22a.3\]]'di lta bu 'di dag len par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de lta bu de dag ni rtog pa mang ba dang mos pa mang ba dang yid ches pa dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_zab mo la mos pa rnams su 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de lta bu de dag ni bsod nams chung ba dang /_dge ba'i
