[\[42a.4\]]mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/skyes nas kyang des 'jig rten gyis khams de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa glog gi lha zhes bya ba mnyes par byas so/_/bskal pa de nyid la rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta 
[\[42a.5\]]bur skyes te/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu de las mngon par byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog gi lha de las rab tu byung ste/_lo brgyad khrir ting nge 'dzin 'di sgom zhing tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/des de bzhin gshegs 
[\[42a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsum pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mnyes par byas so/_/bskal pa de nyid la bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes te/_bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po lta bu de las mngon par byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[42a.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi rgyal po de las rab tu byung ste/_lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom zhing tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/tshong dpon gyi bu bzang sbyin de yang de nas phyis bskal pa brgyad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bzang skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu bzang sbyin zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du de ltar the tsom mam/_yid gnyis sam/_som nyi za bar gyur na bzang skyong khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[42b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu bzang sbyin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/bzang skyong tshong dpon gyi bu bzang sbyin de chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod la chos la 'dun pa dang ldan te/_de'i phyir 
[\[42b.3\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ltos/_bzang skyong da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes skyed 
[\[42b.4\]]pa dang /_/thos pa rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur la/_ji tsam du phan pa mang por gyur pa la ltos/_bzang skyong de bas na khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/yi ger bri bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/bklag par bya'o/_/bzung zhing kun chub par byas nas gzhan 
[\[42b.5\]]dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/brjod par bya'o/_/bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la'ang brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang skyong de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di phyi phyir bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[42b.6\]]ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /_rang byung gi ye shes dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang /_bla na med pa'i ye shes dang /_ltag na med pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ba ma gtogs 
[\[42b.7\]]par chos gzhan 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang bzang skyong yang dag par smra bas gang la mig tu gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams skyed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skyed par byed pa zhes smra ba de dag ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/yang bzang skyong yang dag 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]par smra bas gang la sangs rgyas kyi rigs so/_/chos kyi rigs so/_/dge 'dun gyi rigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/_/thos pa'i rigs so/_/thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu'o/_/thos pa bsags pa'o/_/thos pa'i gzhi'o/_/yon tan bsags pa'o/_/bzod pa skyed pa'o/_/
[\[43a.2\]]byams pa skyed pa'o/_/snying rje thob pa'o/_/byang chub skyed pa'i chos so zhes smra ba de dag ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/yang bzang skyong yang dag par smra bas gang la lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mun pa sel bar byed pa'i chos 
[\[43a.3\]]so/_/snang ba chen po byed pa'i chos so zhes smra ba de dag ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/yang bzang skyong yang dag par smra bas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[43a.4\]]par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad skyed par byed pa'i chos so zhes smra ba de dag ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/bzang skyong 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du/_'jig rten 
[\[43a.5\]]gyi khams gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas kyang lta/_chos kyang nyan/_dge 'dun yang lta bar byed pa'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ji tsam du rgya che ba la ltos/_bzang skyong de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 
[\[43a.6\]]'dzin rin po che 'di sgrub par 'dod pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brtul ba brtan par bya'o/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brtul ba brtan par bya zhe na/_bzang skyong 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[43a.7\]]pos lus la lus kyi rjes su blta bar bya ste/_lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam par brtag par ni mi bya'o/_/tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su blta bar bya ste/_tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam par brtag par ni mi bya'o/_/sems la sems kyis rjes su blta bar bya ste/_
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam par brtag par ni mi bya'o/_/chos la chos kyi rjes su blta bar bya ste/_chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam par brtag par ni mi bya'o/_/bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang 
[\[43b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang /_nyan thos lus mngon sum du byed pa rnams ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin 'di la su zhig mngon par dad par 'gyur/_bzang skyong de ci'i phyir zhe na/_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[43b.3\]]dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni 'khrul to/_/bzang skyong de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag nyid yid la bya/_chos de dag nyid la blta bar bya/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang yid la bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang blta bar bya/_chos kyang 
[\[43b.4\]]mnyan par bya ste mngon par zhen par ni mi bya'o/_/bzang skyong de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa/_rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/_thog ma nyid nas nye bar zhi ba'o/_/bzang skyong chos 'di dag thams cad ni dmigs pa'i dbang du gyur pas 
[\[43b.5\]]dmigs su med pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni yid la bya ba de nyid kyis dben pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dmigs su med pas gzung du med pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bas mi chags pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni bdag 
[\[43b.6\]]dang sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni rgyu'i dbang las gyur pas nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni srog dang gang zag mi dmigs pa'i phyir bgrang du med pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 
[\[43b.7\]]'od gsal bas mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir nye bar gyur pa'o/_/bzang skyong rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom par 'dod par gyur na/_des ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]rnams kyang mthong zhing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag kyang sgom par byed/_chos kyang nyan cing chos la chos 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag kyang sgom par byed la/_bdag kyang mi dmigs shing chos kyang mi snyems pa de ltar mtshan 
[\[44a.2\]]ma'i rnam pa'i 'jug pas mtshan ma med pa'i 'jug pa la 'jug par bya'o/_/bzang skyong de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po'i 'du shes can gyis ni sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi 'du shes can gyis chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par smin pa la re bas ni gtong ba phun sum tshogs par mi 
[\[44a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bas ni tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos la ser sna byed pas ni mang du thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zag la rten pas ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bre mo gtam la mngon par dga' bas ni dben pa mthong 
[\[44a.4\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gnas la dga' bas ni 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/rjes su chags pas ni skyon mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gnod sems la mngon par dga' bas ni bzod pa dang nges par mi 'gyur ro/_/sdang zhing zhe 'gras pas ni phan yon mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nyan 
[\[44a.5\]]thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos gang gi phyir bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mngon sum du mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' la ni ser sna mi 'byung ngo /_/dmigs pa 
[\[44a.6\]]can gyi stong pa nyid sgom par mi 'gyur ro/_/le lo can ni mngon par rtogs pa thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni zhi gnas su mi 'gyur ro/_/rten pa ni bsgom pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong de bas na ting nge 'dzin 'di ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar/_lha dang bcas 
[\[44a.7\]]pa'i 'jig rten la gtad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu khrag khrig phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/srog chags lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]pa'i skye dgu brgyad stong yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sems rnam par grol bar gyur nas/_gang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa de dag ming tha dad kyis 
[\[44b.2\]]kyang tshe'i tshad gcig par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/_bzang skyong yang gang gis nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na nga la mnyes par byas pa lta ci smos/_gang gis nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na grogs 
[\[44b.3\]]por gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de dag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang ye shes mthong ba skyes so/_/dge slong brgyad brgya yang len pa med 
[\[44b.4\]]par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang dag ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dzin gyur pa/_/de dag shes rab tshad ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/tshul khrims tshad dang rdul dang dri ma med/_/tshul khrims rnam dag sems 
[\[44b.5\]]kyang yongs su dag_/gang dag ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dzin gyur pa/_/de dag shes rab nams kyang nyams pa med/_/ting 'dzin thos nas nams kyang nyams pa med/_/zla ba bzhin du yon tan thams cad ston/_/gang dag ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dzin gyur pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa bstod/_/
[\[44b.6\]]des ni chos kyang bsam mi khyab pa mthong /_/de la bsam mi khyab pa'i lha rnams bsrung /_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab byung /_/des ni bsam gyis mi khyab chos bshad pa/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dzin gyur pa/_/des ni thams cad mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas/_/gang zhig ting 
[\[44b.7\]]'dzin 'di ni 'dzin gyur pa/_/rgyal ba gang dag sdug bsngal kun sgrol ba/_/'jig rten don du byung ste bzhugs pa yi/_/rgyal ba de dag de yis gus byas 'gyur/_/ma byon sangs rgyas mang po bsam mi khyab/_/dang ba'i sems kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]zhig lta 'dod pas/_/ting nge 'dzin mchog 'di ni gzung bar byos/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba/_/mi de dag ni rnyed pa bsam mi khyab/_/de dag mi yi 'jig rten legs par 'ongs/_/rab byung legs spyad bsod snyoms legs par zos/_/phyi ma'i dus na ting 
[\[45a.2\]]'dzin mchog 'di ni/_/gang gi lag tu gnas par gyur pa de/_/rnyed pa dam pa shin tu legs par rnyed/_/des ni bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyang bzung /_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[45a.3\]]po bzang skyong stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i slad du sang 
[\[45a.4\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag gi bshos gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis bcom 
[\[45a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ste/_dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_dge slong ma skye dgu'i 
[\[45a.6\]]bdag mo chen mo go ta mI'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma 
[\[45a.7\]]thugs brtse ba'i slad du sang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /_thabs gcig bdag gi bshos gsol bar ci gnang /_dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs snying brtse ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo /_/de nas byang chub 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau'u ta mIs cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas/_dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ngo /_/song nas kyang ling 
[\[45b.2\]]tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_ling tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nye du bo rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'dir rgyal po'i khab 'di'am/_ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan dag nas dge bsnyen ji snyed cig 
[\[45b.3\]]'dus la thams cad 'khor dang bcas te/_kho bo'i tshig gis sang gi gdugs tshod la mgron du bos shig_/de nas ling tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas kyi 'khor der dge bsnyen ji snyed cig 'dus pa de dag thams cad la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis khyed 
[\[45b.4\]]cag 'khor dang bcas par sang mgron du bos so zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_ling tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_khyim bdag ded dpon che bzang dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu phug sbas dang /_bram ze 'dam bus byin dang /_khyim 
[\[45b.5\]]bdag chu lha dang /_khyim bdag dbang pos byin dang /_khyim bdag gzhan dag kyang rang rang gi stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la yang mgo bos 
[\[45b.6\]]phyag 'tshal te/_'od ma'i tshal nas byung nas/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_bzang skyong gi khyim ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_de nyid kyi nub mo de dag thams cad dang tha na slong ba rnams kyi phyir yang bca' bar bya ba dang /_bza' bar bya ba dang /_myang bar bya ba dang /_bldag 
[\[45b.7\]]par bya ba bsod pa mang du sbyar ro/_/zas ro brgya pa yang bshams shing g.yos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam pa rlabs po che dang /_brnyas pa med pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par zhugs pa yin no/_/de 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis mi mang po yang sprul te/_skyo ba skye ba'i tshul du khyim bdag de rnams la byang chub kyi phan gdags pa dang /_yongs su smin par bya 
[\[46a.2\]]ba'i phyir brtson par byed par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang /_ling tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas de dag dang /_khyim bdag gzhan dag kyang rang rang gi gnyen rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan par phyag dar bya ba rnams kyang 
[\[46a.3\]]phyag dar legs par byas/_dar gyi lda ldi ni bres/_spos kyi snod kyis ni bdugs/_me tog gi sil mas ni 'thor du btsud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong rang gi gnyen dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'ang brgyan/_ro brgya dang ldan pa'i 
[\[46a.4\]]bshos kyang sbyar te/_de'i mtshan mo 'das nas gnyen rnams kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_
[\[46a.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bshos kyi dus la bab po/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bshos kyi tshod la bab po/_/bshos ni sbyar lags te da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_zhes gdugs tshod la bab par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe 
[\[46a.6\]]chos gos dang sham thabs banabs/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig_/dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams dang yang thabs cig bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[46a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gi khyim ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/_bdag gi khyim 'di yangs shing rgya che 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]la bai dUr+ya sngon po lta bur gyur te/_grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad kyis kyang mthong zhing 'khor mang po 'di dag kyang /_bag yangs su 'khod pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa mngon par mdzad na legs so snyam du bsams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis byang chub sems 
[\[46b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i sems kyi rtog pa mkhyen nas/_ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gi khyim de yangs shing rgya che la bai dUr+ya sngon po lta bur gyur te/_grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad kyis kyang ci nas 
[\[46b.3\]]kyang mthong zhing 'khor de dag thams cad kyang /_bag yangs su 'khod pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gi khyim du gshegs so/_/gshegs nas kyang dge slong dang /_dge 
[\[46b.4\]]slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams dang /_thabs cig tu gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_ling tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_khyim bdag ded dpon che [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang 
[\[46b.5\]]tshong dpon gyi bu phug sbas dang /_bram ze 'dam bus byin dang /_khyim bdag dbang pos byin dang /_khyim bdag chu lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par rig_/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams 
[\[46b.6\]]kyang 'khod par rig nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams la rang gi lag gis bca' bar bya ba dang /_bza' bar bya ba dang /_myang bar bya ba dang /_ro sna brgya dang ldan pa'i zas bsod 
[\[46b.7\]]pa mang pos tshim par byas so/_/bstabs so/_/rang gi lag gis bza' bar bya ba dang /_bca' bar bya ba dang /_myang bar bya ba dang /_ro sna brgya dang ldan pa'i zas bsod pa mang pos tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol phyag bcabs/_lhung bzed gyur 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]par rig pa dang /_ci rigs pa'i stan zhig blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mdun gyis bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_lid tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung 
[\[47a.2\]]gnas dang /_khyim bdag ded dpon che bzang dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu phug sbas dang /_bram ze 'dam bus byin dang /_khyim bdag dbang pos byin dang /_khyim bdag chu lha rnams dang 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[47a.3\]]du bcug go/_/yang dag par gzengs bstod do/_/yang dag par mgu bar mdzad do/_/chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par mgu bar mdzad nas bzhengs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[47a.4\]]dang thabs cig tu slar gshegs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong zas kyi bya ba byas nas rang gi mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang /_lhan cig tu srog chags 'bum du tshang bas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan 
[\[47a.5\]]cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_ded dpon che 
[\[47a.6\]]bzang dang /_phug sbas dang /_'dam bus byin dang /_mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu lha rnams lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_phyogs gcig 
[\[47a.7\]]tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis 'khor thams cad 'khod par rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur/_rna blags te nyan pa dang /_sems mi g.yeng ba'i slad du kun tu 'dzin pa dang mi bskyud par 'gyur/_kun tu bzung nas kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang 
[\[47b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong chos lnga dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rna blags te 
[\[47b.3\]]nyan pa dang /_sems mi g.yeng ba'i phyir kun tu 'dzin pa dang /_mi brjed par 'gyur ba/_kun tu bzung nas kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong lnga gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa yin te/_zad mi shes pa zad 
[\[47b.4\]]pa dang bral ba/_mi zad pa rnam par mi zad pa/_rnyog pa med pa rnyog pa las yang dag par 'das pa/_dri ma med pa/_dri ma dang bral ba/_rdul med pa rdul dang bral ba/_rdul las 'das pa/_rdul thams cad dang bral ba mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/_bzang skyong chos dang po 
[\[47b.5\]]'di dang ldan na/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du byed thams cad la smod cing /_byang chub la rten pa ma gtogs par 
[\[47b.6\]]skye ba'i gnas thams cad mi 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta bar 'dod cing /_mu stegs can gyi skye mched thams cad dang /_mu stegs can gyi sngags thams cad la mi rten pa dang /_'dod pa'i longs spyod mi 'dod pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la mngon par dga' 
[\[47b.7\]]ba ste 'khrig pa'i chos spangs nas de rtog pa tsam gyis kyang 'dod pa la mi rten na dbang po gnyis sprod pa lta ci smos te/_bzang skyong chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]chen po sems tshad med pa rnams bsgoms shing /_sems shin tu legs par bsdus la gnod pa med pa'i sems su gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par gyur cing sems can thams cad la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[48a.2\]]sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pa ste de bzhi'o/_/bzang skyong chos gsum po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po dang 
[\[48a.3\]]ldan par gyur pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po la spyod pa yin te/_de dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma ltung ba byung ba mi gleng zhing dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas bzod pa yin/_de mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus pa dang bcas/_zhe sa dang 
[\[48a.4\]]bcas shing ston par 'du shes pa yin/_bdag kyang bdag tu smra ba ma yin/_sems can du smra ba ma yin/_srog tu smra ba ma yin/_gang zag tu smra ba ma yin/_gso bar smra ba ma yin/_skyes bur smra ba ma yin/_shed can las skyes su smra ba ma yin/_shed bur smra ba ma yin zhing gzhan dag 
[\[48a.5\]]kyang chos 'di la skul ba ste/_bzang skyong chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa yin/_lus kyi spyod 
[\[48a.6\]]pa yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_yid kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_lta ba yongs su dag pa dang /_'tsho ba yongs su dag cing mang du thos pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang thabs cig tu dgongs pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin te/_bzang skyong 
[\[48a.7\]]chos lnga po 'di dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong chos lnga po de dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]gzhan lnga dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_bzang skyong 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa byed pa yin te/_sems la bsri ba med pa/_'jungs pa med pa/_lhug par gtong ba/_lag pa brkyang ba/_sbyin pa bgeng bar dga' 
[\[48b.2\]]ba/_rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba/_'gyod pa dang bral ba/_sbyin pa byin nas 'gyod par mi byed pa yin te/_bzang skyong chos dang po 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs 
[\[48b.3\]]rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di tha na thos pa tsam yang 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa byed pa yin te/_'di ltar bla na med pa'i chos sbyin par byed pa/_shin tu nges par gsungs pa'i tshig dang /_
[\[48b.4\]]yi ge dang /_thogs pa med pa'i tshig dang /_yi ge dang /_'chab pa med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang /_zab mo don dam pa'i tshul bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i bla na med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gtong zhing de la gnas par gyur pa bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_des pa phun 
[\[48b.5\]]sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /_de gzhan gyis kha byas shing spyos kyang mi khro/_mi gshe/_gnod par mi byed/_rmongs par mi byed/_yi chad par mi 'gyur/_khro ba mang bar mi 'gyur zhing /_'jigs pa med pa yin te/_bzang skyong chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems 
[\[48b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /_rgyas par byed par bya ba'i phyir gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag 
[\[48b.7\]]par bya/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya/_glegs bam du'ang bris te bcang bar bya zhing chos la 'jungs pa med par bya ste/_bzang skyong chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phrag dog med pa/_gdung ba med pa/_rmugs pa dang gnyid dang bral ba/_sgrib pa rnams dang bral ba/_bdag la mi stod pa/_gzhan la mi smod pa yin te/_bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[49a.2\]]dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pa dang ldan pa dang /_dang ba mang ba yin/_rgan pa dang /_bar ma dang /_gzhon pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/_rdzes dang bcas pa yin/_byas pa shes pa dang byas pa 
[\[49a.3\]]gzo ba yin/_de byas pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]la'ang drin du gzon mang po lta la ci smos/_bden pa'i tshig la gnas shing gzhan du mi smra ba yin te/_bzang skyong chos de lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs 
[\[49a.4\]]su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/zab mo'i chos la bzod pa skyed byed cing /_/'gro ba thams cad la ni smod byed pa/_/'gro ba drug po kun kyang mi 'dod pa/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin myur du 'thob/_/phas kyi rgol ba kun la mi rten cing /_/gsang tshig nyan par mi byed ga la 'dzin/_/
[\[49a.5\]]'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ni skyo bar gyur/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin myur du thob/_/tshul khrims rnam dag tshangs par spyod gnas te/_/bud med la ni nams kyang rtog mi skyed/_/'dod chags spangs shing bde gshegs sras gyur pa/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin myur du thob/_/rnam smin mi 
[\[49a.6\]]re bar ni sbyin pa sbyin/_/rten pa med par byin nas mi gdung zhing /_/sangs rgyas ye shes reg bya ma gtogs par/_/sbyin pa sbyin nas smon pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/sems can snying brtse'i phyir ni sbyin byin nas/_/mya ngan byed pa med cing 'gyod pa med/_/sbyin dang dul dang bsdams la 
[\[49a.7\]]rtag tu gnas/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin 'di rnyed 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'jungs med sbyin bdag sbyin byed pa/_/gya nom pa dang yid 'ong sbyin pa byin/_/byin nas de ni yid kyang dga' bar 'gyur/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin 'di rnyed 'gyur/_/bde gshegs gsungs pa zab cing zhi ba 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]yi/_/gya nom mdo sde dag ni 'chang byed cing /_/gang dag chos kyi sbyin bdag gyur pa ni/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin 'di rnyed 'gyur/_/chos la rtag tu gnas par gyur byas nas/_/bzod dang des la gnas shing phrag dog med/_/gzhan dag 'khros na khro bar mi byed pa/_/de 'dra des ni 
[\[49b.2\]]ting 'dzin 'di rnyed 'gyur/_/gang dag la la ting 'dzin 'di 'dod cing /_/chos 'di ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_/gzhan la'ang ston cing bris nas 'jog byed pa/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin 'di rnyed 'gyur/_/nams kyang chos la 'jungs par mi 'gyur zhing /_/bde gshegs 
[\[49b.3\]]sras 'gyur phyir ni ma gtogs par/_/rnyed dang bkur sti'i phyir ni mi 'chad pa/_/de 'dra des ni chos 'di rnyed par 'gyur/_/phrag dog med cing sgrib pa rnam par spangs/_/gnyid dang bral la kun tu gdung ba med/_/bdag la mi stod gzhan la mi smod pa/_/des ni bdag med 'du 
[\[49b.4\]]shes rnyed mi dka'/_/dad dang ldan la sgyu med g.yo med cing /_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la dad/_/des ni byas pa shes shing byas pa srung /_/des ni cung zad tsam yang rnyed mi dka'/_/rtag tu bden pa'i tshig ni smra byed cing /_/chung ngam nyung ngam mang ngam bzang yang 
[\[49b.5\]]rung /_/nams kyang legs spyad chud mi gson pa yi/_/chos 'dod de ni rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims rnam dag byas pa bsrung ba yi/_/mi gang la la chos 'di 'chang byed pa/_/des ni byang chub rnyed par mi dka' na/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di lta smos ci dgos/_/bzang 
[\[49b.6\]]skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//bzang skyong ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa mar mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu/_de las ngas ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob po/_/ngas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu/_de'i mod la ngas 
[\[49b.7\]]tshad med grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_nga'i mig lam du snang bar gyur/_dam pa'i chos 'chad pa yang thos shing de thams cad kyang ji skad du thos pa bzhin du 'dzin par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[50a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/bzang skyong de bas na khyed kyis 'phags pa byis pa rnams spangs pa mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i chos 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/des na khyed ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[50a.3\]]byang chub mi dka' bar rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong nas/_/ngas ni ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgom/_/sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang /_/mchog gi chos kyang thob par gyur/_/
[\[50a.4\]]ji ltar bsod nams byas pa dag_/bsam pa bzang po 'grub pa bzhin/_/khyed kyang chos la spyod cig dang /_/byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/mtha' med cing ni mu med pa/_/byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing /_/gang dag ngas ni sngon bkur 
[\[50a.5\]]ba/_/byang chub de ni ngas rnyed de/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/gang dag byang chub bzhag pa ni/_/sems can bye ba du ma'o/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za mi'am ci yi rnams/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas bsam yas zhes/_/mchod pas nga la mchod pa byed/_/
[\[50a.6\]]mkhas pa'i mi ni gang dag kyang /_/sangs rgyas chos la sten 'dod pas/_/mang du thos par bya ba'i phyir/_/'dun pa nyid ni bstan par bya/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing /_/gang dag ngas ni sngon bkur ba/_/sangs 
[\[50a.7\]]rgyas bsam yas de dag gis/_/der ni nga la lung ma bstan/_/dmigs su med pa'i ye shes la/_/nga ni gnas par ma gyur to/_/sangs rgyas gtso bo skyob pa'i rnams/_/de bzhin bsdus par shes par bya/_/bye ba khrag khrig du ma'i rnams/_/gang dag ngas ni sngon bkur ba/_/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]des ni nga yi bsam mkhyen nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan kyang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam yas la/_/nga ni gnas par ma gyur to/_/de yi phyir ni don dam la/_/brtson pa bzang po dag kyang byos/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/ye shes 
[\[50b.2\]]mchog la'ang bslab par byos/_/mdo sde 'di la bslab byas nas/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyod yul la/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog_/bsam gyis mi khyab rtogs par 'gyur/_/e ma'o bla med ye shes dang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam yas shes/_/bzang skyong 
[\[50b.3\]]sems ni dga' mgu zhing /_/gus pa dang yang bcas par 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs dus na bdag cag kyang /_/chos 'dzin phyi mar 'gyur zhes te/_/lnga brgyar tshang ba de dag kyang /_/sems dga' gus dang bcas par 'gyur/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste 
[\[50b.4\]]bcu bdun pa'o//_//bam po drug pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di ji ltar bsgom par 
[\[50b.5\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzang skyong rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom 'dod par gyur na/_des gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos la gnas par mi bya'o/_/skye ba la gnas par 
[\[50b.6\]]mi bya'o/_/chos thams cad la gnas par mi bya'o/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bya'o/_/byams pa la gnas par mi bya'o/_/bzang skyong de la ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_gang chos de dag la nan tan du byed kyi log pa'i nan tan du byed pa ma 
[\[50b.7\]]yin pa'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyi lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyi chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni rnam par mi 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang skyong de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni rnam par mi rtog_/tshor ba dang /_sems 
[\[51a.2\]]dang /_chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni rnam par mi rtog na/_chos thams cad mi dmigs par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad mi dmigs pas de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go_/bzang skyong gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ni/_chos gang 
[\[51a.3\]]yang mi mthong ngo /_/bzang skyong gang la chos gang yang mi mthong ba de ni sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes shes bya'o/_/bzang skyong gang sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes de ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pa de ni/_sangs rgyas tshad 
[\[51a.4\]]med grangs med pa rnams mthong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang thos so/_/thos nas kyang kun chub par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi gang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_thogs pa med pa'i ye shes 
[\[51a.5\]]kyang 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_gnas nas kyang chos gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/ma mthong nas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing /_dmus long yang ma yin/_'on pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_
[\[51a.6\]]sems dang /_chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te gnas nas kyang /_chos gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/ma mthong nas kyang mi rten par 'gyur/_mi rten nas kyang lam sgom par byed/_lam rnam par bsgoms pa'i phyir/_de chos rnams la the tsom du mi 'gyur/_the tsom med pas sangs 
[\[51a.7\]]rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas mthong nas kyang chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang skyong gal te byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'du shes 'jug na/_de nyid de'i dmigs par lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid yod par lta ba 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid phung por lta ba dang /_khams su lta ba dang /_skye mched du lta ba dang /_mtshan mar lta ba dang /_dngos por lta ba dang /_rgyur lta ba dang /_rkyen du lta ba dang /_dmigs pa 
[\[51b.2\]]'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang skyong chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa/_chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/_mi gzung ba/_gzung ba med par byang chub sems dpas mthong ste/_de dag chos thams cad mi dmigs so/_/rlom sems su mi byed do/_/mi 
[\[51b.3\]]mthong ngo /_/ji ltar mi dmigs shing rlom sems su mi byed la mi mthong zhe na/_bzang skyong 'di lta ste/_dper na gzhan mu stegs can nam/_gzhan mu stegs can gyi nyan thos bdag tu 'du shes pa la gnas pa/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag tu 'du shes pa la gnas pa 
[\[51b.4\]]chos thams cad du 'du shes pa la gnas pa/_chos rnams la dmigs shing /_rlom sems su byed pa/_mthong bar byed pa de ltar bzang skyong byang chub sems dpas mi mthong ngo /_/bzang skyong yang byang chub sems dpas ji ltar mthong zhe na/_bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin 
[\[51b.5\]]gshegs pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos dgra bcom pa rnams kyis chos thams cad mthong ba de bzhin du/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad blta bar bya'o/_/de mthong 
[\[51b.6\]]nas mngon par dga' bar mi bya'o/_/mngon par dga' ba med pas dga' ba can du mi 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang bral te dga' ba yang dag par bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin 'di sgom mo/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' gzugs med pa/_bstan du med 
[\[51b.7\]]pa/_gnas pa med pa/_shin tu rnam par dag pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la blta ste/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la de'i mig thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' mig thogs pa med 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]pa de la chos rnams mngon sum du 'gyur te/_de yid la byas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser gyi ka ba brgyan pa lta bu/_'od zer gyi rgyal po mngon par 'phags pa lta bu/_zla ba nya ba skar mas bskor ba lta bu/_'khor 
[\[52a.2\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stobs kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i stan la 'dug pa lta bu/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhas bskor ba lta bu/_ri yi rtse mo la me 'bar ba lta bu/_sman pa'i rgyal po sman gtong ba lta bu/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[52a.3\]]kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can 'jigs pa med par wa thams cad skrag par byed pa lta bu/_ngang pa'i mchog bar snang la 'phur ba lta bu/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'phags pa lta bu/_ri'i rgyal po gangs ri me tog dang sman thams cad yongs su rgyas pa lta bu/_ri khor 
[\[52a.4\]]yug rlung gi bu las skyes pas 'dzin cing 'greng ba lta bu/_rlung gi phung po sa chu'i phung po 'dzin pa lta bu/_chu'i phung pos sa'i phung po 'dzin pa lta bur mthong ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/ri rab kyi ni rtse mdzes pa/_/dri med dri 
[\[52a.5\]]ma bral zhing dag_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing 'dra/_/lha rnams kyis ni rab tu brgyan/_/bzang skyong de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis stong 
[\[52a.6\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/_lham me lhan ne lhang nger dmigs par byas te/_mthong zhing chos 'chad pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/_kun chub par byed/_/'chang bar byed de/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[52a.7\]]las langs nas kyang /_chos ji skad du thos pa dang /_ji ltar bzung ba dang /_ji ltar kun chub par byas pa bzhin du gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston par 'gyur/_'chad par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa mang du byed 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]pa'o/_/'di lta ste 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi yon tan mang po skyed par byed pa'o/_/bzang skyong de bas na byang chub 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/bklag 
[\[52b.2\]]par bya'o/_/bri bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/bsgrags par bya'o/_/bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la'ang brtson par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/dri bral rdul bral dri med sangs 
[\[52b.3\]]rgyas te/_/chags pa med cing skye bo mang pos mchod/_/rnga rdung 'khar rnga lha yi rol mo'i sgra/_/rol mo phrag brgyas phan mdzad phyag bya ba/_/me tog sil ma dag gis gtor byas shing /_/skye bo mang pos ring bsrel mchod rten mchod/_/lha yi phreng ba dri dang gdugs sna tshogs/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[52b.4\]]'di ni tshol zhing 'dogs par byed/_/gang zhig kun rdzob la ni gnas byas nas/_/shin tu rgyas chos blta dka' gya nom 'byed/_/ma chags ye shes rgyal ba dran byed cing /_/stong pa nyid las nams kyang nyams mi 'gyur/_/zla ba dri med nyi ma shar ba 'am/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs 
[\[52b.5\]]pa 'dug pa bzhin/_/rnam dag sems kyis rgyal ba dran byed cing /_/stong pa nyid ni nams kyang mi 'dor ro/_/ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi rgyal/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lta bas zil gyis gnon/_/de ltar rgyal bas 'jig rten zil mnan te/_/dpal gyi lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/
[\[52b.6\]]tshal gyi mchog la me dag mched gyur te/_/mar gyi me bsregs me lce rab 'bar ba/_/'od zer brgya stong dag ni 'byung ba ltar/_/de bzhin rgyal ba mtshan gyis rgyas par ltos/_/ji ltar sman pa zug rngu 'byin byed pa/_/nad pa rnams la nad dpyad byed pa ltar/_/rgyal ba mi yi seng ge 
[\[52b.7\]]sman pa mchog_/ji ltar 'thun pa bde gshegs gtam yang gsung /_/'khor la seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs mdzad cing /_/khyu mchog sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun mi bsnyengs/_/nags gnas seng ge wa la bzhin du/_/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil gyis gnon/_/ji ltar ngang pa'i 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]rgyal po mchog dag ni/_/mkha' la 'phur na dkar zhing rnam dag mdzes/_/de ltar bde bar gshegs pa gser gyi mdog_/bde gshegs sras kyi thu bo rnams kyang dran/_/ji ltar ri rgyal gangs can lham me zhing /_/lhag ge ba dang rgyal rigs rgyal po 'am/_/
[\[53a.2\]]ji ltar ka ba rin chen sna tshogs brgyan/_/de ltar rgyal ba mtshan gyis brgyan par blta/_/mi g.yo ma ral ji ltar rdo rje 'dra/_/khor yug ri ni rlung gi bu skyes 'dzin/_/de ltar bde gshegs bskal pa phyogs 'dzin cing /_/phan dang ldan zhing byams ldan chos kyang che/_/ji ltar chu la sa dag 
[\[53a.3\]]rten pa dang /_/ji ltar rlung la chu yang rten pa dang /_/ji ltar nam mkha' la ni rlung rten pa/_/de ltar rgyal ba yon tan kun la bzhugs/_/ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum ri rab rgyal/_/lhan ne lhag ge thams cad yongs su rgyas/_/de ltar bde gshegs ri rab lta bu yang /_/rin chen 
[\[53a.4\]]tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs pa mdzes/_/ma chags sems ldan rgyal ba dran byed na/_/mun dang bral zhing mi snang med pa yi/_/ting 'dzin rdul bral rnam dag de mig 'gyur/_/de ni dngos po'i 'du shes kun dang bral/_/rgyal ba rnam dag sems ni dran byed na/_/rdul dang dri ma bral 
[\[53a.5\]]zhing khro ba spangs/_/ma rig bral zhing de yi ye shes dag_/de yi ye shes rdul bral 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba tshul khrims rnam dag dran byed na/_/de yi ye shes rab rib bral zhing dag_/nga dang bdag lta de la phyis kyang med/_/dngos po'i 'du shes nams kyang 'byung mi 
[\[53a.6\]]'gyur/_/de ni srid pa'i rgyud la lta dang bral/_/the tshom lam bral ye shes rnam par dag_/nams kyang gzugs kyi 'du shes mi 'gyur zhing /_/zhi lam bsil ba'i dngos po'i chos kyang nyan/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag ni/_/rang gi dngos po med cing thams cad stong /_/rgyal 
[\[53a.7\]]ba mchog rab bstan pa thos nas kyang /_/de ni dngos po'i 'du shes mi 'byung ngo /_/dngos su shes pa thams cad tshar bcad cing /_/'gro ba thams cad stong par rig nas kyang /_/ji ltar 'dab chags nam mkhar mi chags bzhin/_/nams kyang yid ni chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/mchog 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]rab rgyal la ri mo byas pas ni/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs la gnas shing yid rno bas/_/'jig rten kun na phyogs bcur rnam par snang /_/yon tan tshad med pa ni kun dang ldan/_/lag pa rkang pa de bzhin mgo bo mig_/rgyal srid rta dang ba glang thams cad dang /_/'jig rten pa yi rin chen 
[\[53b.2\]]kun gtong yang /_/tshul khrims phung po yongs su gtong mi byed/_/snying rje bskyed nas 'jig rten kun phan phyir/_/chos kyi gtso bo rin chen ston par byed/_/'dus byas ma lus thams cad spong byed kyang /_/byang chub sems ni yongs su gtong mi byed/_/dge slong dang ni rgyal sras 
[\[53b.3\]]legs zhugs dang /_/de bzhin dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang /_/dad ldan chags dang bral ba'i dge bsnyen mas/_/rjes su dran par byas na gnas 'di 'thob/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni su 'chang ba'i/_/bde gshegs sras po ting nge 'dzin mkhas pa/_/de la yon tan mang po de dag 
[\[53b.4\]]'byung /_/bla med rnam pa mang po'i gnas 'byung ngo /_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//bzang skyong de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad pa'am 'thob par 'dod pa des dang po nyid nas mtshan ma'i 'du 
[\[53b.5\]]shes rnams bsal bar bya'o/_/mtshan ma'i 'du shes rnams bsal nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal du mi bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i nga rgyal spangs shing /_yid la mtshan ma dang bral bas/_ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod par bya ste/_brtsad par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na rtsod 
[\[53b.6\]]pa med par 'gyur zhe na/_gang stong pa nyid mi spong ba ste/_'di ni rtsod pa med pa'o/_/bzang skyong rtsod pa med pa gtso bor byed pa'i byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod par bya'o/_/bzang skyong rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig_/ting nge 'dzin 'di lung nod 
[\[53b.7\]]par 'dod par gyur na/_des chos bcu dang ldan par bya ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bzang skyong nga rgyal bcom pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la phrag dog med pa dang /_gus pa dang bcas shing 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]rje sa dang bcas pa dang /_byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba dang /_'jungs pa med cing 'gyod pa dang bral ba dang /_dad pa dang ldan zhing brtag pa mang ba dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams shing 'chag pa la zhugs pa dang /_mgron du gnyer ba la mi ltos par bsod snyoms 
[\[54a.2\]]byed pa dang /_zab mo la mos pas ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod par 'dod pa de la ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod par bya/_gdon par bya/_bcang bar bya ste/_
[\[54a.3\]]bzang skyong chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ting nge 'dzin 'di mnod par bya'o/_/de ltar zhugs pa de ni chos brgyad 'dzin to/_/brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_shin tu byang phyir tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pas lta ba rnam par 
[\[54a.4\]]dag pa dang /_yang 'byung ba med pas/_shes rab rnam par dag pa dang /_'khor thams cad la don du mi gnyer bas gtong ba yongs su dag pa dang /_shin tu brjed pa med pas thos pa rnam par dag pa dang /_byang chub 'thob pas brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang /_rten med pas 
[\[54a.5\]]bkur sti thob pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems can thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa ste/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' ni chos brgyad po 'di dag rab tu 'dzin to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/
[\[54a.6\]]mkhas pas mtshan ma'i 'du shes mi bskyed cing /_/nga rgyal nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spang /_/bzod pa rdul bral 'dus ma byas bskyed nas/_/des ni ting 'dzin 'di yang lung mnod bya/_/mkhas pas stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang /_/zhi ba mya ngan 'das la brtsad mi bya/_/mi bskyod chos 
[\[54a.7\]]can ston pa dang yang 'thun/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin 'di lung mnos/_/mkhas pa nga rgyal phrag dog mi byed cing /_/byas gzo sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/dang ba skyes par gyur cing mi bskyod pa/_/des ni ting 'dzin 'di yang myur lung nos/_/'jungs pa med cing mun bral 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]mi rtsub la/_/brtag dang ldan la shin tu dad pa can/_/'chag sar zhugs shing brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu 'dod par bya/_/dge slong rtag tu bsod snyoms spyad bya ste/_/mgron du bos pa'ang spang na sogs ci smos/_/don dam dmigs su med la rab tu 
[\[54b.2\]]mkhas/_/de 'dra des ni ting 'dzin 'di zung shig_/gang las ting 'dzin 'phags pa 'di bris sam/_/bcangs sam gzhan dag la yang bstan byas na/_/de las des ni dang por 'di thob nas/_/mkhas pas de la ston par 'du shes bskyed/_/yon tan phun sum tshogs par 
[\[54b.3\]]'dir gnas te/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di lung nod byed pa/_/de ni rgyal bas gnang zhing rdul bral la/_/rnam par dag pa'i chos brgyad myur du 'dzin/_/mkhas pa gang la yon tan 'di snang ba/_/tshul khrims kyang ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin dag cing de 
[\[54b.4\]]bzhin lta ba dag_/des ni srid par sred pa dag kyang sbyangs/_/mkhas pa gang la yon tan 'di snang ba/_/yang srid med pas shes rab rnam par dag_/rten pa dag kyang med cing gtong ba dag_/mang du thos shing nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/mkhas pa gang la yon tan 'di snang ba/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[54b.5\]]brtsams shing byang chub las mi nyams/_/rnyed dang bkur sti cung zad mi rten te/_/de ni bla na med pa'i byang chub 'gyur/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//bzang skyong chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin 
[\[54b.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_bzang skyong 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gnas la gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen/_gnas ma yin pa la gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang yang de 
[\[54b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pas gnas la gnas dang /_gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni bzang skyong /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]gshegs pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing 'jig rten 'di na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i 
[\[55a.2\]]tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang /_las yang dag par 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas dang /_rgyu dang /_rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[55a.3\]]mkhyen pa 'di ni bzang skyong /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gnyis pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing /_'jig 
[\[55a.4\]]rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[55a.5\]]rab tu mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[55a.6\]]pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang 
[\[55a.7\]]skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma dang /_khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma dang /_khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bzhi pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing 'jig rten na 
[\[55b.2\]]dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa du ma 
[\[55b.3\]]mkhyen pa/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dang /_gang zag gzhan mos pa du ma dang /_mos pa sna tshogs rnams kyi mos pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni bzang skyong de bzhin 
[\[55b.4\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing /_'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_
[\[55b.5\]]bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /_/mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa 
[\[55b.6\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni bzang skyong /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[55b.7\]]pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs drug pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[56a.2\]]dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_rnam par gzhag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_
[\[56a.3\]]rnam par gzhag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni bzang skyong /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bdun pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la/_'khor gyi nang du gshegs 
[\[56a.4\]]te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing /_'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi 
[\[56a.5\]]gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[56a.6\]]pa'i stobs brgyad pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing /_'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus 
[\[56a.7\]]kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i mig mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas/_lha'i mig mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas khyu mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing 'jig 
[\[56b.2\]]rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu 
[\[56b.3\]]mkhyen te/_bzang skyong gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa ste/_stobs de la brten nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas khyu 
[\[56b.4\]]mchog gi gnas rab tu mkhyen la/_'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing /_'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskor bar mi nus pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 
[\[56b.5\]]bskor ro/_/bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po 'di dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yis/_/stobs rnams kyi ni sa bshad 
[\[56b.6\]]pa/_/ting 'dzin 'di la gnas na ni/_/byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur/_/gnas dang de bzhin gnas ma yin/_/yang dag ji bzhin mkhyen pa ni/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs dang po/_/'jig rten mgon po skyobs mdzad pa/_
[\[56b.7\]]rang byung rnams kyi stobs dang po/_/de la gnas nas rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/srog chags rnams la chos ston to/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/_/las rnams rab tu mkhyen pa ni/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs gnyis pa'o/_/mos 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]pa chung dang mchog rnams dang /_/'bring dag rab tu mkhyen pa ni/_/dpal ldan rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i/_/stobs gsum pa ni de yin no/_/dbang po rno dang bar ma dang /_/tha ma'i khyad par mkhas pa ni/_/drang srong chen po rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs 
[\[57a.2\]]rgyas rnams kyi stobs bzhi pa'o/_/khams rnams sna tshogs rab mkhyen cing /_/khams rnams kyi ni pha rol phyin/_/gnas 'di dag ni rang byung gi/_/stobs ni lnga pa nyid yin no/_/thams cad du ni 'gro ba'i lam/_/de dang der ni bgrod pa ste/_/de dag thams cad rab mkhyen 
[\[57a.3\]]pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab stobs drug pa'o/_/bsam gtan rnam thar snyoms par 'jug_/kun nas nyon mongs rab mkhyen cing /_/gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa ni/_/stobs bdun pa zhes bya ba'o/_/sngon gyi bye ba tshun chad kyi/_/bdag ni sngon na gar gnas pa'i/_/sngon 
[\[57a.4\]]gyi gnas rnams rab mkhyen pa/_/de ni stobs kyang brgyad pa'o/_/'chi 'pho dang ni skye ba mkhyen/_/mtho ris dang ni ngan song gzigs/_/mig gi pha rol phyin thob pa/_/'di ni stobs kyang dgu pa'o/_/gang dag lha 'am gang dag mi/_/zag pa thams cad nga la zad/_/nga la yang 
[\[57a.5\]]srid med pa ni/_/bsam gyis mi khyab stobs bcu pa'o/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob mdzad pa/_/rang byung rnams kyi stobs 'di dag_/ting 'dzin 'di la gnas na ni/_/de dag thams cad rnyed mi dka'/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//
[\[57a.6\]]bzang skyong byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gang dag thob par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs na thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni 'di bzhi'o/_/bzhi 
[\[57a.7\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nga yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la 'di la chos 'di mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes nga la 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par tshig tu brjod cing rgol bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_dbugs 'byin pa thob par gnas so/_/bag tsha ba med pa thob par gnas so/_/bde ba thob par gnas so/_/mi 'jigs pa thob par gnas so/_/'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag 
[\[57b.2\]]par bsgrag par bya'o/_/'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni/_bzang skyong gang byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs na 
[\[57b.3\]]'thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang po'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang nga zag pa zad pa la de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to/_/zhes 'jig rten na/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_
[\[57b.4\]]tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par tshig tu brjod cing rgol bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_dbugs 'byin pa thob par gnas so/_/bag tsha ba med pa thob par gnas so/_/bde ba thob par gnas so/_/mi 
[\[57b.5\]]'jigs pa thob par gnas so/_/'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/_/'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/_/
[\[57b.6\]]zhes bya ba 'di ni bzang skyong /_gang byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs na thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang gang ngas bar du gcod pa'i chos su bstan pa de de dag la bsten na bar 
[\[57b.7\]]du gcod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes nga la 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par tshig tu brjod cing rgol bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]dbugs 'byin pa thob par gnas so/_/bag tsha ba med pa thob par gnas so/_/bde ba thob par gnas so/_/mi 'jigs pa thob par gnas so/_/'khor gyi nang du gshegs te/_seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/_/'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 
[\[58a.2\]]'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bzang skyong gang byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs na 'thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin 
[\[58a.3\]]gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang gang ngas 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa de la 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_
[\[58a.4\]]sus kyang chos dang 'thun par tshig tu brjod cing rgol bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas dbugs 'byin pa thob par gnas so/_/bag tsha ba med pa thob par gnas so/_/bde ba thob par gnas so/_/mi 'jigs pa thob par 
[\[58a.5\]]gnas so/_/'khor gyi nang du gshegs te seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/_/'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba 'di ni bzang 
[\[58a.6\]]skyong byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs na thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas mi 'jigs gang yin pa/_/
[\[58a.7\]]mi 'jigs rnams ni bshad par bya/_/seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrag byas te/_/'khor rnams la ni chos kyang ston/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas smra la/_/chos 'di sangs rgyas ma gyur ces/_/rgol ba de ni ma mthong ste/_/de phyir sangs rgyas mi 'jigs pa'o/_/zag 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pa zad par smras pa la/_/zag pa 'di dag ma zad ces/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/rgol ba de ni ma mthong ngo /_/gang dag bar du gcod pa'i chos/_/de dag gang gis bsten byas kyang /_/bar du gcod par mi 'gyur zhes/_/nga la rgol ba de ma mthong /_/mya 
[\[58b.2\]]ngan 'das pa thob pa'i phyir/_/ngas ni chos mchog gang bshad pa/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i tshig gi mchog_/des ni nga la rgol ba med/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob mdzad pas/_/mi 'jigs gsungs pa 'di dag ni/_/ting 'dzin 'di la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems 
[\[58b.3\]]dpas 'thob par 'gyur/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//bzang skyong gang byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs na 'thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[58b.4\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag gang zhe na/_bzang skyong 'di lta ste/_nam gyi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/_nam gyi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 
[\[58b.5\]]las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/_/ca co mi mnga'o/_/bsnyel ba mi mnga'o/_/sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o/_/tha dad pa'i 'du shes mi mnga'o/_/so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi 
[\[58b.6\]]mnga'o/_/'dun pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/brtson 'grus nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/dran pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/ting nge 'dzin nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/shes rab nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/
[\[58b.7\]]'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/_/da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/bzang 
[\[59a.2\]]skyong 'di dag ni gang byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na 'thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang la gnas nas de bzhin 
[\[59a.3\]]gshegs/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa'i/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni ma 'dres chos/_/bshad kyis nga la mnyan par byos/_/nam gyi nub mo rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes/_/nam gyi nub mo len med par/_/mya ngan las ni 'das par gyur/_/
[\[59a.4\]]de yi bar du gang gsungs dang /_/gsung dang gsung bar 'gyur ba'i rnams/_/de kun yang dag ji bzhin te/_/de ni ma 'dres dang po'o/_/nga la 'khrul pa cung zad med/_/ca co nga la mi mnga'o/_/gsung la nyams pa mi mnga' ste/_/nga la zhum pa mi mnga'o/_/nga la bsnyel ba yod ma 
[\[59a.5\]]yin/_/nga la ma brtags btang snyoms med/_/chos la sna tshogs byed pa med/_/rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa nyid/_/nga yi 'dun pa ma nyams shing /_/brtson 'grus kyang ni ma nyams so/_/ting 'dzin las ni mi g.yeng zhing /_/nga la nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/nga yi shes rab 
[\[59a.6\]]nyams pa med/_/rnam par grol ba'ang nyams pa med/_/nga yi rnam grol ye shes mthong /_/nga la'ang nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/nga ni 'das pa'i dus la yang /_/ye shes thogs pa mi mnga'o/_/ma 'ongs pa yi dus la yang /_/nga la sgrib pa mi mnga'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i dus la yang /_/
[\[59a.7\]]nga la chags pa mi mnga'o/_/skyob pa nga ni chos kun la/_/ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'o/_/nga yi sku yi phrin las kun/_/ye shes kyi ni rjes su 'breng /_/nga yi gsung thugs phrin las kun/_/ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/_/gang la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs/_/chos kyi 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]'khor lo bskor mdzad pa'i/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres chos/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po ni de dag go/_/ting 'dzin 'di la bsgom byas na/_/sangs rgyas[(]chas [,]chos [)]ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_/ston pa yi ni stobs bcu dang /_/mi 'jigs rnams ni rnyed mi dka'/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting 
[\[59b.2\]]nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba bzhis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[59b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ting nge 'dzin 'di gsan nas lung mnos te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba de bzhin du bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas/_bla na 
[\[59b.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bzang skyong 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang po'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang ji ltar ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[59b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba na/_ting nge 'dzin 'di gsan nas lung mnos te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du mang du thos pa thob par bya ba dang /_mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur 
[\[59b.6\]]ba de bzhin du bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bzang skyong 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba gnyis pa'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'di skad du/_ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i dus na da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[59b.7\]]rgyas de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_ting nge 'dzin 'di gsan nas lung mnos te/_rjes su yi rang nas/_mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_da ltar byang chub sems 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di la ji ltar rjes su yi rang ba de bzhin du bdag kyang /_da ltar gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ngo /_/zhes brjod par bya ste/_bzang 
[\[60a.2\]]skyong 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba gsum pa'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'di skad du bdag gis rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams 'di thams cad sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[60a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin 'di yang thob par gyur cig_/mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces brjod par bya ste/_bzang skyong 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bzhi pa'o/_/bzang skyong rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod 
[\[60a.4\]]nams 'di dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi 
[\[60a.5\]]rang ba de dag gis rjes su yi rang zhing bsngos na/_bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i dpe tsam zhig bstan to/_/bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig tshe lo brgya phrag du ma thub pa/_lo brgya phrag du mar 'tsho ba/_mgyogs pa'i mthu rlung dang 'dra ba zhig 
[\[60a.6\]]yod la de mi 'dug par lo brgya tshang bar shar phyogs su yang song /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su yang song na/_bzang skyong de ci snyam du sems/_tshe lo brgya thub cing lo brgyar 'tsho ba/_mgyogs pa'i mthu rlung dang 'dra ba'i skyes bu des 
[\[60a.7\]]mi 'dug par phyogs drug tu phyogs gcig cing yang lo brgya brgyar song ba'i skyes bu des dpag tshad du zhig tu song bar gyur pa bgrang ba'am/_gzhal ba'am/_bsam pa'am/_dpag par skyes bu la la spro'am/_byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par de ni mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzang skyong bud 
[\[60b.2\]]med dam skyes pa gang la la zhig gis/_skyes bu lo brgyar gnas pa rlung gi mgyogs pa bzhin du mgyogs par 'gro ba de'i spyod yul rnams gser dang dngul gyis gang bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phul la ting nge 
[\[60b.3\]]'dzin 'di mi nyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang ba bzhi po de dag gis rjes su yi rang zhing rjes su yi rang nas kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du mang du thos pa 'dod pas sngo bar yang byed na bzang skyong bsod 
[\[60b.4\]]nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong dang stong phrag brgya dang bye ba phrag brgya dang /_bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//_//bam po bdun pa ste tha 
[\[60b.5\]]ma/_bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji tsam du don che ba la ltos/_bzang skyong de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang /_ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub sems 
[\[60b.6\]]dpa' rnams kyi don chen po yin par rig par bya'o/_/bzang skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa shin tu rgyas pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[60b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/bzang skyong de'i tshe 'dzam 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bu'i gling 'di yang 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_skye bo mang po dang /_mis gang bar gyur to/_/bzang skyong de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa khyim bye ba 
[\[61a.2\]]phrag dgu yod pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod par gyur to/_/bzang skyong de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yang 'di lta ste/_dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod de/_yangs shing rgya che bar gyur to/_/bzang skyong de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na gang du de bzhin 
[\[61a.3\]]gshegs pa de skye ba'i sar gyur pa 'di lta ste/_bzang po byung ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer chen po gcig cig yod de/_grong khyer chen po de na srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu gnas so/_/bzang skyong yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i 
[\[61a.4\]]blo gros de'i nyan thos 'dus pa dang po ni dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus par gyur to/_/zhag bdun 'das nas nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus par gyur to/_/zhag bdun pa gnyis 'das nas nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa ni bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus 
[\[61a.5\]]par gyur to/_/dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu yang 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas phyis ni/_bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos grangs kyis mi chod pa zhig byung ngo /_/bzang skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na mi de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len par gyur te/_'di lta 
[\[61a.6\]]ste/_dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i gsung rab la sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/bzang skyong de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par gyur to/_/
[\[61a.7\]]bzang skyong de'i tshe grong khyer chen po de na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa bu stong du tshang ba zhig yod de/_de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros de'i drung du song zhing bsnyen bkur byed do/_/bzang skyong de nas de bzhin 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i blo gros des rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan to/_/yang dag par bshad do/_/bzang skyong de nas rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba des ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/
[\[61b.2\]]rjes su yi rang nas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che spar gang gis gtor to/_/de de nas shi 'phos pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin gshegs pa de mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang /_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po'i khyim de nyid du skyes so/_/bzang skyong de'i tshe de bzhin 
[\[61b.3\]]gshegs pa de'i gsung rab la dge slong chos smra ba rin chen mchog ces bya ba zhig byung ste/_des 'khor bzhi la ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher ston to/_/yang dag par sgrogs so/_/bzang skyong de'i tshe rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba de rgyal po'i bu tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur te/_des dge slong de ting 
[\[61b.4\]]nge 'dzin 'di 'chad pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang thos ma thag tu dang ba rnyed par gyur te/_dang ba'i sems kyis gser stong phrag brgya dang /_ras bcos bu zung gcig gis dge slong de la g.yogs so/_/bzang skyong de nas rgyal po'i bu tshangs pas byin des dge slong de las ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas/_
[\[61b.5\]]dge slong des legs par bshad pa'i phyir dgab pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa'i phyir chos smra ba'i dge slong de las srog chags stong du tshang 
[\[61b.6\]]ba dang lhan cig chos 'dod pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas lo brgyad stong du rang gi 'khor srog chags stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu dge slong de la bsnyen bkur byed cing rjes su 'brangs kyang mnyan pa tsam zhig 
[\[61b.7\]]thob pa ma gtogs par dge slong de las ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob po/_/de yang lan gnyis ma yin gyi/_lan cig kho na zhig thos nas rjes su yi rang ba bzhi po de dag gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/des srog chags stong du tshang ba de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas stong phrag 
[\[62a\]]
