[\[62a.1\]]drug cu rtsa brgyad mnyes par byas so/_/skye ba thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad cing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrags te/_des rim gyis sangs rgyas gzhan stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyang mnyes par byas so/_/de rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge 
[\[62a.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa 
[\[62a.3\]]zhes bya bar gyur te/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag go/_/srog chags stong po de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su smin par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rdzogs 
[\[62a.4\]]te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa zhes bya bar gyur te/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[62a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag go/_/bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du don che ba la ltos/_'di ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i tshig tu brjod pas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed na/_bzang skyong byang chub 
[\[62a.6\]]sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par sgrogs pa dang /_sgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa lta ci smos te/_bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang bar 
[\[62a.7\]]mi byed/_lung nod par mi byed/_kun chub par mi byed/_'chang bar mi byed/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par sgrogs par mi byed/_sgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas pa lta su zhig yod/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang skyong 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pas byang chub sems 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/bzang skyong de bas na khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer ba rnams kyis/_gal te 
[\[62b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di dpag tshad tsam na yod par thos na/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer ba des ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa'i phyir dpag tshad tsam gyi bar der 'gro bar bya'o/_/thos nas kyang gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_
[\[62b.3\]]bklag par bya/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par bya/_bshad par bya/_bsgrag par bya'o/_/bsgom pa la yang mngon par dga' bar bya'o/_/bzang skyong dpag tshad tsam lta zhog gi_/dpag tshad gnyis tsama'am/_dpag tshad gsum tsama'am/_dpag tshad bzhi tsama'am/_dpag tshad 
[\[62b.4\]]lnga tsam nas dpag tshad bcu'i bar tsama'am/_bzang skyong dpag tshad bcu tsam lta'ang zhog gi_/gal te byang chub sems dpas dpag tshad brgya na da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ljongs kyi phyogs che ge mo zhig na spyod do zhes ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[62b.5\]]dpag tshad brgya'i bar tsam na yod par thos na yang /_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer ba des zhum pa med pa dang /_snyom las med pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_sgyid lug pa med pa dang /_gdung ba med pa'i sems dang /_brtson 
[\[62b.6\]]'grus brtsams pa mi lhod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di tha na mnyan pa nyi tse tsam gyi phyir yang dpag tshad brgya po der 'gro bar bya na lung mnod pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_bsgrag par bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang skyong 'di ltar byang chub sems 
[\[62b.7\]]dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la rag las pa'i phyir ro/_/bzang skyong de la byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag gis dpag tshad brgya po der song nas/_gang las ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par gyur pa'i slob 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]dpon de la des ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu de la bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/_/tha na ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa tsam gyi phyir yang lo gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi'am/_
[\[63a.2\]]lnga'am/_lo bcu'am/_brgya'am/_ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya na lung mnod pa'am/_kun chub par bya ba'am/_bri ba'am/_bcang ba'am/_bsgrag pa'am/_bsgom pa'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bzang skyong rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des rang nyam gtang bar 
[\[63a.3\]]bya ste/_btang nas kyang slob dpon de'i blo bzhin du 'jug par bya'o/_/gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sa dang bcas pas slob dpon gyi phyir 'brang bar bya'o/_/bka' bzhin du byed pas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/_/bka' mi gcog pa dang /_mdza' ba brtag pa dang /_ngo mi rtag pa spangs pa dang /_
[\[63a.4\]]nyes par lta ba med pas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes kyang bskyed par bya'o/_/de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' des slob dpon de la de ltar nan tan byed na sngon chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing 
[\[63a.5\]]bsags pa ma gtogs par tha na ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan pa tsam yang mi thob pa ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te de ni gnas med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' des slob dpon de la khrel yod pa dang /_byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa shes par bya'o/_/de ltar na de'i ting nge 'dzin de'i tshig dang yi ge de yun 
[\[63a.6\]]ring du gnas pa dang /_rmongs pa med par 'gyur na/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di grong gzhan na yod par thos sam grong gi zhing gzhan na yod par thos la/_thos nas kyang tha na mnyan pa tsam gyi phyir yang 'gro bar bya ba lta ci smos/_lung mnod par bya ba dang /_kun chub par 
[\[63a.7\]]bya ba dang /_bcang bar bya ba dang /_bklag par bya ba dang /_bri bar bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba dang /_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir lta'ang smos kyang ci dgos/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di tshol bas tha na ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa tsam yang 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]thob pa ni bzang skyong khyod mos par bya khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid tshol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_chos don du gnyer ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang chos 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bla na med pa yang 
[\[63b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya na/_bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di lung nod par byed/_kun chub par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed la/_lung mnod pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_bcang bar bya ba dang /_bklag par byas 
[\[63b.3\]]nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par byed/_sgrogs par byed/_yang dag par sgrogs par byed cing bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi mchog_/seng ge blo 
[\[63b.4\]]gros zhes bya rjes dran te/_/der ni mi yi dbang po rgyal po des/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni de tshe thos par gyur/_/rgyal pos ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas kyang /_/sems mgu dga' ba dpe med pas bzung ste/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas seng ge'i blo gros la/_/spar gang gi ni rin po che sa kyang gtor/_/
[\[63b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis legs gsungs ting 'dzin 'di/_/sems can thams cad la ni phan par shog_/khyod la skyabs su de ring mchi'o zhes/_/de snyam bsams nas tshig tu'ang brjod par gyur/_/rgyal po de ni de yi las kyis ni/_/shi nas de nyid du ni yang skyes te/_/des ni dge 
[\[63b.6\]]slong rin chen zhes bya bar/_/phyogs su grags pa mthu chen mthong bar gyur/_/de las de nyid kyang ni thos gyur te/_/thos nas dga' ba shin tu rgyas pa skyed/_/bskyed nas byang chub zhugs pa dga' gyur te/_/gser dang gos kyis dge slong dgab byas nas/_/de ni ting 'dzin 'di yang 'dod 
[\[63b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_/srog chags stong dang lhan cig rab tu byung /_/lo ni stong phrag brgya snyed tshang bar yang /_/de dag kun gyi dge slong de phyir 'brangs/_/thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'di/_/lan gnyis ma yin lan gcig kho na thos/_/de yi dran pa skyo ba ma skyes shing /_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]yongs su tshol/_/de dag kun gyis las 'di byas pa'i phyir/_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad tshang ba yi/_/sangs rgyas mthu chen rnams ni mnyes par byas/_/de las ting 'dzin 'di ni thos par gyur/_/de bas bde bar gshegs pa gzhan dag kyang /_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa 
[\[64a.2\]]brgyad tshang ba mchod/_/bde bar gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros la/_/bdag ni rjes su yi rang bgyid ces brjod/_/bsod nams byas pa de yis rgyal po de/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya'i sangs rgyas gyur/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab/_/thams cad de yis skye 
[\[64a.3\]]zhing 'chi las bkrol/_/stong du tshang ba'ang rjes su slob slob nas/_/sangs rgyas gyur te dpa' brtan zhes bya bar/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten la ni grags par gyur/_/ting 'dzin sgras kyang byang chub reg gyur na/_/srid pa thams cad la ni mi brten par/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bar/_/
[\[64a.4\]]ston pa de dag byang chub 'gyur bar ni/_/smos ci dgos te nam yang the tsom med/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di/_/dpag tshad brgya na gal te yod gyur kyang /_/byang chub don du gnyer ba nyin mtshan du/_/nam yang mi 'dug song ste mnyan par bya/_/gal te song nas 'di ni 
[\[64a.5\]]ma rnyed na/_/'on kyang de yi bsod nams tshad med de/_/de ni de yi byang chub bskyed yin na/_/gang gis song ste 'di thos smos mi dgos/_/de phyir gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di 'dod pas/_/dang por tshangs pas byin de dran par byos/_/dge slong gang la ting 'dzin 'di yod la/_/skyo ba'i 
[\[64a.6\]]sems ni med par bsten par bya/_/rjes su dran te skye ba snga ma la/_/stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug lo tshang bar/_/ngas ni chos smra ba la rtag brten kyang /_/ting 'dzin 'di ni nam yang thos ma gyur/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas bden pa zhes bya byung /_/de na dge slong gzhon nu thos mang zhing /_/bde 
[\[64a.7\]]bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa nub 'og tu/_/de tshe des ni ting 'dzin 'di nyid bzung /_/nga ni de na rgyal rigs rgyal po ste/_/dge slong che ge mo zhig ting 'dzin 'di/_/'dzin gyis drung du legs par nyon cig ces/_/rmi lam du ni ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/_/myur du langs te rings pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]ni/_/'di 'dzin pa yi dge slong de btsal te/_/mthong nas rab tu byung ba de las ni/_/'di nyid lan 'ga' thos lta srid dam zhes/_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa drug lo tshang bar/_/ngas ni dge slong de la dga' bas bkur/_/bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/lan 'ga' tsam 
[\[64b.2\]]yang thos par ma gyur te/_/de phyir dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma/_/dge bsnyen dag dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la/_/ting 'dzin thos nas myur du zung shig ces/_/mos par byed cing khong du chud par byed/_/der ni bskal pa tshang bar 'dug nas kyang /_/ting 'dzin 'dzin pa de ni bsnyen cing 
[\[64b.3\]]bsten/_/bskal pa stong du legs par bsnyen bkur byas/_/des ni ting 'dzin 'di yang bshad par gyur/_/ting 'dzin rdul med 'di la rab spyod pa'i/_/dge slong grong du slong ba de nyid la/_/bza' ba dang ni bca' dang mal cha dang /_/de bzhin gos kyang bye ba byin par gyur/_/bca' dang 
[\[64b.4\]]bza' dang mal stan de bzhin gos/_/mang po bye ba thams cad lta yang zhog_/gal te rang gi sha byin thob na ni/_/legs spyad yin na zas skom smos ci dgos/_/rtag tu bran gyur bsnyen bkur byed cing ni/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang tshol byed la/_/mkhas pas rnyed nas de yang myur byed 
[\[64b.5\]]kyang /_/de la byas pa gzo ba ma yin no/_/bskal pa mang po bye bar btsal kyang ni/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/'di yi sgra yang brgya lam thos 'gyur na/_/kha ton byas nas ston pa smos ci dgos/_/gang gis gang gA'i bye snyed 'jig rten khams/_/rin po ches ni bkang ste 
[\[64b.6\]]byin pa bas/_/gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung mnos/_/de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/gang rtag brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa bas/_/gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung mnos/_/de yi bsod 
[\[64b.7\]]nams tshad gzung mi sla'o/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/gang rtag mi rten bsam gtan sgom pa bas/_/gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung mnos/_/de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/gang rtag shes rab gnas 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]par gyur pa bas/_/gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung mnos/_/de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//bzang skyong de bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[65a.2\]]kyi bu mos ting nge 'dzin 'di gus par byas te mnyan par bya'o/_/thos nas kyang gzung bar bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_yi ger bri bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/bzung zhing kun chub par byas nas kyang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/_/legs par bris 
[\[65a.3\]]te gzhag par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang skyong nga 'das pa'i 'og tu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa' dad pa can dang ba/_brtag pa mang ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir mang du thos pa tshol bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag mang 
[\[65a.4\]]du thos pa tshol bas dam pa'i chos tshol ba'i phyir phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu rgyu bar 'gyur te/_bzang skyong sems can de lta bu chos don du gnyer ba/_chos la mos pa/_chos 'dod pa/_chos yongs su 'dzin pa/_shin tu rgyas pa 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang ched du 
[\[65a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnos shing bstan la/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te/_glegs bam chen por legs par bris nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab la gzhag par bya'o/_/bzang skyong de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya 
[\[65a.6\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad byed pa med pa/_bya ba med pa/_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/_chags pa med pa/_dmigs su med pa/_stong pa nyid/_mtshan ma med pa/_smon pa med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_gnyis su med pa/_'jug pa med pa/_brten pa med pa/_
[\[65a.7\]]bgrang du med pa/_rnam par gzhag tu med pa/_gzung ba med pa/_dor ba med pa/_gnas pa med pa/_chos thams cad rtag pa med pa/_chad pa med pa/_rgyu zad pa/_sdug bsngal zad pa/_dngos po zad pa/_mi skye ba/_mi 'gag pa/_mi gnas pa/_mi 'jig pa/_lam med pa/_
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]lam gyi 'bras bu med pa/_'phags pa thams cad kyis ma dkrugs pa/_byis pa thams cad kyis spangs pa/_mi shes pa rnams kyis bor ba/_mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba ste/_bzang skyong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs 
[\[65b.2\]]pa rnams la btab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/bzang skyong de bas na byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus der ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod par 'dod pas/_lung mnos shing kha ton du byas nas gzhan dag la yang rgya 
[\[65b.3\]]cher yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/_/bzang skyong de la chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tha na ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa'i phyir yang brtson par 'gyur na lung mnod pa dang /_kha ton bya ba'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sngon lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs 
[\[65b.4\]]pa dang /_sngon smon lam btab pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mos pa dang /_ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos dkon mchog gi 
[\[65b.5\]]mdzod 'di 'chang bar 'gyur/_ston par 'gyur snyam nas chos kyi tshul thams cad len pa ste/_bzang skyong chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_bcang ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang chos bzhi 
[\[65b.6\]]dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la tha na yi ger bri ba tsam gyi phyir yang brtson par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang /_phyi phyir zhing chos rjes su dran pa la mkhas pa dang /_chos thams cad dmigs pa yongs su gcod pa yid la 
[\[65b.7\]]byed pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa ste/_bzang skyong chos de bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la tha na bri ba tsam gyi phyir yang brtson par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong de la chos bzhi dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]ba la brtson par rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i dngos por yongs su gcod pa'i shes pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku dmigs pa rnam par sgom pa la 
[\[66a.2\]]mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o/_/dmigs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas dmigs pa yid la byed pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o/_/chos thams cad dngos po dang bral bar mos pa la mkhas pas byang 
[\[66a.3\]]chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya ste/_bzang skyong chos de bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la mngon par brtson par rig par bya'o/_/bzang skyong phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos kun tu 'khrug pa'i tshe sems can thams 
[\[66a.4\]]cad la phan gdags pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la brtson par gyur cing /_de 'di snyam du ting nge 'dzin 'di ji ltar na shin tu rgyas pa dang /_rgya che ba dang /_yun ring du gnas par 'gyur snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[66a.5\]]de'i bsod nams mang du bskyed de/_bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol bar rig par bya ba ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po de smon lam gyi dbang gis myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol 
[\[66a.6\]]bar 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa/_bdag med par gnas pa las nges par byung ba/_gang dag gis bskal pa tshad med grangs med gzhal du med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'am/_de bas kyang lhag par go cha chen po bgos pa rnams ni ma gtogs te/_de dag thams cad ni 
[\[66a.7\]]bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_de dag thams cad ni spyod pa'i khyad par ji lta ba dang /_tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung ngo /_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos thams cad kyi pha rol 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]tu phyin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'dod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'dod pas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus der ting nge 'dzin 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_lung mnod pa dang /_
[\[66b.2\]]kha ton bya ba dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang du 'dus so/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la mkhas pa bsgrubs pas/_chos 
[\[66b.3\]]thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs pa thams cad sangs rgyas la dmigs par mos so/_/dmigs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthar 'jug par byed do/_/dmigs 
[\[66b.4\]]pa dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis ya ma brlar shes so/_/de dag ji lta ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dmigs par byed pa dang /_yid la byed pa de lta de ltar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag ste/_de lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni phyogs gang du yang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[66b.5\]]mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba med de/_de dag ni phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par sbyong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag nas tshegs chung ngus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du dmigs pa byas na 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mngon sum du mthong 
[\[66b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad med pas de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong ba yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa rnams de'i mig lam du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dmigs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gzung ba med pa'i phyir/_dmigs pa gcig gis dmigs 
[\[66b.7\]]pa thams cad 'dzin pa yang ma yin/_dmigs pa thams cad kyis dmigs pa gcig 'dzin pa yang ma yin no/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nye bar brtags na shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir dngos po med pa nyid du grub pa'o/_/bzang skyong de lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur la/_rnam par dag nas kyang rlom sems su mi byed/_spros par mi byed de/_de dag ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams 
[\[67a.2\]]cad kyang yongs su rdzogs pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gsungs pa ni/_/ji lta bzhin du ye shes 'jug pa yin/_/de ni 'jig rten gtso bo ston pa'i sras/_/ting nge 
[\[67a.3\]]'dzin 'di la ni yid kyang brtson/_/gang gis sangs rgyas dmigs pa rjes dran pa/_/dmigs pa'i don ni du ma mthong bar 'gyur/_/de la ting 'dzin zhi ba blta dka' 'di/_/phyi ma'i dus na mngon sum du yang 'gyur/_/mkhas pa gang zhig chos kun mi rten cing /_/sems can dag la 
[\[67a.4\]]phan phyir yid brtson pa/_/de dag phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni sbyor bar 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la phan zhing gzung ba'i phyir/_/gang zhig rtag tu blta dka' chos 'di la/_/dran pa brtan par 'jog cing brtson byed pa/_/de yi lag tu ting 'dzin 
[\[67a.5\]]'di 'gro 'gyur/_/gang zhig dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dag_/sangs rgyas dmigs par rtag tu 'jog byed cing /_/gzhan dring mi 'jog rnal 'byor brtson pa de/_/ting 'dzin chen po 'di la gnas par 'gyur/_/rjes su gzung phyir blta dka' tshig la gnas/_/'jig rten 
[\[67a.6\]]thams cad la ni yid skyo zhing /_/mkhas pa srid pa thams cad mi 'dod pa/_/de dag ting 'dzin chen po 'di la brtson/_/byang chub 'dod cing phan phyir snying brtse gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku la rtog_/zhi ba'i chos la smon lam 'debs byed pa/_/de dag ting 'dzin 'di la 
[\[67a.7\]]brten par brtson/_/'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med la zhi/_/bde bar gshegs pas bstod pa'i chos tshol zhing /_/sangs rgyas dmigs pa la ni rtag gnas pa/_/de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtag brtson yin/_/gang dag phyi ma'i sdig pa'i dus de na/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni brtson byed pa/_/
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]spyod pa'i yon tan mtha' yas la gnas pa/_/de yi yon tan 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen/_/gang dag zag pa med pa'i chos shes shing /_/shin tu tshul bzhin zag pa rnams kyang shes/_/rtog pa med spyod mnyam pa nyid gnas pa/_/de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtag brtson yin/_/
[\[67b.2\]]gang dag bde gshegs chos ni tshad med la/_/shes bzhin du yang kun tu smon pa 'debs shing /_/kun mkhyen ye shes la ni brtan gnas pa/_/de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ston to/_/mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid las kyang 'das/_/nyon mongs pa dang rnam dag gang yang med/_/rang bzhin 
[\[67b.3\]]stong pa'i chos rnams gang shes pa/_/de dag bde bar gshegs pa tshad med mthong /_/gang zhig dmigs pa mtha' med brtson byed kyang /_/dmigs pa thams cad stong pa nyid du shes/_/blta bar dka' dag mthong nas rlom sems med/_/des ni bde bar gshegs pa tshad med mthong /_/gang zhig 
[\[67b.4\]]don mthong yid kyang rnam par dag_/nyon mongs med cing zhi ba'i go 'phang gnas/_/rdul dang bral zhing mnyan don chos ston pa/_/de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do/_/bde gshegs sras po zug rngu phyung ba gang /_/bden pa ma nyams the tsom rnams dang bral/_/srog chags phan phyir byams 
[\[67b.5\]]pa sgom byed pa/_/de dag la ni don mchog 'di bshad do/_/gang zhig rang bzhin gyis ni ma rig bral/_/rig pas ma rig gnas ni sel byed cing /_/don mchog 'di la brtson par sbyor byed pa/_/de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do/_/rnam dag gnas shing kun nas nyon mongs med/_/
[\[67b.6\]]ye shes mtha' yas mngon par 'dod byed cing /_/nges don 'di la mchog tu dga' thob pa/_/de la rnam thar zhi ba 'di bshad do/_/gang zhig kun tu sbyor ba kun las grol/_/brtan zhing srog chags kun la snying brtse zhing /_/gnod sems med cing zhi lam dga' brten pa/_/de la ting 
[\[67b.7\]]'dzin 'di ni yang dag bsgrags/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//bzang skyong chos 'di bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas la gus pa dang /_
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]mi phyed pa'i dang ba yid la byed pa dang /_chos la gus shing nyan 'dod pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i tshig bsgrub pa ste/_bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang 
[\[68a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_yid la phyin ci log med pas sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems pa dang /_chos la the tsom med pas dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid rang bzhin gyis dge ba la rtog pa dang /_dngos po la 
[\[68a.3\]]mkhas pa la rtog pas ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa/_shin tu stong pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/_yongs su gcod pa shes pa la rtog pas dngos po ya ma brla rnam par 'jig pa ste/_bzang 
[\[68a.4\]]skyong chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba dang /_dam pa'i 
[\[68a.5\]]chos 'dzin pa la mkhas la dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing sbed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyor zhing sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa ste/_bzang skyong chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[68a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/bzang skyong de bas na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos cher 'khrug pa'i tshe/_der byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog kyang yongs su btang ba la gnas te/_ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/bcang 
[\[68a.7\]]bar bya'o/_/bzang skyong chos thams cad gzung ba la mkhas pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos rin po che'i mdzod 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jog par 'gyur/_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]chos 'di lta bu 'di yang dag par bstan pa dang /_rnam par dbye ba dang /_yang dag par bsgrags par bya ba yang nus par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brtson 'grus kyi gnas 'di dag ni yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus kyi byin 
[\[68b.2\]]gyi rlabs kyis/_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong gang zhig phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus der chos 'di dag 'jog par byed/_yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_
[\[68b.3\]]sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 
[\[68b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'dug kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/de ni chos 'dod pa dang /_chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos bsgrub pa'i phyir phyi ma'i tshe phyi 
[\[68b.5\]]ma'i dus na ting nge 'dzin 'di'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i nor rnams kyis yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag 
[\[68b.6\]]phyi ma'i tshe phyi mi'i dus na chos 'di lta bu 'di dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[68b.7\]]de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang zhig brtan pa chos sems pa/_/phyi ma'i dus su gyur pa na/_/dam chos gzung phyir gnas gyur pa/_/de dag la ni gzungs 'di bshad/_/gang dag dam chos rin chen phyir/_/'jigs pa med pa 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]brtson byed cing /_/snying yang brtse la snying rje can/_/de dag chos kyang 'dzin par gnas/_/brtan cing bag yod dga' ba dang /_/thub pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/_/de dag don du ting nge 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan pa yin/_/gang zhig chos rgyal skyob pa 
[\[69a.2\]]yis/_/gang dag byin gyis brlabs gyur pa/_/de dag phyi dus 'jigs bcas tshe/_/chos nyid 'di ni 'dzin par 'gyur/_/shin tu ngo bo nyid kyis ni/_/chos rnams stong zhing spros med par/_/dran dang ldan pa gang gis shes/_/de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/_/thams cad 
[\[69a.3\]]chos kyi ngo bo nyid/_/de la bsam yas tshigs su bcad/_/nges pa nyid du shes 'gyur ba/_/de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/_/zad pa shes la gnas gyur cing /_/mi skye ba la'ang rab gnas la/_/sems ni dul zhing ngo tsha ldan/_/de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/_/
[\[69a.4\]]bde ba'i lam ni bla na med/_/cang shes lam la zhugs gyur pa/_/brtson 'grus byin gyi rlabs dang ldan/_/de dag chos 'dzin gnas pa yin/_/de bzhin nyid dang mi rtog don/_/gang gis chos nyid rab tu shes/_/de la spros pa ci yang med/_/de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/_
[\[69a.5\]]thams cad chos ni byed med par/_/des pa gang gis shes pa de/_/ci yang med cing len med pa'i/_/chos nyid de ni sgrogs par 'gyur/_/'dzin pa med cing 'dzin dang bral/_/chos kun sngon nas yongs dag par/_/gang gis shes pa de dag ni/_/chos kyi spyod yul gnas 
[\[69a.6\]]pa yin/_/chos kun ngo bo med par ni/_/de ltar chos la gang gis shes/_/de dag chos nyid 'di ston 'gyur/_/de ni 'jug pa yin par bshad/_/ming med ming dang bral gyur cing /_/spros pa med cing mi skye bar/_/gang gis chos nyid rab shes pa/_/de dag stong pa nyid 
[\[69a.7\]]kyang sgrogs/_/gnas pa med cing 'gro ba med/_/nam mkha'i gnas bzhin dag par ni/_/gang gis chos 'di shes gyur pa/_/de la ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur/_/gang dag 'du shes don rtog bral/_/ngo bo nyid du ma skyes shing /_/dngos po'i 'du shes bral gyur pa/_/de dag 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]chos nyid ston par 'gyur/_/rgyas gdab de ni rgya med de/_/dgongs pa'i tshig tu gsungs pa yin/_/gang gis de ltar shes gyur pa/_/de dag chos nyid 'di 'dzin 'gyur/_/bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//bzang skyong de lta bas 
[\[69b.2\]]na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag gis bag yod pa lhur blangs te/_chos 'di dag yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o/_/'di'i phan yon la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/tshul bzhin dang yang ldan par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yang yongs su spang bar bya ste/_de ltar na chos zab 
[\[69b.3\]]mo blta bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_gang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed par byed pa/_rang byung rnams kyi ye shes dang /_thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa 'di rnyed mi dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_
[\[69b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_lid tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_khyim bdag ded dpon che bzang dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu phug sbas dang /_bram ze 'dam bus byin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang 
[\[69b.5\]]pos byin dang /_khyim bdag chu lha dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /_'khor bzhi po las ji snyed cig 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rnams ngas bskal 
[\[69b.6\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa'i chos rin po che 'di'i mdzod dang /_'jig rten thams cad yid ches par mi 'gyur ba zab mo/_/don zab pa/_rnam par thar pa sgo gsum gyi tshul bshad pa/_zab mo byang ba/_mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' 
[\[69b.7\]]ba/_mkhas shing shes pas rig pa/_rgya che ba/_gya nom pa/_don phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di yang khyed la gtad do/_/rjes su gtad do/_/gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rten du gyur pa de dag kyang /_khyed la nyis gyur tu rjes su 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]gtad gyis/_khyed kyis kyang ci nas kyang bri bar bya'o/_/mnyan par bya'o/_/gzung bar bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/bklag par bya'o/_/shin tu rgyas pa dang /_rgya cher bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[70a.2\]]yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o/_/ji skad bstan pa bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ste/_de ci nas kyang skyes bu tha ma par ma gyur par bya'o/_/bzang skyong rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[70a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di thos la thos nas kyang lung nod par byed/_kha ton du byed/_kun chub par byed na des lhag pa'i bsam pas gus par bya ste mnyan par bya'o/_/lung mnod par bya'o/_/bshad par bya'o/_/gang dag gzhan dag la ston tam/_klog tu 'jug na 
[\[70a.4\]]des kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rgya cher bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di yun ring du gnas pa dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_shin tu rgya cher gzhan dag la bstan par bya/_klog tu gzhug par bya ste/_'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_
[\[70a.5\]]sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas 'dus pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid thob ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[70a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lha rnams kyis kyang bar snang las me tog gi char phab po/_/rnga bo che dag kyang ma brdungs par sgra byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[70a.7\]]kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de rat+na rak+Shi tas zhus te gtan la phab pa/_skad gsar chad 
[\[70b.2\]]kyis kyang bcos lags//_//[{D134}]rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba pu N+ya samuts+tshaya sa ma d+hi na ma ma ha yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[70b.3\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yangs pa na a mras bsrungs pa'i tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/_dge slong khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_
[\[70b.4\]]zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba 
[\[70b.5\]]yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/_gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_mngon par 
[\[70b.6\]]shes pa thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo 
[\[70b.7\]]gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bla ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phel ba'i blo gros 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal 
[\[71a.2\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang /_lha'i bu bzhi khri thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[71a.3\]]skyong ba mang po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa shin tu snying por gyur te/_mu stegs byed kyi tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan to/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[71a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[71a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di shin tu snying por gyur te/_mu stegs can ngan pa spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu grangs ma mchis pa dang /_gcer bu pa la sogs pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te mdzes par gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[71a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams legs par yongs su gzung du gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags su gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bskyang du gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[71a.7\]]rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzengs bstod pa dang /_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa dang /_yang dag par bstan par gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung du gsol/_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gsol/_ji lta bu'i tshul gyis chos kyi phan gdags pas mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba'i lam bstan par gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang byang chub 
[\[71b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /_mi 'bral ba dang /_bskyud 
[\[71b.3\]]ngas pa ma mchis pa'i chos can gyi slad du dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi dgongs pa rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_don rtogs pa rjes su 'thob pa'i slad du rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'i slad 
[\[71b.4\]]du ngo tsha dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa'i las thams cad spong ba'i slad du khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_cho ga dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i slad du brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du dpa' bar 'gyur ba 
[\[71b.5\]]dang /_'khor thams cad kyi nang du bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i slad du sran thub par 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs su mi nyams pa dang /_chos yongs su mi nyams pa dang /_shes ba yongs su 
[\[71b.6\]]mi nyams pa dang /_ye shes yongs su mi nyams par 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi nyams pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug gi bar du sems can thams cad la mdza' ba brtan pa dang /_ji skad smras pa 
[\[71b.7\]]de bzhin du bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gnas pas sems can rnams la mi slu ba dang /_gtong ba thams cad rjes su 'jug pas ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang /_sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa la gnas pas ma bstan pa'i tshul 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]khrims dang ldan pa dang /_gnod sems med pa'i yid kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas ma bstan pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /_yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid kyis don thams cad yongs su sgrub pas ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang /_
[\[72a.2\]]shes bzhin la mkhas te/_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi gnas pas ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa dang /_lta ba thams cad dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pas ma bstan pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[72a.3\]]sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la shin tu brtson pas bsdu ba shin tu bsdus pa dang /_lha dang mi'i skye ba thams cad la mi rtag par yid la bgyid pa la brtson pas re ba ma mchis pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la legs par gnas shing nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[72a.4\]]sangs rgyas 'dod pa dang bral bas sgo'i them pa'i rten lta bu dang /_chos kyi dbang du bgyid kyi 'dod pa'i dbang du mi bgyid pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal srid don du gnyer bar bgyid kyi lha dang mi'i rgyal srid don du mi gnyer ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar 
[\[72a.5\]]'gyur ba dang /_chos kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi zang zing gis mi 'tsho ba dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pas zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad la gti mug 
[\[72a.6\]]gi mun pa dang bral bas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas bdud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /_sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas thabs la mkhas par 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[72a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi bdag po bsred med kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sred med kyi bu khyod legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir don 'di 'dri bar sems 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa ni sred med kyi bu khyod legs so/_/sred med kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang /_gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba ngas bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol 
[\[72b.2\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa zhes 
[\[72b.3\]]bya ba yod de/_de la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_chos yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_ye shes yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas mthong 
[\[72b.4\]]ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa nas/_sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas/_thabs la mkhas par 'gyur 
[\[72b.5\]]ba'i bar de dag dang /_yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming tsam bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba tshan po 
[\[72b.6\]]che chen po stobs chen po dang ldan pa zhig yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas so/_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni tshan po che chen po stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sems can la 'di lta ste/_stobs sam spro ba bdag dang mnyam pa yang med 
[\[72b.7\]]na lhag pa lta ga la yod snyam mo/_/des dge sbyong go'u ta ma stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan te/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan zhing sred med kyi bu'i lus thob bo/_/zhes grag go snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thad du song la/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]de ci 'dra ba dang /_bdag ci 'dra ba sad par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/_a mras bsrungs pa'i tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[73a.2\]]nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen pos chos ston cing /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'phags pa dang 'dra 
[\[73a.3\]]la kun nas mdzes shing blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong ngo /_/des bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob bo/_/de dga' ba dang dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs 
[\[73a.4\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing mgo bor thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 
[\[73a.5\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa gdul ba'i phyir gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod song la/_nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i phyir/_mda' 'phangs 
[\[73a.6\]]pa gang yin pa de 'dir long shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnam mda' de ga la mchis pa bdag gis ma mthong lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag 
[\[73a.7\]]g.yas pa nas snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer cig btang ste/_'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i khor yug chen po gang yin pa de na mda' de 'dug pa snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khor yug chen po na mda' 'dug pa de khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi 
[\[73b.2\]]bu khyod song la mda' de long shig_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_'khor thams cad kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las rkyong ba'am 
[\[73b.3\]]brkyang ba las skum pa bzhin du skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug chen po de nas mda' de blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci gnam mda' 'di byang chub sems dpas yab yum 
[\[73b.4\]]las byung ba'i stobs kyis 'phangs pa lags sam/_'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'phangs pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu yab yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis mda' 'phangs pa yin gyi/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'phangs pa ni ma yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu 
[\[73b.5\]]gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'phangs su zin na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yab yum las byung ba'i stobs/_rang gi stobs bsod nams yongs su smin pa las 
[\[73b.6\]]skyes pa de ji lta bu zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu mi bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang gcig gi stobs so/_/glang bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang sngon po gcig gi stobs so/_/glang sngon po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che tha mal pa gcig gi stobs so/_/glang po che 
[\[73b.7\]]tha mal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che 'jigs su rung ba gcig gi stobs so/_/glang po che 'jigs su rung ba bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che glang po che mo 'dra ba gcig gi stobs so/_/glang po che glang po che mo 'dra ba bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni dgon pa'i glang po che gcig gi stobs so/_/dgon pa'i 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]glang po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni ri 'bigs byed kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs so/_/ri 'bigs byed kyi glang po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che mtshon cha'i sder mo can gcig gi stobs so/_/glang po che mtshon cha'i sder mo can bcu'i stobs gang

[\[74a.4\]]po che dmar po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che skya bo gcig gi stobs so/_/glang po che skya bo bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che ku mu da gcig gi stobs so/_/glang po che ku mu da bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che pad ma dkar po gcig gi stobs so/_/glang po che pad ma 
[\[74a.5\]]dkar po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che pad ma gcig gi stobs so/_/glang po che pad ma bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/_spos kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs so/_/spos kyi glang po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che chen po gcig gi stobs so/_/spos kyi 
[\[74a.6\]]glang po che chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni seng ge ral pa can thabs can gcig gi stobs so/_/seng ge ral pa can thabs can bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni tshan po che gcig gi stobs so/_/tshan po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni tshan po che chen po gcig gi stobs so/_/

[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]stobs gang yin pa de ni rab gnon chen po gcig gi stobs so/_/rab gnon chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni sa bla'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/sa bla'i lha'i bu bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/gzhal med khang

[\[74b.3\]]rtag tu myos gcig gi stobs so/_/lha'i bu rtag tu myos bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lus ngan gcig gi stobs so/_/lus ngan bcu'i stobs gang yin pa 
[\[74b.4\]]de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gcig gi stobs so/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/
[\[74b.5\]]'thab bral gyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gcig gi stobs so/_/lha'i bu rab 'thab bral bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i rgyal 
[\[74b.6\]]po yongs su dga' ldan gcig gi stobs so/_/lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/'phrul dga'i lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul gcig gi stobs so/_/lha'i rgyal po rab 
[\[74b.7\]]'phrul bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i rgyal po dbang byed gcig gi stobs so/_/lha'i rgyal po dbang byed bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi ris kyi 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/_/bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni bdud sdig can gcig gi stobs so/_/bdud sdig can bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu phyed pa gcig gi stobs so/_/sred med kyi bu phyed pa bcu'i stobs 
[\[75a.2\]]gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu gcig gi stobs so/_/sred med kyi bu bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu chen po gcig gi stobs so/_/sred med kyi bu chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa brgya lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/
[\[75a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa brgya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa stong lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa stong lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub 
[\[75a.4\]]sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa khri lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa khri lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa 'bum lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[75a.5\]]nges par byung nas bskal pa 'bum lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa sa ya lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa sa ya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges 
[\[75a.6\]]par byung nas bskal pa bye ba lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag bcu lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par 
[\[75a.7\]]byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag bcu lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag khri lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub 
[\[75b.2\]]sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag khri lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum lon pa bcu'i stobs gang 
[\[75b.3\]]yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag sa ya lon pa gcig gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag sa ya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig gi stobs 
[\[75b.4\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa srid pa tha ma pa gcig gi stobs yin te/_maud gal gyi bu stobs de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btsas ma thag tu sa 
[\[75b.5\]]la gom pa bdun 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' ga la 'dug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis ma brlabs su zin na/_btsas ma thag 
[\[75b.6\]]tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams de'i sa chen po thur du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad stong zhom par 'gyur te/_de'i 'og nas chu'i phung po las chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam sa gzhi chen po brtol te 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na/_'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 
[\[75b.7\]]sa chen po de yang zhom par mi 'gyur la/_sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa btsas ma thag pa'i stobs dang /_myur ba dang /_shugs dang /_mthu ni de 'dra 'o/_/maud gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]pa tha ma pa btsas ma thag pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' lang tsho'i mchog la bab pa gcig gi stobs yin te/_stobs de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[76a.2\]]byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o/_/ji lta bu'i stobs dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba de bas 'bum 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug go/_/de bas kyang ches grangs med dpag tu med brjod du med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs 
[\[76a.3\]]dang ldan pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/maud gal gyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod de/_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang 
[\[76a.4\]]ldan par gyur na yang /_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gcig gi 'bum gyi char yang mi phod pa nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod de/_stobs de lta bu brnyes pas stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[76a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i stobs 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pas bsdus pa ste/_de las chung ba yang med/_lhag pa yang med do/_/de ni rdzu 'phrul yang ma yin/_cho 'phrul yang ma yin no/_/byang chub 
[\[76a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ni stobs gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas rkang pa'i mthe bo'i spu'i khung bu gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bgrangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'phangs kyang /_
[\[76a.7\]]sems can 'ga' tsam la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gyi stobs ni de ltar dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_grangs med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]mo/_/maud gal gyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de bstan du zin na ni khyed kyis kyang yid ches par mi nus na sems can gzhan gyis lta ci smos/_maud gal gyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba de'i tshe khams bzhi po sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_
[\[76b.2\]]rlung gi khams 'di dag khams gcig pu 'di lta ste/_nam mkha'i khams su byin gyis rlob ste/_des na sa chen po de zhom par mi 'gyur la/_sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las 
[\[76b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i yab yum las byung ba'i stobs 'di thos nas dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar 
[\[76b.4\]]ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las/_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs thos nas/_bdag gi nga rgyal dang dregs pa chag ste ma mchis par gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang chos 
[\[76b.5\]]dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu ci 'dra ba de lta 
[\[76b.6\]]bu yang bdag gis thob par gyur cig_/tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid las lha'i bu khris tshig 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[76b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi ming bka' stsal nas/_cang mi gsung bar gyur 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das ci nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du/_bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i 
[\[77a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin de bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des 
[\[77a.3\]]bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su ma bzung ba de ni gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/sred med kyi bu dper na chu mig 
[\[77a.4\]]thams cad dang /_mtsho bran thams cad dang /_mtshe'u thams cad dang /_chu klung thams cad dang /_chu bran thams cad dang /_mtsho thams cad dang /_lteng ka thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen po'i khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin du/_sred med kyi bu bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 
[\[77a.5\]]ci yang rung ba sbyin pa las byung ba rnams dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba rnams dang /_sgom pa las byung ba rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_zag pa med pa rnams dang /_'jig rten pa rnams dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_
[\[77a.6\]]mi rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ji snyed pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa dag go_/sred med kyi bu de'i phyir bsod nams thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[77a.7\]]mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/sred med kyi bu dper na/_rin po che'i ri chen po gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_lhun po dang /_lhun po chen po dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod 
[\[77b.2\]]dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[77b.3\]]khams dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar ji snyed yod pa nas/_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i bar 'di dag thams cad ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par blta bar bya ba de 
[\[77b.4\]]bzhin du sred med kyi bu so so'i skye bo'i bsod nams rnams dang /_slob pa'i bsod nams rnams dang /_mi slob pa'i bsod nams rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rnams ji yang rung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 
[\[77b.5\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa'i khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs te/_sred med kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag gis bsod nams thams cad 
[\[77b.6\]]yongs su bzung ba de ltar rig par bya'o/_/sred med kyi bu gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can las theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs pa ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na 'khor los sgyur ba ni bsod nams dang shes rab kyis mchog tu brjod do/_/sred med kyi 
[\[77b.7\]]bu gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur te/_sems can re re yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur na/_sred med kyi 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci bsod nams kyi phung po de mang ngam/_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po yang mang lags na sems can grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi lta smos kyang 
[\[78a.2\]]ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa de dag re re nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'am/_stong gsum gyi 
[\[78a.3\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa lta zhog gi/_sred med kyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung 
[\[78a.4\]]po dang ldan par gyur na/_sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po mang ngam/_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig 'khor los sgyur ba dang mnyam par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung 
[\[78a.5\]]po yang dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis na sems can grangs ma mchis pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sred med kyi bu khyod mos par bya/_khong du chud par bya ste/_de bas na sems dang po bskyed 
[\[78a.6\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba ches mang la ches dpag tu med de/_'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang /_
[\[78a.7\]]bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang po'o/_/sred med kyi bu gzhan yang stong gi bdag po tshangs pa ni stong 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed do/_/sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te mi la la zhig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/_sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dang /_tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan 
[\[78b.2\]]pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang mang /_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid ches mang gi sbyin pa las byung ba ni de lta ma lags so/_/sred med kyi bu stong gi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung 
[\[78b.3\]]po lta zhog gi sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pas stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed la/_sred med kyi bu gal te mi la la zhig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te sbyin 
[\[78b.4\]]pa byin na/_sred med kyi bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang /_byams pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang mang /_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang 
[\[78b.5\]]lags pa de nyid ches mang gi sbyin pa las byung ba ni de lta ma lags so/_/sred med kyi bu stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi_/sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[78b.6\]]byams pas khyab par byed la/_sred med kyi bu mi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/_sred med kyi bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang /_tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de 
[\[78b.7\]]gnyis gang mang /_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi_/sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems 
[\[79a.2\]]can du bsdu bar bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[79a.3\]]pa la zhugs pa sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba la brtson pa/_g.yo med cing sgyu med pa'i byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid de bas ches mang ste/_tshangs 
[\[79a.4\]]pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/sred med kyi bu de ltar na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni 
[\[79a.5\]]dpag tu med pa yin te/_sred med kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_skyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi bsod nams thams cad yongs su bsdus pa de ltar rig par bya ste/_
[\[79a.6\]]sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o/_/sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig yod/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs bcur 
[\[79a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig yod/_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so/_/bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni brjod pa'am/_brda sprad par rngo mi thogs lags 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sred med kyi bu gal te dper blang ba bstan pas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du bstan du zin kyang /_phyogs bcu na 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa ni bstan par sla ba ma yin no/_/sred med kyi bu 'on kyang don 'di nyid brda sprad pa dang /_
[\[79b.2\]]bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can bsod nams 'dod pa rnams phyir zhing 'bogs par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyi brtson 'grus chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la 
[\[79b.3\]]dpes bstan to/_/sred med kyi bu dper na mi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo man chad yungs 'brus yongs su gang bar byas la/_sred med kyi bu de las shar phyogs su yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 
[\[79b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas yungs 'bru gcig bor te/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru de dag thams cad yongs su zad par byas kyang /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs 
[\[79b.5\]]bcu kun tu yang de bzhin tu sbyar ro/_/sred med kyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yungs 'brus yongs su gang bar gyur la de las mi la la zhig gis yungs 'bru re re yang /_yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gses na/_sred med kyi bu 'di ji 
[\[79b.6\]]snyam du sems/_yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus sam/_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru gcig gi cha gses pa'i phyogs gang lags pa de yang gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad 
[\[79b.7\]]shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar gyur pas kyang bskal par yang rtogs par rngo mi thogs lags na/_yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_sred med kyi bu gal te mi la la zhig gis shar phyogs su yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas yungs 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'bru'i cha gses pa re re bor te/_sred med kyi bu de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa thams cad zad par byas kyang /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs 
[\[80a.2\]]bcu kun tu yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/sred med kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkhas yongs su khyab pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mi la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/_sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi de 
[\[80a.3\]]gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so/_/bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sred med kyi bu de lta bu'i sbyin pa las byung 
[\[80a.4\]]ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa g.yo med pa sgyu med pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba la brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang /_byams pa 
[\[80a.5\]]chen po bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/sred med kyi bu dper na gzugs kyi rnam pa nam mkha'i khams kyis ma khyab pa ci yang med pa de bzhin du sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang 
[\[80a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i byams pa des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa de dag ma khyab pa gang yang med de/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas yongs su 
[\[80a.7\]]khyab bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/_sems can gang dag sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur tam/_de bzhin du brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur tam/_de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/_g.yo med pa/_sgyu med pa/_sems can yongs su dgrol ba la brtson pa/_snying rje chen po la zhugs pa/_byams pa chen po la gnas pa'i gom pa bdun la bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa 
[\[80b.2\]]gang yin pa de ni de bas ches mang ste/_sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ni de lta ma yin no/_/sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa 
[\[80b.3\]]gsum pa'o/_/sred med kyi bu gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi 
[\[80b.4\]]phung po'i brgya'i char mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brgya byin dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni tshangs pa chen po'i 
[\[80b.5\]]bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag 
[\[80b.6\]]thams cad ni dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog dang mnyam 
[\[80b.7\]]pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni shA ri'i bu'i shes rab dang /_ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]snyed pa de dag thams cad shA ri'i bu dang mnyam pa'i shes rab dang /_ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang /_de dag thams cad ni rang sangs rgyas gcig gi shes rab dang /_ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i 
[\[81a.2\]]bar du yang mi bzod do/_/sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /_ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[81a.3\]]chen po nges par byung nas bskal pa lnga brgya lon pa'i shes rab dang /_ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[81a.4\]]la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_mi sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lha dang mi'i sil snyan dag kyang grag go/_/lha 
[\[81a.5\]]dang mi'i me tog gi sprin dag kyang phab ste/_me tog gi sprin de dag gis sa chen po 'di pus mo nub tsam du bkram mo/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[81a.6\]]'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_skyed pa dang /_skyed par 'gyur ba gang dag lags pa de dag gis ni bdag cag 
[\[81a.7\]]zil gyis gnon to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can de dag gi don bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na sems can gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs pa de dag ni bsod nams 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mngon par byung ba yang ma lags/_de dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[81b.2\]]bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mngon par byung ba yang lags/_de dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang dag par gzhol ba yang lags so/_/le'u dang po'o//_//bam po gnyis 
[\[81b.3\]]pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bgyid pa'i chos rnams gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po 
[\[81b.4\]]che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos gcig ste/_gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[81b.5\]]chos gcig po 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mnyan pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[81b.6\]]tshol bas chog mi shes pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[81b.7\]]'thob par byed pa'i chos gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos gsum po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_lta ba yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs
