[\[82a.2\]]su dag pa dang /_shes rab yongs su dag pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe 
[\[82a.3\]]na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub la zhugs pa dang /_rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra ba dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_phrag dog med pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ste/_rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 
[\[82a.4\]]'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos drug ste/_drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang /_tshogs kyi 
[\[82a.5\]]kha mi 'dren pa dang /_dben pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang /_byams pa chen po mi gtong ba dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos drug po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/
[\[82a.6\]]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos bdun te/_bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zhi gnas yongs su 'tshol ba dang /_lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /_rgyu yongs su shes pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[82a.7\]]'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_lam gyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang /_lam bsgom pa la le lo med pa ste/_rigs kyi bu bdun po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_lus las su rung ba nyid dang /_sems las su rung ba nyid dang /_tshor ba la so sor rtog pa nyid dang /_chos la rjes su lta ba nyid dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma 
[\[82b.2\]]skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa dang /_dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams kun nas bsrung zhing yongs su sbyong ba ste/_rigs kyi bu chos brgyad po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus 
[\[82b.3\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos dgu ste/_dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'das pa mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang /_ma 'ongs pa mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang /_da ltar byung ba mi zad pa'i chos nyid du 
[\[82b.4\]]so sor rtog pa dang /_sgyu ma'i chos la so sor rtog pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang /_chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /_stong pa nyid mi spong ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa rnam par bsgoms pas smon pa dang bral ba dang /_bsams 
[\[82b.5\]]bzhin du srid par skye ba ste/_rigs kyi bu chos dgu po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_bdag 
[\[82b.6\]]med pa la mos pa dang /_srog med pa la bzod pa dang /_gang zag med pa la gcig tu nges pa dang /_mi rtag pa la yid ches pa dang /_skye ba thams cad la sems can dmyal bar 'du shes pa dang /_phung po rnams la gshed mar 'du shes pa dang /_khams rnams la sbrul 
[\[82b.7\]]gdug par 'du shes pa dang /_skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang /_srid pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la 'dris par 'du shes pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub 
[\[83a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/_/bsod nams sogs par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/_/
[\[83a.3\]]bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi/_mos par bgyi'o/_/bsod nams mi zad pa 'thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[83a.4\]]dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bgyi'o/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho 'thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_bklag par bgyi/_bshad par bgyi'o/_/bsod nams brgya'i mtshan 
[\[83a.5\]]yongs su gzung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bgyi'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[83a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par brtson pas 'di lta ste/_bsod nams mi zad pa dang /_bsod nams rgya mtsho dang /_bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_bsod nams [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyi chos 'di dag ji ltar yongs 
[\[83a.7\]]su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams nye bar rton pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /_bsod 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]nams 'du ba dang /_bsod nams rgyas pa dang /_bsod nams mi zad pa dang /_bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_bsod nams rgya mtsho yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /_thos pa'i tshogs so/_/
[\[83b.2\]]rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i tshogs la ji ltar brtson par bya zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po gang la de'i gtong ba'i sems mi skye zhing gtong ba'i blo mi 'byung ba'i dngos po de blang bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[83b.3\]]yongs su gzung ba gang la btang ba'i sems mi skye ba'i yongs su gzung ba de yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o/_/gang la slong ba rnams kyis bslangs na yongs su 'dzin pa'i blo skye ba'i g.yog 'khor de gzung bar mi bya'o/_/dngos po gang la slong ba rnams kyis bslangs na byang chub 
[\[83b.4\]]sems dpa' mi gtong ba'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba'i rgyal srid de blang bar mi bya'o/_/longs spyod de dag dang /_nor de dag dang /_rdzas de dag dang /_rin po che de dag blang bar mi bya ba nas de lta bu'i dngos po ci yang rung ba'i bar du blang bar mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[83b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/_bdag gi lus 'di yang sems can thams cad la gtang ste yongs su gtang na phyi rol kyi dngos po rnams lta ci smos snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gzhan yang sems can gang dang gang la dngos po gang dang 
[\[83b.6\]]gang gis dngos po gang dang gang byed par 'gyur ba de yod na de dang de la de dang de mi dga' ba med pa dang 'gyod pa med par sbyin par bya ste/_lag pa 'dod pa rnams la lag pa yang sbyin no/_/rkang pa 'dod pa rnams la rkang pa dang /_mig 'dod pa rnams la mig kyang sbyin no/_/sha 'dod pa 
[\[83b.7\]]rnams la sha dang /_khrag 'dod pa rnams la khrag dang /_rkang 'dod pa rnams la rkang dang /_yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la/_yan lag dang nying lag dang /_mgo bo 'dod pa rnams la mgo bo yang yongs su gtong bar bya na/_phyi rol gyi dngos po 'di lta ste/_nor dang /_
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]'bru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che dang /_rgyan dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_bzhon pa dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_ri 'or ba 
[\[84a.2\]]dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma dang /_'khor rnams lta ci smos/_gzhan yang sems can gang dang gang la gang dang gang gis don byed par 'gyur ba de dang de yod na de dang de la dngos po de dang de sbyin par bya ste/_mi dga' ba med pa 
[\[84a.3\]]dang /_'gyod pa med pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la mi re bar yongs su gtong bar bya'o/_/mi lta bar sbyin par bya'o/_/gzhan du na sems can la phan gdags pa dang /_sems can la snying rje ba dang /_sems can de la snying brtse ba dang /_sems can de dag nyid bsdu ba'i phyir 
[\[84a.4\]]bya bar zad do/_/bdag gis byang chub thob pa na ci nas sems can 'di dag chos kun rtogs par gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang su dag de ltar sems skyed par byed pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[84a.5\]]kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba yin te/_de ni srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/lus rtas par bya ba'i phyir ya nga ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar mi byed do/_/de ni srog gi phyir yang gzhan la slong khro mi byed do/_/longs 
[\[84a.6\]]spyod kyi phyir mi dge ba mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/g.yog 'khor gyi phyir yang rtsod pa dang 'thab mo slong bar mi byed do/_/chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo rnams kyi phyir yang gzhan dag la 'drid par mi byed do/_/gzhan gyi longs spyod dag la yang brnab sems skyed par mi 
[\[84a.7\]]byed/_ser sna'i sems skyed par mi byed do/_/de 'dod pa nyung ste sems skyed pa gcig kyang dge ba dang mi ldan pa skyed par mi byed na mang po lta ci smos/_de de ltar brtson na 'dod chen dang chags pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chen dang chags pa spangs na btsal bar bya ba 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]tshol bar mi byed do/_/btsal bar bya ba mi tshol na yang dag pa la brtson par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa la brtson na yang dag par 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par song na yang dag pa'i bsgrub pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa la zhugs na/_yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes 
[\[84b.2\]]gnyen rnams mnyes par byed do/_/yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams mnyes par byas nas sten par byed/_'grogs par byed/_bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang bsten cing 'grogs la bsnyen bkur byed na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las yang 
[\[84b.3\]]dag par nges pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang sgrub par byed do/_/de yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs nas log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thams cad byed do/_/de sems can gyi don la brtson na mi rigs par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de rigs pa la 
[\[84b.4\]]zhugs na 'di lta ste/_sems can rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i tshul dang tshul ma yin pa la mkhas pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na sbyin pa'i tshogs la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[84b.5\]]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams la gcig gis 'du shes bskyed par bya'i gnyis kyi 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ste/_nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med 
[\[84b.6\]]de gnyis su byar med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus 'di ni rtswa dang shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_lam snang ba dang 'dra ste/_spyod pa med pa/_byed pa med pa/_sems pa med pa/_snying po med pa khams kyis bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te 'di la la la zhig gis bcad dam/_
[\[84b.7\]]gtubs sam/_dbyug pa'am/_mtshon cha 'am/_shing ngam/_bong bas bsnun kyang rung ste/_de la bdag gis tshor ba'i rnam par rig pa bskyed par mi bya'o/_/lus la blta bar mi bya'o/_/srog la chags pa bskyed par mi bya'o/_/sems can de dag la yang tha ba dang sdang ba'i sems 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bskyed par mi bya'o snyam pa'i steng du des sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na sman gyi shing ljon pa ni rtsa ba las khyer ram/_sdong po'am/_yal ga'am/_shun lpags sam/_lo ma'am/_me tog gam/_'bras bu'am/_
[\[85a.2\]]snying po las khyer na/_'di snyam du bdag gi rtsa ba khyer la sdong po ma khyer cig ce'am/_bdag gi sdong po khyer la rtsa ba ma khyer cig ce'am/_bdag gi yal ga khyer la lo ma ma khyer cig ce'am/_bdag gi lo ma khyer la yal ga ma khyer cig ce'am/_de bzhin du bdag gi yal ga 
[\[85a.3\]]phre'u dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_shun lpags dang /_snying po las khyer la snying po med pa las ma khyer cig ce'am/_bdag gi snying po med pa las khyer la snying po las ma khyer cig snyam du rtog par mi byed de/_de ltar na sman gyi shing ljon pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam 
[\[85a.4\]]par rtog par mi byed mod kyi/_'on kyang sman gyi shing ljon pa ni rnam par mi rtog bzhin du nad rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma sel bar byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i lus 'di la sman gyi shing ljon pa lta bu'i 'du 
[\[85a.5\]]shes bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can gang dang gang dag la ci dang ci dgos pa de dang de de bzhin du khyer cig ces byas te/_lag pa 'dod pa la ni lag pa/_rkang pa 'dod pa la ni rkang pa/_mig 'dod pa la ni mig_/sha 'dod pa la ni sha//khrag 'dod pa la ni khrag_/rus 
[\[85a.6\]]pa 'dod pa la ni rus pa/_rkang 'dod pa la ni rkang /_mgo bo 'dod pa la ni mgo bo/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa la ni bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag thams cad khyer cig snyam ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i 
[\[85a.7\]]tshogs kyis bsod nams mi zad pas mngon par 'byung ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sbyin pa byin pa na sems can ser sna can rnams kyi gtong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/sems can dbul po rnams kyis longs spyod 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/des yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su gtong ba na sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/des sbyin pa sbyin pa na dus thams 
[\[85b.2\]]cad du chos gsum du yongs su bsngo bar mi bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /_rgyal srid dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar mi bya ba dang /_bdag nyid bsod nams dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su 
[\[85b.3\]]bsngo bar mi bya ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar mi bya ba'o/_/des sbyin pa sbyin pa na sbyin pa de yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_de la yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs 
[\[85b.4\]]su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba 
[\[85b.5\]]dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba ste/_de ltar na yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa de yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[85b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa nye bar brtan par bya'i zad par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ji ltar zad par 'gyur zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[85b.7\]]'di lta ste/_yongs su ma bsngos pa dang /_thabs mi mkhas pa dang /_dma' bar skye bar 'dod pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po la bsten pa ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur la nye bar brtan par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_
[\[86a.2\]]chos kyi rgyal srid 'dod pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur la nye bar brtan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[86a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi mngon du byas la sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_sems can la snying brtse ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mi 'gal ba dang /_chos dang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i rnam 
[\[86a.4\]]par smin pa la'ang mi re ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi po de dag mngon du byas la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams chos gsum la dgod pa'i phyir sbyin pa 
[\[86a.5\]]sbyin par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad byang chub la dgod pa dang /_chos bstan pa de nyid la dgod pa dang /_sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba la dgod pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu chos gsum po de dag la sems can rnams dgod pa'i 
[\[86a.6\]]phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_longs spyod chen po dang /_gtong ba'i sems te/_
[\[86a.7\]]chos de gnyis 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis yongs su spang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chags pa dang /_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]ser sna ste/_rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis yongs su spang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par 
[\[86b.2\]]bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab dang ye shes te/_rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub 
[\[86b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[86b.4\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gang dag sbyin par bya ba'i sbyin pa dag ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems snyoms pa'i sbyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa dang /_byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_
[\[86b.5\]]zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i sbyin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu sbyin pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin par bya ba dag go/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi bzad pa mngon par 'byung bar 'dod pas 
[\[86b.6\]]sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu la brtson par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 
[\[86b.7\]]gzung ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di bka' stsal pa ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni nams kyang bsod nams yongs su nyams pa'am/_ye shes yongs su nyams pa'am/_
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni bsod 
[\[87a.2\]]nams mi zad pa dang /_bsod nams rgya mtshos mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pas dbul por yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni chos kyi rgyun dang ldan pas longs spyod chen por yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni nor bdun dang ldan pas phyug por yang 
[\[87a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag ni bsod nams brgya'i mtshan yod pas bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa yang yin no/_/de dag ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi zhing yang yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la gzhan yang bka' 
[\[87a.4\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs gang zhe na/_gang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /_bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la snying rje ba dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la gus pa drag po 
[\[87a.5\]]dang ldan pa dang /_lus kyi yan lag gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag gi yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa dang /_yid kyi yan lag gsum yongs su dag pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blang ba rjes su sgrub pa ste/_gzhan dag kyang de la 'dzud pa dang /_de dag la 
[\[87a.6\]]'god par byed pa dang /_bdag la mi stod pa dang /_gzhan dag la mi smod pa dang /_tshul khrims dag la de'i ngang can du gyur pa dang /_tshul khrims kyis mi rlom pa dang /_brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dag las mi g.yo ba dang /_'phags 
[\[87a.7\]]pa'i rigs gnas par byed pa dang /_rang gi sems srung ba dang /_gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag la skyon du mi lta ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang /_srid pa mngon par 'grub pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_gzhan rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la 'dzud pa dang /_gzhan gyi 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]bya bdag la spro ba dang /_bde ba dag la de'i ngang can du mi 'gyur ba dang /_dgon par gnas pa mi 'dor ba dang /_nad pa rnams kyi g.yog byed pa dang /_byas nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /_bkur sti 
[\[87b.2\]]mi byed pa dag la dang du len pa dang /_bkur sti byed pa rnams la khengs par mi byed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang ma grags pa dang /_smad pa dang bsngags pa dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dag la khengs par yang mi 'gyur/_zhum par yang mi 'gyur 
[\[87b.3\]]ba dang /_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spong ba dang /_khon du mi 'dzin pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byams pa la gnas pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang dgra rnams la sems snyoms par lta ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi phung po la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang /_theg pa 
[\[87b.4\]]gzhan du yongs su mi sngo ba dang /_lha gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal ba dang /_lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang /_'gyod pa spong ba dang /_yid la gcags pa med pa dang /_dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong 
[\[87b.5\]]ba la mchog tu dga' ba dang /_skye ba'i gnas thams cad la lhag par chags pa med pa dang /_bsams bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba dang /_mi dga' ba bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_dmigs pa la rnam par g.yengs pa 
[\[87b.6\]]med pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod cing mi skrag pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi tshogs yin te/_tshul khrims kyi tshogs de la brten nas srog gi phyir yang bslab pa nyams par mi byed de/_de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir tshul khrims srung bar 
[\[87b.7\]]mi byed do/_/mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/_brgya byin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ma yin/_tshangs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ma yin/_longs spyod kyi phyir ma yin/_dbang phyug gi phyir ma yin/_kha dog gi phyir ma yin/_grags pa'i phyir ma yin/_snyan pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa'i 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]phyir ma yin/_rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin/_bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/_srog gi phyir ma yin/_gos kyi phyir ma yin/_zas kyi phyir ma yin/_mal cha dang stan gyi phyir ma yin te/_na ba'i gsos dang /_sman zong gi phyir tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/mig 
[\[88a.2\]]dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/gzugs la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[88a.3\]]shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/'dod pa'i khams la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/gzugs kyi khams la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/gzugs med pa'i khams la rten te tshul khrims 
[\[88a.4\]]srung bar mi byed do/_/sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/_tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pas skrag ste tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pas skrag ste skyabs 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims 
[\[88a.5\]]srung bar mi byed do/_/mi dbul po'i 'jigs pas skrag ste tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/_/lha dbul po'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dbul po'i 'jigs 
[\[88a.6\]]pas skrag ste/_tshul khrims srung bar mi byed de/_gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi tshul gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi rigs gnas par bya ba dang /_chos kyi rigs gnas par bya ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims 
[\[88a.7\]]srung bar byed do/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol bar 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_grub pa dang /_bde ba 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos gnas par 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod de tshul khrims srung 
[\[88b.2\]]bar byed do/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun yongs su bsdu bar 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par 'dod pa dang /_chos kyi rigs mi 'chad par 'dod pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad par 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[88b.3\]]rigs yongs su spyad par 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/lha'i mngon par shes pa 'dod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa dang /_shes rab 'dod pa dang /_rnam par grol ba 'dod pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[88b.4\]]'dod pa dang /_cho 'phrul 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed de/_de'i tshul khrims de yang ma nyams pa dang /_ma zhig pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_ma 'chol ba dang /_rang dbang yod pa dang /_legs par tshar phyin pa dang /_legs par bsams pa dang /_ma nogs pa dang /_rma med pa 
[\[88b.5\]]dang /_gtsang ba dang /_dri zhim pa dang /_mkhas pas bsngags pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa dang /_ma smas pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu dang ldan pas chos bcu las nyams par mi 
[\[88b.6\]]'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_de la yang bag yod la byang chub 'dod pa dang /_brgya byin las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_de la yang bag yod la byang chub 'dod cing sangs rgyas mthong ba 'ba' 
[\[88b.7\]]zhig 'dod pa dang /_tshangs pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_de la yang bag yod la byang chub 'dod pa dang /_shes nas dang ba thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos la nan tan du bsgrub pa'i phyir chos thos pa las 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa shes pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad shes pa 'dod pa'i phyir spobs pa mi chod pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bsam 
[\[89a.2\]]gtan las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mngon par shes pa myur ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[89a.3\]]shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste/_tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni chos bcu po de dag las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang 
[\[89a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha rnams kyis rtag tu phyag byas pa yin no/_/klu rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yin no/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtag tu bkur sti byas pa yin no/_/dri za rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa yin no/_/klu'i dbang po dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyis 
[\[89a.5\]]rtag tu bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis rtag tu bkur ba yin no/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu thad du 'gro bar bya ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag tu dgongs pa yin no/_/lha dang 
[\[89a.6\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtag tu ston par bkur ba yin no/_/sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba can yin no/_/de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'gro ba bzhir 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na 'di 
[\[89a.7\]]lta ste/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par mi khom pa'i 'gro bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'gro bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i 'gro bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]ngan 'gro thams cad kyi 'gro bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba ste/_de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po legs par yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro ba bzhi po de dag tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung 
[\[89b.2\]]ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos bzhi las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams par mi 
[\[89b.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar thos pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste/_de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[89b.4\]]dpa' chen po ni chos bzhi po de dag las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par 'jig pa bzhi dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos rnam 
[\[89b.5\]]par 'jig pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ba dang /_nad kyi bar gyi bskal pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ba ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i byang 
[\[89b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par 'jig pa bzhi po de dag dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par mtho ba bzhi thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs 
[\[89b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi slu ba dang /_lha la mi slu ba dang /_sems can rnams la mi slu ba dang /_rang gi sems la mi slu ba ste/_de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par mtho ba bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bu gzhan yang de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'jigs pa bcu las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur 
[\[90a.2\]]ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /_dbul ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /_bsngags pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_
[\[90a.3\]]grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_bdud kyis kun nas dkris pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[90a.4\]]dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum dang /_srin po'i 'jigs pa dang /_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_me dang /_chu'i 'jigs pa dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_sbrul dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_gzig dang /_khyi dang /_wa dang /_chu srin ma ka ra 
[\[90a.5\]]dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_chu srin kum b+hi ra dang /_byi la dang /_byi ba dang /_sdig pa dang /_srin gyi me dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba ste/_de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i 
[\[90a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'jigs pa bcu po de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rten ni tshul khrims yin te/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas so/_/gang la tshul 
[\[90a.7\]]khrims yod pa de la ni ting nge 'dzin 'di yod do/_/gang la tshul khrims yod pa de la ni shes rab 'di yod do/_/gang la tshul khrims yod pa de la ni rnam par grol ba 'di yod do/_/gang la tshul khrims yod pa de la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'di yod do/_/rigs kyi bu de la 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gang nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi ba'i tshul khrims ni gang yin/_ci'i phyir na nyon mongs pa rnams zhes bya zhe na/_nyon mongs par byed pas na nyon mongs pa rnams te/_'di ltar khams gsum du sems can rnams nyon mongs par byed pas na nyon mongs pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/de dag 
[\[90b.2\]]zhi bar byed pa gang zhe na/_gang rtog pa med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa med pa dang /_rgyu ba med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa med pa dang /_yid la byed pa med pa ste/_'di ni nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[90b.3\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi ba mi shes pa de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po ni yongs su dag pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du song yang nyon mongs pa dang bcas par zad do/_/de dag ni srid 
[\[90b.4\]]pa'i rtse mor song yang nyon mongs pa dang bcas par zad do/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis gang la khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams med pa de'i tshul khrims kyi phung po ni yongs su dag pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[90b.5\]]tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ma mchis pa de'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[90b.6\]]de ji ltar khams gsum par smon par bgyid/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i 
[\[90b.7\]]phyir khams gsum par smon par mi byed de/_rigs kyi bu gang dag bdag nyid kyang nyon mongs pa med la/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khams gsum du yang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]mi la la zhig gis nam mkha' la ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs bkra ba ston par byed na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci mi de dka' ba byed pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/_mi de ni dka' 
[\[91a.2\]]ba bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag nyid kyang nyon mongs pa med la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khams gsum du yang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par 
[\[91a.3\]]byas nas kyang theg pa gsum ston par byed pa de dag ni de bas kyang ches dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag thar pa'i sgo yang mthong la/_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du khams gsum na yang gnas pa de dag 
[\[91a.4\]]ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/_dgum pa'i gnod pa las thar pa lags pa'i mi slar dgum pa'i gnod pa'i gnas su mchis te/_dgum pa'i gnod pa bgyid pa rnams la 'di skad du bdag sod cig_/gzhan ma gsad cig ces mchi ba de bzhin du 
[\[91a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das dgum pa'i gnod pa'i gnod pa lta bu ni khams gsum lags so/_/dgon par bgyi ba lta bu ni 'jig rten gnas pa lags so/_/dgum pa'i gnod pa bgyid pa lta bu ni 'du byed rnams lags so/_/dgum pa'i gnod pa spangs pa lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[91a.6\]]khams gsum las rnam par grol ba de dag lags te/_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_sems can yongs su dgrol bar bgyi ba'i slad du khams gsum 'ba' zhig tu rgyu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni snying rje chen 
[\[91a.7\]]po'i sems bskyed pa des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ni de lta bu'i snying rje chen po yang ma mchis/_thabs la mkhas pa yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thos pa'i tshogs la ni ji ltar brtson par bya/_des thos pa ni ji ltar btsal bar bya zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[91b.2\]]sems dpa' chen pos mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la nga rgyal bcom pa dang /_bka' blo bde bas bla ma'i sri zhu dang /_gus pa dang /_phangs pa dang /_gces pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/des chos la ni sman gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la ni 
[\[91b.3\]]ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/des bdag la ni nad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/des chos kyi gdams ngag ston pa la ni sman pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/des sems can thams cad la ni nad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/des sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba ni lus 
[\[91b.4\]]la phangs par mi bya'o/_/srog la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya'o/_/dngos po sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la yang des shin du nyon mongs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o/_/nor phun sum tshogs pa la yang des chags pa bskyed par mi bya'o/_/chos gtso bor 
[\[91b.5\]]byas te nor thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyi don dang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rnyed pa 'dod pas rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/
[\[91b.6\]]chos kyi rgyal srid 'dod pa'i phyir rgyal srid thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar 'dod pas dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par 'dod pas dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[91b.7\]]gzung ba la brtson par bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub 'dod pa dang /_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi ka ba bsgreng bar 'dod pa rnams kyis thos pa la brtson par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal byed ni ka bas brtan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'du bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[92a.2\]]shes rab kyi ka ba ni thos pa'i stobs kyis yongs su bzung bas gnas la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu sems skyed nas byang chub sems dpar dam 
[\[92a.3\]]bcas te/_bdag sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces smras la de yang thos pa yongs su tshol ba la mi brtson na sems can thams cad shes rab 'chal par bya ba la zhugs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pa yongs su tshol ba la brtson 'grus 
[\[92a.4\]]rtsom par byed na/_des ni sems can thams cad kyi shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nye bar brtan pa byas pa yin no/_/lha rnams kyang de'i tshe de la mgu zhing yid bde bar gyur nas a la la skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni thos pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_shes rab sbyangs pa'i blos 
[\[92a.5\]]stobs bcu thob par nus so/_/a la la skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i rgyud thams cad rnam pa thams cad du gcad par nus so/_/a la la skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston par nus so/_/
[\[92a.6\]]a la la skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni sngon gyi rgyal ba bzhugs bzhugs pa'i byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par nus so/_/a la la skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni bdud dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas pa pham par byed nus so/_/a la la byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan 
[\[92a.7\]]pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus so zhes ched du rjod par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos nyan pa la brtson pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud sdig 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]can rnams dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/_'di ni bdag cag gi dbang du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di la ni bdag cag dbang med do/_/'dis ni bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du bcom mo/_/'dis ni bdag cag 
[\[92b.2\]]dbang du byas so snyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar thos pa dang ldan na shes rab skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab dang ldan na nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa med na bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/thos pa dang ldan na rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rtog pa 
[\[92b.3\]]yod na tshul bzhin du chos yongs su tshol bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul bzhin du chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson na bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed do/_/thos pa dang ldan na log par lta ba dang bral bar 'gyur la yang dag pa'i lta ba yang skyed par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par zhugs na bdud kyis 
[\[92b.4\]]glags mi rnyed do/_/yang dag par zhugs na don la nye bar rtog pa dang gnod pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/don 'dod na don la yang dag par 'brang bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang thos pa mang po la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud 
[\[92b.5\]]bzhi pham par byed nus par 'gyur ba de ltar rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po'i bdud dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /_'chi bdag gi bdud dang /_lha'i bu'i bdud de/_bdud bzhi po 'di dag pham par byed nus so/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar 
[\[92b.6\]]sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos 'dod pa rnams kyis thos pa yongs su btsal ba de las [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_yun ring po tshad med 
[\[92b.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chen po mchog ces bya ba/_nags dang /_nags 'dab dang /_ri la gnas pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_rtag tu byams pa la gnas pa dang /_snying rje la gnas pa zhig byung ste/_drang srong de mchog tu 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]gyur to/_/de nags khung de dag na gnas pa na 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag byams pa la gnas pa 'di ni sems can rnams kyi dga' ba skyed par yang mi 'gyur la/_byams pa 'dis ni sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams dang 
[\[93a.2\]]bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar byed mi nus so/_/byams pa 'dis ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba yang bskyed par mi nus so snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba gang las skye zhig gu snyam mo/_/
[\[93a.3\]]de la rtog pa 'di lta bu zhig byung ste/_'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang /_rkyen gnyis yod de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi sgra dang /_so sor rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ste/_'di gnyis ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba'i rgyu gnyis 
[\[93a.4\]]dang rkyen gnyis po yin snyam mo/_/de de'i tshe chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa'i blo skyes te/_legs par gsungs pa bdag gis ga las rnyed par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de chos kyi phyir chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson nas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 
[\[93a.5\]]'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas chos btsal to/_/btsal kyang chos smra ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed do/_/de nas de'i mdun du bdud kyi ris kyi lha zhig byung ste/_de drang srong de'i thad du song nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las sangs rgyas 
[\[93a.6\]]kyis gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig bzung ba nga la yod do/_/drang srong des smras pa/_smros shig_/lha des smras pa/_gal te khyod kyis rang gi lus las pags pa bshus te nyi ma la skams nas shog bur byas te/_rang gi khrag dang sbyar bas 
[\[93a.7\]]snag tsha byas la rang gi rus pas smyug gu byas te/_nga las tshigs su bcad pa de 'dri na de lta na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de ngas khyod la sbyin no/_/rigs kyi bu de nas drang srong chen po mchog 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi lus 'di 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]skye ba de dang de dag dang skye ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu bskal pa 'bum phrag mang por nyes pa byas nas/_dgra dang gshed ma'i lag tu song nas chom rkun dang rgyal pos bkrabs pa la sogs pas mtshon rnon pos yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dum bu du mar bcad cing gtubs te 
[\[93b.2\]]'dod pa'i phyir dang /_nor gyi phyir dang /_bcad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa la sogs pa dka' ba 'bum nyams su myong mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gi lus de dag dang /_tshor ba de dag gis sems can su la yang don ci yang byas pa med na/_da bdag 
[\[93b.3\]]gis snying po med pa'i lus 'dis chos rnyed par 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas/_dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_lha de la yang slob dpon gyi 'du shes bskyed nas mtshon rnon pos rang gi lus las pags pa bshus te nyi ma la skams nas shog 
[\[93b.4\]]bur byas te/_rang gi lus las khrag gzags nas rang gi khrag gis snag tsha sbyar te/_rang gi rus pas smyug gu byas nas lha de la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de bdag la gsungs shig_/
[\[93b.5\]]khyod kyis ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du bdag gis bgyis lags te/_bdag gis pags pa bshus nas skams te shog bur bgyis nas rang gi khrag gis snag tsha sbyar te/_rang gi rus pas smyug gu bgyis lags so zhes byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha des drang srong chen 
[\[93b.6\]]po mchog de'i gus pa dang /_don du gnyer ba de lta bu mthong nas/_gnong gnong ltar byas te/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas drang srong chen po mchog des de'i tshe lha de mi snang bar gyur par rig nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa de ma thos 
[\[93b.7\]]su zin kyang /_gang gi phyir bdag gis chos la gus pa chen pos rang gi pags pa bshus te skams nas rang gi khrag dang sbyar ba dang /_rang gi rus pa phyung ste smyug gu byas pas bdag gi chos la gus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/slu bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'on 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]kyang bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_g.yo ba med pas sems can rnams la snying rje'i sems bskyed nas/_lus dang srog la mi lta bar pags pa shog bur byas te rang gi khrag gis sbyar nas/_rus pas smyug gu byas pa'i chos la gus pa'i bden pa dang 
[\[94a.2\]]bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na chos gsung zhing chos ston pa bdag nyid chen po su bzhugs kyang rung ste/_de dag gis bdag la zhal bstan par gsol/_bdag la chos kyang thos par 
[\[94a.3\]]mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar drang srong chen po mchog gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de nyid la 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[94a.4\]]kun nas dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/des drang srong chen po mchog de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs 
[\[94a.5\]]su chud de/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sems can yongs su smin pa yang gzigs nas dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las rkyong pa'am/_brkyang pa las skum pa bzhin du skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i 
[\[94a.6\]]rgyal po de byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_drang srong chen po mchog gi mdun du bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po de byung ma 
[\[94a.7\]]thag tu de'i mod la nags khung de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/me tog gi char chen po yang bab bo/_/de'i tshe nags khung de na shing gi yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_mgo lcogs dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad las chos ston pa'i sgra dag byung ngo /_/de'i tshe lha 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas drang srong chen po mchog la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po de'i 'od kyis phog ma thag tu/_de nas de'i mod la kha dog dang gzugs snga mkho bzhin du gyur te/_rma dang 
[\[94b.2\]]snad pa med par gyur to/_/de nas drang srong chen po mchog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te sor mo bcu'i 
[\[94b.3\]]thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_
[\[94b.4\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/ci nas bdag gis chos thos nas log par zhugs pa'i sems can lta bar gyur pa'i glag glag pa spyod yul ba rnams kyi log par lta ba'i mun pa bsal nas/_yang dag pa'i lta ba'i chos ston par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[94b.5\]]bdag la chos bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bdag la chos bstan du gsol/_rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po des drang srong chen po mchog gtso bor mdzad nas lha'i bu de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 
[\[94b.6\]]bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid las brtsams te/_ci nas lha'i bu'i 'khor de'i nang nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyangs pa'i lha'i bu brgyad stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ba dang /_drang srong chen po 
[\[94b.7\]]mchog de yang dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang /_spobs pa mi chod pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to//_//bam po gsum pa/_bcom ldan 'das des rdo rje'i tshig brgyad po 'di dag kyang bstan te/_brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni zag pa thams cad yongs su chad pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni gnas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir gnas med pa'o/_/
[\[95a.2\]]chos thams cad ni gnyis su med pa'i phyir sgo med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas ston pa'i phyir kun nas sgo'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa'i tshul gyis 'pho ba med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par chad pa'i phyir 'gro ba med 
[\[95a.3\]]pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir dus gsum mnyam pa ste/_rdo rje'i tshig brgyad po de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po des/_chos thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i 
[\[95a.4\]]phyir bstan to/_/mchog gzhan yang chos kyi sgo'i tshig brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid rtul bar mi 'gyur ba ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ming ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/_sgo sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro/_/sgra ni chos thams 
[\[95a.5\]]cad kyi sgo ste/_ngag tha dad par brjod pa'i phyir ro/_/brda ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/_chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam par rig pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/_gso ba dang /_gsog dang /_ya ma brla yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag gi ngo bo nyid ni chos thams 
[\[95a.6\]]cad kyi sgo ste/_bdag gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/zad pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/_yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gdags pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/_gdags pa 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/_ro gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/mchog chos 
[\[95a.7\]]kyi sgo'i tshig de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid rtul bar mi 'gyur ba'o/_/mchog gzhan yang sa bon gyi tshig brgyad po 'di dag ni spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur ba ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mchog a zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad gzod ma 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]nas ma skyes par ston to/_/mchog pa zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad don dam par ston to/_/mchog na zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs yongs su shes par ston to/_/mchog da zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad dul ba dang zhi bar 
[\[95b.2\]]ston to/_/mchog sa zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das par ston to/_/mchog ta zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad de bzhin nyid du dbyer med par ston to/_/mchog ka zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad zad pa nyid du 
[\[95b.3\]]ston to/_/mchog ma zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad dbus dang mtha' yongs su chad par ston to/_/mchog sa bon gyi tshig brgyad po de dag ni spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur ba'o/_/de lta bas na sa bon gyi tshig 'di dag dang /_chos kyi sgo'i tshig 'di dag dang /_rdo rje'i tshig 
[\[95b.4\]]'di dag la dran pa dang /_shes bzhin du spyod pa mnyam pa nyid la brtson par bya'o/_/rtag tu 'du 'dzi med par spyod pas tshul bzhin du so sor brtag pa la brtson par bya'o/_/rtag tu dge ba gang yin zhes tshol zhing 'dod pa la brtson par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 
[\[95b.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po des chos kyi tshig zhus pa de dag gi lan btab nas/_'jig rten gyi khams de snang bar mdzad cing rab tu g.yos par mdzad nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang thabs cig tu mi snang bar gyur te/_skad cig thang cig 
[\[95b.6\]]yud tsam de la rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bzhugs par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas kyang gang du yang gshegs pa'am slar gshegs par mngon pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu de nas drang srong chen po mchog de spobs pa mi chod pa dang ldan par gyur te/_brjed ngas pa med pa'i dran 
[\[95b.7\]]pa de dang yang ldan par gyur nas lhas yongs su bzung ba thob par gyur to/_/lhas yongs su bzung ba des na bdud phyir rgol ba yang choms nas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas sems can rnams la chos ston 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]te/_bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid rgyas par bshad cing rab tu bstan to/_/des lo stong tham par chos bstan te/_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni nyan thos su yongs su smin par byas so/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 
[\[96a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas su yongs su smin par byas so/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 'khor los sgyur bar yongs su smin par byas so/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 
[\[96a.3\]]brgya byin du yongs su smin par byas so/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni tshangs par yongs su smin par byas so/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni byams pa bsgom pa la bkod do/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni snying rje bsgom pa la bkod do/_/srog chags brgyad khri 
[\[96a.4\]]bzhi stong ni dga' ba bsgom pa la bkod do/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni btang snyoms bsgom pa la bkod do/_/srog chags dpag tu med pa zhig ni mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du nye bar 'gro bar byas so/_/de'i 'og tu drang srong chen po mchog de shi nas lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong 
[\[96a.5\]]dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po de nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chen po mchog de gzhan zhig 
[\[96a.6\]]yin par khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam/_the tsom zan rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chen po mchog tu gyur te/_ngas chos 'dod pa dang /_chos la gus par gnas pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs des 'og gi phyogs 
[\[96a.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po de spyan drangs so/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni nams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]mi 'gyur la/_dam pa'i chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gus pa dang bcas pa rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan 
[\[96b.2\]]na 'dug kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhal ston par mdzad cing chos kyang thos par mdzad do/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter ri dang /_ri sul dang /_shing dag gi nang du bcug pa dag yod 
[\[96b.3\]]de/_gzungs dang /_chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa glegs bam du byas pa dag kyang lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams spobs pa sgrub par byed do/_/dri 
[\[96b.4\]]ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni tshe zad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_lha rnams kyis tshe dang stobs sgrub par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_lha'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag 'dod na lo stong 
[\[96b.5\]]du yang 'khod do/_/lo 'bum phrag gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi'am/_lnga'i bar du yang 'khod pa nas/_bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag pa'am/_yang na ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du yang 'khod do/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos la gus pa skyes pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[96b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rga ba yang sel bar mdzad do/_/nad kyang sel bar mdzad do/_/dran pa yang bsgrub par mdzad do/_/rtogs pa dang spobs pa yang bsgrub par mdzad do/_/chos la gus pa skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[96b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lta bar gyur pa rnams ni sel bar mdzad la/_yang dag pa'i lta ba ni bsgrub par mdzad do/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos la gus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzhan gyi gnod pa 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thos pa'i tshogs la mkhas pa la brtson par bya'o/_/thos pa'i tshogs la mkhas pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[97a.2\]]po la yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/_yang na de bas kyang gong ma'am/_de bas kyang lhag par 'gyur te/_dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams nye bar rton pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /_bsod nams 'byung ba dang /_
[\[97a.3\]]bsod nams rgyas pa dang /_bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /_bsod nams mi zad pa dang /_bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_bsod nams rgya mtsho yin te/_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi bsod nams rnams kyi mtha' 'am tshad ni rtogs par 
[\[97a.4\]]mi nus so/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgya mtsho chen po'i thigs pa rnams kyi tshad dang mtha' ni rtogs par nus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /_thos pa'i tshogs bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i 
[\[97a.5\]]tshad dang mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sa la ri dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_nags tshal dang /_rtswa yod pa thams cad ni srang tshad kyis tshad dang mtha' rtogs pa'am shes par nus kyi byang chub sems 
[\[97a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /_thos pa'i tshogs bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad gzung bar mi nus so zhes nga smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di 
[\[97a.7\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshogs gsum po sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /_thos pa'i tshogs de dag gi nang na tshogs gang ches mchog dang /_ches gtso bo lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]tshogs gsum po sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /_thos pa'i tshogs de dag gi nang na thos pa'i tshogs 'ba' zhig mchog ces bya/_rab ces bya/_rab mchog ces bya/_gya nom pa zhes bya/_gtso bo zhes bya/_khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya/_bla ma zhes 
[\[97b.2\]]bya/_bla na med pa zhes bya/_gong na med pa zhes bya/_gong ma'i yang gong ma zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi mdun na yungs 'bru gcig 'dug pa bzhin du sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar 
[\[97b.3\]]bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab ji lta ba de bzhin du ni thos pa'i tshogs blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' 
[\[97b.4\]]yas pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ni thos pa'i tshogs blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i tshogs ni bya ba gnyis byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbul ba sel ba dang /_longs spyod chen po bsgrub pa ste bya ba 'di gnyis byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang bya ba gnyis byed 
[\[97b.5\]]de/_gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_ngan 'gro sel ba dang /_bde 'gro bsgrub pa ste bya ba 'di gnyis byed do/_/shes rab kyi tshogs kyang bya ba gnyis byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lta bar gyur pa thams cad sel ba dang /_shes rab bsgrub pa ste bya ba 'di gnyis byed do/_/
[\[97b.6\]]rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i tshogs ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_len pa dang bcas pa dang /_phung por rnam par smin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_len pa dang bcas pa dang /_phung por rnam par smin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu thos pa'i tshogs 
[\[97b.7\]]ni zag pa med pa dang /_len pa med pa dang /_phung por rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyis thos pa'i tshogs la brtson par bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i tshogs dang tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]thos pa'i tshogs 'di dag bstan pa na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i srog chags sum stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/lha'i bu lnga stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/tshan po che 
[\[98a.2\]]chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na mi skye ba'i 
[\[98a.3\]]chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus la 
[\[98a.4\]]gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar mos pa dang /_ngag la brag ca dang 'dra bar mos pa dang /_sems la sgyu ma dang 'dra bar mos pa dang /_chos thams cad la mi zad pa'i chos nyid du mos pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi 
[\[98a.5\]]skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab 
[\[98a.6\]]par yang byed la sems can du 'du shes pa yang med pa dang /_chos thams cad la stong pa dang /_mi rtag par yang mos par byed la gzhir yang mi byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong la sha'i mig la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa 
[\[98a.7\]]la yang mkhas la sems kyang sems la gtod par mi byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lta ba spangs pa'i phyir bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_chos kyis lhag pa'i phyir 
[\[98b.2\]]bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang /_dben pa'i chos kyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 
[\[98b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan yang thob la bsam gtan la yang mi rten pa dang /_shes rab kyis kyang rnam par brtags la spros pa yang med 
[\[98b.4\]]pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa yang rab tu 'dzin la sems can yang sdud pa dang /_spyod pa thams cad la yang gegs med la spyod pa yang khong du chud par byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa 
[\[98b.5\]]myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /_
[\[98b.6\]]snying rje chen pos 'khor ba las yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_dga' ba chen pos chos la dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms chen pos rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na 
[\[98b.7\]]mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mngon 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]sum du byed pa dang /_dus gsum yongs su shes pa dang /_khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa la yid ches pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan 
[\[99a.2\]]na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob pa de kho nas ta la bdun srid tsam 
[\[99a.3\]]gyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lha dang mi'i sil snyan 'bum yang 'khrol lo/_/pad ma'i sprin gyi char chen po yang mngon par bab bo/_/'jig rten 'di yang snang ba chen 
[\[99a.4\]]pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos nyid de/_gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po 
[\[99a.5\]]dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo /_/de dag byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis khyab par gyur nas nyi ma dang zla ba rnams kyi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du thug nas phyir log 
[\[99a.6\]]ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 
[\[99a.7\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/ye 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]shes mchog brnyes yongs dag yangs pa'i spyan mnga' ba/_/dbang po zhi ba zhi gnas pha rol phyin mchog brnyes/_/sku mdog gser gyi ri bo lha yi 'od 'dra ba/_/ci yi slad du bcom ldan 'dzum pa 'di ston mdzad/_/gang gi blo gros ci 'dra dus gsum ldan pa dang /_/lha 
[\[99b.2\]]dang mi rnams sems kyi spyod pa mkhyen bzhin du/_/'du shes mi mnga' rtag tu ye shes mchog brnyes pa/_/zhal ras zla 'dra 'dzum pa'i don ni bstan par gsol/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed gang dag ma 'ongs dus/_/gang dag gnas pa'i rgyal ba de dag mtshungs 
[\[99b.3\]]pa ste/_/sems can gang dag dkar po spyod pa sna tshogs pa/_/sbyor mkhyen lung bstan slad du thams cad yang dag gsungs/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di dag ni sku yis thams cad khyab/_/khyod kyi gsung ni sangs rgyas zhing mang yangs par grag_/'dir ni thugs kyis 'gro 
[\[99b.4\]]ba kun la byams pa bskyed/_/rgyal ba ye shes mtha' yas ldan pa gang slad gsungs/_/chos rnams ya ma brla ste chu zla 'dra ba dang /_/sgyu ma lta bur 'jig pa rmi lam ngo bo nyid/_/sprin ltar mi brtan 'jig pa'i chos can mkhyen pa po/_/mi yi seng ge gang slad 'dzum 
[\[99b.5\]]don bstan par gsol/_/stong pa mtshan med smon med rtogs pas rnam par grol/_/rtag tu thugs dul chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas/_/rlung srubs mkha' la 'tshub kyang spros med 'dra ba po/_/ci slad 'dzum mdzad 'di la don ni ci mchis gsungs/_/gang gi sems deng 
[\[99b.6\]]sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la btud/_/gang gis de ring shing rgyal drung du bdud kyang bcom/_/gang gis rgyal ba mchog rnams gdan ni yongs su bzung /_/skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni ci phyir 'dzum pa bstan/_/'di na rgyal ba'i nyan thos de rnams sa ma mchis/_/'di 
[\[99b.7\]]la rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang ci ma mchis/_/'di ni sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi yul/_/'jig rten mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan par gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bo khyod kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'di bskal pa grangs med pa gsum pa phrag 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 
[\[100a.3\]]dag par byed pa zhes bya bar bskal pa tshangs pas bstod pa zhes bya ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa 
[\[100a.4\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa mang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa mang po'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag 
[\[100a.5\]]par byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo dper na dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyad pa ji lta ba 
[\[100a.6\]]bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang /_longs su spyad pa yang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mang po'i rgyal po de yang gtam gzhan mi gsung bar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[100a.7\]]bsdu ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'ba' zhig ston to/_/de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang med de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de yang tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad med de/_de bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang /_gzhan mu stegs can med pa dang /_bai dUr+ya las grub la 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad mas spras pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[100b.2\]]kyi zhing du 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid bar snang de las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gsol te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas bcom 
[\[100b.3\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags te/_'di ltar de bzhin 
[\[100b.4\]]gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa'am/_klan ka tshol ba'am/_tho 'tshams pa'am/_bsting pa'i slad du mchis pa gang dag lhags pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba drag po 'thob par 'gyur la/_nga rgyal 
[\[100b.5\]]dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa nges par bcom nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig la 'dud cing /_bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig la thal mo sbyar ba btud pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'di nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_
[\[100b.6\]]dregs pa drag pos mchis la/_chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas bdag nyid chen po 'di lta bu thob ste/_sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa'i nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sngon 
[\[100b.7\]]'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas des na da ltar 'di lta bu'i mngon par shes pa myur 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]ba thob par gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sred med kyi bu tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis ni 'das pa'i 
[\[101a.2\]]dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/de phyin chad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med/_grangs med pa la bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mo byed/_mchod pa byed par 
[\[101a.3\]]'gyur te/_tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis na de'i byang chub kyi sems ma mchis par gyur nas/_des na 'di brtsad pa'i bsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar mchis la 'di lta bu'i 
[\[101a.4\]]nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang ldan par gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 
[\[101a.5\]]byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_chos la ma gus pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la khyad du gsod pa dang /_log pa'i tshig smra ba ste/_sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi 
[\[101a.6\]]sems brjed par 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa dag dang 'dris par byed pa dang /_theg pa 
[\[101a.7\]]dman pa la mos pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la sdang zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang /_chos rnams la slob dpon dpe mkhyud byed pa ste/_sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu gzhan 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgyu byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la g.yos sten par byed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la lce gnyis byed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur 
[\[101b.2\]]sti la lhag par zhen pa ste/_sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe 
[\[101b.3\]]na 'di lta ste/_bdud kyi las ma rtogs pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa stobs chung ba dang /_shes rab dang thabs med pa ste/_sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur 
[\[101b.4\]]ro/_/sred med kyi bu yang gang gi phyir tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi byang chub kyi sems brjed par gyur pa de nyon cig_/sred med kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[101b.5\]]rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i bstan pa gnas pa na 
[\[101b.6\]]bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de bdud kyis bslus nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du mi 'gro ba'i steng du nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non nas bram ze dang khyim bdag chos smra ba rnams dang /_lhan cig tu 'thab 
[\[101b.7\]]pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa la zhugs te/_chos dang chos smra ba rnams la yang ma gus pa bskyed do/_/de'i tshe de nyid la chos lnga dang bral bar gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos thos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang /_'bel ba'i gtam sna tshogs dri bar bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems shin tu brtan por bya ba dang bral bar gyur nas des mi dge ba'i chos ni yongs su bzung la 
[\[102a.2\]]byang chub kyi sems ni yongs su ma bzung ste/_sred med kyi bu chos lnga po de dag dang bral bar gyur to/_/sred med kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin par khyod som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za na khyod 
[\[102a.3\]]kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu nor [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gyur te/_nga rgyal des na de'i byang chub kyi sems brjed do/_/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsrungs pa dang /_
