[\[143b.6\]]rgyas kyis gsungs pa/_pho dge ba chos kyi yi ge 'di'i ming ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'or bar dgongs pas yang dag par gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mtshor chud par gsungs so/_/sems can la la zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa 
[\[143b.7\]]gcig yod na chos kyi yi ge thams cad la ci yang re zhing btsal ba med/_chos kyi yi ge 'dis ni chos kun gyi mdo btus te chos so cog gi gces pa bsdus so/_/chos kyi yi ge rnams kyi phyi mo'i bsams pa ste/_chos kyi yi ge 'di'i ming ni theg pa chen po bsdus so/_/yang ming rdo rje'i ting nge 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]'dzin ces kyang bya'o/_/yang ming dpag tu med pa'i gzhung gi phyi mo zhes kyang bya ste mi la la zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di mnos te gzungs su 'dzin pa zhig yod na de brgya stong gis sangs rgyas gzungs su 'dzin pa ste/_de lta bu'i legs pa'i don ni dper nam mkha' dang 
[\[144a.2\]]mtshungs mu mtha' med de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi yi ge 'di gtams bcol to/_/dga' bos gsol pa ji lta bu'i sems spyod pa dang ji lta bu'i mis chos kyi yi ge 'di mnos shing gzungs su 'dzin/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/_pho dge ba chos kyi yi ge 'di mnos shing gzungs 
[\[144a.3\]]su 'dzin pa'i mi de ni sems thob pa dang stor ba med la rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_'dran tor brjod pa la yang rtag par mi g.yo ba'i sems la dad de/_grong khyim du zhugs pa yang sems rtag par thub pa la 'dug go/_/khyim du 'dug na yang yod pa gsum la ma chags pa de lta bu'i da 
[\[144a.4\]]ltar gyi tshe'i dus la dpal yon rnam pa lnga yod de/_gcig ni phal gyis btsun zhing gus pa'o/_/gnyis ni lus ye 'drog tu mi mchi ba'o/_/gsum ni yon po chad pa yid myur du lan lon pa'o/_/bzhi ni sems can bsgral ba la sred pa'o/_/lnga ni 'phrul gyi lam du 'jug nus pa ste de lta bu'i 
[\[144a.5\]]mis ni chos kyi yi ge 'di mnos shing gzungs su 'dzin to/_/dga' bos gsol pa/_de lta bu'i mis ni sems can rnams bsal la yon blang du rung ngam mi rung /_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/_de lta bu'i mis ni sems can rnams kyi phyir dpal zhing chen po byas nas rtag par shes rab chen po 
[\[144a.6\]]spyad de dpal gyi rang bzhin bden pa gnyis ka gnas/_dge 'dun gyi gzhi rten pa yin te yon rnams la mgo dang /_mig dang /_rkang pa dang /[ {]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]de kun kyang blang du rung na gos dang kha zas blang du rung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_pho dge ba de lta bu'i mi ni khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin/_
[\[144a.7\]]khyod kyi zam pa yin na mi tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos na yon mi 'bul/_dga' bos gsol pa/_mi de la chos kyi yi ge de mnos te gzungs su bzung ba yon phul na mi des dpal yon ji tsam thob/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/_yang mi la la zhig gis mkhar gang ba'i gser 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]dngul khyer te sbyar bar byas pas mi des chos kyi bshad zin nas/_de'i tshe dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_phal sde bzhin kun shin tu dga' ste/_sems kyis yang dag pa'i mir gyur pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te dga' nas gus par spyod do/_/
[\[144b.2\]]rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos kyi yi ge rdzogs so/[ {D136}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsa tur da ra ka sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa khye'u bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas 
[\[144b.3\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de nyid kyi dus kyi tshe ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung gi tshal na shing sA la zung gi bar na bzhugs 
[\[144b.4\]]so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par rtog cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_go'u ta ma'i bu 
[\[144b.5\]]khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la mig mi 'dzums par rtog par byed/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mdang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas g.yar lam 'jigs 
[\[144b.6\]]pa chen po 'jigs su rung ba spu zing zhes bgyid pa zhig rmis lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yar lam de rmis nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu myur bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur lags grang snyam nas de'i slad du sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang /_mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir 
[\[144b.7\]]bar gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_go'u ta ma'i bu khyod kyi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas 'jigs pa ji lta bu zhig rmis/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de bka' 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]stsal pa/_sA la'i tshal khrod 'di nyid du/_/'jig rten mgon po'i ltas su ni/_/khyod kyis rmi lam ci rmis pa/_/dris pa de ni nga la smros/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_mdang sum bdag gi g.yar lam na/_/
[\[145a.2\]]'jigs su rung zhing dngangs bgyid la/_/spu zing bgyid pa rmis gyur pa/_/de ni mi mchog gsan du gsol/_/'jig rten khams 'dir ljon pa'i shing /_/rtag tu me tog 'bras bu dag_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/_/yid ni dga' bar bgyid pa 'khrungs/_/'jig rten khams su 
[\[145a.3\]]ljon mchog de/_/grib ma bsil bas sems can rnams/_/rab tu dga' bgyid bro nad dang /_/mya ngan dag kyang sel bar bgyid/_/yon tan mtha' yas phun tshogs shing /_/srid rtse'i bar du mtho bar 'phags/_/de mthong bas ni mig dag cing /_/thos pas rna ba rnam dag 
[\[145a.4\]]'gyur/_/de las rab 'jam don ldan zhing /_/shin tu rigs shing chos ldan la/_/sems can kun la bde skyid pa'i/_/sgra skad dag kyang nges par 'byung /_/de las gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/'od zer dag ni 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/de dag snyed kyi zhing rnams kyang /_/ljon shing 
[\[145a.5\]]chen pos bsal bar bgyid/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi mi/_/mtha' yas dpag tu ma mchis pa/_/gang dag 'od kyis reg gyur pa/_/sems can rnams kyi don kyang bgyid/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su ni/_/de las dri ngad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[145a.6\]]gang dag de yi dri snom pa/_/de dag ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur/_/de dag dmyal bar mi mchi zhing /_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas sdig can dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lha min ris mi mchi/_/de dag bzang 'gror mchi bar 'gyur/_/sems can kun la bde skyed pa/_/de 'dra'i ljon shing chen po de/_/
[\[145a.7\]]gyad kyi dog sar chag nas ni/_/sA la'i tshal gyi gseb tu sgyel/_/ljon mchog chag pa mthong gyur nas/_/de nas srog chags stong phrag ni/_/bsam yas dpag tu ma mchis pa/_/cho nges 'debs shing smre sngags 'don/_/de tshe sgra de mi grag cing /_/dri yang bda' bar ma gyur 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]pa/_/gdeg pa'i rngo yang ma thogs nas/_/de ma thag tu bdag kyang brgya la/_/de ltar 'jigs su rung ba dang /_/spu yang zing zhes bgyid pa yi/_/g.yar lam mdang sum rmis pa de/_/spyan dang ldan pa bdag la gsungs/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 
[\[145b.2\]]dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag so so na gnas pas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas mthong nas rang rang gi 'khor lha'i bu khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu 
[\[145b.3\]]brgyad cu lhag tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sgra skad 'thun par nyam thag pa'i nga ros ngu zhing mya ngan byed la smre sngags 'don bzhin du de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[145b.4\]]bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/kye ma'o sdug bsngal mi bzad che/_/sA la'i tshal khrod dga' bar ni/_/de ring mgon po mya ngan 'da'/_/kun dga' khyod kyis mi shes sam/_/gang zhig snang med rnams kyi sgron/_/skyabs dang dpung gnyen gang yin pa/_/de ni zhi ba 
[\[145b.5\]]len med par/_/de ring mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar mthong ba gzhan min te/_/de ring sA la'i tshal khrod du/_/nga ni mya ngan 'da' 
[\[145b.6\]]'gyur gyis/_/mya ngan ma byed brtan par gyis/_/kha dog ldan zhing bsam yas la/_/'od dang dri bsung phun tshogs pa'i/_/ljon shing ljon pa chen po de/_/sA la'i tshal khrod chag gyur pa/_/ljon shing ci 'drar ston pa ni/_/de ring sA la'i tshal khrod du/_/ji ltar me la chus btab 
[\[145b.7\]]bzhin/_/len med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/shes rab rdzu 'phrul mthar phyin pa/_/nye rgyal pang nas skyes dag bzhin/_/mi mchog nga yang 'da' 'gyur bar/_/kun dga' khyod kyis mi shes sam/_/'dus byas thams cad mi rtag ste/_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/_/
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]ston pas de dag rab mkhyen nas/_/dge slong rnams la de yang bshad/_/kun dga' tshur shog khyod song la/_/nga yi nyan thos rnams la smros/_/lha yi mig gi mthar phyin pa/_/gnas brtan chen po ma 'gags dang /_/gnas brtan chen po ka t+ya'i bu/_/gnas 
[\[146a.2\]]brtan gang po rab 'byor dang /_/gsus po che ni chen po dang /_/ba lang bdag dang dga' byed dang /_/gro zhin don yod rgyal po dang /_/chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba dang /_/dga' bo dang ni sgra gcan bzang /_/nga yi nyan thos gzhan rnams dang /_/slob dang mi slob gnas brtan 
[\[146a.3\]]dang /_/gzhan yang so so'i skye bo dag_/nga ni mya ngan 'da' 'gyur gyis/_/thams cad shin tu myur bar sbron/_/slob dang so so'i skye bo yis/_/ma mthong sdug bsngal skye 'gyur bas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu ni/_/mya ngan zug rngus gzir mi bya/_/mya ngan ma byed 'du byed 
[\[146a.4\]]rnams/_/mi rtag rmi lam lta bu zhes/_/ji ltar chos kyi chos nyid kyis/_/de dag rnams ni dbugs dbyung bya/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos slar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_mgon po sangs rgyas mya ngan las/_/'da' 
[\[146a.5\]]bar 'gyur bar thos nas bdag_/phyogs slad bdag ni lus rma zhing /_/bdag ni g.yar ngan shin tu che/_/lus nyams bde ba ma mchis shing /_/sems nyams bde ba'ang ma mchis la/_/chags bral nyams bde'ang ma mchis na/_/spyan ldan bdag ni ji ltar mchi/_/bdag 
[\[146a.6\]]gi skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang /_/'jig rten rnam 'dren gang lags pa/_/deng mthong slad kyis mi mthong zhes/_/gnas brtan rnams la ji skad bgyi/_/mya ngan gyur cing sdug bsngal bas/_/ji ltar mya ngan brjod par bgyi/_/bdag cag rnams kyi 'jigs chen 'di/_/
[\[146a.7\]]gnas brtan de dag ji ltar nyan/_/gang dag slob dang skye bo yi/_/dge slong mya ngan zug rngu yis/_/kun nas zug pa ji ltar gnas/_/mi mchog bskal par bzhugs su gsol/_/'khor bzhi'i nang du mchis nas ni/_/ston pa mya ngan 'da' 'gyur zhes/_/ji ltar brjod bgyi mi yi mchog_/thub 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]chen bskal par bzhugs su gsol/_/sgron ma chen po'i 'jig rten du/_/shin tu myur bar nub 'gyur te/_/'jig rten 'di dag rab myur bar/_/ldongs pa nyid du 'gyur lags so/_/mi mchog bdag ni g.yar ngan 'di/_/dge slong rnams la smrar mi spro/_/gang la g.yar ngan ma mchis pa/_/
[\[146b.2\]]gzhan zhig mngag par bka' stsal gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_go'u ta ma'i bu 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa yin gyis mya ngan ma byed par thong cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[146b.3\]]bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams kyis/_/de ring sangs rgyas 'da' thos nas/_/gzhal med khang dag spangs nas ni/_/mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don/_/nga 'das phyi na dge slong dag_/ma mthong mya ngan byed ma gzhug_/'di ni rim gro byed pa'i las/_/song la dge slong rnams kyang sbron/_/de'i tshe tshe dang 
[\[146b.4\]]ldan pa ma 'gags pa ri rab kyi spo la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pas lha'i bu dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa rnams rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag nas mi snang bar gyur pa mthong 
[\[146b.5\]]zhing lha rnams kyi smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra chen po dag kyang thos rang gi 'khor rnams kyang srabs par mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de'i tshe bsams te lha'i mig gis lha'i bu 'khor dang bcas pa de dag yi chad cing rang rang gi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dag spangs te rings pa [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[146b.6\]]par gang du dong zhing 'dong bar byed ces 'jig rten la rnam par bltas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo las dpag tshad brgya tsam dag chad pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo las dpag tshad nyis brgya tsam dang /_rtse mo las dpag tshad sum brgya tsam dang /_
[\[146b.7\]]rtse mo las dpag tshad bzhi brgya tsam dag chad pa dang /_rtse mo las dpag tshad lnga brgya tsam dag chad cing chad cing rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lhung ba dag kyang mthong ste sems can 'ga' tsam la yang gnod pa'am/_rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed na srog gi bar chad byed par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'di 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]ltar ri rab kyi rtse mo de dag kyang gang dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab la rten cing gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba thos nas mya ngan gyi zug 
[\[147a.2\]]rngus gzir cing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/_shAkya'i bdag po'i rgyal po bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa de de ring gyad rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung gi drung du len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[147a.3\]]'da' bar 'gyur te/_deng ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig zum par 'gyur ro zhes de dag ku sha'i grong khyer logs su mngon par phyogs te/_rings pa rings par brtad cing dong ba dag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo de dag kun tu rab tu bsgul cing kun du rab tu bskyod de rings pa rings par brtad 
[\[147a.4\]]pa de dag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_rgya mtsho chen po yang g.yos shing 'khrugs par gyur te de'i phyir ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo de dag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lhung bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ri rab kyi spo la 'dug pas de'i tshe sgra skad chen po phyung ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras 
[\[147a.5\]]so/_/'jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon gang yin pa/_/gang gis 'jig rten bde ba stsol mdzad cing /_/sems can rnams kyi sbyin gnas gang yin pa/_/thub pa de ni de ring mya ngan 'da'/_/ye shes 'byung gnas rab rib mun bcom zhing /_/'jig rten srog chags rnams kyi pha dang ma/_/
[\[147a.6\]]de bzhin skyabs dang dpung gnyen gang yin pa/_/thub pa de ni de ring mya ngan 'da'/_/zug rngu 'byin mdzad sdig med nyon mongs med/_/gso mdzad dam pa sman pa chen po ste/_/mi dge'i zug rngu 'byin mchog gang yin pa/_/thub pa de ni de ring mya ngan 'da'/_/gang zhig sems can chags dang sdang 
[\[147a.7\]]bas bcom/_/rmongs pas zil non rga dang 'chi la chags/_/'gags 'gal lam log zhugs pa gzigs nas ni/_/'jig rten thugs rje bskyed nas chos ston cing /_/gang zhig bdud sde rab gtum drag po'i gzugs/_/sna tshogs gzugs can mtshon sra rdo rje thogs/_/kha cig 'jigs pa 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]du ma rnam ston cing /_/gzhan dag sna tshogs brag thogs 'khod gyur pa/_/de 'drar rnam mang drag po'i gzugs can gyi/_/sde dag gzigs kyang mi g.yo mi 'gul ba/_/bdud kyi sde bcom 'jig rten mgon po de/_/sA la'i tshal du de ring mya ngan 'da'/_/gang gis phyag g.yas rab tu brkyang 
[\[147b.2\]]mdzad de/_/ri rab rtse 'di grong bcas g.yo mdzad cing /_/chos kun mnga' brnyes rnam 'dren drang srong de/_/sA la'i tshal du mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/gang gis brdabs pa phyogs bcur bsam yas pa'i/_/sgra bsgrags mkhyen pa'i pha rol byon gyur pa/_/ston pa sems can rnams kyi snying po de/_/
[\[147b.3\]]sA la'i tshal du de ring mya ngan 'da'/_/gang gis stobs ldan sder bcas skrag mdzad cing /_/mi g.yo mya ngan med pa 'dus ma byas pa brnyes/_/srog chags rnams la phan phyir 'khor lo bskor mdzad cing /_/thub pas bden pa bzhi dag rab tu bstan/_/gang zhig cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[147b.4\]]ste/_/skra rtse'i khyon la zhing rnams bkod mdzad cing /_/sku la sku yi 'du shes mi mnga' ba/_/mgon po de ni de ring mya ngan 'da'/_/ston pa gyad kyi yul du gshegs nas ni/_/nye na yod pa'i tshal khrod zhugs gyur te/_/bsam gtan zhi la bdag nyid mnyam bzhag nas/_/shing zad me ltar mya ngan 
[\[147b.5\]]'da' bar 'gyur/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dzam bu'i gling na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma ji snyed pa rnams las gnas brtan 'od srung chen po 'khor dang bcas pa ma gtogs 
[\[147b.6\]]pa dang /_gzhan yang dge slong nyis brgya rtsa bzhi ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i 'khor bzhi po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i tha mar gyur pa ni 'di yin no zhes gyad rnams kyi nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung gi tshal ga la ba der dong ngo /_/tshe 
[\[147b.7\]]dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i lha dang /_lha'i bu mo dang /_klu dang /_klu rgan pho dang /_klu'i bu mo dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin gzhon 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]nu dang /_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang /_sha za dang /_sha za rgan po dang /_sha za gzhon nu dang /_sha za gzhon nu ma ji snyed pa rnams dang /_'gro ba rnams lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_skar 
[\[148a.2\]]ma ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mig mchi mas gang ste mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don la ngud mos 'debs shing yang dang yang du smre ste/_sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir bas lag pa gnam du bsgreng ste/_ngud mos 'debs par byed do/_/yang kha cig 
[\[148a.3\]]ni lag pa sbrel cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni phan tshun mgo sprad de gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni kha gdangs te nyam thag pa'i nga ro 'byin cing smre sngags 'don la dbang po nyams shing bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor mog mog por gyur te rkang lag sgyur zhing ngu'o/_/yang de na kha cig ni 
[\[148a.4\]]gcig la gcig lta zhing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni klad pa rdebs par byed do/_/kha cig ni lag pa gnyis kyis mgo la rdebs shing lus rab tu snyon smongs par byed do/_/kha cig ni mig sgyur zhing ngud mos 'debs la rkang mthil bsregs pa bzhin du sgyid pa 'dar la cho nges 'debs shing smre 
[\[148a.5\]]sngags 'don to/_/kha cig ni e ma'o sangs rgyas/_e ma'o sangs rgyas zhes smre sngags 'don cing gdong mchi mas gang la sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag ste/_lag mthil gyis mig nyed cing cho nges 'debs la mya ngan byed cing mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir bas bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[148a.6\]]la 'drad cing mya ngan byed smre sngags 'don to/_/srog chags bye ba phrag mang po gzhan dag ni mchi mas brnangs bzhin du mchi ma klog cing sgra chen po 'byin to/_/kha cig ni thal mo sbyar te mchi ma klog cing smre sngags 'don to/_/kha cig ni mya ngan gyi mes gdungs nas lag pa g.yas 
[\[148a.7\]]pas mgo bo la 'dzin cing smre sngags 'don to/_/de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang lus yongs su rmya nas lag pa g.yon pas mgo bo la 'dzin cing smre sngags 'don to/_/kha cig ni lag pa rdebs la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdog nyams shing sngon por gyur la/_mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]smre sngags 'don to/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[148b.2\]]kyi spyan sngar shing bcad de 'gyel ba bzhin du sa la sgyel nas kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'dud do/_/kha cig ni gdung ba'i sgra chen po 'byin to/_/kha cig ni gdung ba'i sgra 'byin cing sa la 'gre'o/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas lag pa gnam 
[\[148b.3\]]du bsgrengs te/_e ma'o sangs rgyas/_e ma'o sangs rgyas/_e ma'o mgon po/_e ma'o thugs rje can sems can thams cad la thugs brtse zhing skyob par mdzad pa/_e ma'o 'jig rten gsum gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen sems can thams cad la mig stsol bar mdzad pa/_e ma'o rten 
[\[148b.4\]]med pa rnams kyi rten mdzad pa/_'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad ldongs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dkon mchog med par 'gyur ro/_/zhes smre sngags 'don cing de dag phan tshun lag pa sbrel te snying rje rje skad du ma shi ba'i smre sngags lta bus smre sngags 'don 
[\[148b.5\]]to/_/pha shi ba dang /_phu nu shi ba dang /_bu shi ba'i smre sngags lta bus smre sngags 'don cing /_e ma'o mgon po/_e ma'o dge ba'i bshes gnyen/_e ma'o snyan cing 'jam pa gsung ba/_e ma'o seng ge dang /_glang po che dang /_khyu mchog gi stobs can/_e ma'o bdud rtsi'i 
[\[148b.6\]]go 'phang ston pa zhes rnam pa sna tshogs mang por smre sngags 'don to/_/kha cig ni bar snang la song ste bdag nyid brdabs nas de dag sa la lhung ba dang /_sa la 'gre ldog cing snying thag pa nas snying rje bar smre zhing smre sngags 'don to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo brgyal nas shing bcad de 
[\[148b.7\]]'gyel ba bzhin du sa la 'gyel to/_/des yang 'du shes phyir rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pa gnyis sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/sems can shin tu sdug bsngal la/_/ngu zhing smre sngags 'don bgyid 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]la/_/mya ngan zug rngus gzir mthong nas/_/bdag gi g.yar ngan slar zhing skye/_/ji ltar dgon pa'i shul zhig tu/_/'dron pa chom pos bcom gyur cing /_/zhugs kyi phung po chen po yang /_/mdun na mchis pa mthong ba na/_/kun nas zhugs par mthong nas ni/_/de 
[\[149a.2\]]dag 'jigs pa lhar skyes shing /_/phyogs rgyug de dag skyabs ma mchis/_/kun nas dpung gnyen ma mchis ltar/_/de bzhin sems can mang po rnams/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' thos nas/_/skyabs ma mchis shing sdug bsngal la/_/mya ngan zug rngus gzir bar mthong /_/gang 
[\[149a.3\]]dag gtso bo 'das gyur na/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas blta bar bgyi/_/gzhan dag mya ngan 'da' 'gyur la/_/bcom ldan bskal par bzhugs su gsol/_/zhugs 'bar me lce ldan gyur pa/_/rgyu zad rab tu zhi ba ltar/_/gyad kyi yul du rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mya ngan 'da' ba ji ltar 
[\[149a.4\]]blta/_/sangs rgyas 'od ma'i tshal khrod du/_/de ring slan chad mi mthong zhing /_/'dren pa rgyal byed tshal du ni/_/chos ston pa yang mi mthong ngo /_/mi mchog de ni 'das gyur ces/_/lid tsa bI yi grong khyer mchog_/yangs pa can du zhugs nas ni/_/lid tsa bI la ji ltar brjod/_/gang 
[\[149a.5\]]zag gtso bo 'das gyur ces/_shAkya rnams kyi grong khyer mchog_/ser skya'i gnas su mchis nas ni/_/kun mi dga' ba ji ltar brjod/_/thub chen de ni rab zhi zhes/_/ma ga d+hA ba rnams dang ni/_/ma skyes dgra yi grong mchog tu/_/ji ltar tshig tu brjod par bgyi/_/shAkya 
[\[149a.6\]]seng ge 'das gyur ces/_/srog chags stong phrag mang po dag_/cho nges yang dang yang 'debs na/_/bdag gis ji ltar lan yang gdab/_/shAkya seng ge 'das gyur na/_/dge slong dge slong ma dag dang /_/khyim pa rnams kyang bdag gis ni/_/ji ltar dga' bgyi 
[\[149a.7\]]mi yi mchog_/skyes mchog bdag la gnas brtan rnams/_/kun dga' mi mchog sbyin pa'i gnas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gar gshegs zhes/_/'dri na ji skad brjod par bgyi/_/thub pa lha klus dris pa na/_/bsam gtan chen po snyoms zhugs sam/_/'on te 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]'chag tu gshegs so zhes/_/mi 'jigs par ni ji ltar brjod/_/bdag gis yang dang yang du ni/_/su yi seng ge'i gzims khri bshams/_/dpa' bo bdag gis slan chad ni/_/su yi seng ge'i khri yang bshams/_/'khor rnams la ni seng ge ltar/_/bsnyengs pa mi 
[\[149b.2\]]mnga' sgrogs mdzad pa/_/go 'phang zab mo blta dka'i chos/_/bdag gis su la mnyan par bgyi/_/gang zag gtso bo 'das gyur na/_/su yi zhabs la chab 'bul zhing /_/gang gi na bza' chos gos gzung /_/su yi lhung bzed gzung bar bgyi/_/mi mchog dge 'dun 
[\[149b.3\]]dbus su ni/_/su zhig bdag gi bsngags pa brjod/_/kun dga' thos pa rgya mtsho zhes/_/slan chad bdag la su zhig mchi/_/mkhyen pa spobs pa mtha' yas pa/_/gsung 'jam yid dga' mdzad pa dang /_mchog tu dga' bskyed mdzad pa/_/su la mngon sum mnyan par 
[\[149b.4\]]bgyi/_/rgyal sras thos pa 'dzin pa yis/_/de ltar smre sngags kun bton nas/_/thub pa chen po'i zhabs drung du/_/brgya la nas sa la sgyel bar gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_go'u ta ma'i bu ngas dang po nyid nas khyod la kun 
[\[149b.5\]]dga' bo sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad la rtag pa dang ldan pa med do zhes don de ma bstan tam/_go'u ta ma'i bu 'du byed thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_zil ba'i thigs pa lta bu dang /_slu bar byed pa yin te/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag 
[\[149b.6\]]pa yin gyis go'u ta ma'i bu ci rung mya ngan ma byed cig smre sngags ma 'don cig_/go'u ta ma'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa do mod nam gyi thun tha ma la mtha' las 'das pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_btags pa yang dag par 'joms pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_mi 
[\[149b.7\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/_go'u ta ma'i bu khyod song la shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i gzims khri dbu ni shar phyogs/_zhal ni byang phyogs/_rgyab ni lho phyogs su bstan la/_glo 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]g.yas phyogs kyis dbab tu rung ba shoms shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de'i tshe ngu zhing mya ngan byed la smre sngags 'don cing mchi mas brnangs la ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma 'dzag bzhin du shing sA la zung gi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i gzims khri 
[\[150a.2\]]bshams so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i gzims khri bshams nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/thub chen seng ge'i gzims khri ni/_/bshams pa'i tha ma deng lags te/_/mi mchog seng ge'i gzims khri ni/_/
[\[150a.3\]]slan chad bsham du ma mchis so/_/mi mchog mya ngan 'das gyur cing /_/'jig rten mgon po 'das pa na/_/sA la mdzes tshal stong pa yi/_/khrod 'dir bdag gis ji ltar blta/_/gang zhig sA la'i ljon tshal na/_/yun ring gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha/_/des ni rnam 'dren 
[\[150a.4\]]ma mthong na/_/slan chad ji ltar gnas par 'gyur/_/kye ma'o 'du byed mi rtag ste/_/sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu lags/_/'di 'dra'i ston pa dpa' bo yang /_/'di nyid du ni 'da' bar 'gyur/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[150a.5\]]pa/_'dus byas thams cad mi rtag ces/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni sngon yang gsungs/_/gang la rang dbang yod min pa/_/de la smre sngags bton mi phan/_/smre sngags yang dang yang bton cing /_/ngud mos btab pa tsam gyis ni/_/don 'di thob par mi sla yis/_/mkhas 
[\[150a.6\]]pa mya ngan ma byed cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mi mchog mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ba/_/khyod la'ang mya ngan yod yin na/_/ma 'gags 'jigs pa med par ni/_/ci yi phyir na de skad smra/_/
[\[150a.7\]]ma 'gags pas smras pa/_sems can nyam thag sdug bsngal zhing /_/mya ngan gdungs pa mthong nas ni/_/bdag gi mig kyang chus gang zhing /_/mchi ma 'khrug ces byed pa'ang yod/_/sems can ji snyed ngu ba rnams/_/lha yi mig gis mthong ba na/_/bdag kyang de dag don 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]gyi phyir/_/shin tu ngu yang bro mod kyi/_/'on kyang smre sngags bton pas ni/_/phan pa 'ga' yang mi rnyed pas/_/de phyir khyod la kun dga' bo/_/chos soms mya ngan ma byed zer/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te lha dang /_mi dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri 
[\[150b.2\]]za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding bye ba 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/_shing sA la zung gi bar ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas seng ge'i gzims khri la sku'i glo g.yas pa phab ste gzims so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[150b.3\]]'das seng ge'i gzims khri la gzims ma thag tu lha rnams kyis bar snang las lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu phab cing /_lha'i phye ma mang po dag gis kyang gtor/_lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang rab tu gsil to/_/mi rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[150b.4\]]gshegs pa la blta ba'i tha mar gyur pa ni 'di yin no zhes mi yul gyi me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shing sA la zung gi bar du seng ge'i gzims khri la sku'i glo g.yas 
[\[150b.5\]]pas phab ste gzims ma thag tu de nas skad cig de dang thang cig de dang yud tsam de la shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 'bum phrag bcu 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig 
[\[150b.6\]]rten gyi khams rin chen dbyangs can zhes bya ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don legs par sems pa zhes bya ba shi 'phos nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pang par bu nyid du rdzus te skyes so/_/de skyes 
[\[150b.7\]]ma thag tu ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/seng ge sgra yi spyan snga nas/_/gang gi don phyir bdag 'ongs pa/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bzhugs sam ci/_/de nas lha zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don legs par sems 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gsung bar mdzad pa mi dbang po/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge de/_/de ring sA la'i bar du ni/_/lan med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don legs par sems 
[\[151a.2\]]pas lha de la phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_shAkya seng ge de yi chos/_/mchog tu mthong dka' mnyan pa'i phyir/_/bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yi/_/sangs rgyas zhing nas bdag 'dir 'ongs/_/de ni sA la'i bar du deng /_/mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur na go/_/kho bo sangs rgyas zhing 
[\[151a.3\]]'dir ni/_/'ongs pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/kho bo de ring 'dir 'ongs nas/_/thub pa de yang 'da' 'gyur bas/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_/mya ngan bya bar kho bos byas/_/kho bo 'ongs pas sangs rgyas ni/_/mi mthong don med 'gyur mi bya/_/sems bskyed tsam yang 
[\[151a.4\]]mi bsdad cing /_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'gro bar bya/_/des ni 'jam zhing des pa dang /_/dga' ba brjod pa'i tshig gis ni/_/de nyid du ni ma ga d+hA'i/_/bdag po rgyal la 'di skad smras/_/rgyal po khyod ni bdag la gson/_/skyes bu dam pa dkon pas na/_/bag ma mchis pa ma 
[\[151a.5\]]mdzad par/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud/_/bskal pa stong phrag bye ba la/_/rgyal ba lan 'ga' 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/tshogs pa 'di ni rnyed pa la/_/mkhas pa skyo bar ma mdzad cig_/'di ni mi mkhas byis pa snyam/_/gang phyir rgyal chen khyod dgongs pa/_/rgyal chen 
[\[151a.6\]]byis pa bdag ma lags/_/mi dbang khyod ni byis pa lags/_/'dod pa'i dbang du song nas ni/_/gang gis ngan 'gror 'gro ba yi/_/mtshams med pa ni khyod kyis mdzad/_/de ni byis pa'i byis pa nyid/_/khyod kyis sdig pa'i las mdzad pa/_/mtshams med 'jigs pa chen po 
[\[151a.7\]]lags/_/de yis khyod ni mnar med pa/_/mi bzad 'jigs pa chen por ltung /_/sangs rgyas la ni sems dad mdzod/_/des ni thar pa 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/mi dbang de nas rkyen rnams kyis/_/khyod kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob/_/khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs bsten pa/_/lha 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]sbyin gnod byed chen po lags/_/de yi rjes su phyogs nas ni/_/khyod kyis yab ni bkrongs par gyur/_/khyod kyi yab ni chos spyod pa/_/sangs rgyas thugs las skyes pa'i sras/_/khyod kyis nga rgyal de yis ni/_/mkhas pa po ni bsad par gyur/_/rdzogs 
[\[151b.2\]]sangs mya ngan ma 'das par/_/khyod kyis gzigs par mi bgyi 'am/_/de yi sku gdung rnams la yang /_/mchod pa rgya chen dag kyang mdzod/_/bdag ni zhing 'dir mchis pa yang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan phyir ma lags/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas bltar mchis kyis/_/rgyal 
[\[151b.3\]]po chen po bzod par mdzod/_/shAkya seng ge drang srong che/_/de ni de ring 'da' 'gyur zhes/_/sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra de yi/_/spyan snga nas ni bdag gis thos/_/de la blta ba'i ched du bdag_/zhing 'dir mchis par gyur pa lags/_/rgyal rigs nye du'i tshogs kun dang /_/
[\[151b.4\]]lhan cig 'grogs te mchi bar bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di nas gyad yul lam ring ma smad pa/_/rkang pas bgrod par mi nus shing rtas song /_/khye'u khyod do mod sdod par gyis shig dang /_/dpung chen rnams kyis bde bar 'dong 
[\[151b.5\]]bar bya/_/de nas khye'u des rgyal po ma skyes dgra la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mi dbang khyod ltar bdag la le lo med/_/bsam yas rdzu 'phrul stobs ni bdag la yod/_/bdag ni 'dod na shar phyogs zhing rnams ni/_/du ba ma dag tu'ang thogs med 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/bdag ni 
[\[151b.6\]]gang nas 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten khams/_/de yi bar na sangs rgyas zhing mang gang /_/de yang mtha' yas mang po tshad med pas/_/gyad yul lta zhig ji ltar gyur kyang rung /_/de nas khye'u de rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pang pa nas babs nas rkang pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung ste tshigs su bcad 
[\[151b.7\]]pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang zhig sdig med nyon mongs yod min zhing /_/stobs chen gsung mchog mi dbang lta 'dod pa/_/de ni kho bo'i phyi bzhin deng shog dang /_/shAka thub mya ngan ma 'das de mthong 'gyur/_/khye'u de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung ma thag tu de nas skad cig de dang 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu las srog chags bdun khri nyis stong 'dus par gyur nas/_khye'u de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 
[\[152a.2\]]'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gzims khri la sku'i glo g.yas pas phab ste gzims ma thag tu de nas skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 'bum phrag lnga 'das pa na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[152a.3\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta mdzes rin chen brtsegs zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhi bar 'jug ces bya ba shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[152a.4\]]'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por tshong dpon seng ge lta bu zhes bya ba'i khyim du skyes so/_/de skyes ma thag tu ched du brjod pa 'di skad ched du brjod do/_/gang phyir bskal pa bye snyed du/_/gang gis phyag kyang yang yang gtubs/_/spyan dang rang gi sha dag 
[\[152a.5\]]dang /_/de bzhin dbu yang btang mdzad cing /_/sangs rgyas nyid ni bzhed pa yis/_/bskal pa stong phrag bye bar yang /_/btsun mo sras dang sras mo dang /_/bdog pa thams cad yang yang btang /_/sems can rnams ni dgrol ba'i phyir/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya mang du/_/sbyin pa 
[\[152a.6\]]rgya chen btang gyur pa'i/_/spyan dang ldan pa bzhugs sam ci/_/de nas tshong dpon seng ge lta bus khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang phyir skyes ma thag tu yang /_/tshig mchog rjod par byed pa khyod/_/lha 'am 'on te klu zhig gam/_/gnod sbyin yin nam srin po yin/_/
[\[152a.7\]]nye du'i tshogs ni skrag gyur cing /_/'jigs pas phyogs su rnam par rgyug_/kho bo sangs rgyas sgra yis ni/_/gzhan du 'bros par mi byed khye'u/_/de nas khye'u des tshong dpon de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kho bo lha min klu yang min/_/gnod sbyin ma yin srin po'ang min/_/
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]'jig rten thun mong yin pa'i phyir/_/ci 'dra tshong dpon mi shes sam/_/kho bo lha klu gnod sbyin dang /_/mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/_/lha yi lha zhes brtan pa ni/_/khyu mchog bzhin du dam yang 'cha'/_/de nas tshong dpon seng ge lta bus khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mkhas 
[\[152b.2\]]pa khyod kyis bsgrags pa yi/_/de 'dra'i tshig ni thos gyur nas/_/the tshom lhag par skyes gyur cing /_/kho bo lhag par bsngags so khye'u/_/ji ltar khyod ni lha dang klu/_/ji ltar gnod sbyin mi 'am ci/_/ji ltar lha yi lha yin pa/_/de ni khye'u khyod nga la smros/_/de nas khye'u des tshong 
[\[152b.3\]]dpon seng ge lta bu la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lho yi phyogs cha logs na ni/_/gsung bar mdzad pa'i bdag po ni/_/lta mdzes rin chen brtsegs bzhugs pa/_/de nas kho bo 'dir 'ongs te/_/kho bo lan brgyar brgya byin dang /_/dbang sgyur du yang kho bo gyur/_/kho bo lan 
[\[152b.4\]]brgyar tshangs pa dang /_/de bzhin 'khor los sgyur bar gyur/_/kho bos yun ring brjod bya na/_/bskal pa'am bskal pa bye bar yang /_/zad par 'gyur ba yod min te/_/mkhas pa kho bo 'gro dgos so/_/tshong dpon 'on kyang re zhig rjes su bstan pa 'di la khyod kyis kun tu 
[\[152b.5\]]bsten par bya/_nges par bsten par bya/_goms par bya zhing lan mang du bya'o/_/tshong dpon rjes su bstan pa de yang gang zhe na/_tshong dpon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta mdzes rin chen brtsegs des 'di skad ces/_
[\[152b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gsum dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_
[\[152b.7\]]'di lta ste/_sems mtha' yas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /_ye shes zab mo'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /_snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rjes su sgom pa ste/_tshong dpon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas khye'u des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ye shes zab mo rtogs dka' de la ni/_/
[\[153a.2\]]gang dag rgyu dang rgyu med kun mkhyen pa'i/_/sangs rgyas grags chen rnam dag ma gtogs pa/_/lhar bcas skye dgu 'di dag som nyi byed/_/byang chub gnas min gang yin de med de/_/yang dag ye shes gang la'ang chags pa med/_/chags pa rnam spangs zug rngu bral gyur 
[\[153a.3\]]pa'i/_/ye shes rnam par bsgoms na sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/mtha' yas sems la sems yod ma yin par/_/sems la 'jug pa rab tu zhi bar gsungs/_/sems 'di thams cad dag las log gyur pa'i/_/rjes su rab tu 'jug pas sems zhes bya/_gcad 
[\[153a.4\]]cing gcag rung gang yin de mi sra/_/bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos rnams mi phyed cing /_/dngos po thams cad nam mkha'i dngos 'dra ba'i/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin/_/gang gis de 'drar rang bzhin stong shes nas/_/dngos po kun la mi gnas sgom byed 
[\[153a.5\]]pa/_/de ni nyon mongs dra ba kun spangs shing /_/srid pa'i 'dod chags bcom pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/thams cad shes kyang rnam shes yod min zhing /_/thams cad sgom yang rnam sgom yod min la/_/thams cad rtogs kyang rtogs pa yod min zhing /_/thams cad brjod kyang 
[\[153a.6\]]gang la'ang mi gnas la/_/zab chos chos kyi 'du shes yod min zhing /_/sems can 'grol yang sems can 'du shes med/_/zhi dben zhi ba'i 'du shes yod min zhing /_/byang chub rtogs kyang byang chub 'du shes med/_/dpa' brtul lta ba'i zug rngu spangs pa de/_/bsten 
[\[153a.7\]]dka' 'gro ba kun las 'das gyur cing /_/sems can kun gyi 'chi 'pho 'gro dang kun/_/rab tu shes shing rab byung sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas skad cig de dang thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la tshong dpon seng ge lta bu rang gi 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang /_srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing sems yongs su bsngos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha bye ba phrag brgyad kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[153b.2\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid du nges par gyur to/_/srog chags khrag khrig 'bum phrag bzhi ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/de nas khye'u des de'i 
[\[153b.3\]]tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/shAkya seng ge'i spyan snga 'dir/_/kho bo 'ongs pa de don yin/_/srog chags khrag khrig 'khor ba yi/_/'jigs pa che las thar gyur cing /_/srog chags bye ba mang po rnams/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub tu/_/sems bskyed pa yang 
[\[153b.4\]]skyes gyur te/_/bzod pa la yang rab tu bkod/_/bdag gi pha ma phu nu dang /_/nye du rnams kyang bzod lag na gnas/_/bye ba phrag brgyad lha rnams ni/_/thams cad byang chub rab tu zhugs/_/dpag med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/nor gyi phung po che rnyed pas/_/bdag ni sangs 
[\[153b.5\]]rgyas chos rnams kyis/_/dbul ba thag ring zad par gyur/_/de nas khye'u rab tu zhi bar gnas kyis pha ma dang phu nu dang /_nye du'i tshogs rnams bos te pha ma dang /_phu nu dang /_nye du dang /_rtsa lag gi skye bo rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i srog chags 
[\[153b.6\]]'bum phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas gyad rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung gi tshal ga la ba der dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gzims khri la sku'i glo g.yas pas phab ste gzims ma thag 
[\[153b.7\]]tu de nas gzhan yang skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad 'das pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' spu zhes bya ba nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med ces bya ba shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer chen por tshong dpon me tog bzang po zhes bya ba'i 
[\[154a.2\]]khyim du skyes so/_/de nas khye'u de skyes ma thag tu de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/bdag med mi g.yo'i chos ston pa/_/rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas ni/_/sA la'i ljon shing tshal khrod du/_/de ring mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/chos rnams 'di dag 
[\[154a.3\]]dmigs med na/_/mi mkhas dmigs par byed pa dag_/de dag sdug bsngal mi grol zhing /_/de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal 'phel/_/chos rnams thams cad gnas min te/_/de dag rnams kyi gnas kyang med/_/zad pa dang ni ma zad pa/_/thams cad 'di la 
[\[154a.4\]]rnyed mi 'gyur/_/stong pa nam yang mi 'jig cing /_/stong pa rnam par 'jig pa'ang med/_/de la rkyen kyang yod min zhing /_/rkyen med pa yang de la med/_/gang gis zhi ba mthong dka' zhing /_/zab mo'i chos 'di bstan mdzad pa/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/rdzogs 
[\[154a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs sam ci/_/seng ge chen po glang po che/_/tshangs par gyur cing zag pa med/_/mig tu gyur pa de ring ni/_/sA la'i bar du 'da' bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun dag na/_/zla ba nya ba 'dra bar ni/_/yun ring chos rnams ston mdzad pa/_/phyin 
[\[154a.6\]]chad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lhun po'i sgang na nor lha ltar/_/dge slong tshogs la rnam mdzes pa/_/legs par gsung pa mgon po ni/_/phyin chad grong khyer gshegs mi 'gyur/_/lha mi'i mdun na skyob pa yi/_/bla med chos kyi nga ro dang /_/dga' bar mdzad pa'i gsung dbyangs 
[\[154a.7\]]te/_/phyin chad thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer chen po'i srog chags 'bum tham pas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang gi phyir khye'u 'di skyes ma 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]thag tu de ltar sngon gyi gnas kyi tshe rabs de dang de dag rjes su dran zhing /_'di'i shes pa dang mi 'jigs pa'i stobs bskyed pa des tshig 'bru sna tshogs kyis tshigs su bcad pa de lta bu dag rjod par byed pa'i shes rab kyi spobs pa dang /_shes rab kyi mi 'jigs pa dang shes rab 
[\[154b.2\]]kyi khyad par ni ngo mtshar te/_bdag cag gis kyang de lta bu'i shes rab yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir nges par 'bad par bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas khye'u des skye bo phal po che de dag 'di lta ste/_mtha' yas mu med pa dang /_snang ba med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_skye ba 
[\[154b.3\]]med pa la bzod pa'i phyir mi ldog pa dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la bkod pa dang /_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag thams cad kyang tshogs par byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/des 
[\[154b.4\]]de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed zin gyis khyed cag tshur shog dang /_da bdag cag thams cad tshogs par byas la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[154b.5\]]sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'grogs te 'dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med srog chags nyis 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 
[\[154b.6\]]'tshal ba'i phyir bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gzims khri la sku'i glo g.yas pas phab ste/_gzims ma thag tu de nas skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la byang phyogs logs su sangs 
[\[154b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag gnas zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]chen po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa thob pa zhes bya ba shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por dmag dpon seng ge zhes bya ba'i khyim du skyes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i 
[\[155a.2\]]me tog kun tu rgyas pa thob pa de skyes ma thag tu ched du brjod pa 'di skad du brjod do/_/gang gis sems can bye mang rnams/_/nyon mongs gyur pa thar mdzad cing /_/shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' mdzad pa/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs sam ci/_/brtson pas pha rol gshegs gyur cing /_/ye shes 
[\[155a.3\]]'phrin las mnyam bzhag la/_/mkhyen pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs sam ci/_/zhi ba'i thugs mnga' bzod pa brnyes/_/zug rngu 'byin mdzad de bzhin gshegs/_/sems can rnams la chos ston kyang /_/chos de rlom par mi mdzad pa/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[155a.4\]]bzhugs sam ci/_/'jig rten gsum na mi gnas kyang /_/gang gis 'dod khams gzugs khams dang /_/gzugs med khams ni ma lus par/_/mkhyen pas gzhal bar mdzad gyur pa/_/spyan dang ldan pa bzhugs sam ci/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub yan lag gnas zhes bya 
[\[155a.5\]]bas sku lha'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa'am/_/de bas lhag par bzhugs 'gyur bas/_/phyis kyang rdzogs sangs mthong 'gyur gyis/_/'dod pas dga' bar gyis shig khye'u/_/'di ni rgyal chen khyim yin gyis/_/
[\[155a.6\]]'dod pa'i dga' mchog spyod byos la/_/sad nas pi wang rnga chen dang /_/rdza rnga rnams dang 'khar sil rdobs/_/de nas khye'u des de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa kho nar shes mod kyi lha yin par 'du shes pa'i sems can gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa smras 
[\[155a.7\]]pa/_sems can gang dag 'dod dbang song /_/de dag byis pa rmongs pa yin/_/de dag gis ni rdzogs sangs dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa mi shes so/_/'dod rnams snying po med pas na/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod bdag mi 'dod/_/'dod pa spu gri'i so 'dra bas/_/'dod pa de la su yid rton/_/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]khyi dang phag dang wa dag dang /_/ba lang bong bu dre'u rta dag_/de dag 'dod pa sten byed kyi/_/sangs rgyas mi mdzad nyan thos min/_/zhar ba theng bo long ba dang /_/glen pa sgur po mi'u thung rnams/_/de dag 'dod pa sten byed kyi/_/sangs rgyas mi mdzad nyan thos min/_/sbrang bu sbur ba phye leb dang /_
[\[155b.2\]]de bzhin rma bya khu byug rnams/_/de dag 'dod la sten byed pas/_/kho bo khyad par med par 'gyur/_/ji ltar me yi klubs kyis ni/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang gyur na/_/long ba der ni ltung ba ltar/_/rgyal ba 'dod par de bzhin no/_/'dod pa mi rtag sdug bsngal bas/_/su zhig 'dod 
[\[155b.3\]]pa sten par byed/_/gang dag 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang bas/_/de dag de yi chos mi shes/_/kho bo 'dod pa mi gnyer bar/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni kho bo mkhyen/_/lhar gyur bdag la 'dri ba 'di/_/sangs rgyas yin par kho bos shes/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas skyob 
[\[155b.4\]]pa ni/_/lhun po'i rgyal las 'di skad ces/_/mtshan mo'i thun gyi tha ma la/_/sangs rgyas 'da' bar 'gyur zhes thos/_/kun sbyor zad pa'i drang srong la/_/gang dag lta bar 'dod pa dag_/kye ma ston pa 'das gyur gyis/_/tshur shog sangs rgyas blta phyir 'dong /_/skyob 
[\[155b.5\]]pa shAkya seng ge ni/_/mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/_/gang gis mthong zhing thos gyur pas/_/dge ba mang po byed 'gyur ltar/_/des ni bskal pa bye stong du/_/dge ba byas pa ma yin zhes/_/byang chub yan lag gnas mdzad pa/_/bde gshegs mi mchog de skad 
[\[155b.6\]]gsungs/_/gang dag ston la dga' ba yi/_/lha dang gnod sbyin mi rnams dag_/grags chen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/blta phyir myur du tshur shog cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa thob pa/_bcom 
[\[155b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i srog chags 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing /_mdun du bdar te/_yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //_//
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]bam po gnyis pa/_bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gzims khri la sku'i glo g.yas pas phab ste gzims ma thag tu de nas khye'u bzhi po mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa med la/_skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang lhag chad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa de dag phyogs bzhi nas bcom ldan 
[\[156a.2\]]'das la thal mo sbyor zhing phyag 'tshal ba'i skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/khye'u bzhi po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ba'i tshe grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang gi srog 
[\[156a.3\]]chags 'bum phrag mang po rnams sems rab tu dang zhing yid bsdus nas thal mo sbyar te thams cad kyis phyag byas so/_/de dag dong ba'i tshe phyogs bzhir dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi kho ra khor yug tu me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu bab po/_/de dag dong ba'i tshe lha rnams kyis lha'i sil snyan 
[\[156a.4\]]brgya stong dag mngon par rab tu gsil cing lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra dag kyang phyung ngo /_/de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyogs bzhir seng ge'i gzims khri bshams pa bzhi yang byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[156a.5\]]dga' bos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs bzhi na/_/seng ge'i gzims khri 'thun pa dang /_/rnam par mdzes pa 'di 'dra ba/_/gang gi rgyu lags bcom ldan 'das/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di 
[\[156a.6\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis phyogs bzhi nas 'ong ba'i khye'u bzhin ras zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra zhing nyi ma'i 'od zer las yang dag par 'das pa'i 'od kyis gling bzhi zil gyis gnon pa/_gzugs dang /_gzi brjid kyi 'od gsal ba/_shes rab kyi snang ba thob pa/_brtson 
[\[156a.7\]]'grus thob pa/_ye shes zab mo rjes su rtogs pa/_dpal dang ldan pa/_blo dang ldan pa/_spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa/_khrel yod pa dang ldan pa/_rtogs pa dang ldan pa/_blo gros dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pa/_brtan pa dang ldan pa/_shes rab dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]rnam grangs kyi tshig ston pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas do mod nam gyi thun tha ma la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga 
[\[156b.2\]]gyad rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung gi bar du mtha' las 'das pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'dra ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon 
[\[156b.3\]]pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par shes par dka' ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi btags pa yang dag par 'joms pa'i yongs 
[\[156b.4\]]su mya ngan las 'da' bas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba thos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes te/_phyogs bzhi kun nas 'dug cing nga'i yon tan bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa'i chos bstan pa nyan par 'gyur 
[\[156b.5\]]ba bzhi po 'di dag mthong ngam/_kun dga' bo de la gang shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i khye'u kha dog dang ldan pa/_gzi brjid dang ldan pa/_gzugs dang ldan pa/_'od 'bar bas gsal ba/_dpal 'bar ba/_srog chags 'bum phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing lha 'bum gyis rab 
[\[156b.6\]]tu mchod la/_lha'i me tog gi char 'bab pa nyams su myong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'ong ba'i khye'u 'di ni kun dga' bo sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na stong gi 'jig rten la dbang sgyur zhing lha dang 
[\[156b.7\]]mis legs par mchod pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_de rgyal po byed pa na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang mi rnams la chos ston cing chos yang dag par bgro ba yang byas so/_/srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag la chos ston pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su smin par byed cing mngon 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]par shes pa dag la mkhas pa dang /_chos kyi tshul rtogs par khong du chud cing 'phags pa mtha' yas pa/_rgyun mi 'chad pa/_sna tshogs pa/_'jigs pa med pa/_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang ldan la/_chos shes pa la mkhas shing ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par 
[\[157a.2\]]gyur nas lo bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du chad pa med pa dang /_mtshon cha med pa dang /_sems can thams cad la rnam par tho 'tsham pa don du mi gnyer bar chos kyi rgyal po byas so/_/de yang 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin zhing rgyal srid la gdu ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad la phan gdags 
[\[157a.3\]]pa dang yongs su thar bar bya ba dang /_dul bar bya ba dang /_gdul bar bya ba dang /_dul ba dang /_gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rgyal po byas te/_des lo bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis srog chags khrag khrig phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad byang chub la rab tu bkod cing phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu bkod do/_/byang chub 
[\[157a.4\]]sems dpa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas khyim 
[\[157a.5\]]nas khyim med par legs par kho nar rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na 'dug ste mal du nyal bar yang mi byed na/_rmugs pa dang gnyid la 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_des sngon lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang 
[\[157a.6\]]'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'am/_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'am/_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma bskyed do/_/de'i bar du sngon nam yang sdug par 'du shes pa'am/_mi sdug par 'du shes pa'am/_gtsug lag khang du 'du shes pa'am/_gtsug lag khang ma yin par 'du shes pa med 
[\[157a.7\]]cing /_mi dge ba yid la byed pa'i 'du shes gzhan 'ga' yang ma bskyed par chos gnyis la gnas par gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_mig mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i tshul gyis sha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang /_de la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi phung po'i de kho na rjes su rtogs pa'o/_/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]gzhan yang lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang sar 'du shes pa'am/_chur 'du shes pa'am/_mer 'du shes pa'am/_rlung du 'du shes pa'am/_nam mkhar 'du shes pa'am/_rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'am/_bud med du 'du shes pa'am/_skyes par 'du shes pa'am/_
[\[157b.2\]]bkres par 'du shes pa'am/_skom par 'du shes pa'am/_grong du 'du shes pa'am/_dgon par 'du shes pa'am/_grong khyer du 'du shes pa'am/_grong rdal du 'du shes pa'am/_mi 'thun par 'du shes pa'am/_mi 'thun pa med par 'du shes pa'am/_dben par 'du shes pa'am/_
[\[157b.3\]]bsam gtan du 'du shes pa'am/_bdag tu 'du shes pa'am/_gzhan du 'du shes pa'am/_gzugs su 'du shes pa'am/_gzugs med par 'du shes pa'am/_mthar 'du shes pa'am/_dbus su 'du shes pa'am/_skye bar 'du shes pa'am/_'gag par 'du shes pa'am/_nyung ngur 
[\[157b.4\]]'du shes pa'am/_mang por 'du shes pa'i 'du shes gzhan dag kyang ma bskyed de/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ma gtogs par rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i 'du shes de dag dang gzhan dag kyang kun tu mi 'byung bar gyur to/_/gang de'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' des srog chags 
[\[157b.5\]]khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag thams cad ni sems dang po bskyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[157b.6\]]ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir skad cig 'di nyid ma thal bar 'jig rten gyi khams de dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas gnyis lhan cig mi 'grogs par 'phags te dong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[157b.7\]]de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nga bzhin du shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa sha stag ste/_thams cad kyang snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du byung ba sha stag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]'di nyid la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po la mngon par phyogs shing seng ge'i gzims khri la sku'i glo g.yas pas phab ste gzims par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang do mod nam gyi thun tha ma la gyad rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung gi bar 
[\[158a.2\]]sha stag tu thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo ngas sha'i spyan thogs pa med pas gang du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi rtogs shing yul ma yin la gting mi rtogs pa de dag dang /_gzhan yang tshad med pa dag rab tu mkhyen to/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[158a.3\]]dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nga'i sha'i spyan gyi thams cad mkhyen pa la dad pa'i sems skyed par byed pa 
[\[158a.4\]]dang /_tha na lhag pa'i bsam pas sems skyed pa gcig tsam skyed par byed na de dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis sems bskyed ma thag tu bsod nams kyi phung po mang po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa dang grangs med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[158a.5\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang gis sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon sum du gyur pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas/_rjed pa byas/_gsol ba byas kyang de sems bskyed pa dang /_smon lam 'di dang 
[\[158a.6\]]bral bar gyur na/_des ni rigs kyi bu snga ma des bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba de tsam du bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khye'u 'dis nga'i bstan pa 'di la nyin mtshan 'dis sems can rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur ba ltar ni nga'i nyan thos shA ri'i 
[\[158a.7\]]bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_gzhan dag gis kyang nga'i gsung rab 'di la sems can rnams kyi don ma byas so/_/kun dga' bo gal te khyed cag gis tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas par gyur la sems can rnams la chos ston par byed cing nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa gzhan med par chos ston par gyur te/_
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]de ltar byas kyang khyed cag gis ni khye'u 'dis bstan pa 'di'i khur ji tsam thogs pa'am/_thogs par 'gyur ba de tsam gyi khur thogs par mi nus so/_/kun dga' bo de ltar na gang dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i dngos po dang /_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba dang /_sems can rnams la 
[\[158b.2\]]phan 'dogs pa dang /_sems can rnams la 'du shes btang snyoms su byed pa dag ni yon tan dpag tu med pa yin pas khye'u 'di yang yon tan dpag tu med pa yin te/_khye'u 'di ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis lho phyogs nas ston ka'i dus kyi tshe'i 
[\[158b.3\]]nyi ma 'char ba 'dra zhing zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa 'char ba 'dra ba'i khye'u rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i dbyig pas sa chen po 'di la rdebs par byed cing 'ong ba mthong ngam/_des sa chen po la rdebs pa na 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ste/_'di lta ste dper na yul ma ga d+hA nas byung ba'i snod rin po 
[\[158b.4\]]che las byas pa'am/_gser las byas pa'am/_dngul las byas pa/_shin tu mthar phyin par byas pa/_byi dor legs par byas pa/_shin tu phyis pa/_dri ma med pa/_bug rdol med pa/_nag nog med pa/_dri ma bkrus pa/_rdul med pa/_snum bag med pa/_yo byad rnam pa mang 
[\[158b.5\]]po'i yo byad du byas pa/_shin tu byang ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa/_gnas lnga rab tu rdzogs pa/_gnas bcu yongs su spangs pa/_nye ba'i skyon bcu gnyis dang bral ba/_lugs lan stong du brtags shing gser dngul gyi skyon dang bral ba/_shin tu dag pa/_'byung khungs bzang po nas byung ba/_rigs 
[\[158b.6\]]dang ldan pa/_gser gyi rigs khyad par can brgya las byas pa/_ma zhom pa/_yan lag brgyad la mkhas pa'i mi stong gis legs par bsregs pa/_nye ba'i skyon thams cad dang bral ba las ni sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/kun dga' bo de 'dra ba'i de lta bu de ltar 
[\[158b.7\]]snang ba'i ni dper bya ba tsam dang /_nye bar mtshon pa tsam du zad de/_de bzhin du khye'u 'dis rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i dbyig pas sa chen po 'di la rdebs pa na yang de lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/kun dga' bo khye'u 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhi bar gnas zhes bya ba yin te 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blta mdzes rin chen brtsegs zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba nas 'ongs pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci'i 
[\[159a.2\]]phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams de rin po che bkod pa zhes bya zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na log pa nyid du nges pa dang ma nges pa'i sems can gyi ming yang med de/_kun dga' bo sems can de dag thams cad ni 'jig pa med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa sha stag yin no/_/
[\[159a.3\]]kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa'i zhing kho na yin te/_de na skyes pa dang bud med kyi ming yang med do/_/kun dga' bo sems can de dag thams cad ni tshangs par spyod pa dang /_gtsang ba dang /_dri nga ba med pa dang /_shes pa'i spyod yul gtsang ba dang /_'khrig pa dang bral ba yin 
[\[159a.4\]]te/_'jig rten gyi khams de na 'khrig pa'i chos kyi ming yang med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag kun tu 'byung ba med cing /_zas rnam gnyis ma gtogs par zas kyi 'du shes kyang med do/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_ye shes kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i zas dang /_
[\[159a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par brjod pa'i zas so/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la rgya cher 'jug pa ma gtogs par phung po gnyis dang theg pa gsum ston pa med de/_kun dga' bo rnam grangs des 
[\[159a.6\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams de rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/kun dga' bo sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa dang /_gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar sems skyed par byed pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[159a.7\]]pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni skyes ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad mngon par shes par 'gyur zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]dag skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i 'du shes can du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa blta mdzes rin chen brtsegs de byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig tshad med pa de dag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa kho na'i 
[\[159b.2\]]gtam ma 'dres pa dag ston par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de'i bsngags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re'i chos kyi khyad par 'di lta ste/_smon lam 
[\[159b.3\]]brtsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa dag ngas brjod par gyur na bskal pa stong phrag mang pos kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhi bar gnas pa 'di gang nas 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming tsam zhig brjod par 
[\[159b.4\]]zad do/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhi bar gnas pa 'di ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la blta ba dang /_sems can mang po rnams skyo ba bskyed par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming dang yon tan yongs su bsgrag par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[159b.5\]]pa de'i bsngags pa rab tu bshad par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi chos kyi bdag nyid chen po dang /_yang dag pa'i yon tan yongs su bsgrag par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can tshad med pa rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par bya ba 
[\[159b.6\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_yang dag par dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs so/_/kun dga' bo sngon de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'jig rten du byung ba na khye'u 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma skyes 
[\[159b.7\]]dgra zhes bya bar gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra de srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag la chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang yongs su smin par byed de/_des nyi ma 'char ka tsam gyi snga dro gcig gis kyang srog chags bye ba phrag 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]sum cu rtsa drug bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod cing skyon med par zhugs te/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar 
[\[160a.2\]]me mdzad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang lo stong tham par bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de'i rjes su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/des sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don byas nas nyi ma tha ma'i nyi ma nub 
[\[160a.3\]]kar yang srog chags bye ba phrag drug bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/_de nyid kyi nyi ma nub kar srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun cu zag pa zad pa la yang rab tu bkod par gyur na/_slob pa rnams kyi mthong ba'i sa'am bsgom pa'i sa la bkod pa 
[\[160a.4\]]lta smos kyang ci dgos/_kun dga' bo ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhi bar gnas kyi bsngags pa mang po dang /_khye'u 'dis sems can ji snyed cig gi don byas pa dag brjod par gyur na/_bskal pa stong phrag mang pos kyang mthar thug 
[\[160a.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga'i spyan sngar rigs kyi bu rab tu zhi bar gnas kyi stan thing shig dang /_khyod la bsod nams mang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo sems can gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhi bar gnas kyi ming thos pa de dag la ni 
[\[160a.6\]]mngon sum du sangs rgyas byung ba yin no/_/kun dga' bo gang su dag yon tan bkod pa lung ston pa rgya cher bstan pa'i chos 'di bshad pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blta mdzes rin chen brtsegs de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang 
[\[160a.7\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir dad pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam thob par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni kun dga' bo chos thun mong yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang /_dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]chen po rnams kyang blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar ngas lung bstan pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi smon lam gyi khyad par ni ma gtogs so/_/kun dga' bo sems can gang dag gi rna ba'i dbang pos yon tan bkod pa lung ston pa rgya cher bstan pa'i chos 
[\[160b.2\]]bshad pa 'di nyid thos par gyur pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed cing shin tu legs par rnyed pa yin na/_gang gis 'di thos nas dad pa skyed par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_kun dga' bo gnas 'di lta bu de dag dang /_chos kyi tshig gi gnas 'di lta bu de dag legs par bsrung bar bya zhing legs 
[\[160b.3\]]par yid la bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo mdo sde 'di lta bu dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa rnams kyis sngon ma thos pa'i phyir te/_khyod kyis chos spong bar byed pa dag ni mig lam du yang 
[\[160b.4\]]mi snang bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di nas nub phyogs kyi ngos kyi nam mkha' las rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig 'ong ba 'di mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis nub phyogs nas khye'u zhig sems 
[\[160b.5\]]can gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse zhing glo gnyis kyis sa chen po 'di 'gul bar byed/_rab tu 'gul bar byed/_g.yo bar byed/_rab tu g.yo bar byed/_ldeg par byed/_rab tu ldeg par byed cing sa chen po g.yo bas 'jigs su rung ba dang /_spu zing zhes byed pa kun tu ston par byed cing 
[\[160b.6\]]'ong ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bgyid cing mchi ba'i khye'u 'di mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'di'i mdun nas rin po che sna 
[\[160b.7\]]tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'ong ba gang yin pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dri sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang bar gyur to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni rigs kyi bu 'di'i ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa yin te/_des na khang pa brtsegs 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa 'di las de lta bu'i dri 'byung ngo /_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis sgra bzhi po 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med pa zhes bya ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'byung ba 'di dag thos sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[161a.2\]]de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sa 'di dag ni khye'u 'di'i spu'i khung bu dag nas 'byung ste/_kun dga' bo sa 'di dag thos pas srog chags khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi don byas so/_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can mang po rnams ni len pa 
[\[161a.3\]]med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi sgra gcig pu thos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la nges par zhugs so/_/gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i lha dang mir bcas pa'i 
[\[161a.4\]]skye dgu dag las lha dang /_mi khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba blta ba'i phyir nub phyogs logs na de bzhin 
[\[161a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dga' spu zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs pa yin te/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs ma thag tu 'dis sems 
[\[161a.6\]]can tshad med pa rnams kyi don byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas shing 'dis chos kyi 'khor lo yang rjes su bskor to/_/kun dga' bo bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad nas rigs kyi bu 'di'i spu'i khung bu dag nas sgra bzhi po 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_dngos po med pa'i sgra 
[\[161a.7\]]dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'di dag 'byung ste/_sgra re res kyang sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don byas so/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig bsags lags na des da ltar 'di'i spu'i khung bu dag nas 'di 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri med spyan zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_
[\[161b.2\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di de'i gsung rab la dge slong ye shes dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas ye shes 
[\[161b.3\]]kyi tshig dang /_rtogs par dka' ba'i tshig dang /_don 'byung ba ston pa'i tshig 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad skye ba dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang /_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa 
[\[161b.4\]]zhes bya ba dag thos nas zhag bdun du yongs su skyo ba med pa dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /_yid la byed pa gzhan med par tshig bzhi po de dag lus la zhen pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa dang /_shin tu zhag pa dang /_kha ton byang ba dang /_yid kyis legs par brtags pa dang /_mthong bas 
[\[161b.5\]]shin tu rtogs par byas te gnas so/_/kun dga' bo dge slong des don gyi tshig bstan pa bzhi po de dag gis sangs rgyas bye ba snyed kyis gsungs pa'i chos bstan pa rnams la rjes su zhugs te/_bzung zhing rtogs par byas nas de sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_
[\[161b.6\]]grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'ongs te chos bstan to/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong ye shes dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur pa des las de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lus la zhen pa dang /_mang du thos pas lo drug tu lhag pa'i bsam pas 
[\[161b.7\]]chos bstan pas na bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad nas de'i spu'i khung bu dag nas de lta bu'i sgra dag dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul de nyams su myong bar gyur cing de'i lus las kyang skye bo mang po'i don byed pa'i chos kyi sgra bzhi po 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_dngos po med pa'i sgra dang /_nye bar zhi 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]ba'i sgra dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra de de dag 'byung bar gyur te/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad nas khye'u 'di'i spu'i khung bu dag nas sgra bzhi po 'di dag 'byung bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi gang dag gis byang chub sems 
[\[162a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med kyi ming thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed cing shin tu legs par rnyed pa yin na/_gang dag gis chos ston pa thos pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_kun dga' bo lha dang mi rnams kyi skyes pa'am/_bud med gang dag gis byang chub sems 
[\[162a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med kyi ming thos shing thos nas kyang dad pa thob par gyur pa de dag kyang thos ma thag tu yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur na/_gang dag gis sha'i mig gis mngon sum du mthong ba dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[162a.4\]]kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dag thob pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 
[\[162a.5\]]ba la blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga gang du rigs kyi bu 'di 'dug par 'gyur bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med kyi stan thing shig dang /_des khyod la yun ring por phan pa dang bde ba dang mngon par shes 
[\[162a.6\]]pa myur ba nyid du yang 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di'i stan bting ba las byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas khyod snyoms par 'jug pa la bde bar gnas shing sems bskyed pa'i skad cig gcig gis zang zing med pa'i chos 'phags pa dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[162a.7\]]gal te khyod nyan thos kyi sa la nges par zhugs par ma gyur na ni khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'thob par yang ngas lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo dge slong ngam/_dge 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi 'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_mi'am mi ma yin pa gang yin pa'am/_sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dag gis 
[\[162b.2\]]zhi ba bshad pa lung bstan pa 'di thos nas dad pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gang dag zhi ba bshad pa lung bstan pa 'di nyan par 'dod pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gang du 'dug nas zhi ba bshad pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad 
[\[162b.3\]]par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi stan bsham par bya ste/_kun dga' bo des stan bshams ma thag tu stan phun sum tshogs pa bcu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i stan 'thob pa dang /_brgya byin gyi stan 'thob pa dang /_tshangs pa'i stan 'thob pa dang /_skye 
[\[162b.4\]]dgu'i bdag po'i stan 'thob pa dang /_tshe rabs de dang de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la stan 'thob pa dang /_dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por byang chub kyi shing drung du song ba'i seng ge'i khri stan 'thob pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[162b.5\]]pa'i ye shes rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khri stan bla na med pa 'thob pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba na chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa skor ba'i khri stan 'thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa na lha bye ba phrag stong gis 'dus byas pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 
[\[162b.6\]]'phags shing zil gyis mi non la/_bla na med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri stan 'thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs 
[\[162b.7\]]pa na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyi yid rab tu dang ba skyed par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma'i khri stan 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_kun dga' bo 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]seng ge'i khri stan bcu po de dag 'thob par shes par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos zhi ba bshad pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad pa na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos smra ba la sems dang bas gus 
[\[163a.2\]]par byas te/_dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_gus pas chos kyi stan shom par byed pa des ni seng ge'i khri stan bcu po de dag 'thob pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu dmigs med la thal mo sbyor cig dang /_des khyod la don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde 
[\[163a.3\]]bar 'gyur zhing gang gis khyod mngon par shes pa myur ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen po yang khyod kyis yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de'i tshe rigs kyi bu dmigs med kyi chos kyi stan bshams nas sems rab tu dang bas zhe sa dang bcas/_gus pa 
[\[163a.4\]]dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa' dmigs med ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dmigs med dpa' bo glang po che/_/dul zhing mnyam bzhag sems can che/_/shes rab chen po 'od byed la/_/bdag ni thal mo sbyor bar 
[\[163a.5\]]bgyid/_/ye shes brtson 'grus 'byung ba'i gnas/_/shes rab brtsegs shing mnyam bzhag pa/_/mtshungs med brtan pa 'di la ni/_/de ring thal mo sbyar bar bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_dmigs
