[\[163a.6\]]med 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/_/khyod kyis thal mo sbyar byas pa'i/_/rnam smin ji snyed 'dzin pa de/_/gau tam bu la bshad par bya/_/kun dga' bo khyod thal mo sbyar ba de'i rnam par smin pas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho 
[\[163a.7\]]brang 'khor dag tu nyan thos rnams la ston pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing khyod de dang de dag tu 'jug pa dang 'byung ba dang 'greng ba dang 'chag pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang spyod lam thams cad du 'jig rten na sems dang ldan pa dang /_sems med pa'i 'byung ba thams cad kyang khyod ga la ba de logs su 'dud 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_lha'i bu mo dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_zhang blon dang /_zhang blon gyi g.yog gnyug ma dang /_tshong dpon dang /_grong mi dang /_ljongs 
[\[163b.2\]]kyi mi dang /_khyim bdag rnams dang /_gzhan yang gang dag mir gyur pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa glang po che dang /_rta dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_phyugs dang /_bya dag gis khyod mthong na dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 
[\[163b.3\]]rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dag dang /_me tog yod pa dag dang /_'bras bu yod pa dag kyang khyod ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du khang khyim dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_pu shu 
[\[163b.4\]]dang /_skar khung dang /_rta babs dag kyang khyod kyi bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi zil gyis non cing khyod ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sgrib pa med pa'i rnam 
[\[163b.5\]]par thar pa mngon sum du mdzad de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na byang chub kyi snying po'i nye 'khor gyi rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_me tog yod pa dag dang /_'bras bu yod pa dag dang /_gong 
[\[163b.6\]]ma bzhin du sbyar te/_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su rab tu btud par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang rigs kyi bu dmigs med la thal mo sbyar cing lus btud pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis khyod kyi spyod lam thams cad du mi dang /_
[\[163b.7\]]mi ma yin pa dang /_nags tshal thams cad khyod ga la ba de logs su 'dud pa dang /_rab tu 'dud pa dang /_mngon par rab tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'am/_da ltar mngon sum du gyur 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]cing bzhugs pa na chos bkod pa lung ston pa 'di thos nas/_lhag pa'i bsam pas thal mo gcig tsam sbyor bar byed pa dang /_nges par rtog cing mos par byed pa de dag ni ngas bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de lta bu dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[164a.2\]]dga' bo de lta mod kyi sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di lan gcig gam/_lan gnyis thos par 'gyur ba de dag kyang nyung na/_gang dag gis 'di lta bu thos nas dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag lhag 
[\[164a.3\]]pa'i bsam pas mos par 'gyur ba dang /_nges par rtog par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur ba dang /_som nyi med par 'gyur ba dang /_the tsom med par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag thams cad ni ngas sangs rgyas 
[\[164a.4\]]kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen te/_de dag gis ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin zhing /_de dag gis ni sangs rgyas gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag thams cad ni gang dag da ltar 
[\[164a.5\]]nga'i mngon sum du 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te 'dug pa dang /_nga'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po blta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs pa dag bzhin du kun dga' bo de dag kyang deng phyin chad nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa byang chub kyi snying 
[\[164a.6\]]por gshegs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dag la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur chen po byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams 
[\[164a.7\]]pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar khye'u bzhi 'ong bar 'gyur ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur zhing da ltar nga'i spyan snga na ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyang thos par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]chen po dmigs med kyi spu'i khung bu dag nas chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis don nges par 'byung ba'i mdo sde 'di lta bu bshad pa dag la yang dang yang du lus btud de thal 
[\[164b.2\]]mo sbyar bar bya zhing sems kyis dad pa bskyed par yang bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas khyod sems can thams cad kyis legs par mchod par 'gyur zhing khyod la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang rab tu 'dud par 'gyur zhing khyod yongs su 
[\[164b.3\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus la yang lha dang mi rnams mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la bka' stsal pa/_ma 'gags pa khyod kyis lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus steng gi bar snang las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thal mo 
[\[164b.4\]]sbyar te lus btud cing 'khod pa dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma 'gags pa de dag ni chos la dad pa dang ldan pas thal mo sbyar cing dad pas lus rab tu btud pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa grangs med par log par ltung bar 
[\[164b.5\]]'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mir mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur la/_de dag mir gyur pa na re res kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bas lhag pa snyed byed par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur zhing de dag de'i 'og tu dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[164b.6\]]ba dag yang dag par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyis rab tu gdung bar 'os pa zhes bya bar mtshan 
[\[164b.7\]]'thun pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag tu 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i tshe gyad dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_gyad rgyal dka' zhes bya ba dang /_gyad stobs po che dang /_gzi brjid lha dang /_rgyal ba'i lha dang /_phrag par 'dzeg dang /_blo bzang dang /_'jigs med dang /_dbyig dang /_bden pa dang /_
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]byang phyogs kyi stobs kyi mig dang /_gyad thams cad bzod ces bya ba de dag thams cad 'khor lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur nas/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 
[\[165a.2\]]thal mo sbyar te lus thur du btud nas ngu bar byed/_smre sngags 'don par byed cing mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dmigs med dang /_
[\[165a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'di dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po'i dge 'dun dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du thal mo sbyor zhing lus kyang rab tu 'dud par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag 
[\[165a.4\]]thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 
[\[165a.5\]]'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas gsal bar byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig 
[\[165a.6\]]rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te yang phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pas yongs su zhus pa/_'jig rten snang mdzad ji slad du/_/
[\[165a.7\]]'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang la gas/_/bdag dang srog chags gzhan dag gi/_/som nyi legs par bsal du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gyad kyi bu 'di dag lhags te sems rab tu dang bas nga dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]chen po dmigs med dang /_mdo sde'i tshig bstan pa 'di la thal mo sbyar cing rab tu btud nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed pa dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[165b.2\]]kun dga' bo gyad kyi bu 'di dag thams cad ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye bar ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing de dag phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[165b.3\]]bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/yid bde mgu ba'i sems ldan pa'i/_/gyad kyi bu rnams 'dir lhags te/_/thal mo sbyar cing rab btud pa/_/kun dga' khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/_/mkhas pa 'di dag thams cad kyis/_/nga la mchod pa 'di byas nas/_/bla med byang 
[\[165b.4\]]chub 'thob 'gyur bar/_/mgu ba nyid kyis rjod par byed/_/dmigs med shes rab ldan pa dang /_/chos la'ang gus dang bcas byas shing /_/de bzhin nyan thos dge 'dun la/_/thal mo sbyar ba 'di byas pas/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_
[\[165b.5\]]thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang ni/_/lus rab btud pas phyin chad ni/_/de dag byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba'i/_/phun sum tshogs pa cir 'gyur ba/_/nga yis bskal pa'am bskal pa ni/_/bye ba phrag brgyar brjod gyur kyang /_/spyod pa dam pa spyad byas pa/_/de la grangs ni yod min 
[\[165b.6\]]pas/_/bskal pa bye ba rnams kyis kyang /_/mtha' ma rtogs par sla ba min/_/kun dga' bo do mod nam gyi thun tha ma la sangs rgyas nga dang khyod blta ba'i tha mar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang phyogs nas 'od chen po gser gyi kha dog lta bu zhig 'ong zhing de'i gzi brjid kyis 
[\[165b.7\]]byang phyogs kyi rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_lcug ma dang /_tshal dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_ri dang /_thang dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_pu shu dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_nam mkha' dang /_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]bar snang thams cad 'di lta ste/_gser gyi mdog lta bur kha dog gcig tu kun tu snang bar gyur pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin du khyod kyis byang phyogs nas 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 
[\[166a.2\]]las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdun 'ong zhing khang pa brtsegs pa dbus ma'i nang na gzi brjid mchog dang ldan zhing dpal gyis rnam par mdzes pa'i khye'u zhig skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[166a.3\]]khye'u 'di ni mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa thob pa zhes bya ste/_'di nas byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag gnas zhes bya ba'i 
[\[166a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshig gi sgra 'byung ste/_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_lcug ma dang /_shing ljon pa'i tshogs 
[\[166a.5\]]dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad las kyang byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshig gi sgra 'byung ngo /_/sgra des sems can dag dge ba'i chos rnams kyis yongs su smin par byed do/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi yan lag gnas de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[166a.6\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa drug khri bzhi stong du bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par nyan thos ni mi mnga' ste/_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur 
[\[166a.7\]]ba zhig la bu mang po bdog par gyur na de'i blon po rnams kyang bu nyid yin par 'gyur la/_blon po bka' la gtogs pa rnams kyang bu nyid yin/_mchog gi zung yang bu nyid yin/_rgyal phran rnams kyang bu nyid yin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'i sras rnams kyang byang chub 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]sems dpa' nyid yin la/_blon po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin/_blon po bka' la gtogs pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin/_mchog gi zung yang byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin/_rim gro ba rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin/_dge 'dun 
[\[166b.2\]]dkon mchog kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyid sha stag go/_/kun dga' bo de ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa rnams kyang 
[\[166b.3\]]mngon par shes pa mngon par 'phags pa/_na tshod kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kun tu sdud pa/_shes rab brtsegs pas mngon par 'phags pa/_ye shes yang dag par bsags pa dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi sems la mngon par brtson pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 
[\[166b.4\]]yang dag par sdud pa la brtson zhing byang chub sems dpa'i chos tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gnas te/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[166b.5\]]'di nyid du yangs pa can gyi grong khyer du skyes pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag gis yongs su gang ba yin no/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen 
[\[166b.6\]]po 'di yang blta ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag kun tu ston cing 'ong ste/_kun dga' bos snang ba chen po 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mthu yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdun po 'di dag kyang 
[\[166b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bshad pa dag sprul pa mdzad pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na khye'u 'di dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang yod de/_khye'u 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir skyes ma thag tu lha dang mi rnams dga' 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur to/_/de dag las kha cig gis ni zag pa zad pa thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni slob pa'i sa thob bo/_/sngon sems ma bskyed pa kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni 
[\[167a.2\]]sems bskyed ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo gang na khye'u 'di skyil mo krung gis 'dug cing 'od 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbus ma 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sprul pa yin no/_/de las ni rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa lhag ma drug po gzhan 
[\[167a.3\]]dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa thob pas gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis khyab par byas shing 'di lta ste/_chos yang dag par 'dzin pas sems 
[\[167a.4\]]can dpag tu med pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i mthu la ltos/_de nas khye'u de dag thams cad lhan cig tshogs te yang dag par dga' zhing srog chags 'bum phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas skad cig gcig ma thal bar me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing bcom ldan 
[\[167a.5\]]'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa thob pa 'dis 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang ldan pa'i cho 
[\[167a.6\]]'phrul gyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig ni dgra bcom pa nyid du btul to/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig ni slob pa'i sar btul to/_/sems can bye ba phrag brgya ni dkon mchog gsum la dad par byas shing bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 'dzin du bcug go/_/lha bye ba phrag bdun brgya ni byang chub la rab tu 
[\[167a.7\]]bkod de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid du nges par byas so/_/lha bye ba phrag bdun ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag ni byams pa'i 'dus pa mthong ba dang /_byams pa mthong zhing 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]phrad par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su smin par byas so/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don bya ba gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don bya ba gang yin pa de dag 
[\[167b.2\]]ni nga dang 'di dag gis yongs su rdzogs par byas zin to/_/ngas sems can rnams kyi don yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang yin pa de yang ngas yongs su rdzogs par byas zin to//_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[167b.3\]]pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par bzhugs su gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ji srid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[167b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs par 'gyur ba de srid du skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de srid du sems can dge ba 'di lta bu dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /_de srid du bdag cag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur 
[\[167b.5\]]bgyi ba dag rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_de srid du 'jig rten na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_de srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di thos par 'gyur ba dang /_de srid du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das dang rigs kyi bu 'di dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[167b.6\]]cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na bdag cag la gnas gsum yongs su nyams par 'gyur lags te/_gsum gang lags zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan 
[\[167b.7\]]pa dang /_rgya chen po la mos pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig de dag gsol nas shin tu myur bar dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar 'gyur ro snyam nas ngu bar byed/_
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]smre sngags 'don par byed cing mchi ma dag phyis nas shing bcad de 'gyel ba bzhin du sa la sgyel to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don legs par sems pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'dus byas rtag par 
[\[168a.2\]]'gyur ba yi/_/gnas 'di rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pas/_/mya ngan ma byed kun dga' khyod/_/brtags pas 'dus byas 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/rtog pa de yang mi rnyed de/_/de ltar chos stong kun dga' khyod/_/ci yi phyir na mya ngan byed/_/brtags 
[\[168a.3\]]pas shes pa stong pa ste/_/shes pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas stong /_/de la sangs rgyas mi dmigs na/_/ci phyir kun dga' mya ngan byed/_/dngos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang /_/smig rgyu la ni chu bzhin pas/_/brtag med rnam pas mi brtag cing /_/mkhas pa rnam par ma rtog 
[\[168a.4\]]shig_/ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis/_/rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang /_/skye dgu'i tshogs dang ljon shing tshal/_/me tog 'bras bu dga' sprul ltar/_/de bzhin 'dus byas thams cad kyang /_/sgyu ma bzhin du snying po med/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos kyang /_/gzhan 
[\[168a.5\]]min de bzhin kho na yin/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rigs kyi bu don legs par sems pa la phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_/chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/_/de 'dra'i chos mchog bdag gis ni/_/mnyan pa'i tha ma de ring yin/_/
[\[168a.6\]]ji ltar mnyan yod 'jug bya zhing /_/kun dga' rdzogs sangs ga la bzhugs/_/spyan ldan gang nas byon 'gyur zhes/_/dris na ji skad brjod par bya/_/dri gtsang khang pa mi mchog gis/_/stong par bzhugs nas ji ltar blta/_/khri gdan stong pa mthong 'gyur na/_/ji ltar gnas 
[\[168a.7\]]'gyur brtul zhugs bzang /_/de nas rigs kyi bu rab tu zhi bar gnas kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lo grangs bye bar dus kyang ni/_/don 'di rnyed par shin tu dka'/_/chos dbyings shin tu blta dka' ba/_/so sor rtog shig kun dga' bo/_/ji 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]ltar chu shing sdong po ni/_/shun pa rim gyis bshus gyur na/_/de la snying po med pa ltar/_/chos rnams rang bzhin de dang 'dra/_/ji ltar char pa bab pa na/_/mdor na chu yi chu bur dag_/skye zhing 'gag par 'gyur ba ltar/_/'gro 'di'i dngos po de dang 'dra/_/ji ltar dbu ba rdos pa 
[\[168b.2\]]la/_/mig can snying po rtog pa na/_de la snying po med pa ltar/_/'gro ba 'di kun de dang 'dra/_/ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ni/_/rang bzhin snying po med pa ltar/_/khams gsum 'jig rten de 'dra yis/_/mkhas pa ngu bar ma byed cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[168b.3\]]bos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhi bar gnas la phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mkhas pa ji skad zer ba de/_/kho bos mi shes ma yin te/_/drang srong chen pos mdo sde las/_/'jig rten gsum kun dngos med gsungs/_/lha rnams bye ba ngu bzhin dang /_/
[\[168b.4\]]mchi mas brnangs pa 'di dag ni/_/bdag gi drung du nyer lhags shing /_/ngu bas bdag gi sdug bsngal bskyed/_/spyan dang ldan pas bdag bor te/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bzhud na/_/kho bo gang phyogs 'gro bya zhing /_/su zhig bdag gi skyob par 'gyur/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas 
[\[168b.5\]]shin tu dkon/_/bdag gis su la mchod bya zhing /_/zhi ba zab mo blta dka' ba'i/_/dam chos su las mnyan par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs med kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_longs shig btsun pa kun dga' bo/_/chos 
[\[168b.6\]]'ga' 'ong ba yod min la/_/'gro bar 'gyur ba'ang med pas na/_/mya ngan ma byed chos nyid ltos/_/sangs rgyas skye ba ci 'dra bar/_/de yi byang chub de dang 'dra/_/'khor lo bskor ba ci 'dra bar/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'ang de dang 'dra/_/sangs rgyas nam yang skye med cing /_/sangs rgyas 'gag 
[\[168b.7\]]par 'gyur ba'ang med/_/rang bzhin de 'dra'i chos rnams la/_/kun dga' khyod ni ci phyir ngu /_/kho bo'i spu yi khung bu nas/_/stong dang dngos po med pa dang /_/nye bar zhi dang sangs rgyas zhes/_/sgra skad bzhi po 'byung ba nyon/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rigs kyi bu dmigs med la phyir 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_brtul zhugs bzang po khyed cag lta/_/myur du zhing gzhan 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/der yang bdud rtsi'i tshig gsung ba/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/der ni zab mo sangs rgyas kyis/_/gsung ba'i chos kyang thos 
[\[169a.2\]]'gyur la/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshogs kyi mchog_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mthong /_/kho bo 'jig rten mgon 'das zhes/_/lha rnams bye ba mang po dag_/cho nges 'debs pas mdun bdar na/_/mkhas pa ji ltar gnas par bya/_/dge bsnyen stong phrag mang po 
[\[169a.3\]]rnams/_/thams cad shugs chen du byed cing /_/bdag gi drung du lhags gyur na/_/kho bos ji ltar lan yang gdab/_/sum cu rtsa gsum 'thab bral dang /_/dga' ldan pa dang rab 'phrul dang /_/dbang sgyur tshangs pa la sogs pa'i/_/lha tshogs nye bar lhags pa rnams/_/shAkya 
[\[169a.4\]]skyes mchog 'das gyur na/_/ji ltar yongs su gzengs bstod cing /_/bdag ni ji ltar de dag la/_/dam chos smra ba spobs par 'gyur/_/skyes bu skyes mchog 'das gyur na/_/kun dga' 'dren pa gang na zhes/_/lha rnams 'dri bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/rnam 'dren bsam gtan zab 
[\[169a.5\]]mo dang /_/bsod nams chen po'i gnas pa la/_/nang du yang dag bzhag go zhe'am/_/'on te 'chag cing bzhugs so zhes/_/ji ltar tshig gi lan yang gdab/_/de nas rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa thob pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su 
[\[169a.6\]]bcad de smras pa/_zla ba gsum po 'di 'das nas/_/kho bos phyis kyang blta bya bar/_/bdag ni khyod la dam 'cha' yis/_/kun dga' thong shig ma ngu shig_/sangs rgyas stong phrag gzhan dag la/_/shAkya'i tog gi cha byad kyis/_/chos mchog bshad par mdzad gsol zhes/_/
[\[169a.7\]]khyod phyir bdag gis gsol bar bya/_/rdzogs sangs thugs rjes gzigs mdzad cing /_/khyod kyi mdun du gshegs par 'gyur/_/khyod kyis mi mchog yongs bsnyen gyis/_/kun dga' 'di la khyod ma ngu /_/gang du 'di 'dra'i ston pa ni/_/'jig rten du ni 'da' 'gyur ba/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_/mya ngan chen po bya ba'i rigs/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas 'di skad ces/_/bskal pa bye bar 'tsho gyur pa'i/_/'dus byas thams cad mthar 'jig ces/_/gsungs pa ston pa'i drung nas thos/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom 
[\[169b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis snam logs su 'dug nas lan gsum du snying rje chen po'i sgra bsgrags pa/_mdongs par gyur pa'i sems can la/_/gang gis mig ni stsol mdzad cing /_/srog chags kun mgon gang yin pa/_/ston pa de ring mya ngan 'da'/_/mi rnams 'dren pa de 'das zhes/_/
[\[169b.3\]]tshig 'di thos par gyur na ni/_/rgyal po dam pa lus 'phags bu/_/shin tu sdug bsngal ji ltar gnas/_/de nas gyad dang gyad mo dang /_/gyad kyi bu rnams mi bzad cing /_/mi mchog mya ngan 'da' 'gyur zhes/_/de na snying rjes ngu bar byed/_/tha ma'i ston pa blta ba'i phyir/_/
[\[169b.4\]]de dag der ni lhags gyur nas/_/thal sbyar rab btud 'khod nas ni/_/'dud cing phyag kyang 'tshal bar byed/_/dpag tshad lnga yi khor yug tu/_/lha dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis gang /_/de yi kho ra khor yug tu/_/mi rnams kyis ni gnas mi rnyed/_/drang srong dam pa mchod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[169b.5\]]dri zhim me tog chu bo dag_/pus mo nub tsam phab gyur cing /_/phye ma'i char pa'ang phab par gyur/_/de nas dga' bo nye dga' gnyis/_/tha ma'i ston pa blta ba'i phyir/_/bye ba drug cu'i klu rnams dang /_/yongs su mya ngan 'das par lhags/_/brang 'gro chen po chu lha dang /_/gzi can 
[\[169b.6\]]dang ni rgya mtsho dang /_/gsal mthong dang ni btang bzung dag_/bye ba phrag brgya'i klus bdar cing /_/tha ma'i ston pa blta ba'i phyir/_/spos chu'i sprin dag 'dus byas shing /_/nam mkha'i ngos ni khebs byas te/_/char bzhin 'bebs shing nye bar lhags/_/'jig rten mgon po mchod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[169b.7\]]lha klus lha yi me tog gi/_/char dang spos chu gtsang ma yi/_/char pa dag kyang rab tu phab/_/klu yi rgyal po ma dros pa/_/dung phyur drug dang lhan cig tu/_/rin chen char pa rab 'bebs shing /_/skyes bu khyu mchog drung du lhags/_/brang 'gro chen po e la'i 'dab/_/lhun po tsam yang ngu byed cing /_/
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]tha ma'i 'jig rten mgon po la/_/mchod pa bya phyir nye bar 'ongs/_/klu yi bu mo stong dang ni/_/brgya dang khrag khrig rnams dag kyang /_/nga ro sprin snyed sgrogs byed cing /_/ston pa'i drung du nye bar lhags/_/tha ma'i 'jig rten mgon po la/_/mchod pa bya phyir de 
[\[170a.2\]]dag gis/_/spos chu gtsang ma'i char chen yang /_/der ni mngon par rab tu phab/_/gnod sbyin stong phrag bye ba dang /_/brgya dang khrag khrig rnams dag kyang /_/sangs rgyas yon tan dran byed cing /_/blta ba'i phyir ni nye bar lhags/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang /_/tha ma'i sangs rgyas 
[\[170a.3\]]blta ba'i phyir/_/ngu bzhin mchi mas brnangs gyur cing /_/ston pa'i drung du nye bar lhags/_/de bzhin lha dbang brgya byin yang /_/sum cu gsum pa stong phrag ni/_/sum cu gsum gyis mdun bdar cing /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi drung du 'ongs/_/drang srong dam pa mchod pa'i phyir/_/des 
[\[170a.4\]]kyang me tog man dar dang /_/lha yi tsan dan phye ma yi/_/char pa mngon par rab tu phab/_/tshangs pa ngan spong gtsug tor can/_/tha ma'i ston pa blta ba'i phyir/_/gnyis ka tshangs pas mdun bdar cing /_/ngu mos 'debs shing rjes su lhags/_/gnas gtsang lha brgya bye ba phrag_/
[\[170a.5\]]mang po gzi brjid chen po rnams/_/de ring rgyal ba 'da' 'gyur zhes/_/ngu mos 'debs shing lhags par gyur/_/lha brgya bye ba phrag mang po/_/rnam mang cho nges 'debs byed cing /_/mi mchog bskal par bzhugs gsol zhes/_/bsam gtan che la gsol ba 'debs/_/
[\[170a.6\]]bdud kyi bu pho mkhas pa po/_/ded dpon zhes ni bya ba yang /_/mi mchog mya ngan 'da' 'gyur zhes/_/shin tu sdug bsngal gyur cing 'ongs/_/des kyang zhabs la gtugs nas ni/_/shAkya'i rigs snang 'jig rten la/_/brtse slad bskal par bzhugs su gsol/_/rdzogs 
[\[170a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs gyur na/_/lha dang mi yi bdag po la/_/bsam yas don du 'gyur lags kyis/_/thub chen bskal par bzhugs gsol zhes/_/mi yi mchog la gsol ba 'debs/_/de nas rigs kyi bu dmigs med kyis lha dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]rten de dang /_bdud kyi bu ded dpon la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bag med pas ni 'das byas shing /_/de ltar smre sngags 'don byed pa/_/khyed kun mi shes byis pa ste/_/spre'u rnams dang ni 'dra ba yin/_/ji ltar phag ni sems bral zhing /_/nyal ba mtshon cha rnam dag 
[\[170b.2\]]gis/_/yongs su gshegs nas sad pa na/_/snying rjes smre sngags 'don pa ltar/_/bag med dbang song sngan cad ni/_/gang gis chos rnams ma thos pa/_/khyed cag thams cad de 'dra bar/_/kho bos de ltar spobs pa yin/_/de ring ye shes sgron ma ni/_/
[\[170b.3\]]'jig rten du ni nub 'gyur zhing /_/kye ma rgyal ba 'das 'gyur gyis/_/dge ba dag gis las gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa don 
[\[170b.4\]]yod rgyal po dang /_gnas brtan 'od srung gzhon nu dang /_gnas brtan gsus po che chen po la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyi lag pa g.yas pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag tu phul cig_/dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das legs lags so zhes gsol 
[\[170b.5\]]te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas dge slong 'bum tham pas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu rang rang gi lag pa phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yon pas ni dge slong de dag thams cad kyi lag pa nas bzung /_phyag g.yas pas ni kun dga' bo dang /_sgra 
[\[170b.6\]]gcan zin gyi lag pa nas bzung ste/_dge slong dag gnas brtan rnams la kun dga' bo bzang po dang /_dpal sgra gcan zin 'di gnyis bcol cing yongs su gtad do zhes phyag gis dge slong de dag gi lag tu gtad do/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sgra skad dang nga ro'i sgra snying rje zhing 
[\[170b.7\]]'jigs su rung ba dag byung bar gyur cing sgra skad des sangs rgyas kyi zhing du grags par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gnyis gnas brtan de dag la yongs su gtad pa mthong nas dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyis tshe'i 'du byed btang bar gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]'di ltar dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la blta bar mi bzod pa'i phyir te/_de dag 'di snyam du 'jig rten gyi mgon po/_'jig rten gyi sgron ma/_thugs rje dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa/_thugs brtse ba dang 
[\[171a.2\]]ldan pa/_phan par bzhed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la bdag cag blta bar mi spros/_je dang po kho nar bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/_/snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[171a.3\]]'das lnga brgya tham pas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa rnams brkyang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la rab tu btud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gis kun dga' bo dang /_sgra gcan zin dang /_gnas brtan rnams kyi lag pa nas bzung ste phyag 
[\[171a.4\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi phyag tu phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sgra gcan zin 'di bdag gi bu/_/kun dga' bo ni go re long /_/'di gnyis drang srong che rnams la/_/mngon sum du ni yongs su gtad/_/de ring 'dzam 
[\[171a.5\]]bu'i gling du ni/_/bdag gi mtshan mo tha mar 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis/_/slan cad bdag ni mthong mi 'gyur/_/gang dag byams pa bsam yas pa'i/_/'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtogs par/_/gzhan gang bdag la skyob 'gyur zhing /_/su zhig dpung gnyen 
[\[171a.6\]]skyabs su 'gyur/_/sems can gcig gi slad du yang /_/bskal pa stong phrag mang po ni/_/gang gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa/_/de snyed bskal par bsdad bgyi na/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/'jig rten khams su rnam bltas na/_/gang gi phyir ni 'dir bsdad pa'i/_/
[\[171a.7\]]sems can 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo /_/sems can gang dag chos 'di la/_/gus bcas don ni bdag gis bgyis/_/blo gros ngan pa gzhan dag ni/_/sangs rgyas bye bas gdul mi spyod/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lnga brgya tham pa de dag gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]so/_/khyod kyis sems can don rnams mdzad/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang khyod kyis mdzad/_/cho 'phrul dag kyang bstan mdzad cing /_/chos kyi rnga chen rab tu brdungs/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/_/sprin gyis sa gzhi chen po ltar/_/srog chags bye ba tshim mdzad cing /_/
[\[171b.2\]]sems can rnams kyi zug rngu phyung /_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis/_/
[\[171b.3\]]spyan ldan bskal par mthong ba dang /_/'dren pa bskal par bzhugs 'gyur bar/_/dpa' chen rnams la gsol ba 'debs/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/shes rab chen po bzhugs gyur na/_/srog chags bye ba mang po la/_/bsam gyis mi khyab don du 
[\[171b.4\]]'gyur/_/lha yi tshogs rnams 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/lha min rnams kyang 'grib par 'gyur/_/nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' yang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lnga brgya tham pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_
[\[171b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag ngu mos btab pas chog_/smre sngags bton pas chog gis mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/'dus byas thams cad kyi rang bzhin de yin/_mtha' de yin/_'gro ba de yin te/_'dus byas skyes 
[\[171b.6\]]pa la rtag pa nyid med de/_mtha' 'di lta bu yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag nyid kyis 'dus byas thams cad spangs pas na mnga' dbang mi mdzad cing /_yang mnga' bdag mdzad par nam yang mi dgongs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong bar 'gyur ba'am/_
[\[171b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas phyag brkyang ste 'od kyis snang bar mdzad par 'gyur ba'i 'od des 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/khyed cag 'di na 'dug na yang de bzhin gshegs pas zhal nye bar ston par 'gyur zhing dam pa'i chos bstan pa yang mngon par ston par 'gyur gyis mya ngan ma byed cig_/de nas 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag pas zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bo dang /_phyag g.yas pa'i mthe bo dang /_de bzhin du g.yon pa gnyis dang /_de bzhin du sku'i yan lag dang /_nying 
[\[172a.2\]]lag rnams dang /_de bzhin du zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis spras pa gnyis dang /_de bzhin du 'jam zhing dra bas 'brel la sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu'i phyag sor rnams dang /_phyag ris shin tu bkra ba'i phyag rin po che gnyis dang /_de bzhin du mtshan thams cad dang /_
[\[172a.3\]]de bzhin du sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_mdoms kyi gsang ba'i than kor dang /_de bzhin du zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_de bzhin du zhal gyi smin mtshams nas 'od zer bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum rab tu bkye ste/_'od zer re re'i thog ma la yang pad ma bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mngon par 
[\[172a.4\]]sprul to/_/pad ma re re'i snying po la yang seng ge'i khri bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mngon par sprul to/_/seng ge'i khri re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa re re sprul te/_sangs rgyas kyi skus chos ston cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa re res kyang sems can 
[\[172a.5\]]bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir btul to/_/kha cig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sar btul to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug nas 'od zer bye ba phrag 'bum rab tu bkye ste/_'od zer re re'i thog ma la yang pad ma bye ba phrag 'bum 
[\[172a.6\]]'bum mngon par sprul to/_/pad ma re re'i snying po la yang seng ge'i khri bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mngon par sprul to/_/seng ge'i khri re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa re re mngon par sprul te sangs rgyas kyi skus chos ston cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang byang 
[\[172a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang /_gzungs dang /_rdo rje'i tshig yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dag yang dag par rab tu ston pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan mi gsung ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]gshegs pa'i sprul pa re res chos bstan pa des kyang sems can dag pa dag las srog chags bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu bkod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung gi bar du 
[\[172b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku glo g.yas pas seng ge'i gzims khri la gzims pa zhig mngon par sprul pa mdzad nas sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi gnas su gshegs te rang rang gi sku las 'od rab tu bkye'o/_/de rab tu bkye ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi gnas 
[\[172b.3\]]thams cad snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi gnas thams cad snang bar mdzad nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sems can 'di dag yang dang yang /_/bsad cing bsad cing phyir 
[\[172b.4\]]yang 'tsho/_/'du shes de nyid bstan byed pas/_/des na sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/'jig rten 'dir ni byung gyur nas/_/gang gis sdug bsngal 'gag 'gyur ba/_/zad pa med cing len med la/_/'gag pa 
[\[172b.5\]]med cing zag med pa'i/_/dam pa'i chos ni ston par mdzad/_/gang dag chos 'di rab shes pa/_/de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas skad cig de dang thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la 
[\[172b.6\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi gnas nas srog chags dung phyur phrag gsum gyis chos 'di thos nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/_chos thob pa de dag gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/zad pa ma mchis len ma mchis/_/mi 'gag 
[\[172b.7\]]zag pa ma mchis pa'i/_/'phags pa'i chos 'di 'tshal gyur pas/_/bdag cag bsil gyur mya ngan 'das/_/mkhyen nas ji bzhin nyid brnyes shing /_/sems can rnams kyi dbang po mkhyen/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams ston mdzad cing /_/sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba/_/
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]zug rngu 'byin cing gsos mdzad la/_/sman stsol mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen/_/mya ngan 'da' ba ston mdzad pa'i/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag btul/_/mig dang sgron mar gyur pa 'di/_/shin tu myur bar 'das gyur na/_/su zhig srog 
[\[173a.2\]]chags bye ba rnams/_/yang sos gnod las thar mdzad 'gyur/_/zug rngu 'byin mdzad sman pa che/_/'byung po kun gyi gsos mdzad pa/_/de yis sems can gang gsos pa/_/de dag ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sems can dmyal 
[\[173a.3\]]ba chen po thig nag gi gnas kyi mthar bzhugs te 'od rgya chen po rab tu bkye'o/_/des sems can dmyal ba chen po'i gnas de snang bar gyur nas srog chags stong phrag mang po dag de nas bton te mtho ris la rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus 
[\[173a.4\]]gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dag nas kyang srog chags stong phrag mang po dag bton te mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam la rab tu bkod do/_/de nas skad cig de dang thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la srog chags bye ba 'bum 
[\[173a.5\]]phrag du ma dag sems can dmyal ba'i gnas dag nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu de dag gis sngon gyi chos yang dag par rjes su dran nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/de nas lha'i bu chos thob pa/_chos rtogs pa/_
[\[173a.6\]]chos kyi gting du zhugs pa de dag gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/ji ltar dgon pa'i shul zhig tu/_/ded dpon 'jigs pa ma mchis pas/_/chom rkun gdug pas gtses gyur pa'i/_/sems can mang po thar bgyid ltar/_/de bzhin 'khor ba'i 
[\[173a.7\]]btson ra las/_/ded dpon bla na ma mchis pa/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/_/sems can bye ba thar bar mdzad/_/thugs rje nye bar bskyed mdzad cing /_/bdag cag sdug bsngal thar mdzad pa'i/_/bla med ded dpon 'od mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi/_/
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]bdag cag lus kyis reg gyur pa'i/_/chos dang yon tan bsam yas pa'i/_/tshogs mchog 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la'ang /_/bdag cag skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od bsil zhing 'jam pas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med 
[\[173b.2\]]pa'i gnas kyi sems can dmyal ba'i yongs su gdung ba sim zhing bsil bar mdzad nas yan lag stong yongs su rdzogs pa/_sems can thams cad rab tu sim pa skyed pa/_'jam pa snyan par gsung pa/_phan pa dang bde bar mdzad pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[173b.3\]]smon pa med pa dang ldan pa'i gsung gis sems can dmyal ba pa de dag la bka' stsol cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang gis stong nyid mtshan med dang /_/skye med 'dus byas ma yin pa'i/_/chos rnams rab tu shes gyur pa/_/de dag 
[\[173b.4\]]ngan 'gro'i 'jigs las 'grol/_/de nas srog chags bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad kyis gsung de thos nas dus gsum la thogs pa med cing yan lag gi yon tan 'bum dang ldan pa'i sgra rna lam du grag pa thos nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i gnas nas shi 'phos te 
[\[173b.5\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gshegs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang la sdug bsngal mi rnyed pa'i/_/sems can rnams ni mchog tu bde/_/ming dang mtshan 
[\[173b.6\]]ma tha snyad dang /_/'du shes gang yin tshul bzhin min/_/brtan pas de dag rnam spangs na/_/des ni sdug bsngal dag las dgrol/_/gang dag gzugs med rten pa yi/_/'du shes kun kyang tshul bzhin min/_/yang dang yang du 'chi 'pho zhing /_/shi nas skye bar 
[\[173b.7\]]'gyur ba yi/_/sdug bsngal phyir zhing rab 'phel ba/_/khams gsum pa dag ci phyir bde/_/gang gis stong pa stong shes shing /_/stong pa de la'ang mi sems la/_/gang dag stong nyid mi mthong ba/_/de dag stong nyid shes pa yin/_/gang gis chos don de shes pa/_/
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]de la bdag ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/gang la bdag ni mi rnyed pa/_/de la sdug bsngal ga la 'byung /_/stong dang nye bar len med dang /_/mtshan ma rnyed pa ma yin zhing /_/bdag med chos ni ston byed pa/_/sangs rgyas thugs las skyes pa'i sras/_/de nas 
[\[174a.2\]]gang dag der skyes pa'i srog chags bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad po de dag gis zag pa zad pa thob cing lha'i drang srong du gyur nas/_de dag gi sems can dmyal ba'i gnas dag gi sems can dmyal ba'i gnas kyi sdug bsngal dag rjes su dran zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu 
[\[174a.3\]]yang rjes su dran nas byas pa gzo ba'i phyir bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mthong bar dang po kho nar bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/_/zhes de nas lha'i bu dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa 
[\[174a.4\]]de dag gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba gang zag mchog_/snang ba 'od mdzad rab tu gsal mdzad pa/_/mya ngan 'da' bar mdzad pa ji ltar blta/_/bdag cag sngar nyid mya ngan 'da' bar bgyi/_/de skad ces gsol nas de nyid du yongs 
[\[174a.5\]]su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das skad cig de dang thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/_gyad rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung gi bar du slar gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_
[\[174a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga ni do mod nam gyi thun tha ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_sems can rnams la bstan par bya ba'i tha ma ni 'di yin gyis/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po sems can rnams 
[\[174a.7\]]mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/_bde ba skyed par byed pa/_sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byed pa/_sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po la thogs pa med par 'jug par 'gyur ba/_sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa dag kun tu bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i glo g.yas pa btegs te/_seng ge bzhin du bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar phyogs bcu'i skye dgu de dag la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos sa chen po la bsnun to/_/bsnun pa dang 
[\[174b.2\]]de las sgra skad chen po byung zhing rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag 'od bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa med pas snang bar yang gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od zer 'di lta bu dag rab tu bkye ste/_'od zer rab tu bkye ba des spu'i 
[\[174b.3\]]khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag byung ngo /_/'od zer de dag re re las kyang 'od zer gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag byung ngo /_/'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bar byas te/_'od zer gcig dang 'od zer gnyis pa lhan cig 
[\[174b.4\]]mi 'grogs par 'gro zhing yang dang yang du spu'i khung bu so so nas 'od zer rab tu bkye bas 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed snang bar mdzad do/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon 
[\[174b.5\]]par 'du mdzad pas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan par gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bye brag kyang rtogs par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[174b.6\]]'od kyis gsal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis shar phyogs logs na kho ra khor yug gi khyon du dpag tshad 'bum yod pa'i grong khyer de ltar che ba/_de ltar yangs pa/_
[\[174b.7\]]de ltar ma tho ba/_de ltar rgya che ba zhig rdul phra rab kyi rdul brgya stong dag gis yongs su gang ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag mang ba yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gang gis zag med len med cing /_/'gag med zag pa med pa yi/_/chos de rab tu shes pa dag_/de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/de nas srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis 
[\[175a.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/_chos thob pa de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/zad pa ma mchis len ma mchis/_/mi 'gag zag pa ma mchis pa/_/'phags pa'i chos 'di 'tshal 
[\[175a.3\]]gyur pas/_/bdag cag bsil gyur mya ngan 'das/_/mkhyen nas ji bzhin nyid brnyes shing /_/sems can rnams kyi dbang po mkhyen/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams ston mdzad cing /_/sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba/_/zug rngu 'byin cing gsos mdzad la/_/
[\[175a.4\]]sman stsol mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen/_/mya ngan 'da' ba ston mdzad pa'i/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag btul/_/mig dang sgron mar gyur pa 'di/_/shin tu myur bar 'das gyur na/_/su zhig srog chags bye ba rnams/_/yang sos gnod las thar mdzad 'gyur/_/
[\[175a.5\]]zug rngu 'byin mdzad sman pa che/_/'byung po kun gyi gsos mdzad pa/_/de yis sems can gang gsos pa/_/de dag ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi gnas kyi mthar bzhugs te 'od rgya chen po rab tu bkye'o/_/
[\[175a.6\]]des sems can dmyal ba chen po'i gnas de snang bar gyur nas srog chags stong phrag mang po dag de nas bton te mtho ris la rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha 
[\[175a.7\]]ba dag nas kyang srog chags stong phrag mang po dag bton te mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'da' ba la rab tu bkod do/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad kyi gnas rnams su 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bur shin tu 'jam pa/_dga' bar gyur pa/_
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]yid du 'ong ba/_sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byed pa/_mig dga' bar byed pa/_snying dang mig rab tu sim pa skyed pa/_bsil ba/_byams pa dang /_snying rje las nges par byung ba/_lus bde ba skyed par byed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po'i gnas de dag gsal bar mdzad cing 
[\[175b.2\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag gi me'i gdung ba skyes pa'i gdung ba yang yongs su zhi bar mdzad nas/_sems can de dag la bde ba nye bar bsgrub pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas mthar gyis 'od de dag rab tu bkye'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od kyis sems can de 
[\[175b.3\]]dag gi lus mngon par brlan par mdzad cing lus dang sems 'jam zhing las su rung ba bskyed nas yon tan 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i gsung gis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nga ni 'jig rten bde stsol cing /_/nga ni sdug bsngal thar mdzad pa/_/nga ni lus ngal gyur pa rnams/_/
[\[175b.4\]]rab tu zhi ba ston mdzad pa'o/_/ngas bshad zhi ba bde ba dang /_/shin tu blta dka'i chos gang yin/_/gang dag chos de rab shes pa/_/de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs song ba'i/_/mi rnams de dag rnyed pa yod/_/de dag bskal pa stong rnams su/_/phyin 
[\[175b.5\]]chad sdug bsngal bsten mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa dag kyang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam 
[\[175b.6\]]de la seng ge'i gzims khri dag la glo g.yas pas phab ste gzims par gyur nas de dag kyang slar bzhengs te cho 'phrul de lta bu dag kun tu ston par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams 
[\[175b.7\]]cad 'di lta ste dper bgyi na da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du/_skad cig 'di dang /_thang cig 'di dang /_yud tsam 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la mngon par phyogs shing cho 'phrul de lta bu dag kun tu ston par mdzad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de de bzhin te/_
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang deng srid pa tha ma spangs te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa sha stag ste/_thams cad kyang gyad rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sA la zung 
[\[176a.2\]]gi bar sha stag tu seng ge'i gzims khri la sku'i glo g.yas pas phab ste bzhugs so/_/de dag thams cad kyang do mod nam gyi thun tha ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis shar phyogs 
[\[176a.3\]]na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mthong ngam/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams 
[\[176a.4\]]dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag mthong ngam/_de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/_bgrang ba'i 
[\[176a.5\]]tshul gyis mthong lags kyi don dam par ni ma mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_dper na gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis 
[\[176a.6\]]yongs su gang bar gyur na/_dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_/rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag tshad bzung ba'am/_bgrang ba'am/_dpe'am/_yongs su bgrang bar nus snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_
[\[176a.7\]]dper na gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de lta bu'i bye ba phrag 'bum rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongs su gang bar gyur na/_dge slong dag ngas sha'i spyan tha mal pas shar phyogs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gzigs te/_dper na gnya' shing gang 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]tsam na 'dug pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_sha'i mig ma nyams pa/_rgyang ring por mi lta ba'i rang gi yul bzhin no/_/lho phyogs su yang de bzhin/_nub phyogs su yang de bzhin/_byang phyogs su yang de bzhin/_phyogs mtshams rnams su yang de bzhin/_'og gi phyogs su yang de bzhin/_steng gi 
[\[176b.2\]]phyogs su de bzhin no/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di lta ste/_dper na gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i rdul phra rab 
[\[176b.3\]]kyi rdul de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag shar phyogs na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa dang /_bzhugs par gyur pa dag kyang gzigs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa sha stag yin no/_/de bzhin du mar me 
[\[176b.4\]]mdzad ces bya bar mtshan 'thun pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_de bzhin du thams cad zil gyis gnon ru ces bya bar mtshan 'thun pa dang /_de bzhin du pad ma dam pa zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa dang /_de bzhin du mngon par 'phags par gshegs pa zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[176b.5\]]du grags mchog ces bya bar mtshan 'thun pa dang /_de bzhin du 'khor ba 'jig ces bya bar mtshan 'thun pa dang /_de bzhin du gser thub ces bya bar mtshan 'thun pa dang /_de bzhin du 'od srung zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa sha stag la yang de snyed gzigs so/_/de bzhin du mtshan gzhan dang /_
[\[176b.6\]]gzhan du gsol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang gzigs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan de dag kyang 'jig rten na chos rgya chen po dang /_chos sna tshogs dang /_chos mchog dang ldan pa'i las can dag yin te/_de ltar mtshan tha dad par gsol ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[176b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag kyang gzigs so/_/mtshan de lta bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang /_bzhugs pa dag dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang gzigs te/_nga'i sha'i spyan tha mal pa bsgribs pa med pa/_
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]thogs pa med pa chags pa med pa'i yul du snang ba ni de dag yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen pa gang yin pa ni de bas kyang lhag pa dang /_lhag pa bas kyang lhag pa dang /_bsam gyis mi 
[\[177a.2\]]khyab pa dang /_ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gong ma dang /_ches gong ma dang /_tshad med pa dang /_ches tshad med pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/sha'i spyan tha mal pas kyang de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa dang /_de ltar gzhal du med pa dang /_de 
[\[177a.3\]]ltar bgrang du med pa dang /_de ltar grangs med pa yin na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_dper na khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[177a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob par gyur pa de dag la bskal pa yongs su rdzogs par bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas/_rjed par byas/_gsol bar byas te/_mchod pa sna 
[\[177a.5\]]tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis mchod pa byas pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byed pa yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam skyed cing the tsom med pa'i blos yang dag pa'i 'du shes 
[\[177a.6\]]bskyed par gyur na/_sems bskyed ma thag tu de bas ches bsod nams mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mang po dag dang yang nye bar 'gyur gyi/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur pa la bskal par bsnyen bkur byas pas 
[\[177a.7\]]ni de lta ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig ye shes 'di la mos par byed pa de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur zhing /_de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/sha'i spyan bshad pa lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka' ba yin gyis/_bdag cag gis 'di nyid la sdug bsngal zad pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i mtha' 
[\[177b.2\]]ma dang /_zag pa zad pa thob par bya'o snyam nas yang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/sems can dpag tu med pa rnams ni slob pa'i sa la bkod par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu ni sems dang po bskyed pas yongs su grub par gyur to/_/byang 
[\[177b.3\]]chub sems dpa' bye ba 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te/_mchi mas brnangs shing ngu bzhin byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[177b.4\]]ldan 'das bdag sems can rnams bdag gi yul las yang dag par 'da' bar ma gyur cig snyam nas/_gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal ba de nyid bcom ldan 'das nyams pa mi mnga' 
[\[177b.5\]]bas sku tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar skya rengs ma shar cing gdugs ma bdal bar yang sems can tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi don gyi slad du 'di lta ste/_mya ngan las 'da' ba la rab tu bkod lags pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi yul stongs 
[\[177b.6\]]par mdzad lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi brtson pa dang /_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la dad par mi byed pa de dag khyod kyi 
[\[177b.7\]]grogs yin la/_khyod kyang de dag gi grogs yin pas sdig can khyod kyi grogs mang du yod kyis/_sdig can ngu bar ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag gis sen mo'i rtse mos sa gzhi chen po las sa'i rdul zhig blangs nas bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]sdig can 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sen mo'i rtse mo la rten pa dang sa gzhi chen po la rten pa'i rdul gang yin pa de gnyis gang mang snyam sems/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[178a.2\]]'das bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi sen mo'i rtse mo la mchis pa'i dog sa'i rdul ni nyung gi sa gzhi chen po la mchis pa ni shin tu mang lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can 'di lta ste dper na nga'i sen mo'i 
[\[178a.3\]]rtse mo la 'dug pa'i rdul bas kyang ches nyung ba'i sems can dag ngas nyon mongs pa zad par byas te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa la so sor bkod kyi/_sdig can 'di lta ste dper na sa gzhi chen po la rten pa'i rdul bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni khyod kyi yul du song bas na sems 
[\[178a.4\]]can gyi khams dpag tu med par yod kyis sdig can khyod dga' bar gyis shig_/sdig can de lta mod kyi sems can rnams ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid ji ltar ring bar 'gyur ba de ltar byed pas na de rnams la khyod kyis kyang ci zhig byar yod/_sdig can de ltar na sems can gyi khams dpag tu 
[\[178a.5\]]med par yod kyis de dag la bya ba gang yod pa de gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni do mod nam gyi thun tha ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong ngam/_
[\[178a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_/de bas kyang shin tu tshad med pa dag yod par blta'o/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa dag mthong ngam/_byang chub sems 
[\[178a.7\]]dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i bkod pa dang /_nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa dag mthong ngam/_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]pas ni de bas kyang phyir zhing lhag pa dang /_shin tu tshad med pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen te/_dge slong dag ngas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu dag mthong ba ni ngas bskal 
[\[178b.2\]]pa'am/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa 'bum 'am/_bskal pa bye ba'am/_bskal pa khrag khrig gam/_de bas kyang lhag pa de snyed du dpes rab tu phye ste rgya cher yang dag par rab tu brjod kyang mthar thug par 'gyur ba med do/_/dge slong dag 
[\[178b.3\]]ngas khyed cag nyan thos rnams la ston pa'i bya ba gang yin pa de yang byas te ngas chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud ma byas par phyi nang med par rnam pa thams cad du thams cad bstan zin te/_de las lhag par thob par bya ba ni tha na rtswa'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang med kyis da khyed cag gis nan 
[\[178b.4\]]tan la gnas par bya'o/_/ngas khyed cag la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos kyang bstan/_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam yang bstan/_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu dka' bdag kyang yang dag par bskyed/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 
[\[178b.5\]]yang dag par bsgrubs zin gyis de bzhin du thams cad rjes su yongs su zung la ci nas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/_de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon 
[\[178b.6\]]par 'du mdzad pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu chos bstan pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis thos par gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang dag bstan pa'i chos de dag ston cing 
[\[178b.7\]]chos de dag kun tu shes par gyur pa'i sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod par gyur to/_/bye ba 'bum phrag bcu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod par gyur to/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu ni rang byang chub la rab tu bkod par 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]gyur to/_/sems can de bas lhag pa rnams ni zag pa zad pa la gnas par gyur to/_/de ltar chos bstan pa 'dis sems can khrag khrig phrag tshad med dpag tu med/_bgrang du med/_gzhal du med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyi don byas par gyur to/_/
[\[179a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' yis khyed kyis ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa kun tu bsrung ba la nan tan gyis shig_/dge slong dag khyed kyis bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa'i phyir 
[\[179a.3\]]de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags 
[\[179a.4\]]pa khye'u bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pra dz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[179a.5\]{D137}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sa mA d+hi a gra ut+ta ma/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa/_bam po gcig go/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun sum khri dang /_
[\[179a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po lnga stong tsam dang /_lha dang klu la sogs pa sde brgyad dang /_lha dang mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de ma yin pa gzhan yang phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sogs pa sde bzhi yang 
[\[179a.7\]]'khor der 'dus par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas cang mi gsung zhing bzhugs pa las 'khor mang po rnams the tsom du gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu chos kyi rgyal bu 'dug pa las langs te/_sangs rgyas la lan gsum 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/shin tu legs so chos kyi rje/_/ting nge 'dzin la zhi bar bzhugs/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po rnams/_/thams cad the tsom skyes par gyur/_/shin tu legs so nyi zla'i 'od/_/cang mi gsung bar 
[\[179b.2\]]snang mi mdzad/_/shin tu legs so rin chen gter/_/dbul phongs rnams la sbyin mi mdzad/_/shin tu legs so mi yi rgyal/_/ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs su gsol/_/shin tu legs so klu yi rgyal/_/bdud rtsi'i char pa dbab tu gsol/_/shin tu legs so lha yi mchog_/
[\[179b.3\]]myur du chos rnams bstan du gsol/_/shin tu legs so sems can la/_/theg pa gcig don bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga la rin po che bla na med pa'i ye shes mang du yod pa khyod 
[\[179b.4\]]la phan pa dang bde bar mdzad cing dbul phongs pa dang bral bar bya ba yod kyis the tsom ma byed par ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig_/de nas dga' bo stan las langs te sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni mang du thos pas bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob 
[\[179b.5\]]snyam na mdo sde dag las bshad pa thos pa ltar na mang du thos shing shes rab rno ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa ni byang chub thob pa shin tu dka' ste bgegs brgyad du zhes 'byung na/_bdag gis ji ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' 
[\[179b.6\]]stsal pa/_dga' bo mang du thos pa la sems rnam pa gnyis te/_gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang /_'khrul pa'i sems so/_/sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na ni mang du thos pas kyang gnod pa med do/_/sems 'khrul pa la gnas na ni mang du thos pas 
[\[179b.7\]]kyang phan pa med de/_gang gis ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang shin tu ldan na myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mdo kun las ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab ni mchog dam pa'o zhes bstod/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab tu ldan pa ni dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nang na seng ge mchog tu gyur pa dang /_snang ba thams cad kyi nang na nyi ma mchog tu gyur pa dang /_ri'i nang na ri rab lhun po mchog tu gyur pa lta bu'o/_/de yang 
[\[180a.2\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab tu ldan pa'i shugs ni mchog dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo gal te mi zhig gis shing tsan dan las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug 
[\[180a.3\]]lag khang brtsigs pa dang /_mi gzhan zhig gis rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na/_mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam/_dga' bos gsol pa/_mi de gnyis kyi nang na rin po che 
[\[180a.4\]]sna bdun las bgyis pa'i bsod nams mchog go/_/sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gzhan yang mi zhig gis gser tha mal pa las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas pa dang /_mi gzhan zhig gis gser btso ma las 
[\[180a.5\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na/_de gnyis kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam/_dga' bos gsol pa/_gser btso ma las bgyis pa'i bsod nams rab tu che'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gal 
[\[180a.6\]]te mi zhig gis shing tsan dan dang /_spos kyi shing gzhan dag las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i sku gzugs byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mi gzhan zhig gis gser btso ma dang /_rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[180a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i sku gzugs byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal na mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams la khyad par yod dam/_dga' bos gsol pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang /_gser btso ma las sku gzugs bgyis pa'i bsod nams che'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gal te 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]mi zhig gis sbyin pa chen po'i sems bskyed de/_rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod dang /_chung ma dang /_bu sbyin pa byin pa dang /_mi gzhan zhig gis yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /_mig dang /_lus dang /_rnyed dka' ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod kyi sbyin pa byin na mi de gnyis 
[\[180b.2\]]kyi bsod nams la khyad par ci yod/_dga' bos gsol pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang /_lus dang /_chung ma dang /_bur bcas pa'i sbyin pa'i bsod nams che ba lags so/_/sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis stong 
[\[180b.3\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i mi rnams la 'jig rten du spel te klog cing kha ton byed du 'jug pa dang /_de la mi zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i mi rnams yi ge bzhin du 'don cing yi ge yang don ston cing khong du chud na mi 
[\[180b.4\]]de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che/_dga' bos gsol pa/_yi ge bzhin du 'don cing khong du chud pa'i bsod nams che'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang thogs pa med par kha ton du shes la don zab mo mi shes 
[\[180b.5\]]par mdo sde glegs bam yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam 'chang ba dang /_de la mi zhig mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang byang bar kha ton shes la don zab mo yang rtogs te/_mdo sde'i glegs bam yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang 
[\[180b.6\]]ba tsam 'chang na mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang mchog tu gyur pa yin/_dga' bos gsol pa/_kha ton bgyis la don yang rtogs te/_gzhan la yang ston cing 'chad pa'i bsod nams mchog tu gyur pa lags so/_/sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gal te mi 
[\[180b.7\]]zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis 'grel cing 'chad la/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms mi spyod pa dang /_gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad la/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyang rgya cher spyod/_sems can rnams la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sems snyoms na/_mi de gnyis bsod nams gang che ba yin/_dga' bos gsol pa/_byams 
[\[181a.2\]]pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa spyod cing sems can la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams che zhing mang ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes 
[\[181a.3\]]la bstan bcos 'u ta [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yang byang bar 'chad shes te 'jig rten du spel ba dang /_de la mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes la/_bkri ba'i bstan bcos dang /_nges pa'i bstan bcos dang /_phung po lnga'i bstan bcos dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi bstan 
[\[181a.4\]]bcos dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bstan bcos dang /_stong pa chen po'i bstan bcos dang /_nyi zla'i bstan bcos dang /_nyi zla sprin gyi bstan bcos dang /_mdo sde rgyan gyi bstan bcos dang /_don dam pa nyid kyi bstan bcos dang /_rdo rje snying po'i bstan bcos dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[181a.5\]]mkhyen pa'i bstan bcos dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi bstan bcos la sogs pa bstan bcos 'u ta [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yang shes la sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyang spyod de/_tshul khrims 
[\[181a.6\]]'chal pa dang /_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_sems gnyis su med cing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang /_sems can gyi skyon thams cad mi mthong zhing sems can rnams la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar snyoms te/_dgra sdang ba la yang nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang /_de la mi 
[\[181a.7\]]zhig gis phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur pa mi 'debs na mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che ba yin/_dga' bos gsol pa/_phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur pa ma btab na mi de'i bsod nams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis te/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gzhan yang mi zhig gi gong du smos pa'i bsod nams thams cad kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang bar byed nus la mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_bstan bcos 'u ta [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga snyed kyang 
[\[181b.2\]]kha ton dang 'brel cing 'chad nus te/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_byams pa la sogs pa yang spyod/_sbyin pa yang byed de/_mang du thos pa'i mchog tu yang gyur la chos thams cad stong zhing zhi ba'i don yang ston te/_nyan pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 
[\[181b.3\]]byed de/_de ltar phan pa dang bde ba'i don byas kyang des ni mi zhig nyin gcig gam/_mtshan gcig ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa tsam du mi phod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mang du thos pa'i gang zag ni ri'am rgya mtsho ltar nga rgyal gyi sems che'o/_/de ltar nga rgyal che ba ni ngan song du 
[\[181b.4\]]bskal pa grangs med kyi bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba de las thar na yang 'dab chags kyi byar skye bar 'gyur na mang du thos pa la phan pa ci yod/_gang la bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yod pa ni skye shi'i 'khor ba'i sdig kha na ma tho ba'i las lci ba byang bar nus so/_/mang 
[\[181b.5\]]du thos pa ni rtswa dang 'dra'o/_/ting nge 'dzin ni me dang 'dra'o/_/mang du thos pa ni lcags dang 'dra'o/_/bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni gser dang 'dra'o/_/mang du thos pa ni rtsi bdug pa dang 'dra'o/_/bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni rtsi'i sdong po dang 'dra'o/_/mang du thos pa ni gtsang po dang 
[\[181b.6\]]'dra'o/_/bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/_ngas bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bsod nams dang /_yon tan bshad na zad pa'i mtha' med de bskal par yang mi rdzogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_nga mngon sum du dran pa sngon 'das pa'i 
[\[181b.7\]]dus na nga mang du thos pa'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe 'jam dpal dang nga gnyis yod med gnyis la rtsod par gyur te/_'jam dpal ni yod ces smra/_ngas ni med do zhes smras te/_yod med gnyis kyi bden pa la rtsod par gyur te gcig tu ma chad do/_/mtha' ma tshe 'phos nas ngan song du skyes par 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]gyur te/_bskal pa grangs med kyi bar du lcags kyi thu lum za bar gyur to/_/dmyal ba de las thar te sangs rgyas 'od srung dang phrad nas yod pa dang med pa'i bden pa gnyis 'od srung gis 'di skad du bshad do/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni 
[\[182a.2\]]gcig tu nges shing chad pa med de/_khyed yod pa dang med par smra ba ni don de lta bu ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste/_bden pa 'di gnyis ni yod pa yang ma yin la/_med pa yang ma yin te/_khyed shes pa ni 
[\[182a.3\]]yi ge'i don shes par zad kyi don zab mo mi shes pas don 'di lta bu ni khyed dmus long ngam 'on pa lta bu yin na/_don zab mo 'di lta bu ji ltar shes shing rtogs par gyur zhes bshad pa thos nas ri dben par song ste/_bdag nyid yid la byas nas bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[182a.4\]]zhugs so/_/zhag bdun lon pa dang bsam gtan zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum dang /_ye shes rnam gsum dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di dag rtogs shing khong du chud par 
[\[182a.5\]]gyur te/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ci yang med par rtogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na bsam gtan bsgom pa ni mchog dam par rig par bya ste/_gang zhig nyin gcig gam/_mtshan gcig 
[\[182a.6\]]gam/_nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba yang khad kyis zhi zhing byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba yang 'byang bar 'gyur te/_de yang gang zhe na/_pha 
[\[182a.7\]]ma bsad pa dang /_dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang bshig pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas khang mes btang ba yin te/_phas pham pa bzhi dang /_phas pham pa brgyad dang /_lci ba lnga dang /_rang bzhin gyi lci ba drug nyams pa yin/_
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde la skur pa btab pa yin/_pha rol po'i nyes pa'i skyon smra zhing bkur sti mi byed pa yin/_gang du skyes par nga rgyal che ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis sdig lci ba yang yin te/_de yang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na rang zhi zhing 'byang bar 'gyur/_de 
[\[182b.2\]]yang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'byang gi gzhan gyis 'byang ba ma yin no/_/nyin zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan dang bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob na tshe gcig tu dben sar ri dang shing drung du 'dug ste/_rtog pa bsal ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_spong ba 
[\[182b.3\]]yid la byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems ni 'bab chu dang 'dra ste skad cig kyang mi sdod/_sems ni spre'u dang mtshungs te gcig btang yang gcig la 'dzin to/_/mdor na sems ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mi g.yo'o/_/gal te sems g.yo na chos thams cad 
[\[182b.4\]]la 'khrul pa'i 'du shes skye'o/_/gal te ting nge 'dzin la gnas na ni 'jig rten na skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang 'gog pa'i 'du shes shing rtogs te/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba/_mi rtag par 'gyur zhing 'pho ba/_stong zhing bdag med pa/_sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/_sprul pa lta bu/_glog 
[\[182b.5\]]dang /_rlung dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu/_chu'i dbu ba dang /_smig rgyu dang /_brag ca dang /_bar snang gi bya'i rjes lta bur rtogs so/_/'jig rten na srid pa ri dang /_tshal dang /_gtsang po dang /_'bab chu dang /_mtshe'u dang /_lteng ka dang /_rgya mtsho la sogs pa chu thams cad kyang me'i bskal pa chen 
[\[182b.6\]]po byung ba'i tshe/_thams cad tshig cing zad par 'gyur yang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi ma gtogs te/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du shes na bsam gtan gyi mthu ni shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/_/sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na 
[\[182b.7\]]phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_skar ma dang /_'bab chu dang /_gtsang po dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_ri dang /_tshal dang /_klung dang /_lung pa skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas na rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang phyin cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rlung dang /_me dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_
[\[183a.2\]]skar ma dang /_gza' dang /_ri dang /_tshal dang /_chu dang /_shing dang /_lha'i pho brang dang /_klu'i pho brang yang rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul nus te/_de bas na bsam gtan gyi mthu ni shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[183a.3\]]shugs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang sprul nus so/_/dga' bo maud gal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul cing ting nge 'dzin gyis sa chen po 'di yang mgal me bskor ba bzhin du bskyod 
[\[183a.4\]]nus te/_mang du thos pas ni de ltar mi nus par rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la khyod sa chen po sgul cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dga' bos gsol pa/_bdag la bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pas sgul rngo mi thogs so/_/bcom
