[\[183a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dge sbyong gis 'bras bu bzhi ma thob kyang mang du thos pa las khri phrag brgya stong gis 'phags so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i dge slong lnga brgya tsam zhig thams cad 
[\[183a.6\]]mang du thos pa rlom pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la maud gal gyi bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_ting nge 'dzin mchog go zhes gsungs pa thos nas sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad 
[\[183a.7\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mang du thos pa bslabs te/_mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang khong du chud pas rgyal khams chen po bcu drug snyed kyang bdag cag la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar gus shing bkur sti bgyi na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa ni nam yang 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la dge slong lnga brgya po 'thun par dus gcig tu bdag cag ni mang du thos pa spang zhing bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la slob po zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[183b.2\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyed mang du thos pa spangs te/_bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug go zhes ma smra shig_/ngas bltas na khyed kyi shes rab ni sbrang bu'i 'dab mas nyi zla sgrib par 'dod pa dang /_dmus long gis ri rab lhun po la 'dzeg par 'dod pa 
[\[183b.3\]]dang /_gru gzings med par rgya mtsho la rgal bar 'dod pa dang /_bya 'dab ma chag pa nam mkha' la 'phur 'dod pa bzhin khyed kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams shi ba tsam du 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[183b.4\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod ma 'jigs ma skrag par sems ting nge 'dzin la zhog shig_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_bdag cag la bsam gtan gyi mthu yang ma mchis na/_ting nge 'dzin du ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga la sman dam pa 
[\[183b.5\]]yod de khyod ting nge 'dzin thob par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/_bdag cag gis de bzhin du spyod par 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman dam pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_rtog pa dang /_bsal 
[\[183b.6\]]ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_spong ba'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_rtog pa dang /_bsal ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_spong ba ci lags/_bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas kyis yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dang 
[\[183b.7\]]po'i sems ni rtog pa zhes bya/_sems gnyis byung ba ni bsal ba zhes bya/_sems gsum byung ba ni 'jug pa zhes bya/_sems bzhi byung ba ni spong ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_bsam gtan dang po la rtog pa zhes bya/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la bsal ba zhes bya/_bsam 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]gtan gsum pa la 'jug pa zhes bya/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la spong ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_
[\[184a.2\]]tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_de bzhin du mngon par shes pa bzhi dang /_chos thams cad ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_bden pa bzhi dang /_ting nge 'dzin bzhi dang /_mtshan ma med pa bzhi dang /_byang chub bzhi yin 
[\[184a.3\]]na/_dge slong khyed bsam gtan dang po yang gsal bar ma rtogs na bsam gtan bzhi dang /_chos thams cad lta ci smos/_dge slong dag thabs sna tshogs kyis bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/_/gal te mi gtsang ba la rtog na lus kyi chen po bzhi pags pa 
[\[184a.4\]]dang /_rus pa dang /_tshigs pa dang /_rnag khrag zags pa dang /_snod bu ga dgu yod pa'i nang du chu blugs na zags pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba'i dngos po bshang gci che chung dang /_btsog pa shin tu skyor rung ba zags pa mthong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin de las kyang dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[184a.5\]]mthong ba ni 'di ltar g.yo ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_rnam par sdos pa dang /_rnam par ser ba dang /_rnam par dkar ba dang /_rnam par gnag pa tha dad pa sna tshogs mthong bas/_sems ma 'khrul bar gyur na dngos po de dag mthong ba'i tshe phyir bzlog par 
[\[184a.6\]]bya'o/_/rus pa dkar po dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bgrang ba'i rtog pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi nyams pa dang /_dge slong mas rtsa ba brgyad nyams pa dang /_dge bsnyen mas khrims kyi rtsa ba lnga nyams pa dang /_dge tshul gyis khrims bcu 
[\[184a.7\]]nyams pa dang /_dge slob mas lci ba drug nyams pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi spyi'i dkor brkus pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_pha ma dang /_dge 'dun gyi dkor brkus pa dang /_phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde la skur pa'i gang zag de lta bu ni 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i tshe bdag gis lus dang /_ngag rlung nag po lta bu dang /_khrag ni me rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra ba dang /_rus pa ni ri dang brag lta bu dang /_rtsa ni shing lta bu dang /_nang grol lnga ni sbrul lam rtsangs pa lta bur mthong ba dang /_lag na me chen 
[\[184b.2\]]po thogs te rlung chen po la rgyug pa dang /_mgo la ri chen po khyer zhing langs kyang rdab 'chos pa dang /_kha nas seng ge 'byung ba dang /_mig nas 'bar ba mo 'byung ba dang /_sna nas sbrul chen po 'byung ba dang /_rna ba nas 'phar spyang 'byung ba dang /_bshang gci che chung chu lta bur 'bab 
[\[184b.3\]]cing rgya mtsho lta bur mthong ba dang /_gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad cho 'phrul rnam pa mang po ston pa mthong na mtshan ma de lta bu mthong ba'i tshe bsam gtan las langs te/_tshal lam ri dgon par song ste/_phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'don cing 'gyod tshangs bya'o/_/
[\[184b.4\]]de ltar sngon gyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig 'gyod tshangs bya ba yang zhag bdun nam/_bdun gnyis sam/_bdun gsum mam/_bdun bzhi'am/_bdun lnga'am/_bdun drug gam/_bdun bdun gyi bar du 'thol tshangs bya'o/_/de ltar sdig sbyangs nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya 
[\[184b.5\]]ste/_de la sdig chung ba ni bags kyis bdag gi lus bai dUr+ya'i ri lta bur mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang rtsa ba bzhi ma nyams pa nas/_rang bzhin gyi khrims lci ba lnga'i bar du ma nyams pa yin na ting nge 'dzin du 'jug pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dus gcig tu chos ston pa dang /_de yang 
[\[184b.6\]]bden pa bzhi'am/_yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bzod pa'am/_spyi bo dang /_'jig rten chos kyi mchog gi chos ston pa dang yang na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_skyes bu ya brgyad kyi 
[\[184b.7\]]chos dang /_stong pa nyid bzhi dang /_ting nge 'dzin gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad ston par mthong ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin las mun nag mthong ba dang /_snang ba mthong na ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag phyir gnas 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]pa'i tshal du dong ste/_bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin nyin zhag bdun bsgoms pas thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa thob par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags te/_sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[185a.2\]]cag ni sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bzhin 'khor ba las thar te bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar thob na cho 'phrul bstan pa'i dus la bab bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong lnga brgya rnams steng gi bar snang la 'phags 
[\[185a.3\]]te/_nyal ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_sdod pa dang /_lus la me dang /_chu la sogs pa 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon par bstan te/_de'i tshe mang du thos pa'i dge slong rnams bsam gtan bsgoms pas maud gal gyi bu chen po dang 'dra bar 
[\[185a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad par gyur to/_/de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos 'di de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas ji srid du gnas shing dus ngan pa'i tshe sems can ji snyed cig chos 'di bsgoms pas/_dge sbyong 
[\[185a.5\]]gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_deng phyin chad dpyid zla 'bring po la rtsa mchog gi grong khyer du mya ngan las 'da'o/_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgyad cu'i bar du chos la spyod pa'i sems can mang du 'byung ste/_dur khrod dang shing 
[\[185a.6\]]drung na gnas shing 'di yid la byed de/_rtog pa dang /_bsal ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_spong ba'i chos spyod pa stong phrag bcu la stong phrag dgus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/_/lo sum brgya'i bar du ni sems can stong stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 
[\[185a.7\]]'bras bu bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lo sum brgya phan chad/_lo lnga brgya tshun chad ni nga'i nye gnas rnams bags kyis mi dge ba'i chos spyod do/_/phrag dog gi sems kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag lnga brgya la stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu thob po/_/
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]lo lnga brgya phan chad brgyad brgya tshun chad nga'i nye gnas rnams khyim pa'i gos gyon nas ba lang dang /_lug dang /_byi la dang /_bong bu dang /_rta gso zhing 'bru mang po bsog ste/_rang gis lag dar zhing rang za ba dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo yang gso bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe stong phrag stong 
[\[185b.2\]]la stong phrag gcig gis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/_/lo brgyad brgya phan chad nas lo stong tshun chad ni nga'i nye gnas rnams sdig pa'i chos bslab ste/_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po chen po dang /_khyim bdag la grogs por bsten cing phan tshun tha na phrin gyis 
[\[185b.3\]]'drul zhing /_zhing rmo brko byed de/_'bru gzan mang po dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che sna bdun sog cing sha za zhing chang 'thung ste/_chen po bzhi gso zhing rtas par byed pa dang /_smad 'tshong ma ltar gos sbu gu gyon zhing 'drid pa dang /_slu ba'i las byed de/_de la 'bum 
[\[185b.4\]]phrag khri la brgya tsam zhig gis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob bo/_/lo stong phan chad sum brgya tshun chad ni che thang du 'khrugs te/_nga'i nye gnas rnams lus chos gos gyon yang shing gi kha la 'phan rnying btags pa 'dra ste/_gzi byin yang med/_khyim pas mthong na yang bkur sti dang 
[\[185b.5\]]mi byed pas shan pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i dus na yul khams kyang 'khrugs te/_gcig la gcig dgra byed cing gsod pas rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_pha ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo yang gcig la gcig dgra byed de/_byams pa dang snying brtse ba'i sems kyang med pas 
[\[185b.6\]]bza' ba dang btung bas nyon mongs te/_khyim thab med pa dang /_chung ma med pa dang /_bu pho med pa dang /_bu mo med pa dang /_long ba dang /_'on pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo las bros pa yul khams phung bar byed pa/_'tsho bas rang mi sos pa dag nga'i chos la zhugs nas khyim pa rnams 
[\[185b.7\]]kyis kyang rngon pa dang 'dra bar lta ste/_dper na lha'i glang dang /_rta rgod dam/_bal glang myos pa ltar gdul dka' ba/_rang dgar yang 'gro ba/_slob dpon dang /_slob ma yang mi rgod ma rungs pa dang 'dra ste/_'dod chags la bag med par spyod cing bla ma dang 'og ma'i rim pa yang med pa dang /_bzang 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]ngan gyi rim pa yang med de/_dud 'gro phyugs dang 'dra ba/_kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa mang po byed cing ngan song gsum gyis mi 'jigs par gar song bar gnas kyang chang 'tshong ba dang /_shan pa dang /_rngon pa dang /_smad 'tshong ma dang /_sten cing 'grogs pa/_kha nas kyang dag 
[\[186a.2\]]sdig pa smra zhing sems la yang sdig pa sems pa dang /_yang na blon po dang sten cing dge ba'i mi dag la thabs sna tshogs kyis bsdigs shing nor phrogs te bu smad gso'o/_/yang na rngon pa'i yo byad nya rgya la sogs pa 'chang zhing nya la sogs pa bcus nas rang gi lag bdar te gsod pa dang /_
[\[186a.3\]]sreg pa dang /_zla ba nya ba dang /_shi ba'i tshe gso sbyong mi byed de rang nyams su gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi las byed pa rnams phan tshun rtsod cing bla ma dang /_'og ma dang /_grogs po la zhe sdang ba dang /_gdug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_slob dpon dang /_slob ma yang gcig la gcig 
[\[186a.4\]]skyon 'dru zhing /_'phya ba dang sgrogs pa'i gtam smra ste/_dper na rtsangs pa mang po kun gcig tu 'dus pa dang 'dra ba dang /_phan tshun dpung dang /_sde tshan gcig la gcig tshig ngan gyis sma 'bebs pa dang /_bla 'og gi rim pa yang med pa dang /_mi rgod ma rungs pa ltar dge ba byed pa las 
[\[186a.5\]]'phrog rlom byed pa dang /_khe dang grags pa la chags te/_chos mi shes par gyur pa de'i tshe/_mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang nub par gyur te/_klog pa dang /_'don pa yang med pa dang /_nga'i slob ma rnams kyang dgra chos dang /_gtsug lag dang /_yi ge dang /_rtse ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_bon chos dang /_
[\[186a.6\]]mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_glu gar dang /_'du ba dang /_spyugs pa dang /_'phong rtsal dang /_rta rgyug pa la sogs pa'i chos ma yin pa slob cing spyod de/_de ltar ma legs pa'i chos spyod pas/_tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song du lhung ste/_bskal pa grangs med par ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong nas de las thar nas 
[\[186a.7\]]yang byol song du skye ste/_ltogs pa dang /_skom pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang /_khal lci ba 'gel zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi zhig na sbyangs pa'i yon tan slob pa yang chos ma yin pa mang du byed de/_ri dang /_tshal dang /_dur khrod dang /_shing drung na mi gnas shing rtag tu grong du rgyug ste/_
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]sems la rtog pa mang zhing khe dang grags pa tshol te/_nor rdzas dang /_longs spyod la chags shing /_chog mi shes pa dang /_chos ston pa'i bshad mkhan zhig yin na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yang khri tsam la gcig tsam yang thog tu mi phebs te/_'khor mang po dang 'grogs nas grong rgyu 
[\[186b.2\]]zhing khyim pa'i khyim du zhugs nas khyim pa la chos ston pa yang khe dang grags pa'i phyir te/_longs spyod mang du sogs shing shan pa dang 'dra'o/_/sha dang chang la mi spyod pa dag gis dge slong dag khyed ni btsun pa khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yin na/_snying rje'i sems kyang med de/_'di 
[\[186b.3\]]ltar chos ma yin pa mang du spyod pas khyed ni shan pa dang 'dra'o zhes spyo zhing brgyad par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong de dag de skad ces gshe ba thos nas kun log ste/_de la rdeg pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_brgyad bkag ste/_gcig la gcig 'di skad du smra'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i tshe 
[\[186b.4\]]na ni nged sha dang chang 'thung ba ma gnang ste/_da nged de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas da ni ci yang gnang bas nged sha dang chang 'thung ba yin no/_/khyim pa dang bral ba'i 'og tu de dag gcig la gcig bdag cag gis shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas gsungs pa dang 'dra'o zhes smra zhing la 
[\[186b.5\]]la ni tshig kyal pa dang /_don med pa'i tshig dang /_'gran dor gyi tshig dang /_'khrul pa'i tshig tu gtam smra zhing dper na/_dmus long zhig mdzub mo gnyis nyi ma la btsugs te/_nyi ma ya gi ni byin chung ngo /_/yangs so/_/dog go zhes smra ba'am/_mi 'on pa zhig bdag gis gnam gyi steng na 
[\[186b.6\]]chos 'chad pa'i sgra thos so zhes zer ba dang 'dra bar dmus long mang po tshogs te/_'jig rten na 'jam dpal dang 'od srung chen po la sogs pa sprul te/_de'i nang na bzhugs kyang kun gyis rdeg cing gshe ste/_de nas skrod cing 'dug tu mi ster ro/_/gzhan yang dper na seng ge ni spos kyi ri la gnas te/_
[\[186b.7\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_gcan gzan gang yang gnas der nyer mi bzod do/_/seng ge ri de las byung ste song ba'i 'og tu ni gcan gzan gdug pa khro bo la sogs pa gcig gis gcig bos te/_spos kyi ri la lhags nas 'bras bu zhim po za zhing chu mig la 'thung ngo /_/de ltar za zhing 'thung ba las thams cad skams 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]shing med par gyur te/_spos kyi ri la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang skyob par mi 'gyur bas rtswa gdug pa skyes te zos ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur ro/_/nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad kyis ngas bstan pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis 'don cing klog pa 
[\[187a.2\]]yang gong ma ni bar du bcug_/bar ma ni 'og tu bcug_/'og ma ni gong du bcug_/bar ma ni 'og dang /_tha mar bcug ste/_don ma yin pa la don zhes zer/_don la ni don ma yin zhes zer te/_ji ltar mu stegs can dag so so nas nga'i gzhung ni bden pa yin no zhes zer ba dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[187a.3\]]de'i dus na mdo sde bcu gnyis 'jig rten na spyod kyang gzi brjid dang mthu med do/_/la la zhig 'don tam klog kyang mi gcig 'ga' yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob pa med do/_/de ltar nga'i slob ma rnams kyang rgyal po srid star ba'am/_bya 'dab ma med pa dang 'dra ste/_gtsug lag khang dang 
[\[187a.4\]]mchod rten yang stongs shing zhig ral gso ba yang med do/_/de ltar sku gzugs dang ba dan dang /_rin po che'i gdugs yod pa yang dgra cha zhig pa 'dra ste/_phug ron dang /_bye'u dang /_phag dang /_khyi dang /_lug la sogs pa'i tshang dang gnas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong so so na 
[\[187a.5\]]'dug pa'i gnas ni byi dor bzang du byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_'di yang khyed la mdo tsam zhig bshad pa yin no/_/dga' bos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas mchi ma blags te ngus so/_/de ltar dga' bos yid gdung zhing ngu ba ma btang ba las 
[\[187a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod de ltar ma ngu bar mdo sde 'di gzungs su zung la 'jig rten du rgyas par spel cig_/de nas dga' bos gdong mchi ma phyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis gzungs su bzung ngo /_/zhes gsol to/_/brgya byin dang /_lha dang /_
[\[187a.7\]]mi rnams kyis kyang dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa bdag cag gis kyang yongs su bzung ste/_gang zhig mdo sde 'di ri'am/_tshal lam/_shing drung ngam/_bas mtha' 'am/_dur khrod na gnas te 'don tam/_klog na bdag cag gis lha dang /_mi'i 'khor dang /_mi ma yin pa 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]dang bcas te/_gnas der 'gro zhing chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig gcig tsam yang mi brjed mi nyams par bzung ngo zhes gsol to/_/mdo sde 'di gsungs pa'i tshe dge slong stong snyed kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par gyur to/_/dge slong ma stong lnga brgyas 
[\[187b.2\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/dge bsnyen lnga brgya yongs su dag par gyur te/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin la sogs pas phyag byas nas phyir dong ngo /_/'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[187b.3\]{D138}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA san ni pA ta rat+na ke tu d+hA ra NI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs 
[\[187b.4\]]pa chen po dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de la phyag 'tshal te/_bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di sbyor bar bgyis/_bdag gis rig sngags 'di grub par gyur cig 'di lta ste/_a bA me/_a bA me/_aM ba re/_aM ba re/_pa ri kun dza/_na Ta na Ta/_
[\[187b.5\]]pu ska ra bA ha/_dza lu kha/_kha ma kha ya/_i li mi li/_ki li mi li/_kIrti pa ra/_mu dre mu dra mu khe swA hA/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal/_bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/_dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge 
[\[187b.6\]]slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag 
[\[187b.7\]]gi don rab tu thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su chad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]chen po la 'di lta ste/_lhun po'i rtse 'dzin gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_chu lha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_bzang po'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rgyal ba'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_'od kyi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_nam mkha'i blo gros 
[\[188a.2\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_glog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_thub dka' gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_chu lha gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_dri med gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag 
[\[188a.3\]]la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad kyang /_bzod pa dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes can/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_de bzhin 
[\[188a.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa/_shes pa la mkhas pa/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa thabs shes pa la mkhas pa/_sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na kun tu rgyu mkhas pa gsal ba/_yid gzhungs pa/_
[\[188a.5\]]rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_g.yog lnga brgya pa/_gcig gi ming ni nye rgyal/_gcig gi ming ni pang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod do/_/tshogs kyi gtso bo g.yog gi tshogs can de gnyis phan tshun 'di ltar bdag cag las gang gis thog mar bdud rtsi thob pa 
[\[188a.6\]]des gcig la gcig sbran to/_/zhes dam tshig byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/_sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs nas/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[188a.7\]]rta thul spyod yul du zhugs nas/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ci ltar dge sbyong 'di'i spyod lam mdzes pa de lta bu ni bdag gi sngon cad dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am mir gyur pa gzhan su la yang gang la 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]yang sngon ma mthong na/_bdag de'i gan du song ste/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston pa gang yin/_gang las rab tu byung /_gang gis chos la dga' zhes 'dri'o snyam nas/_kun tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' 
[\[188b.2\]]bar bya ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston pa gang /_gang las rab tu byung /_gang gi chos 
[\[188b.3\]]la dga'/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shAkya'i sras po brtul zhugs dka' thub chen po kun gyi dam pa dbang dang ldan/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin cing grol la de bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya sad 
[\[188b.4\]]mdzad mi mnyam sdug bsngal mtsho skems da ltar 'di na yod/_/dri ma med pa de yi skyabs su nga song nga ni de yi chos la dga'/_/nye rgyal gyis smras pa/_khyod kyi ston pa ji skad smra/_ji skad ston/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/_de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa legs par rab tu nyon la yid 
[\[188b.5\]]la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan 'byung dang /_/las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs/_/gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/_/thar pa'i mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog 
[\[188b.6\]]de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs/_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing /_dri ma dang bral la nyon mongs pa med pa skyes te/_des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[188b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyis ni shin tu rnyed dka' thos gter bdud rtsi'i chos bshad pa/_/'di ni rtag tu skye ba'i 'bab chu skems par bden par khong du chud/_/de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste/_/lam 'di dam pa shes rab chos rnams bsgom pa mi mnyam byed pa yin/_/de nas kun 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i 
[\[189a.2\]]khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'di lta ste/_ral pa can stong rab tu byung ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/nye rgyal gyis smras pa/_bdag gi grogs po'i mchog dang /_slob ma'i 'khor la bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 
[\[189a.3\]]rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_slar song nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ba dang /_kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste/_
[\[189a.4\]]mthong nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dngas/_bzhin gyi mdangs ni yongs su dag_/pags pa'i mdog ni kun tu dkar ba las na/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed do/_/nye rgyal gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin 
[\[189a.5\]]te/_kho bos bdud rtsi rnyed kyis tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_kho bos ci snyed pa khyod la bshad do/_/de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_kun tu 
[\[189a.6\]]rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang gis srid gsum rgya mtsho myur rgal zhing /_/phung po dgra chen rnam par gzhig bya ba/_/mya ngan med zhi lam de shod cig dang /_/yang 'byung med pa'i lam du 'jug par bya/_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis 
[\[189a.7\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyu ldan 'byung dang /_/las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs/_/gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/_/thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]gis mkhyen te gsungs/_/pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/_sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya phyir dri ma med pa zhi ba'i chos/_/nyon mongs lta ngan nyes pa thams cad zhi byed mi shes gcod pa dang /_/'di ni 'dus byas gsog gsob de phyir stong pa slu bar thub pas gsungs/_/de thos zhi ba 
[\[189b.2\]]reg 'gyur dri ma med pa'i tshig de zlos te gsungs/_/nye rgyal gyis smras pa/_ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan 'byung dang /_/las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs/_/gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi 
[\[189b.3\]]gnas pa/_/thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs/_/de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis de nyid du chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la/_nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par sbyangs te/_des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas 
[\[189b.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/yang dag spyod pa 'di ni chu bo sgrol ba zhi ba mgyogs pa'i gzings/_/ye shes mchog 'di sdug bsngal gsum po zhi byed 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro/_/'di ni yongs su shes na nyon mongs phung po 'joms shing bdud 'dul 'gyur/_/thar pa 'di ni dgra dang thab mo 
[\[189b.5\]]bsal cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems/_/pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs/_nye rgyal gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi 
[\[189b.6\]]grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs zhes thos na/_bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngam/_pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/_tshe 
[\[189b.7\]]dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/_bdag cag gi 'khor la bltas te rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes rang gi 'khor ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bdud sdig can gyis yul ang ga ma ga d+hA na mkhas shing snyan pa dang /_brjod pa dang 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]grags par ldan pa skyes bu dam pa nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong gau ta ma'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'dong ngo zhes thos nas/_de 'di snyam du sems so/_/kyi hud de gnyis gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma'i slob mar gyur na bdag gi 
[\[190a.2\]]bdud kyi yul stongs par byed par 'gyur gyis/_bdag der song ste skyes bu dam pa de gnyis rab tu 'byung ba las bzlog la/_sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du 'jug go/_/snyam ste/_de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bdud sdig can myur du bdag gi khang pa nas mi snang bar byas te/_
[\[190a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi cha byad dang rtags dang spyod lam du bsgyur nas/_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi mdun na lam kar 'dug ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bos sngar smras rgyu dang byed rgyu lta bu de ni log pa ste/_khyed gnyis yid kyi spyod pa ci la nges pa bgam par bya ba'i phyir/_/
[\[190a.4\]]smras pa de dag thams cad don yod ma yin 'di la rgyu yang med/_/dge dang mi dge'i las de'i 'bras bu thob pa 'di na ga la yod/_/myur du khyed gnyis 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la rab spyod rtsed mo byos/_/skye rga na 'chi med cing sdug bsngal med de 'jig rten pha rol med/_/
[\[190a.5\]]bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las bskyed 'bras med rgyu dang byed pa med/_/rnyed phyir 'dir ni shAkya'i bu yis smras kyis dad pas ma 'gro shig_/de nas nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyi ga 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma bdud sdig can bdag cag rab tu byung ba las bzlog pa'i 
[\[190a.6\]]phyir 'ongs so snyam nas/_de nas nye rgyal rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug nas rang gi 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u khyod nyon cig 'khor ba'i skyon/_/dran par gyis la 'jig rten rga ba yis/_/gzir zhing 'chi bdag gis ni rab bskor ba/_/de gnyis spang phyir 
[\[190a.7\]]rab byung legs par zung /_/de nas pang nas skyes kyis bdud la slar smras pa/_mkhas pa'i blo 'chang sdug bsngal gsum mthar phyin mchog chos rnams kun shes kyis/_/rnam pa kun tu bdag cag blo gros 'di las bskyod nus su yang med/_/sred pa rab zhi bya phyir bdag cag brtan 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]pa'i yid kyis rtag tu 'bad/_/seng ge'i gzugs can wa yi tshig gis nged kyi blo gros ma bsgyur cig_/bden pa mthong ba'i lha gang dag nam mkha' la 'dug pa de dag gis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyed gnyis legs so legs 
[\[190b.2\]]so/_/'di lta ste/_rab tu 'byung ba dang /_mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i lam yin te/_lam 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'o/_/lam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[190b.3\]]rab tu 'byung ba dang /_mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags shing bstod pa'i lam mo/_/de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar song ngo /_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal 
[\[190b.4\]]dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis kyis rang gi 'khor la bltas te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u dag nged ni rga ba dang na ba dang /_'chi ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'byung bar yang dag par chas kyis/_khyed kyis shes par gyis shig_/
[\[190b.5\]]khyed rnams las gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung mi 'dod pa de ni 'di nas phyir log shig_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag cung zad shes pa de kun kyang khyed kyi mthu na/_khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na/_
[\[190b.6\]]khyed gang las rab tu byung ba de las bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par bdud sdig can gyis rig nas ci nas de gnyis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i gan du 'gro mi nus par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[190b.7\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi logs su g.yang sa chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgya pa zhig sprul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/_ci nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis g.yang sa chen po 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]de mi mthong zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do/_/yang bdud sdig can gyis de gnyis kyi mdun du ri chen po brtan pa/_sra ba/_ma rnyil ba/_sul med pa/_gcig tu stug por gyur pa/_mkhregs pa/_'phang du dpag tshad stong yod pa cig mngon par sprul te/_seng ge 
[\[191a.2\]]khro zhing gdug la gtum pa/_sgra chen po 'byin pa stong yang mngon par sprul na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzi brjid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis ri de yang ma mthong /_seng ge yang ma mthong /_seng ge'i skad kyang ma thos te lam drang por bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 
[\[191a.3\]]song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ni 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed skyes bu dam pa tshogs kyi gtso bo g.yog gi tshogs can 'di gnyis la ltos/_de dag gis 
[\[191a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis g.yog dang bcas pa nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas gcig ni nga'i nyan thos thams cad kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/gcig ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/
[\[191a.5\]]de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/skyes bu mkhas pa g.yog ldan 'di gnyis ni/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan dang shes rab 'jigs med par/_/mi mchog phan pa mdzad pas lung bstan te/_/bdag gis de gnyis bsti stang bskyed nas bsu/_/de nas dge slong de stan 
[\[191a.6\]]las langs nas dge slong mang po dang /_khyim na gnas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba mang po dang lhan cig tu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bsu nas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[191a.7\]]te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis la stsal du gsol/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyi ming ci/_nye rgyal gyis gsol pa/_bdag ni bram ze rgyal gyi bu lags te nye rgyal zhes bgyi/_bdag gi ma'i ming ni shA ri ka ste/_bdag de las skyes pas na de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni 
[\[191b.2\]]shA ri'i bu zhes btags so/_/bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so/_/pang nas skyes kyis gsol pa/_bdag gi pha'i ming ni kauN+Di n+ya zhes bgyi/_bdag gi ma'i ming ni maud gal zhes bgyi ste/_bdag de las skyes pas na de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni maud gal gyi bu zhes 
[\[191b.3\]]btags so/_/bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu nga'i thad du g.yog dang bcas te/_tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nyid kyis de gnyis rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing 
[\[191b.4\]]dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par bdud sdig can dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang dag bstan bcos don spyod mkhas pa rig pa'i 
[\[191b.5\]]pha rol song /_/de kun nga yi rkang la phyag 'tshal de dag 'dren pa nga /_/gau tam slob ma 'khor bcas nga la deng myur skyabs 'tshol cig_/mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyas pa gsal ba'i lam ni khyed la bshad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod lam 'gro ba 'di dag ngan 'gror 
[\[191b.6\]]'dren cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnyed par byed/_/nga yi lam ni rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems byed pa/_/'chal pa 'dzem pa med cing mu cor smra ba wa skad da yang ci zhig zer/_/khyod ni bcom zin bdud kyi las kyis nga la da yang 'dir ni byed mi nus/_/de nas bdud sdig can 
[\[191b.7\]]gyis dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs mi snang bar byas nas/_tshangs pa'i cha lugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyi shes rab kyis ni las dang nyon mongs sred pa'i myu gu rab tu bsal/_/de yi slan chad thub pa ji slad sems can don 'dir 'di ltar sdug bsngal spro/_/
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]gtso bo 'gro ba 'di na khyod kyi snod 'gyur skye bo gang na'ang ma mchis te/_/dus 'di lags na skyon dang bral khyod ci yi slad du mya ngan myur mi 'da'/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas 'dul gang 'khod sems can mtshungs med gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/ngas mthong de 
[\[192a.2\]]dag nga yi snying rjes thar bar bya ba yin/_/'gro ba rab 'bring ngan par gyur pa thar te mthar thug na/_/de nas mya ngan 'da' yis blo gros ngan pa g.yos ci bskul/_/de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste 
[\[192a.3\]]mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa dang /_de'i mod la bdud kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can kun phan tshun 'di skad du ci'i rgyus bdag cag gi rgyal po chen po 'di mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug pa su yang mi shes so zhes 'dri'o/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i 
[\[192a.4\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa thogs te rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang /_lhab lhub dag gis bdag cag brgyan nas rab tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed pa'i lha'i sil snyan byas te/_rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis glu len gar byed cing /_yan lag lnga dang ldan 
[\[192a.5\]]pa'i lha'i sil snyan dag byas nas/_dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang ldan par bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang /_bdud sdig can des lag pa gnyis bsgreng nas bos de sgra ma byed/_sgra ma byed ces smras pa dang /_yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/yang glu rab tu blangs shing sil 
[\[192a.6\]]snyan byas pa dang /_bdud sdig can gyis lag pa gnyis g.yabs te bos so/_/lha'i bu mo de dag gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang /_gar dang /_sil snyan lan bdun gyi bar du byas pa dang /_yang de bzhin du bdud sdig can de lag pa gnyis bsgreng nas 'bod cing sgra ma byed/_sgra ma byed ces zer ro/_/
[\[192a.7\]]de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i bu mo de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i bu mo dbyangs snyan glog ces bya bas bdud sdig can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/gtso bo khyod kyis deng 'dir 'chi 'pho'i ltas shig gzigs sam ci/_/'on tam 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]ci zhig de ring 'gro ba zhugs kyis 'khrugs gyur tam/_/'on te 'di na khyod dgra stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam/_/ci yi slad du khyed ni dgyes par mi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_nga la dgra yod pa ni stobs ldan sems thul ba/_/sa stengs 
[\[192b.2\]]shAkya'i bu pho sgyu ma bslabs pa'i blo/_/de ni ci nas gal te brlag par ma gyur na/_/de yis nga yi 'dod khams 'di ni stongs par byed/_/lha'i bu mos smras pa/_gtso bo srid gsum bcings sred rgya mtsho mtha' [{]rings [,]ring [}]la/_/zad bgyid nus pa'i stobs dang ldan pa su zhig mchis/_/
[\[192b.3\]]bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus rtsal rnams gang gis kyang /_/de la de ring ma lus bgyid par nus ma mchis/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_sbyin dang brtul zhugs bsam pa smon lam snying rje'i zhags pa can/_/stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang gzhu thogs te/_/'khor 
[\[192b.4\]]ba las byung rab tu zhi ba'i lam dang 'thun gyur nas/_/srid pa ma lus bzlog pa nye bar bstan par byed pa po/_/de yi slob ma bsam gtan la ni mngon par brtson yid kyis/_/dben par rgyu zhing nyes pa zad par bya phyir khor zug tu/_/cho ga bzhin du zhugs nas grong dang grong khyer stong pa dang /_/
[\[192b.5\]]nags kyi nang dag dang ni ri yi sman ljongs rnams na gnas/_/rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs dang snying rje'i grogs dang ldan pa yi/_/dam pa nye rgyal pang nas skyes gnyis thub pas btul bar 'gyur/_/rab dul chos can 'jig rten gsum kun cho ga bzhin du btul/_/des ni nga yi 'dod khams 
[\[192b.6\]]'di dag stongs par byed par 'gyur/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis bdud sdig can las bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dang bral ba'i glog ces bya ba thob bo/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag 
[\[192b.7\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i sil snyan dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_lhab lhub dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor ba dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_sil snyan nas rgyan gyi 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]bar du de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal du bab par gyur to/_/bdud kyi bu mo de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas pas so so nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes par gyur to/_/gang gi phyir 'od ma'i 
[\[193a.2\]]tshal du 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu bab ces dge slong de dag the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa 'di gnyis la ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog gi char chen po rab tu 
[\[193a.3\]]bab pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rgyu ci lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyi mthu ma yin te/_bdud sdig can gyi g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam gyis bdud kyi khang pa de nas nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char 
[\[193a.4\]]chen po nas rgyan gyi bar gyi char phab bo/_/de dag ring po mi thogs par 'dir 'ongs te/_nga las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag so so nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung dang brjod pa'i dbyangs thos nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[193a.5\]]'das la de bas kyang rab tu dga' ba skyes te/_de dag dga' ba dang rangs pa des byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de nas yang bdud kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi khang pa der gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo 
[\[193a.6\]]sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sred chu ma lus skems pa'i 'gro ba'i mig gcig pu/_/mig ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni/_/khyod deng lha dang mir bcas pa yi 'gro ba sgrol/_/thub pa 
[\[193a.7\]]bdag cag ji ltar myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/lha dang mis mchod don dam gsung ba bcom ldan 'das/_/bdag cag 'thun par bud med smad pa nyid spangs nas/_/blo mchog khyod kyi 'phrul gyi drung du myur bar ni/_/mchis nas 'di bzhin thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung mnyan to/_/bdag 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]med gsung ba don dam gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das/_/byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med nor gsung sgron/_/mtshungs med bdud kyi stobs btul khyod kyis bdag cag la/_/da ltar myur du lhan cig byang chub lung bstan gsol/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag stan las langs nas 
[\[193b.2\]]mgrin gcig tu bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nyes byas blo gros can khyod snying po med g.yo ba'i/_/dpal rnyed ci phyir bcom ldan 'das la sdang bar sems/_/dregs pas gos nas skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyis/_/lus kun gtses te mi bzad gnas su nye bar song /_/
[\[193b.3\]]de ltar khro ba spangs te rgyal la dad par gyis/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa dregs pa'i 'dam las thar ba'i bdag_/'di ni nyid kyis 'gro ba kun gyi ngo bo mkhyen/_/thugs rje can gyi skyabs su 'dong gis myur du bzhud/_/de nas bdud sdig can shin tu gdug pa'i yid dang ldan pa 'di snyam du sems 
[\[193b.4\]]te/_bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas la/_gang g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag bdag nyid bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong bar byas te/_'di nas bzlog la 'gro mi nus par bya'o snyam pa dang /_bdud des de dag bcings par ma nus so/_/de ci'i 
[\[193b.5\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bdud sdig can gyi drung nas dong ba dang /_de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te de 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag gis yang 'di 'dra ba'i 
[\[193b.6\]]bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas te/_ci nas bdag gis g.yog mo de dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad 'khrul nas dge sbyong gau ta ma mi mthong zhing slar yang bdag gi gnas su 'ong bar nam mkha' 'di dag thams cad du rnam par 'thor rlung dang /_rlung nag po chen pos kun tu khyab 
[\[193b.7\]]par bya'o snyam na yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis rlung cung zad kyang langs par byed ma nus so/_/tha na skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod ma nus na mang du lta ci smos/_de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu khros shing sdug bsngal te yid mi bde zhing yid la gcags nas ngu zhing skad chen 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]pos rang gi bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor la bos te bdud kyi gnas thams cad sgras gang bar byas so/_/sdug pa'i bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor rnams tshur shog shig_/nga ni bdag yul rang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs las nyams/_/shAkya'i bu 'di sgyu ldan g.yo can ngag 
[\[194a.2\]]'jam la/_/khong nas rang bzhin dug sdong 'dra ba 'dir skyes so/_/de nas sgra des bdud kyi g.yog mo dang /_bdud kyi bu mo de dag thams cad dang /_bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rings pa'i gzugs kyis myur du lhags nas/_bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 
[\[194a.3\]]'khod pa dang /_'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci slad thugs khros rab tu 'khrugs shing thugs mi dgyes/_/bsreg bskal deng 'dir ma byung 'di nas khyod ma 'phos/_/'di na khyod lhag dgra ni su yang ma 
[\[194a.4\]]mchis na/_/khyod ci rmongs par gyur tam ci slad gzhan du dgongs/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_shAkya'i bu pho dmangs phal shing gi grib ma 'dug pa ma mthong ngam/_/ci phyir 'di na khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang ldan pa'i dgra med smras/_/stobs gcig ldan pa g.yo can de yis thams 
[\[194a.5\]]cad rnam pa du mar bslus/_/bdag cag bu dang sder bcas me lce 'bar dang bcas pa'i me yis bsregs/_/'jig rten 'di na skyes bu gtso bo dpal dang brjod pa rnam grags pa/_/mkhas pa bstan bcos snyan dngags mang po byed brtson 'thun par myur bar yang /_/chos kyi kyo ba tang 
[\[194a.6\]]gis drangs te shAkya'i bu 'di'i skyabs deng song /_/lus mdzes g.yo can blo gros ldan 'di nga yi dgrar ni rab tu gnad/_/rab tu sdug pa'i g.yog mo de dag snying rje med pas nga bor te/_/nga la dpang btsugs nas ni de ring dge sbyong de yi skyabs su dong /_/gal te bdag cag myur bsgrims stobs 
[\[194a.7\]]chen 'di deng thal bar ma byas na/_/g.yo dang sgyu yis srid pa gsum po de dag ma lus stongs par byed/_/de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ltar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul dang /_stobs kyi yul gyi 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]mthu dang /_rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad bstan te/_shAkya'i bu 'di gal te thal bar bgyid nus pa de lta na ni legs/_de ltar ma nus na ni de la skyabs su mchi'o/_/yab nyid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/_gang bdag cag sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba sngar shAkya'i bu gcig 
[\[194b.2\]]pu gnyis su med pa 'dis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rab tu pham par bgyis na da g.yog mang por gyur pa lta ci smos/_bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag deng la gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gsod nus na slar shog shig_/ci ste ma nus na yang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrung 
[\[194b.3\]]gis slar shog shig_/de nas bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bcu gnyis po de dag de nas 'phags te/_'di nas steng du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bkang nas de 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul drag po bstan te/_gang gling bzhi pa'i nam mkha' thams cad sprin nag 
[\[194b.4\]]po chen po dang /_rlung nag po chen po dang /_skar mdas bkang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab la yang lag gis brdabs te/_gling bzhi pa thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyang 'byin to/_/de dag gis klu dang /_klu chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_gnod 
[\[194b.5\]]sbyin chen po dag gis sa chen po brag dang rir bcas pa thams cad dang ldan pa/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang g.yos par rig_/mtsho dang /_mtsho chen po dang /_'bab chu dang /_chu bran dang /_'bab chu chen po dang /_rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do/_/
[\[194b.6\]]bdud kyi 'khor de dag ni ri rab kyi zom la 'khod nas/_dpag tshad tsam gyi rdo'i char mngon par sprul te nam mkha' las kun tu 'bebs so/_/ral gri dang /_gtun shing dang /_rdo ba dang /_mtshon rtse gnyis dang /_ste'u ka ma dang /_lcags mda' dang /_spu gri dang /_spu gri lta bu dang /_
[\[194b.7\]]dgra sta dang /_ste'u so lta bu dang /_ste'u so dang /_kha rad rod can dang /_kha shin tu rad rod can dang /_sra ba/_drag pa/_rtsub pa/_rno ba'i char rab tu sprul te kun tu phab po/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_gang rdo 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]dang /_mtshon cha de dag thams cad ni lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/_yul ang ga ma ga d+hAr skar mda' ltung ba ni spos kyi char chen por 
[\[195a.2\]]byin gyis brlabs/_sgra de ni rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /_mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang /_dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang /_bdud 
[\[195a.3\]]bzhi pham par bya ba'i sgra dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang /_len pa dang bcas pa dang /_len pa med pa'i sgrar byin gyis brlabs so/_/rdul dang /_mun nag dang /_rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhi'o/_/gang gling bzhi pa 'di na rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_
[\[195a.4\]]nags tshal dang /_sa dang /_brag dang /_ri ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re re las kyang 
[\[195a.5\]]'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/_'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[195a.6\]]mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/_lha dang /_
[\[195a.7\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa sa dang nam mkha' la 'khod pa brgya stong mang pos ni me tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas so/_/sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni dran pa rnyed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa dran nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas te/_ngan song de dag nas shi 'phos nas lhar skyes so/_/bdud kyi sde de'i 
[\[195b.2\]]nang nas bdud kyi bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[195b.3\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rnam dag sku mnga' mchog tu gzugs bzang ba/_/ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra/_/grags pa 'jig rten bkram nas lham me ba/_/mgon po khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi/_/
[\[195b.4\]]rab tu lam stor rnam par mig zums la/_/khyod ni 'jig rten sgron ma nyi ma 'dra/_/gzhan gyis mi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig_/ded dpon khyod la skyabs su rab tu mchi/_/shin tu tshogs bsags ye shes 'byor pa'i mdzod/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin gzod nas rnam grol thugs/_/
[\[195b.5\]]thugs rje bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i gsung /_/don kun grub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi/_/'khor ba'i dgon pa las ni khyod thar mdzad/_/tshogs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu ston/_/byams la gnas shing mchog gi cho ga mkhyen/_/thugs rje gnas pa'i skyabs su rab tu mchi/_/sgyu ma 
[\[195b.6\]]smyig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba yi/_/sred pa la ni yul gyi gnas kyis chags/_/mi shes nad sel 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon/_/sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi/_/chu bo bzhi dbus zam par gyur pa khyod/_/nor bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab sgrol ba/_/yang dag lam ston 'jig 
[\[195b.7\]]rten rtsa lag po/_/thugs rje ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchod do/_/blo mchog khyod la bdag cag bzod par gsol/_/khyod la bdag cag yid kyis gnod bsams pa/_/mgon po dpa' bos nongs pa bzod par gsol/_/khyod ni 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu gtso/_/bdag cag bdud kyi 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]phyogs rnams rab spangs te/_/byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi/_/sems can ma lus thams cad mgron du gnyer/_/bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi/_/ci nas bdag cag pha rol phyin spyod par/_/bdag cag rnams la spyod pa rgya cher ston/_/
[\[196a.2\]]gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni du rnams dang /_/ldan na byang chub rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/me tog gang gis khyod la mngon gtor ba/_/phyogs kun du yang de dag gdugs gyur te/_/dus kun bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhing du ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi spyi bor 'dug gyur cig_/de nas 
[\[196a.3\]]bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang /_bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma gtor ba dang /_me tog sil ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma las 'das pa'i me tog gi 
[\[196a.4\]]gdugs kun tu 'dug par gyur te/_me tog gi gdugs de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug go/_/bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang /_bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de 
[\[196a.5\]]dag gis kyang so so nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_chos kyang 'chad pa 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te/_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger bzhugs dpa'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang 
[\[196a.6\]]thad kyi steng gi bar snang la me tog gi gdugs de dag 'dug par gyur pa mthong zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kha dog mtshungs pa/_rtags mtshungs pa/_gzugs mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag seng ge'i khri tha dad cing 'khor 
[\[196a.7\]]tha dad la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i nyi tshe tha dad par mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni ma thos so/_/bdud kyi 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba dang mos pa 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu phyir log nas/_bdud kyi gnas su de lta bu'i ngo mtshar bdud sdig can la rgya cher bzlas te/_
[\[196b.2\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma de yi ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang bdag cag gis gzhig par ma nus na gsad par lta ci smos/_de'i steng du nyi khri de'i skyabs su dong ste/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod do/_/de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid 
[\[196b.3\]]la gcags te des 'di skad ces smras so/_/shAkya'i bu ni ji srid brlag par ma byas pa/_/de srid bar du nga yi dbal song slar mi 'ong /_/shAkya'i bu 'di ji ltar de ring bsad snyam ste/_/bdag cag gzhan la yid mi rtog cing mi smra 'dug_/de nas bdud sdig can yid mi bde 
[\[196b.4\]]zhing mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug go/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_bdud spa bkong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang /_bdud kyi bu pho tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[196b.5\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'di lta bu'i theg pa dang /_ye shes dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_snying rje dang /_thabs dang /_spobs pa 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thabs dang ye shes kyi bar du ldan pa ngo mtshar to/_/
[\[196b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi mchi zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag chos bzhi dang ldan na 'di la skyes bu gang 
[\[196b.7\]]zag la la sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'di la rigs kyi bu chos thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin cing /_chos gang yang mi 'dzin/_mi gtong /_
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]khas mi len/_mi gnas/_nye bar mi len/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mi gtong /_mi 'dzin/_khas mi len/_nye bar mi len/_mi gnas/_mi rtog rnam par mi 
[\[197a.2\]]rtog ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du spyod pa na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de sems can du smra ba ma yin/_srog tu smra ba ma yin/_gso bar smra ba ma yin/_gang zag tu smra ba ma yin zhing /_sems can dang 
[\[197a.3\]]sems can gyi khams la yid kyis mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas mi rtog rnam 
[\[197a.4\]]par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de khams gsum dang /_dus gsum dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi rgyu dang /_rkyen dang /_dmigs pa dang /_'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'byung ba dang /_gnas dang /_skye ba 
[\[197a.5\]]thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni spyod pa'i gnas kyi yul thams cad la rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[197a.6\]]dag chos thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa yin te/_sgra med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_yi ge med pa/_smon pa med pa/_skye ba med pa/_'gag pa med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_chags pa med pa/_dmigs pa med pa/_bstan du med pa/_dben pa/_
[\[197a.7\]]bdag med pa/_mtshan nyid dang bral ba/_skad cig pa/_nye bar zhi ba/_mun pa med pa/_snang ba med pa/_gnas med pa/_yul med pa/_dbang po med pa/_phyogs med pa/_gnyen po med pa/_bsam du med pa/_mi 'phrogs pa/_ser sna med pa/_spros pa med pa/_rdul med 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]pa/_rdul dang bral ba/_cha shas med pa/_ci yang med pa/_byed pa po med pa/_tshor ba po med pa/_rten med pa/_gzung ba med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_so sor snang ba med pa/_skad cig pa ma yin pa'i bar du'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni nam mkha' 
[\[197b.2\]]dang mtshungs te/_stong pa nyid pas dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang /_mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul dang /_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs 
[\[197b.3\]]po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gang la la yul thams cad la chags pa'i yul gyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol na/_de 
[\[197b.4\]]gnyis la chags pa yin te/_de gnyis la chags pa'i yid kyis brnag pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slu bar byed do/_/de la gnyis gang zhe na/_gang phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la mtshan nyid du rnam par spyod pas gnas pa dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa de ni gnyis te/_
[\[197b.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slu ba'o/_/spyod pa'i gnas dang 'bras bu la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so/_/skye ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_sems can gyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so/_/bshad pa dang /_rab tu bstan pa dang /_gdams pa dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_sgra 
[\[197b.6\]]dang /_skad kyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so/_/rtag pa dang /_chad pa la rnam par lta ba'i shes pa dang /_shes bya'i gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so/_/sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po'i 
[\[197b.7\]]'du shes kyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so/_/gang pha rol dang /_tshu rol dang /_rtog pa dang /_sel ba la gnas shing rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag skyes bu gang zag su la la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol ba de dus gsum du ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]'dzin pa dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog par rnam par dpyod pa la gnas shing kun tu rtog ste/_mchog tu 'dzin pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la de'i gnyis so/_/'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu la la zhig me 'dod pa la sa'i ngos la nyug pa 
[\[198a.2\]]dang /_skom 'dod pa la me dang /_zan 'dod pa la rdo dang /_me tog 'dod pa la gos dang /_spos 'dod pa la mi ro bam pa dang /_gos 'dod pa la dur khrod dang /_byug pa 'dod pa la nam mkha' la nyug pa de bzhin du bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gang spyod pa'i gnas la chags shing rnam par 
[\[198a.3\]]spyod pa'i lus gnyis kyi gnas kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol na de'i 'bad pa 'bras bu med pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 
[\[198a.4\]]thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang brjod du ma mchis pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang brjod du med par shes pa de nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/de'i 
[\[198a.5\]]phyir rigs kyi bu khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig_/gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa gal te mchis zhes bgyis na ni rtag par 'gyur/_ji ste ma mchis zhes 
[\[198a.6\]]bgyis na ni chad par 'gyur/_dbu ma'i lam ni dmigs su ma mchis te/_de ni mchis pa yang ma lags/_ma mchis pa yang ma lags so/_/gang ma chags/_mi skye/_mi 'gog_/tshad ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis/_dpe ma mchis/_snang ba ma mchis pa de la 'tshal 
[\[198a.7\]]ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' glog gi blo gros kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang la 'gro ba'ang ma mchis/_'ong ba'ang ma mchis pa de lta bu shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]sems dpa' rnam par snang byed kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang na thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis/_ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis/_mngon du bgyi ba yang ma mchis/_zhi ba yang ma mchis/_rab tu zhi ba yang ma mchis/_
[\[198b.2\]]dus gsum yang ma mchis/_theg pa gsum yang ma mchis/_smon lam dang yang mnyam pa'i rlom sems kyang ma mchis pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang khams gsum 
[\[198b.3\]]yang ma mchis/_kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang ma mchis/_rig pa gsum yang ma mchis/_theg pa gsum yang ma mchis/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la rtog pa yang ma mchis/_rnam par rtog pa yang ma ma mchis/_bri bar yang ma mchis/_'phel bar yang 
[\[198b.4\]]ma mchis la/_nyams par yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje blo gros kyis gsol pa/_gang so so'i skye bo'i chos dang /_'phags pa'i chos dang /_slob pa'i chos dang /_mi slob pa'i chos dang /_nyan thos kyi chos dang /_
[\[198b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/_mnyam par yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_gang dben pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid la rnam par dpyod cing mngon par mi zhen pa 'di ni 
[\[198b.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches gsol pa/_gang chos thams cad mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid thob par bgyid pa dang /_mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du mi rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[198b.7\]]blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pas gsol pa/_gang khams gsum la rnam par spyod cing sems nyid sems la 'jug par bgyid de/_sems gnyi ga la sems kyis rnam par dpyod na mi dmigs pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]rgyal gyis gsol pa/_gang chos thams cad la mi chags/_rjes su mi chags/_btang snyoms su mi bgyid/_khong khro bar mi bgyid/_'dod par mi bgyid/_mi rmongs/_mi 'dzin/_mi gtong ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[199a.2\]]dpa' pad ma'i snying pos gsol pa/_gang bsod nams dang sdig pa la mi chags shing /_zab mo la bzod pa'i tshul la 'jug pas ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la mi rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol 
[\[199a.3\]]pa/_gang chos thams cad chu zla dang mtshungs par rab tu 'tshal cing chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid sogs pa dang /_'bri bar yang mi mthong ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/_gang gi sems dang sems 
[\[199a.4\]]las byung ba la/_mun pa dang /_snang ba dang /_skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_'phel ba dang /_'bri ba thams cad mi 'byung ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/_gang gnas pa la gnas pa na khams gsum pa la gnas 
[\[199a.5\]]pa'i tshangs pa la mi dmigs/_mnyam par mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa/_gang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu goms par bgyid cing /_
[\[199a.6\]]mi chags mi skyo ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad la mi chags mi skyo zhing chos zab mo'i tshul yang rab tu 'tshal te/_gang rab tu 'tshal ba de yang mi len mi 'dor/_
[\[199a.7\]]sdud par mi bgyid/_bral bar mi bgyid cing /_chos gang la yang sogs pa'am/_'bri ba'am/_rig pa'am/_rnam par grol ba'am/_'jig pa'am/_bri ba'am/_'phel ba yang mi bskyed la/_dngos po dag la rnam par mi rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba 'di 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ste/_tshul gcig po 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul 'di ltar zab mo stong pa nyid bsgom 
[\[199b.2\]]pa'i tshul 'di gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na kun tu sbyor ba dang /_rab tu sbyor bar ci dgos/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lta ba mi bzad pa dang bral zhing yang dag pa'i lta bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_g.yo med cing drang por sgro 
[\[199b.3\]]'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_sdig pa dang bral zhing bla ma la rim gro bya bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_bka' blo bde bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_kun tu sbyor ba thams cad dang bral bar sgro 'dogs pa 
[\[199b.4\]]yang med pa dang /_sems can thams cad la khro ba dang snying rje bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_ston pa gsum du sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_mi slu ba'i dge ba'i chos su sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_rnam par ma zhi bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_dam 
[\[199b.5\]]pa'i chos bsrung bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_sems can nyam chung ba stobs la rab tu dgod par sgro 'dogs pa 
[\[199b.6\]]yang med pa dang /_'jigs pa'i skyabs mi 'jigs par sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams nan tan la gzud par sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_bzod pa dang des par sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_'dzin pa thams cad la chags pa'i mtshan 
[\[199b.7\]]nyid du sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang /_rdul dang mun pa'i phung po thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs par yang med pa dang /_bsngo ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thams cad rnam par spong bar sgro 'dogs par yang med pa 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba nyi shu ste/_
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]yi ge dang /_skad dang /_sgra dang /_smra ba dang /_brjod pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa la 'jug pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba'o/_/gzhan mu stegs can gyi tshig gi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang /_spyod pa thams 
[\[200a.2\]]cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang bsod nams thams cad dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang /_len pa dang /_skye ba dang /_'jig pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa gsum dang /_gnas dang /_rgyu dang /_
[\[200a.3\]]las dang /_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thams cad shes nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_nam chos zab 
[\[200a.4\]]mo'i tshul 'di rtogs pa de'i tshe/_chos gang ston pa dang /_gang la ston pa dang /_don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge gang dag gis ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/_gang rab tu spong ba dang /_gang bsgom pa dang /_gang kun shes par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag 
[\[200a.5\]]thams cad brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid la 'jug ste/_des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu tshul gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa de khyod kyis legs 
[\[200a.6\]]par smras so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams cad la chags pa med pa'i dngos po yin pas chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_mi 'jig pa'i mtha' can dang /_ma rig pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa mi skye ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[200a.7\]]dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mi skye ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang /_chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i mtha' can dang /_sems can thams cad kyang de lta bu yin pa dang /_chos thams cad ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can dang /_dus gsum dang /_khams gsum dang /_phung po 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]thams cad ni ci yang med pa'i mtha' can dang /_'du byed gsum ni stong pa nyid kyi mtha' can dang /_chos kyi phung po dang /_rnam par smin pa'i phung po dang /_sogs pa dang /_'bri ba'i phung po ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can du yongs su brjod do/_/stong pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[200b.2\]]dang /_brjod du med pa'i don dang /_chos thams cad kyi don gyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug go/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe bdud kyi bu mo dang /_
[\[200b.3\]]bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_lus rags pa spangs nas yid kyi lus rnyed do/_/gzhan nyi khri brgyad stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha dang mi dkrigs phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa 
[\[200b.4\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nyi khri po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor/_rab tu gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[200b.5\]]phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi dge ba'i grogs po dang 'grogs pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams bsod nams thams cad sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yid la mi bgyid pa la gzigs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di 
[\[200b.6\]]ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo mtshar du 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams the tsom gcad pa'i phyir sngon byung ba 'di gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po dpag tu med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[200b.7\]]gyi khams 'di nyid du snang ba 'chang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po la skye dgu'i tshe lo drug khri brgyad stong thub ste/_de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste/_nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga'i dus su gyur pa na/_'khor bzhi la theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i chos ston to/_/yang de'i tshe gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur 
[\[201a.2\]]ba'i rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ste/_de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog dang dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[201a.3\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor cing sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs dang /_spos sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[201a.4\]]nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/lha dang klu la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis/_/mngon par rab bstod nyes pa mang sel ba/_/nor bdun gyis ni 'gro la phan mdzad pa/_/gang gis blo gros zhi dang ldan gyur gsungs/_/'gro ba'i mun sel zhi ba'i sgron me 
[\[201a.5\]]mdzad/_/'chi 'pho na rga skye ba mya ngan 'joms/_/'gro ba ngan song lam las rab bzlog pa/_/gang gis bdud kyi lam las thar pa gsungs/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[201a.6\]]skyes bu dam pa chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhi ba yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /_ma lta bur sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang /_chos 
[\[201a.7\]]thams cad la srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med pa dang /_tha dad du dbyer med cing mnyam par yongs su rtog pa ste/_skyes bu dam pa chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhi ba yin no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/_
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhags pas mi zin cing bdud kyi lam las thar te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la mi khro zhing klan ka mi tshol ba yin/_sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyin gnas su 'du shes pa yin/_chos thams cad la tshul gcig tu 
[\[201b.2\]]yongs su rtog ste/_'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing bcos su med pa/_tha dad pa ma yin pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_ma 'gag pa ste/_chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog pa'o/_/
[\[201b.3\]]rgyal po chen po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhags pas mi zin cing bdud kyi lam las thar pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas de 
[\[201b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/mi mnyam yon tan 'dzin pa rab rib med mdzad pa/_/ji ltar 
[\[201b.5\]]bud med las ni ngan song spangs pa yi/_/skyes par 'dir 'gyur 'chi 'pho sel ba bka' stsol cig_/rab mchog phan pa mdzad pa myur du yid kyang thul/_/dam pa'i 'gros bzhud bde gshegs rab zhi dga' mdzad pa/_/bcom ldan ji lta bur na bud med skyes par 'gyur/_/'dul mchog gzhan 
[\[201b.6\]]la phan mdzad myur du bshad par gsol/_/bdag gi blo gros thibs po 'dir ni bsal bar gsol/_/'jig rten 'di na mi mnyam mnyam pa dge sbyong mchog_/rab grags yon tan mang po dran dang 'dul ba 'dzin/_/ci nas 'di nyid du ni skyes par bdag 'gyur bar/_/rab rib mi mnga' bde 'gro 
[\[201b.7\]]'chi med lam myur gsungs/_/rigs kyi bu dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/che zhe rnam grangs gang gis bud med dag bud med kyi dngos po myur du brjes te sngon 'phangs pa'i bud med 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par bud med du skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod do/_/che zhe de la rnam grangs gang gis bud med myur du skyes par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[202a.2\]]sngon 'phangs pa'i bud med kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de gang zhe na/_che zhe de la rin po che tog ces bya ba'i gzungs/_rdzu 'phrul chen mo/_phan yon chen mo/_mthu chen mo 'di lta ste/_bud med kyi dngos po thams cad zad par byed cing lus dang /_ngag 
[\[202a.3\]]dang /_sems kyi gnas ngan len gyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa ma lus par zad par byed do/_/rin po che'i tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi dngos po ma lus par 'gyur te/_bud med kyi dbang po mi snang zhing skyes pa'i dbang por skye bar 'gyur/_skyes pa 
[\[202a.4\]]gzugs bzang po yan lag thams cad tshang bar 'gyur/_drang zhing zhib pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang ldan zhing legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang /_dgra thams cad thul bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'di dang tshe 
[\[202a.5\]]rabs phyi ma la lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi sdug bsngal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag ma gtogs par de dag gi 
[\[202a.6\]]bud med kyi dngos po'i lhag ma lus de nyid la yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len gyi rnam par smin pa/_tshe gzhan la bud med kyi dngos po 'grub par byed pa'i sa bon sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa'i sa bon gyi rgyu 
[\[202a.7\]]'thun pa ri rab tsam yang ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad de byin gyis brlabs so/_/gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes so/_/mngon par bstod do/_/bsngags so/_/rab tu bsngags so/_/de ltar phyogs bcu na da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[202b.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can rnams kyi nyes par byas pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 
[\[202b.3\]]bya ba'i phyir rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad de rab tu bsngags pa'i bar du mdzad do/_/gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal 
[\[202b.4\]]rnam par smin pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams spel ba'i phyir/_rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad par 'gyur te/_rab tu bsngags pa'i bar du mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/da ltar nga yang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad de/_phyogs bcu na da ltar byung ba'i de 
[\[202b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad pa rnams la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bsngags so/_/rab tu bstod do/_/che zhe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba skye bo'i nang na mthu dang dbang thob pa gang la las rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di glegs bam du bris te 'chang na/_
