[\[202b.6\]]rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i snyan pa dang /_sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur rgya cher grags par 'gyur te/_gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi bar du sgra dang /_snyan pa rgya chen pos gang bar 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[202b.7\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas so/_/de'i yul thams cad du 'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char pa dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba'i nyes pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_seng ge dang /_ma he dang /_glang po che dang /_spyang ki ma rungs pa thams cad kyang gnod par mi 'gyur/_
[\[203a.2\]]dug dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_snum med pa dang /_ro med pa dang /_rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal ba reg na mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_'bras bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog thams cad kyang 
[\[203a.3\]]rab tu skye zhing rnam par 'phel te snum pa dang /_ro zhim por 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba g.yul du nye bar gnas pa'i tshe rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba des pha 
[\[203a.4\]]rol gyi dmag tshogs thub par 'gyur ro/_/de ste rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba g.yul du zhugs pa gnyi ga rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs na/_de gnyis gcig la gcig dga' zhing 'thun par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rin 
[\[203a.5\]]po che tog gi gzungs 'di yon tan dang /_phan yon mang ngo /_/grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal la lar mi'am/_rkang bzhi pa dag na'am dus ma yin par 'chi ba'am/_gnod pa zhig der byung na der rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di glegs bam la byas te mchod pa'i yo byad cher sbyar 
[\[203a.6\]]te bzhag la/_shin tu khrus byas shing lus rab tu byugs te gos sar pa bgos nas tshangs par spyad de/_seng ge'i khri me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor ba/_dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/_ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba la 'dug la/_der rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam bklags 
[\[203a.7\]]na der nad dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/der 'jigs shing spu zing zhes byed pa dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang la la bu 'dod na des khrus byas te gos sar pa bgos la tshangs par spyod de/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]spos dang /_byug pas glegs bam de mchod la/_bdag nyid kyang stan me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor ba/_dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/_ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba la 'dug nas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bklags na des bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bla na med pa'i yongs su 
[\[203b.2\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par de nyid de'i bud med du gyur pa'i tha ma yin no/_/che zhe rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gang la la'i rna lam du grags pa na tha na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya'ang 
[\[203b.3\]]rung ste/_de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos la reg par mdzad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang de'i tshe sangs 
[\[203b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs bcu dag gi lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_
[\[203b.5\]]mi dang /_mi ma yin pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams shin tu skrag pa skyes par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad kyang snang bas rgya cher khyab par gyur te/_lag mthil lta bur mnyam par 'dug cing /_de'i tshe na ri dang /_shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_ri rab dang /_
[\[203b.6\]]khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po yang mi snang bar gyur to/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin de dag kyang sa g.yos pa dang /_snang ba des skrag pa skyes par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyis mda' rgyang gang tsam na de bzhin 
[\[203b.7\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mthong nas/_de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos la reg pa na yang 'di bzhin du de'i tshe sa g.yos par gyur/_de'i tshe 'di bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par 'dug_/'di bzhin du snang ba dang sa g.yo bas skrag pa skyes te/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha 
[\[204a.2\]]ma yin thams cad phyogs bzhir blta zhing mda' rgyang gang tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de mthong nas thal mo sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di gsungs so/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[204a.3\]]dza lo ke/_dza lo ke/_mo ke/_dza li/_dza la/_dza li ni/_dza la pra te/_dza hi li/_ba ra pu ru Sha lak+Sha Na sa mA ru h+ya/_a ma me/_a ma me/_ba ma me/_ba ma me/_na ba me/_ma hA me/_dza ha me/_dza ha me/_dza ha me/_ba ra me/_ba ra me/_ba ba be/_ba ba be/_ba ha be/_bang ga be/_ba dza be/_bA ra 
[\[204a.4\]]bA ra she_/dza la me kha/_ba ra kha/_a la dza hi li/_dzan tu le/_dzan tu mu khe/_ba ha ra/_ba ha ra/_sid+d+hapra te/_nan ti lA/_nan ti na dA lA/_sUr+ya bi ha kha/_tsan dra bi ha kha/_tsak+Shur dz+yo ti sha bi ha kha/_sarba k+Sha ya/_s+t+rI dwA su ra bi ha kha/_dza kha ga_/dza kha ga_/su ra kha ga_/pi ha ma/_a mr-i kha/_a 
[\[204a.5\]]mr-i kha/_a mr-i kha/_a mr-i kha/_a mr-i kha/_a mr-i kha/_a mr-i kha/_a mr-i kha/_mr-i kha/_mr-i kha/_mr-i kha/_bya ba ts+tshe da karma/_du ne du ne/_ud pA da bya bats+tshe da dz+nyA na kr-i ta/_a nu da pA da/_kha ga ne ru ka_/ang gu le/_b+hang gu le/_bi b+hang gu le/_ku la ha/_in dra pa ri bi bA ha/_bya bats+tshe da gar b+ha/_tsa 
[\[204a.6\]]pra ti/_tsa pra ti/_a mo ha/_dar sha ne/_pa ri brta b+ha Sh+ya/_kha sa ma/_kr-i ta/_dz+yo ti kha ga_/dza hi/_dza ha/_dz+yo ti/_ni Sh+ka b+hi ra sa/_b+hi ra sa/_b+hI ra sa/_b+hI ra sa/_b+hI ra dza/_ma tri kra ma/_b+ha ba kr-i pa/_ma ha kr-i pa/_hi le/_hi hi le/_a ru na pra te/_sa ma ya ni Sh+ka/_da ma/_dA na/_d+h+yan a pa rA mrI She/_pha la kuN Da la la khe/_ni brta/_iSh+Ta/_
[\[204a.7\]]b+ha ba karmak+Sha ya/_pra dur b+ha ba/_pu ru Sha twa ma/_a sa ma sa ma/_sa ma ya/_bi b+hid di dz+nyA ta thA ga ta swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang sa chen po g.yos so/_/bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag kyang rin po che tog gi 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te pho mtshan skyes so/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dag gi bu mo grangs med 
[\[204b.2\]]dpag tu med pa rnams kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te pho mtshan skyes nas/_de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/_thams cad kyang ma 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob 
[\[204b.3\]]par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa byang nas/_bud med de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing skad chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya 
[\[204b.4\]]thub pa ngo mtshar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje chen po gang gis bdag cag da ltar bud med kyi dngos po mi gda' bar gyur cing /_rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i skyes pa'i dngos por gyur pa'i sngon byung ba 'di rgya cher bshad du gsol/_de lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang /_cho 
[\[204b.5\]]'phrul dang /_skyo bas bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'di lha dang mi dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams dpang du 'gyur bar bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub 
[\[204b.6\]]pas sngon byung ba 'di bshad pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de'i thad nas rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas pas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos te/_thos ma thag tu btsun mo dam 
[\[204b.7\]]pa lha mdzes dang /_bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te pho mtshan skyes pa de'i tshe de bzhin du lha'i bu mo nas mi'i bu mo'i bar du grangs med/_dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes pa'i dbang po 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]skyes te/_bud med de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang ngo /_/gang gi tshe rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa phor gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po ud 
[\[205a.2\]]pa la'i gdong des bu thu bo gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/_bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang /_skyes bu chen po lha mdzes dang bcas/_lha mdzes kyang skyes bu chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas/_gzhan yang srog chags dgu khri 
[\[205a.3\]]nyis stong dang bcas te khyim nas byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de'i thad du skra dang /_kha spu bregs/_gos ngur smrig bgos te yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kha ton la dga' zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson 
[\[205a.4\]]par gyur to/_/de nas de na srog chags bye ba mang po 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rab tu byung snyam nas/_de dag phan tshun 'di skad ces smra'o/_/dge sbyong 'di ni bdud kyi las la brtson pa ste/_g.yo can sgyu ma bdud kyi las dang ldan pas chos 'di 
[\[205a.5\]]ston cing la la ni pho mtshan med par byas/_la la ni mo mtshan med par byas/_la la ni skra dang kha spu bregs/_la la ni gos tshon can bskon/_la la ni gos dkar po bskon/_la la ni lhar skye bar ston/_la la ni mir skye bar/_la la ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar/_la la ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su 
[\[205a.6\]]skye bar/_la la ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar/_la la ni 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba med par bya ba'i chos ston to/_/bdud kyi las kyi lam la brtson zhing bud med bsgyur ba'i sgyu dang ldan pa dge sbyong 'od zhi spos snang dpal de dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis rab tu slu ba yin gyis bdag cag 'di nas 
[\[205a.7\]]dong ste/_de'i gzugs dang rtags 'dzin pa yang mi mthong ba dang /_de'i tshig kyang cung zad kyang mi thos par 'dod do/_/de nas de nyid na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba zhig yod pa des tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo'i chung ma dang /_g.yog mo dang bu mo gang yin pa de dag 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]thams cad kyang dge sbyong ma rungs pa 'dis mo mtshan med par byas te/_skyes pa'i dbang por sprul nas thams cad kyi mgo bregs te gos tshon can bskon nas kho bo gcig pu mya ngan gyis non te/_tha na bdag cag thams cad 'dus la gang du dge sbyong ma rungs pa/_dge sbyong sgyu ma bdud kyi 
[\[205b.2\]]zhags pa la brtson pa 'di'i sgra dang /_skad kyang mi thos na mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i ri khrod nyam nga bar 'dong gis tshur shog ces byas pa dang /_de dag thams cad dga' ste de bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul dang /_the tshom du gyur pa'i srog chags bye ba 
[\[205b.3\]]khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang lhan cig tu de nas dong ste/_yul mtha' 'khob kyi ri khrod nyam nga bar drang srong gi cha byad kyis spyad pa spyod cing sems can de dag la 'di skad ces chos ston to/_/'khor la las thar ba yang med/_legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras 
[\[205b.4\]]bu rnam par smin pa yang med na/_der chad par smra ba'i dge sbyong bdud kyi las kyi lam la brtson pa zhig byung gis/_gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang /_gang dag gus par smra ba dang /_gang dag de'i chos nyan pa de dag sems g.yengs pa yin te/_de dag mgo bregs/_khyim nas phyung /_
[\[205b.5\]]gos tshon can bskon/_dur khrod du spyad pa spyod du bcug_/slongs mo ba'i spyod pa la 'dzud/_zan za gcig par byed/_lta ba mi bzad pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu yid 'byung bar byed/_dben par gnas pa la dga' ba dang /_gnas khang du bcug_/'dod pa'i dga' ba'i glu gar dang /_
[\[205b.6\]]phreng ba dang /_dri dang /_byug pa dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_'khrig pa'i chos dang /_chang ra ro bar 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs shing smra ba nyung bar byed de/_de lta bu'i dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis chad par smra ba/_bdud kyi las la brtson pa de sems can rnams kyi dgrar gyur pa zhig byung ste/_
[\[205b.7\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i byed pa ni sngon ma thos ma mthong ba yin par kho bos rtogs so zhes des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du bcug go/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge sbyong chen po ud pa la'i gdong gis thos pa/_ga shed kyi ri khrod na kha cig 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bdag nyid kyang lam ngan par zhugs shing gzhan yang lta ba mi bzad pa 'dzin du 'jug ste/_dkon mchog gsum la mi snyan pa sgrogs so zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag gis sems can 'di dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las yongs su thar bar ma byas 
[\[206a.2\]]shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la ma bkod na bdag dge sbyong du gyur pa don med do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ldongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten du bdag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/_ji ltar rab tu nyam thag par gyur pa'i bdud 
[\[206a.3\]]bzhi'i zhags pas bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgrol bar nus snyam ste/_de nas dge sbyong chen po ud pa la'i gdong rtul ba che zhing brtan pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la zhus te/_srog chags brgya stong du mas 
[\[206a.4\]]bskor cing mdun du bdar nas mtha' 'khob kyi grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ri dang /_ri brag nyam nga ba'i gnas de dang de dag na spyad pa spyod cing de dang de dag tu sems can de dag la ci nas sems can de dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las bzlog ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba la 
[\[206a.5\]]btsud nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod/_gzhan la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par smon pa la/_la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la/_la la ni 'bras bu la bkod/_la la ni rab tu phyung /_la la ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la/_la la ni za gcig pa la/_la 
[\[206a.6\]]la ni dus khrims pa la/_la la ni skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la bkod pa de lta bur chos bstan to/_/bud med dag la ni rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad de/_bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur nas skyes pa la bkod do/_/srog chags mang po gang de bzhin gshegs pa la the tshom du gyur 
[\[206a.7\]]pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa'i lta bar song ba de las bzlog ste/_nyes pa 'chags su bcug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de nyid la phul nas rab tu phyung ngo /_/shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul ni ma gtogs te/_
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]des 'di ltar ud pa la'i gdong 'dis bdag gi 'khor rnams bslus te khrid kyis/_bdag gis kyang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud byas te/_'di ltar mngal na 'dug pa tshun chad 'di la rnam par 'tshe'o/_/
[\[206b.2\]]de nas phyis btsas nas kyang gzhon nu rtsed mo byed pa dang /_bzo'i las kyi mtha' dang /_klog cing 'dug pa dang /_dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba nas byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du skrag par bya'o/_/bgegs bya'o/_/byang chub thob 
[\[206b.3\]]nas kyang bstan pa gzhig par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/_/de nas dge sbyong ud pa la'i gdong gis shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul gyis smon lam de ltar brtul te btab pa la mthu chen po dang 'bad pa drag pos dad par byas te sdig pa'i lta ba thibs po de las bzlog nas nyes pa 'chags su 
[\[206b.4\]]bcug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chab tu sems bskyed du bcug go/_/de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul rab tu dul zhing dad pa skyes nas 'di skad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[206b.5\]]rgyas pa de'i tshe byang chub thob nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol zhes smon lam btab bo/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang rim gro rnam pa du 
[\[206b.6\]]ma byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang bcas te khyim nas byung nas rab tu byung zhing /_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las bzlog ste/_theg pa gsum la bkod/_sems can dpag tu med pa ni 'bras bu la bkod/_bud med bye ba 
[\[206b.7\]]khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa ni skyes pa thob par byas pa'i rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the tshom mam/_yid gnyis sam/_som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur te/_ngas de lta bu'i skyes bu'i mthu byas so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba gang gis dge sbyong thob par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du the tshom mam/_yid gnyis sam/_
[\[207a.2\]]som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de'i tshe de'i dus na the tshom du gyur pa'i srog chags bye ba mang po dang bcas te sangs 
[\[207a.3\]]rgyas la mi snyan pa'i bar du zer ba shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam du khyod the tshom mam/_yid gnyis sam/_som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdud sdig can 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya bar gyur te/_gang 
[\[207a.4\]]de'i tshe ngas de'i 'khor rab tu phyung nas de'i phyir nga la sems rab tu khro ba bskyed nas phyis smon lam btab ste/_khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig 
[\[207a.5\]]ces byas so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de la ma dad cing ma bsdams pa'i tshig smras te/_sdig pa'i lta bar song ba bzung nas/_ngas khyed sdig pa'i lta bar song ba de las kun thar bar byas te rab tu phyung nas/_de tshun chad 
[\[207a.6\]]khyed kyis sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/_de dag la mchod pa dang rim gro byas/_de dag las chos mnyan te smon lam btab nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad de/_khyed lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i las de sngon bskal pa du mar ngan song gsum du sdug 
[\[207a.7\]]bsngal myong ngo /_/las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis da ltar bdud sdig can gyi gnas su skyes so/_/rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa na/_bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]pa'i dngos por gyur te mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[207b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha dang mi'i bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni bud med kyi dngos po las 
[\[207b.3\]]gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po rnyed do/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs la sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan 
[\[207b.4\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rgya cher snang bas khyab par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yod pa de dag na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud bye ba phrag brgya gang dag bdud byed pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus dogs pa skyes te/_snang ba chen po 'di gang nas byung zhes 
[\[207b.5\]]gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la blta zhing bdud sdig can zhes bya ba gang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa de bdag cag bas stobs che zhing dbang che la mthu che na/_'di de'i mthu'am snyam nas/_de nas bdud de dag gis bltas na bdud sdig can de mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug 
[\[207b.6\]]cing yid rab tu mi dga' ba de mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang bdud sdig can gyi khang pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ci'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling 
[\[207b.7\]]bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas/_khyod mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug_/de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag la rgyas par smras pa/_kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/shAkya'i rigs las shin tu g.yo dang sgyur ldan pa'i dge sbyong zhig 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]'dir skyes te/_de skyes ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas/_rab tu g.yos par byas/_'khrugs par byas te/_dngangs par byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa 'di na mkhas pa gang su tshangs pa'i dbang po'am/_
[\[208a.2\]]klu'i dbang po'am/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/_mi 'am ci'i dbang po nas/_gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du mkhas pa su yang rung /_de dag thams cad de la mchod pa'i 
[\[208a.3\]]phyir 'dong ngo /_/lo drug gi bar du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'dug ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs pas kho bos kyang rang gi stobs kun bstan par 'dod nas sde dang g.yog bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang de'i drung du dong ste kun tu bskor nas bdud kyi stobs dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang 
[\[208a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pa thams cad bstan kyang de'i spu'i khung bu gcig kyang dngangs shing 'jigs par bya ma nus na stan de las bskyod pa lta ci smos/_bgegs gzhan bya bar lta ga la nus te/_dmangs des de lta bu'i sgyu shin tu bstan cing sa g.yo bar byas pas kho 
[\[208a.5\]]bo sde dang bcas te pham nas shing bcad pa bzhin du sa'i steng du lhung ngo /_/de der 'dug ste de 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs nas 'di ltar bdud kyi yul thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_rig pa bsgrubs nas stan de las langs te sems can rnams la rab tu bstan nas gling bzhi pa'i 
[\[208a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can su mkhas shing shes pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i sgyus 'dun par byas te/_de dag gi sems dang /_'gro ba drug tu skye ba dang /_'gro ba yang kho bos mi shes so/_/gang dag de la skyabs su dong ba de dag gi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam yang dngangs pa dang 'khrugs par 
[\[208a.7\]]kho bos byed ma nus na de la slu ba'am bskyod par lta ga la nus te/_deng kho bo'i g.yog mo lnga brgya dang /_bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma dmangs de la skyabs su dong nas chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod de/_kho bos de dag de dang phral bar ma nus so/_/de'i phyir 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]stobs dang ldan pa/_bsod nams dang ldan pa/_shes pa dang ldan pa/_dbang phyug dang ldan pa khyod kho bo'i grogs gyis dang /_shAkya'i bu dmangs de srog dang dbral lo/_/de la sems can gang dag skyabs su song ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam par gzhig par bya'o/_/dge sbyong g.yo sgyu 
[\[208b.2\]]can nag po'i phyogs pham par byas te/_bdud kyi phyogs dkar po snang bar byas la/_de phyin chad bde ba la reg par gnas par bya'o/_/de nas bdud me 'od ces bya bas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa la bltas pa dang /_de nas bdud me 'od kyis 
[\[208b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mthong /_sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa thos so/_/mthong nas de spu zing zhes byed cing dngangs par gyur te/_de nas des bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ma lus zhing na 'di ni gzugs bzang mchog_/bsod nams shes pas ring nas gnas 
[\[208b.4\]]gtsang ste/_/nyon mongs rnam grol lam ldan yun ring lon/_/srid pa kun zad mya ngan rnams las thar/_/khyod kyang mi rigs khro ba'i dbang ma 'gro/_/gtso mchog 'di ni srid pa gsum na skyabs/_/'di la zhe sdang cung zad su skyed pa/_/de ni rmongs shing bde ba nyams par 'gyur/_/
[\[208b.5\]]de nas gzhan yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ni 'phrul chen bsod nams rab kyi mtshan/_/mi gnas 'gro ba kun las rab tu thar/_/sdug bsngal ma lus zad pa'i lam ston pa/_/bdud brgya kun gyis gtse bar bya mi nus/_/sdig can 
[\[208b.6\]]gyis smras pa/_nga yi skye bo dag la dbang byas te/_/khyod kyi skye bo 'di yang de dbang 'gro/_/de yis ring por mi thogs yul stongs byed/_/'u bu cag kyang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de nas bdud nags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ni rab tu 'byor par gyur pa'i tshe/_/
[\[208b.7\]]de na khyod kyis rang gi dpa' ba bstan/_/da ni rab tu dpung nyams re chad na/_/de ring ci phyir thams cad mkhyen la sdo/_/bdud ral gri zla ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ni su la'ang yid kyi khro ba med/_/mi gnas de ni bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang /_/khams gsum dag las 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]thar zhing 'gro ba rgyu/_/de la gzhan gyis gsad par mi nus so/_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_'dod khams 'di na sems can gang 'khod pa/_/'dod la chags shing nga rgyal dregs pas myos/_/de dag nga phyir rtag 'brang phyag brnyan te/_/de dag tshogs pas ci phyir de mi 
[\[209a.2\]]sod/_/de nas bdud sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/snying po med cing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar/_/dngos po kun shes srid pa rnam par brtul/_/srid par ma chags nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/_/de la bgegs byed nus par ga la 'gyur/_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_mi yi 
[\[209a.3\]]'jig rten 'di na de yang yod/_/bza' btung zhim po sman dang gos rnyed cing /_/tshor ba gsum yang de yi sems la yod/_/ci phyir de la brlag par bya mi nus/_/bdud sred spong zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ni/_/rdzu 'phrul bdag cag 
[\[209a.4\]]yul na ci yod pa/_/don grub 'phrul la cha shas mi reg na/_/de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus/_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_ngas ni de la zan bcad byas/_/de la rdo ba dag kyang 'phangs/_/de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas/_/gnas dag nas kyang rab tu bskyod/_/bdud shes mig 
[\[209a.5\]]ces bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis gang tshe de la bgegs byas tshe/_/de ni khros pas cung zad 'tshig pa'am/_/khyod la khro gnyer bzhin yang bstan byas sam/_/de las khyod kyis tshig ngan mngon thos sam/_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_de ni so sor brtags pas rtag 
[\[209a.6\]]tu bzod/_/'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang gti mug bral/_/de ni sems can kun la byams sems ldan/_/'dre bar spyod pa la yang de brtag go/_/bdud thub dka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kun sbyor gsum gyi zhags pas gang bcings pa/_/de la bdag cag nan 
[\[209a.7\]]tan bgegs bya mod/_/des ni skyon dang gti mug zhags pa spangs/_/de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus/_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_stobs thob khyed cag nga yi grogs yin te/_/khyed rnams bag yod byos la de'u re chos/_/thams cad phyogs su ri yi phreng ba dang /_/sa 'di ma 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]lus byin gyis chur brlab bo/_/mkha' las mi bzad stug pa'i brag char dang /_/lcags kyi phye ma'i phung po rab tu dbab/_/lcags mda' mdung thung spu gri mda' bo che/_/de lus phye mar brlag phyir dbab par bya/_/kun nas rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang /_/mdung thung ral gri 
[\[209b.2\]]tho ba rnams phab la/_/'bar ba mngon 'phangs sbyor ba de dag gis/_/shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya/_/de bzhin du bdud bye ba'i bar du thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras so/_/de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[209b.3\]]'dong bar bgyi'o/_/rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos la sde dang g.yog tu bcas te 'dong ngo /_/bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_stobs kyi yul de dag thams cad bstan par ni bya na/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de rtsal ci 'dra ba de'i mod la rab tu ston te/_khyod rang gis rigs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[209b.4\]]de nas bdud bye ba rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos te/_bdud bye ba re re zhing yang g.yog stong stong ya lad rnam pa mang po gyon pa/_lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa/_go cha rnam pa sna tshogs bgos pa dag dang chas te/_de'i nub mo 'das nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir phyin te/_yul ang ga ma ga 
[\[209b.5\]]d+hA'i drang thad kyi nam mkha' la 'khod nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum gang dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[209b.6\]]la sems ma dad cing gus par bya ba yid la byed pa med par gyur la/_chos dang dge 'dun la'ang sems ma dad pa yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das bgrongs su bcug nas/_de dag kyang lag cha dang /_go cha sna tshogs dang chas te de nyid na 'khod do/_/
[\[209b.7\]]bdud sdig can ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bsgyur nas/_drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po la dad pa/_rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi pha rol tu son pa/_g.yog lnga brgya yod pa/_gangs kyi ri'i ngos la gnas pa 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]de'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/gau ta ma rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog_/mkhas shing mngon par shes pa dag lag na gnas/_/ang ga ma ga d+hA na der 'dug de ring ni/_/rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bsod snyoms spyod/_/brtan por sna tshogs gsal 
[\[210a.2\]]ba'i gtam rnams kyis/_/de dang khyod du lhan cig smra bar byos/_/der khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po yang /_/gdon mi za bar rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras te/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/_rang gi 'khor gyi 
[\[210a.3\]]bdud rnams la bsgo ba/_ngas deng mi mtshungs blos bsams ci 'dra nga las khyod nyon cig_/bdag yul bdud kyi dregs chen 'joms pa'i sgyu de mi ston par/_/rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan de shAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra/_/de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la brtse ba bu la ma byams bzhin/_/de yi 
[\[210a.4\]]slob ma rgyags spangs gdon mi za bar snga dro ni/_/grong khyer dag tu g.yeng ba med par mthar gyis rgyu ba na/_/de dag glu gar snyan mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du gzungs/_/de thos shAkya'i khyu mchog ci nas yid spro med par bya/_/bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_glang chen rnga mo seng ge 
[\[210a.5\]]ma he stag gtum sgra drag dbyar dus kyi/_/'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu du ma grong de'i phyi rol myur sprul te/_/bdag cag lag cha mtshon thogs 'dug pa ngo mtshar mngon sum de mthong na/_/bslad cing mi dran rdzu 'phrul stor te de nas tha dad phyogs su 'gro/_/bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_lam srang 
[\[210a.6\]]bzhi mdo rta babs dag na mi sdug gdong [{]mangs [,]mang [}]'khod/_/sna tshogs mtshon rnon mda' chen mda' zhags brla dgas ral gri thogs/_/nam mkha' las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra grag sprin las lce yang 'bebs/_/de nas sa g.yos 'jigs pas dbang med myur du ma rungs 'gyur/_/bdud de dag gis 
[\[210a.7\]]bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang /_rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud kyi sgra yang mi 'byin/_phyogs bzhi na me dang ri yang med/_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]sprin nag po yang med/_dus ma yin pa'i rlung yang med de/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang byin gyi rlabs kyis klu gang yang tha na char pa thigs pa gcig tsam yang mi 'bebs so/_/yang de'i tshe nyan thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i 
[\[210b.2\]]khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu dar la bab pa/_byad bzhin bzang ba/_btsun pa'i 
[\[210b.3\]]cha byad dang 'dra ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ste/_de dag gis lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/_shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge sbyong glu long shig_/dge sbyong gar byos shig_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_grogs 
[\[210b.4\]]po dag khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par bya yis nyon cig_/bdud gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyis gcom bskyungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/skye mched dag gis shin tu chog_/skye mched dag gis bdag cag bslus/_/
[\[210b.5\]]skye mched dag ni gsod pa ste/_/skye mched dag gis mthar dbyung ngo /_/phung po byas pas shin tu chog_/phung po byas pas bdag cag bslus/_/phung po byas pa gsod pa ste/_/phung po byas pa ngas mthar dbyung /_/'di lta ste/_ba ha ra/_ba ha ra/_b+ha ra ba ha/_ma ri tsai ba ha/_sa t+ya ba 
[\[210b.6\]]ha A ma ba ha swA hA/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu rgyug cing /_glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang /_de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/mgon po bdag cag de ring 
[\[210b.7\]]bzod par gsol/_/'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ston pa'i mchog khyod de/_/phung po khyod kyis ji ltar 'jigs bcas bshad/_/bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum/_/bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas maud gal gyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas glu'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste 'di skad ces 
[\[211a.2\]]smras so/_/khams nyid dag gis shin tu chog_/khams nyid dag gis bdag cag bslus/_/khams nyid dag ni gsod pa ste/_/khams nyid bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo /_/tshor ba dag gis shin tu chog_/tshor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus/_/tshor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/_/
[\[211a.3\]]tshor ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo /_/sems pa dag gis shin tu chog_/sems pa dag gis bdag cag bslus/_/sems pa dag ni gsod pa ste/_/sems pa bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo /_/'du shes byas pas shin tu chog_/'du shes byas pas bdag cag bslus/_/'du shes byas pa 
[\[211a.4\]]gsod pa ste/_/'du shes byas pas ngas mthar dbyung /_/'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog_/'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslu/_/'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/_/'khor ba bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo /_/'di lta ste/_A ma ba/_A ma ba/_A ma ba/_A ra dza/_na ra dza ha sha ma mya tha/_sha ma mya tha 
[\[211a.5\]]ga gan ba swA hA/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang /_de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phrul ldan sbas pa 'phags 
[\[211a.6\]]lam thub dbang sras/_/'khor ba'i nyes la mnyam lta chos kyi sgron/_/sdig spangs bdag cag ri mo gus pa skyes/_/sangs rgyas chos mchog dge 'dun deng skyabs so/_/bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo 
[\[211a.7\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas glu'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste 'di skad ces 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]smras so/_/reg pa byas pas shin tu chog_/reg pa byas pas bdag cag bslus/_/reg pa byas pas gsod pa ste/_/reg pa bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo /_/bdag po dag gis shin tu chog_/bdag po dag gis bdag cag bslus/_/bdag po dag ni gsod pa ste/_/bdag po 
[\[211b.2\]]bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo /_/'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog_/'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus/_/'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/_/'khor ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo /_/srid pa kun gyis shin tu chog_/srid pa kun gyis bdag cag bslus/_/srid pa kun ni gsod 
[\[211b.3\]]pa ste/_/srid pa kun ni ngas mthar dbyung /_/'dod pa'i dga' bas shin tu chog_/'dod pa'i dga' bas bdag cag bslus/_/'dod pa'i dga' bas gsod pa ste/_/'dod pa'i dga' ba ngas mthar dbyung /_/grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste/_/ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na/_/
[\[211b.4\]]byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te/_/mi mkhas gzugs kyi dregs pas myos/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_mi mkhas sgra yi dregs pas myos/_/mi mkhas dri yi dregs pas myos/_/mi mkhas ro yi dregs pas myos/_/mi mkhas reg gi dregs pas myos/_/grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste/_/
[\[211b.5\]]ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na/_/byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te/_/mi mkhas chos kyi dregs pas myos/_/mi mkhas phung po'i dregs pas myos/_/mi mkhas khams kyi dregs pas myos/_/mi mkhas longs spyod dregs pas myos/_/mi mkhas bde ba'i dregs pas myos/_/
[\[211b.6\]]mi mkhas rigs kyi dregs pas myos/_/mi mkhas 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos/_/grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste/_/ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na/_/byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te/_/mi mkhas kun gyi dregs pas myos/_/'di lta ste/_kharga ba/_kharga ba/_kharga ba/_mun nyi ni/_
[\[211b.7\]]A brta/_bi brta/_kha brte/_pra ma ar+Tha/_dz+yo ti ra brta swa hA/_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang /_de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/_
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]yid rab tu dga' nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khams rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang /_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas bskyed pa dang /_/zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis nye bar bstan/_/mchog sbyin dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/_/bdud gzhon 
[\[212a.2\]]nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/_/yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir 
[\[212a.3\]]zhugs pa dang /_grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu dar la bab pa/_byad bzhin bzang ba btsun pa'i cha byad 'chang ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/_rab 'byor la 'di 
[\[212a.4\]]skad ces smras so/_/dge sbyong glu long shig_/dge sbyong gar byos shig_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_grogs po dag khyed cis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par bya yis nyon cig_/de dag gis gcom bskyungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad 
[\[212a.5\]]ces smras so/_/dngos po thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin/_/'dus byas g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med/_/smig rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin de la ther zug med/_/chos kun myur du 'jig par blo dang ldan pas shes/_/sdug bsngal chos gzir byis pa thams cad 
[\[212a.6\]]gar chags pa/_/reg kun sdug bsngal khur yin tshor ba dag kyang med/_/ji ltar dad pa byang chub lam bsgom bsten byed pa/_/de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med/_/chos kun mtshan nyid gcig ste 'du shes spangs pa dge/_/bdag med ldan pas spyod kun rdzas 
[\[212a.7\]]kyi mtshan nyid bdag_/srog dang gso ba gang zag dang ni byed pa med/_/bdud kyi g.yo dag thong la sems ni byang chub bsngos/_/nam mkha'i glog bzhin dbang po dag la rnam shes 'byung /_/reg dang tshor dang sems pa thams cad bdag med de/_/tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yang yod ma 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]yin/_/byis pa'i sde rnams bslus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug_/phung por thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med/_/yang dag mtha' ni stong zhing mtha' rnams kun dang bral/_/byang chub lam spyod des ni 'dren pas byang chub brnyes/_/rmongs med chos nyid 'di ni chos 
[\[212b.2\]]su skyob pas gsungs/_/'di lta ste/_su mun de/_bi mun de/_sun da dza ti/_si li si li si li/_a ba si li/_a ba ha si li/_ta tha tA si li/_b+hu ta ko Ti si li swA hA/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di 
[\[212b.3\]]dag smras pa dang /_de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/_yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song 'di 'dra'i chos ma thos/_/gti mug mi shes dngos pos sdig las ci bgyis pa/_/rgyal ba'i sras la bdag cag mngon sum 
[\[212b.4\]]deng bshags na/_/'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs/_/bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/_/yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus 
[\[212b.5\]]srang de dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang ste/_srang de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug_/maud gal gyi bu chen po ni nub phyogs su bltas te 'dug_/gang po ni lho phyogs su bltas te 'dug_/rab 'byor ni shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas 
[\[212b.6\]]gcig nas gcig tu dpag tshad phyed phyed tsam na 'khod do/_/nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag gi dbus kyi sa'i phyogs na khru lnga bcus 'khor ba'i pad ma chu ba ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser/_'dab ma ni bai dUr+ya sngon po/_/ze ba ni dpal gyi snying po/_/snying po ni mu tig_/dri ni lha'i spos las lhag pa/_
[\[212b.7\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa zhig byung ste/_pad mo de las snang ba byung ngo /_/snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/_srang de na pad ma de 'phang du mi gsum gyi khrun tsam du snang ngo /_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du ni pad 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]ma de'i 'phang du lha'i dpag tshad lnga bcu par snang ngo /_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du ni pad ma de'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya par snang ngo /_/'og min gyi lha'i bar du ni pad ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad phyed par snang ngo /_/pad ma de'i 'dab ma dag las tshig dang don dang tshigs 
[\[213a.2\]]su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/_sems can gang dag sa 'di la gnas pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'dir gang zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa/_/gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo 
[\[213a.3\]]gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/nyag gcig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byon pa the tshom med/_/mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang rig pa chos don mthar 'dod pa/_/tshul shes pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dir ston pas btul/_/'gro ba kun la phan don rig 
[\[213a.4\]]mkhas dam chos gsung ba che/_/thub pa smra mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pas de ring gshegs/_/dus gsum gshegs pa ston pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang /_/tshad med chos don rig pa mi dang lhar bcas 'gro ba skyob/_/'jig rten don dang phan spyod mkhas pa ye 
[\[213a.5\]]shes chen po'i sgron/_/dam pa gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs de ring 'dir kun ston/_/sdug bsngal phongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing /_/'jig rten don slad mi bsnyel blo gros mnga' bas spyad/_/ma rig pa yis bsgribs pa'i mig can dag la yang /_/dam pa'i chos kyis 
[\[213a.6\]]mig ni ji bzhin rab tu sbyin/_/thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'dir ni tshogs 'gyur gyis/_/don gyi dam pa gzigs pa gzugs bzang mchog mnga' la/_/stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa/_/smra ba'i seng ge ring por mi thogs 'dir gshegs so/_/'gro 
[\[213a.7\]]ba sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas pa gzigs nas ni/_/dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing /_/mngon par shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba/_/de ni chos kyi rnga chen brdung du yang dag gshegs/_/dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa/_/don 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo sgyur dbang po/_/pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyir/_/drug gi sa bon smra ba'i seng ge 'dir gshegs so/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad ma de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/khyed cag tshogs te de ring dga' 
[\[213b.2\]]ba spyod/_/bag med sems pa srid dang rgyags pas bsgribs/_/rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos/_/bag med gyur pas bde gshegs mchod mi byed/_/'dod pa mi rtag chu yi zla ba bzhin/_/skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tu sra/_/dga' ba dag la bag med 
[\[213b.3\]]ma thar ba/_/nam yang mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bag med zhi ba'i phyir mi 'jug_/dge dang mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam/_/rga dang na 'chi'i 'jigs pas kun zin cing /_/khyed cag ngan song sa la rab tu zhugs/_/sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la/_/sten 
[\[213b.4\]]cig sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang srungs/_/'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spongs la/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar dong /_/song ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyon/_/legs bshad de ni khyod kyi don chen te/_/shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu/_/dam pa'i chos ldan 
[\[213b.5\]]mnyan pa don chen no/_/gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bcu drug gi bar du pad ma de'i 'dab ma las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo /_/mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba nyon mongs med/_/rab tu bsgrims te chos la rnam par bsgoms/_/ma 'khrul sems dang rnam par thar 
[\[213b.6\]]'dod pas/_/zhe sdang rab tu spangs pa'i blo gyis shig_/rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bstan pa yi/_/bzod pa mchog la rnam par bsgom par gyis/_/des ni na dang rga las thar ba yi/_/shin tu rnam thar myur du thob par 'gyur/_/gang rnams gzugs kyi rnam rtog srog la chags/_/ther 
[\[213b.7\]]zug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por lta/_/de dag gi ni skye ba'i rgyun mi 'chad/_/de rnams ngan song sa la shin tu 'bab/_/rtag tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing /_/byed med rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas/_/rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa/_/de dag 'gro ba kun las 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]thar bar 'gyur/_/skye dang 'jig 'grol chos 'di thams cad la/_/nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams sgom byed pa/_/de dag 'chi med rga med na ba'ang med/_/ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad pa'ang med/_/gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags/_/lam de mchog 
[\[214a.2\]]ste shin tu dag pa yin/_/da ltar shAkya seng ge 'di bzhin du/_/bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par 'joms par 'gyur/_/gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spang phyir/_/ci yang med cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa/_/tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa rnams/_/de dag la ni 
[\[214a.3\]]lam mchog 'di bshad do/_/bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur par/_/chos 'di thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su/_/smon pa spangs na bla na med pa yi/_/byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg par 'gyur/_/de lta bu'i don gyi tshig gis chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi 
[\[214a.4\]]khams 'dir mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs te/_srang gi dbus na pad ma de 'khor bar 'dug go/_/'og min gyi lha grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad ma de'i khor yug tu 'khod do/_/bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas 
[\[214a.5\]]kun tu bltas te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang gi dbus na pad ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag byung ste/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad ma de 'khor bar 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng 
[\[214a.6\]]du bltas na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi gnas thams cad na yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad ma de 'khor bar 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te/_spu zing zhes 
[\[214a.7\]]byed par gyur cing /_lus rngul te lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen pos bos te bdud gzhan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi 'gyur yid kyis nga yi tshig nyon la/_/nga la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med/_/thub stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de/_/skye bo brtan phyir 'jig 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]rten 'dir 'dug go/_/lha mi dga' ba'i dam pa 'dir byung ste/_/'gro mchog ma lus nges par nye bar dong /_/bde gshegs tshig la skom zhing rab tu dga'/_/yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i lam du 'gro/_/'di ni 'jig rten gsum po slu ba dge sbyong sgyu yin te/_/lha mi mang po thams cad yid gcig 
[\[214b.2\]]pad ma 'khor bar 'dug_/da ni 'jigs pa'i skad phyung myur du ri yi char phob ste/_/ci nas bdud kyi sde btsan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dir brlag gyis/_/de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gi phan byed tshig 'di nyon cig khyod kyi chos rig na/_/bdag 
[\[214b.3\]]sde brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid sku dang dpal 'chang gzugs mthong bdag cag myos/_/sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skyabs rab mchog gzhan med/_/de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu ngu zhing gdong mchog tu khro bas non pas bdud sdig can la 
[\[214b.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa/_/bdag gi stobs mthu med pa'ang mi shes sam/_/'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod sdo ba/_/ngo mi tsha 'am 'dzem par mi bya 'am/_/bdag cag stobs ni shin tu brlag par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus 
[\[214b.5\]]pa/_/pad ma'i drung du nye bar der 'dong ste/_/chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shin tu dag_/bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag gyur te/_/lus ni dri nga stobs dang brtson 'grus stor/_/ci tsam skad cig brlag par ma gyur pa/_/de yi bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dong /_/de nas bdud gzhan 
[\[214b.6\]]zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod ni chos kyi spyod pa spangs shing sdig byed dga'/_/sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i phan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog_/grong khyer 'dir byon bdag cag myur du dga' zhing dang bas blta/_/'jig rten gsum mchod srog chags 
[\[214b.7\]]kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'dong /_/de nas nam mkha' de nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba des sgra chen por 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed kun tshogs pas gus shing dga' ldan nga yi tshig nyon cig_/sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btud ngag yid 'thun spyod de/_/khro spangs rab dga' thub 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]pa'i gsung mchog la yang dga' dad bskyed/_/sangs rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs dong de ring gus par mchod/_/de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas te/_bdud la la ni 'khor 
[\[215a.2\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do/_/la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/_la la ni dbang byed kyi cha byad du/_la la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byad du/_la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byad du/_la la ni dga' ldan pa'i 
[\[215a.3\]]cha byad du/_la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/_la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byad du/_la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/_la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byad du/_la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/_la la ni 'phags skyes po'i cha byad du/_la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byad du/_la la ni yul 
[\[215a.4\]]'khor srung gi cha byad du/_la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i cha byad du/_la la ni nyi ma'i cha byad du/_la la ni zla ba'i cha byad du/_la la ni skar ma'i cha byad du/_la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/_la la ni nam mkha' lding gi cha byad du/_la la ni mi'am ci'i cha byad du/_la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i 
[\[215a.5\]]cha byad du/_la la ni rin po che'i cha byad du/_la la ni gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/_la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byad du/_la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen po'i cha byad du/_la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byad du/_la la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byad du/_la la ni 'khor lo rin po che'i cha 
[\[215a.6\]]byad du/_la la ni nor bu rin po che'i cha byad du/_la la ni glang po rin po che sa srung gi bu'i cha byad du/_la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi cha byad du/_la la ni bud med rin po che'i cha byad du/_la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/_la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/_
[\[215a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/_/la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sngo la phyang 'phrul dang /_rgyan dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dmar po dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'phang du ta 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do/_/la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la phyang 'phrul dang /_spud pa kha dog le brgan te gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan ser po dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do/_/la la ni le brgan kha dog le brgan la gser gyi gos dang /_phyang 
[\[215b.2\]]'phrul dang /_lhab lhub ste/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mthing ga thogs shing 'khod do/_/la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so/_/la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la mu tig dmar po'i char 'bebs so/_/la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog tu 
[\[215b.3\]]bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/_nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so/_/la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/_nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so/_/la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo /_/
[\[215b.4\]]la la ni lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te sa la chag chag 'debs so/_/la la ni mching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par byed do/_/la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin to/_/la la ni kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[215b.5\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do/_/bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs so/_/
[\[215b.6\]]la la ni srang dang /_khang pa dang /_khyim dang /_skar khung dang /_rta babs dang /_bsil khang dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_sgo khang dang /_shing khang dang /_gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i 
[\[215b.7\]]phyir 'khod do/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe/_rab tu 'khrugs te skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag la phyin chad grogs med de/_/bdag gi dpal deng 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]thams cad stor/_/bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams/_/brtson 'grus tha ma brtsam par bya/_/bdag gis pad ma rtsa ba bcad/_/pad ma bcad dang kun 'khrugs te/_/des na sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro/_/de ni tha ma'i stobs yin no/_/bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsams nas rlung 
[\[216a.2\]]lta bur nam mkha' las babs te/_srang gi pad ma ga la ba der phyin nas pad ma de'i sdong po yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na reg par yang ma nus/_pad ma'i 'dab ma bcad par 'dod na de dag kyang ma mthong /_pad ma'i snying po lag pas brdab par 'dod na de yang ma dmigs te/_dper na glog snang yang mi 
[\[216a.3\]]dmigs pa bzhin no/_/'di lta ste dper na grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pad mo de yang snang mod kyi mi dmigs so/_/gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing rig par mi rung ba de'i tshe/_'khor thams cad rab tu dngangs par bya ba'i phyir skad drag cing che la 
[\[216a.4\]]'jigs pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod na de yang ma nus so/_/yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te rab tu bskyod par 'dod na reg par yang ma nus te ma dmigs so/_/'di lta ste dper na la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na mi dmigs pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can 
[\[216a.5\]]gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung zhing ma dmigs nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ci nas sems can 'dus pa rnams brtags te sems rnam par 'khrugs par bya'o snyam na sems can de dag mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par yang ma nus so/_/de nas bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing sangs rgyas kyi mthus 
[\[216a.6\]]de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'dar te/_gdong mchi ma can gyis phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge sbyong gis ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'di byas/_/'di ltar bdag ni mdun 'dir slad bzhin skad cig myos par song /_/yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog 
[\[216a.7\]]kyang zad/_/des bskrad brlag par ma gyur bar du bdag gnas myur du 'gro/_/bdag gi gnas su 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma nus te/_/rab tu skrag cing ngus nas 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong /_dgra 'di'i mdun 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]du bdag gi srog zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/_ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi pha rol du 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam na/_'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba'am/_phyogs dang phyogs 
[\[216b.2\]]mtshams su 'bros kyang ma nus te/_de nyid du mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis mthong nas rab tu khros shing skrag ste/_skad chen por ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo zhes zer ro/_/de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes 
[\[216b.3\]]bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur te/_des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci phyir khyod deng mya ngan yid kyis ngu gdangs sgra chen 'bod/_/'gro ba kun gtso thub mchog skyabs su ma 'jigs myur du song /_/'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal 
[\[216b.4\]]gsum sel ba/_/'di la bsnyen bkur zhi 'gro ba de ba thob par 'gyur yang dag_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gi tshig snyan pas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su song la/_bcings pa 'di las bdag grol bar bya'o snyam du bsams te/_de nas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na 
[\[216b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag skyabs su mchi'o/_/'di skad 
[\[216b.6\]]ces kyang gsol to/_/thub mchog myur du 'jigs chen mi bzad bcings pa 'di las khrol/_/de ring slan chad bde gshegs gtso mchog skyabs su bdag mchis te/_/gti mug gis ni bdag ldongs khyod la khros shing nongs chen gyis/_/mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag so sor 
[\[216b.7\]]bshags par bgyi/_/gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis tshig snyan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ba de'i tshe na bdag grol ba snyam du shes so/_/yang gang gi tshe 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'i tshe yang mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis shes te/_
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro bar ma nus pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang /_skyabs su sems bskyed nas yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so/_/lan bdun gyi bar du bdag bcings pa dang grol bar shes te de nyid du 'dug go/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs 
[\[217a.2\]]las/_bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o//_//bam po bzhi pa/_gong du smos pa'i bar du ste/_nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba bdud gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong glu long shig_/dge sbyong gar 
[\[217a.3\]]byos shig ces spyod pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas/_nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis gang gi tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos so/_/skad cig de nyid la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[217a.4\]]sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos kyi kha lo bsgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang /_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu 
[\[217a.5\]]yi gnas gyur te/_/nyan thos de dag la ni kyal ka deng byas pa/_/'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po bye ba khrag khrig mang po 
[\[217a.6\]]gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/da ltar bstan pa 'di yi gnas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te/_/bstan pa'i cho ga bsrung slad du/_/kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig_/
[\[217a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ltar nga nyid der song ste/_/bzhon dpung bcas pa'i bdud btul la/_/skye bo mang po thams cad kyang /_/mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya/_/de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/_bdud kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/_klu'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab/_las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal tam/_yul thams cad kyi nang na 
[\[217b.2\]]ni sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang /_chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho ba skam pa dang /_lta ba'i rgya mo dral ba 
[\[217b.3\]]dang /_sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi/_'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa'i mi rigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud du gyur la/_de dag 
[\[217b.4\]]re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/_de dag thams cad nga la bsad par shom yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang gnod par mi nus so/_/ngas 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang /_gdul 
[\[217b.5\]]bar nus te/_bdud g.yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtogs so/_/yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan pas/_de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 
[\[217b.6\]]'gro bar bya ste yongs su spyod do/_/de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam na gdan las bzhengs par bzhed pa dang /_de nas 'od ma'i tshal bsrung ba'i lha mo mthu mdzes zhes bya ba 
[\[217b.7\]]des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/_/grong khyer 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis bltam/_/re re la yang shin tu ma rungs pa/_/bye bas smra ba'i seng ge bskor cing mchis/_/zhe sdang rab 'bar rno 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]ba'i mtshon thogs te/_/khyod dgrongs slad du 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis gnas/_/mgon po rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs/_/'jig rten rtsa lag brlag par ma bzhud cig_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs pa de'i tshe/_gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang 
[\[218a.2\]]ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sdig can dag ni lnga stong po/_/mtshon char bcas pa mchis pa ni/_/bsam med de dag khyod la sdo/_/thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug 
[\[218a.3\]]lag khang nas byung ba de'i tshe/_sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jig rten sgron ma brlag gyur na/_/kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing /_/chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig_/chos kyi gru yang 'jig par 'gyur/_
[\[218a.4\]]'jig rten kun na rgya chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur/_/'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs g.yo can gdug pas shin tu bltam/_/sa 'di bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rungs 'gyur ba las/_/ji ltar shin tu 'byung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis/_/khyod brlag bgyi slad 'di na rab tu mi bzad mang 
[\[218a.5\]]po dag_/sdig pa'i chos can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten bsrung slad bdag gi tshig gson te/_/stobs bcu grub par bzhud de de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dngar nas bzhud pa dang /_de na shing gi 
[\[218a.6\]]lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya ba de snying rje snying brtse bar ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thams cad don grub thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rungs gyur na ni/_/mgon po khams gsum 'di dag thams cad de'u re mig ni stor bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha' 'di 
[\[218a.7\]]la sbrul gyi rked chings rno ba'i mda' dang mtshon thogs shing /_/khyod dgrongs slad du kha nas me 'bar rgyu yis da ni der ma gshegs/_/de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/grong khyer bzang po 'di na 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po/_/mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par blta/_/gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams/_/khyod dgrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyis gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du byon 
[\[218b.2\]]pa dang /_der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer bsrung ba'i lha mo ta ma la'i snying po zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra cher ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings par song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan shul 'di seng ge rnga mo glang chen smyon 
[\[218b.3\]]pas bskor/_/dge slong rnams la gtse slad bdud kyi rnam mang gnod par bgyid/_/sa 'dir ston pa khyod dgrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson/_/sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse'i slad du ma gshegs shig_/bcom ldan bdud btul khyod kyis bstan pa rnam zhig dang /_/sgyu ma 
[\[218b.4\]]bgyis pa mi 'thun gdong can bdud mthong nas/_/lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams/_/kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs/_/dam chos cher zhig pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs gyur dang /_/nam mkha' skar ma'i 'od stor nyi zla gyur mthong nas/_/'gro mchog kye ma mi 
[\[218b.5\]]bzad klad pa deng drag rdob/_/bde gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi hud mchi/_/mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di nyams shing /_/chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs pas brlag_/chos kyi chu yang skam par 'gyur/_/dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du/_/ma rung 
[\[218b.6\]]'gyur ba nyer gnas tshe/_/mi dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang /_/'di dag tu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol/_/smra mchog de ring brlag 
[\[218b.7\]]par ma bzhud cig_/bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod gyur na/_/'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi/_/'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog_/bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud/_/sems can thugs brtse'i slad du 'dir gzhes te/_/sems can skye bas gtses pa 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]'jigs thar mdzod/_/dam pa brnyes nas sgrol bar rab 'gyur bar/_/sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs/_/sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs/_/srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung shi_/sku mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por 
[\[219a.2\]]bzhugs/_/kye ma 'dod la chags pa'i byis pa'i sde/_/de rnams zhi bgyid slad du chos lam shod/_/skye mched dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang /_de nas sa'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig skra bshig cing gdong 
[\[219a.3\]]mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni/_/rgya mtsho bzhin bltam pa yi khrag bstsal cing /_/dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam/_/spyan yang gang gA'i bye ma rnyed stsal to/_/sngon ni rin chen 
[\[219a.4\]]rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta/_/gnas dang gos dang mal cha zas skom dang /_/de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman bstsal/_/rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa mdzad/_/khyod kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs/_/bzod pa dang ni thos pa 
[\[219a.5\]]rtag tu bsnyen/_/phar 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no/_/bya ba dka' ba dag kyang mtha' yas spyad/_/sems can du ma nyon mongs thar bar mdzad/_/gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni/_/lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig_/chu bo chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral/_/'jig 
[\[219a.6\]]rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te/_/sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bsal bar bya/_/sems can mang po 'jigs med grong khyer gzud/_/sems can de dag dgos pa yongs rdzogs shing /_/byang chub dam pa la ni shin tu khod/_/'di na lam bor sdig pa spyod pa rnams/_/tshul khrims thos bshig 
[\[219a.7\]]mgon pos bzod par mdzod/_/'di dag sgrol tshig dam bcas dgongs su gsol/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por chos ston to/_/mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol/_/'di dag yan lag brgyad kyis chu yis khrus/_/mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni/_/'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]ma mchis/_/bdag grol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzad/_/srid gsum rgya mtsho las kyang 'gro ba sgrol/_/khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig_/rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang nas gshegs pa dang /_skad cig de nyid la lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[219b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag rnams kyis bde gshegs sngon mthong ba/_/zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul/_/chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na/_/de la de lta bu yi bgegs ma byung /_/
[\[219b.3\]]ston pa 'di ni shin tu dus ngan la/_/rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyes te/_/thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad slad du/_/'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing /_/smra ba'i seng ge 'di na bzhugs bzhin du/_/sdig can dag ni bye ba stong mang po/_/de ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig 
[\[219b.4\]]par bgyid/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo grong du deng ma gshegs/_/de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa/_/de dag yul cig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa/_/'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor/_/de ring ma rung bar ni gyur ta re/_/
[\[219b.5\]]de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slad/_/shin tu sems can don mdzad spyad/_/de ni de ring grong khyer 'dir/_/brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go/_/yang de'i tshe lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[219b.6\]]mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gdong la mchi ma zag cing ngom zung gnag pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/_la la ni skra 'bal/_la la ni rgyan 'grol/_la la ni gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang 
[\[219b.7\]]ba dan snyol/_la la ni bdag nyid kyi lus sa la rdob/_la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/_la la ni shin tu nyon mongs par ngu /_la la ni lag pas brang rdung /_la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so bya bzhin du 'gre ldog_/la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bstod 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]cing phyag 'tshal bar byed/_la la ni bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_gos dang /_phyang 'phrul dang /_gser gyi skud pa dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_ras bcos bu dag mngon par 'thor ro/_/de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang pos mgrin gcig 
[\[220a.2\]]tu skad mthon por 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jig rten don slad 'di bas mang ba yi/_/bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu spyad/_/zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod skyes kyis/_/btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugs su gsol/_/sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung ngu mdzad/_/
[\[220a.3\]]lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung /_/shin tu yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs la/_/srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol/_/dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smin te/_/bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can du ma la/_/khyod kyi thugs rje bskyed 
[\[220a.4\]]de so sor rab ston la/_/chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyam thag bsgral bar mdzod/_/'gro ba dgon pa'i dbus song 'khyams gyur cing /_/'khor ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor ba/_/de dag la ni lam mchog so sor ston/_/'phags pa'i chos mchog tshig gis thar bar mdzod/_/chos kyi 'khor 
[\[220a.5\]]lo dam pa gang bskor ba/_/de ni khyod kyi thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad/_/rlabs chen thugs mnga' ring du bzhugs su gsol/_/'gro ba rnams ni mgon med ma gyur cig_/de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rnam 'dren brgya la ma rung gyur na ni/_/'jig rten 'di ltar ma lus 
[\[220a.6\]]ldongs par 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad lam rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu/_/'dir ni yong ye thams cad ma mchis 'gyur/_/ngag lus sems las skyes dge sa bon dag_/bdag cag bag yod gyur pas 'dir btab ste/_/de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan/_/bsod nams 'byung gnas 'dir brlag ma 
[\[220a.7\]]gyur cig_/yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lhags kyang /_/thub pa rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni/_/ma rung mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig_/dge ba 'di 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]la bdag cag mngon sum gyur/_/dpag tshad sum cu drug tu mgyogs shing drag shul ldan pas kun tu bskor/_/sna bgrang ral gri mtshon rnon rtsub pa'i sgra mang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde/_/byang chub snying por lhags pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs shing brlag gyur na/_/da ltar don brnyes grags pas khyab pa de la ga la 
[\[220b.2\]]bgegs shig byed/_/de nas lha mo gzhan zhig ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mi che/_/'di ni bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi sde ste shin tu dpung che bas/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa 'di ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dogs/_/de brlag na ni 'jig rten 'di 
[\[220b.3\]]dag shin tu snang med 'khyam par 'ong /_/de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gson te/_/dge ba bzhugs shing gtso bo thugs rje can/_/lha mang bye ba mya 
[\[220b.4\]]ngan chen pos gdungs/_/de la chos kyi bcud kyis da gtor cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/_de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/deng khyed ma 'jigs khyed ni 
[\[220b.5\]]ma skrag shig_/bdud rnams thams cad bzhon bcas gcig char du/_/tshogs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nus na/_/nga yi lus kun la ni smos ci dgos/_/deng ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste/_/nga yis rtag tu sa 'dir chos bshad do/_/lam rnams stor ba la ni nga nyid kyis/_/dri ma 
[\[220b.6\]]med pa yang dag lam bstan bya/_/ngas sngon bya ba dka' ba mang po byas/_/zas dang skom yang shin tu rgya cher byin/_/gnas dang sman yang mi nyung sbyin byin pas/_/nga la deng su gnod par byed par nus/_/ngas ni rta dang glang chen shing rta dang /_/lhab lhub phyang 'phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang /_/bran pho 
[\[220b.7\]]bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang /_/nga la su zhig gnod par byed par nus/_/chung ma bu pho bu mo bran mang dang /_/yid 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal po'i rigs/_/sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byin rlob/_/nga lus de ring ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur/_/mgo dang sna dang rna ba mig gnyis dang /_/lus dang 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pags pa khrag dang rkang lag bcas/_/nga yi srog kyang lus can rnams la btang /_/su zhig nga la 'tshe bar byed par nus/_/ngas ni sangs rgyas bye ba rab mang la/_/gus ldan bdag gi lag nas shin tu mchod/_/rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang bzod la dga'/_/nga la 
[\[221a.2\]]su zhig rlag par byed par nus/_/ngas sngon shin tu bya dka' mang po rnams/_/mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu nga yis byas/_/lus kun bcad kyang nga la 'khrug med na/_/nga la rnam par 'tshe ba su zhig nus/_/nyon mongs ngas btul nges par nga sangs rgyas/_/sems can thams cad la ni 
[\[221a.3\]]byams sems ldan/_/khro med phrag dog tha ba nga la med/_/nga yi mdun na de ring su zhig nus/_/ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul/_/ngas ni bdud mang bye ba pham par byas/_/khyed kun rnam par thar par nges par bya/_/grong du ci phyir mi 'gro ma 'jigs shig_/sems can don 
[\[221a.4\]]phyir phyogs bcu 'di dag na/_/sangs rgyas la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' yang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun na bsogs/_/zhing rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya/_/bsod nams ye shes dag gis gnas par bya/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[221a.5\]]de dag tshul bcas kun gnas pas/_/sangs rgyas dag gi dgongs pa'i mdzad pa bya/_/yang de'i tshe lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu 
[\[221a.6\]]med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 
[\[221a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs phyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pham par mdzad do/_/sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal to/_/sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil to/_/skye ba'i shing ljon pa 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bcad do/_/'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlags so/_/ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal to/_/gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad par bsgyur to/_/chu bo bzhi skams so/_/chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do/_/byang chub kyi lam ston to/_/bzod pa dang des pa la btsud do/_/bsam gtan gyi 
[\[221b.2\]]bde ba la rtser stsal to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par mdzad do/_/ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to/_/sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu btsud do/_/de nas lha dang mi de 
[\[221b.3\]]dag gis bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag dar byas so/_/lha'i gos dang /_me tog dang /_lha'i ras bcos bus kun tu g.yogs so/_/
[\[221b.4\]]lha'i me tog man dar ba dang /_man dar ba chen po dang /_ba ru sha ka dang /_ba ru sha ka chen po dang /_many+dzu sha ka dang /_many+dzu sha ka chen po dang /_mdog mdzes dang /_mdog mdzes chen po dang /_ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad mas kun tu g.yogs so/_/gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[221b.5\]]gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos gnyis su lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te/_lha'i ras bcos bu dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_lag rgyan dang /_rna rgyan dang /_mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to/_/shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhim pa'i chu dang zhing rnyog pa med la yan 
[\[221b.6\]]lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dag sprul te/_bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gser gyi skud pa dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba bzung zhing gser gyi phye ma dag gi char yang phab bo/_/
