[\[221b.7\]]dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya'i phye ma dang /_a ga ru dang /_rgya spos dang /_dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i char yang rab tu phab bo/_/go shir sha dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang lam der phab bo/_/lha'i rgyan sna tshogs gser gyi skud pa dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]nor bu dang /_mu tig dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad brgyan to/_/grong ngam/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol na yang lha dang mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do/_/grong khyer gyi nang na bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 
[\[222a.2\]]'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam du gshegs so/_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku'i gzugs dang /_rtags dang /_
[\[222a.3\]]spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/_de na sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs par mthong ba nas/_gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang /_gang dag sred med kyi bus 'dul ba dang /_
[\[222a.4\]]gang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang /_gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang /_gang dag 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba dang /_gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang /_gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang /_gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang /_gang dag gzhon 
[\[222a.5\]]nus 'dul ba dang /_gang dag bud med kyis 'dul ba dang /_gang dag seng ges 'dul ba dang /_gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang /_gang dag klus 'dul ba dang /_gang dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul ba nas/_gang dag ri bong la dad cing ri bong gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das ri bong 
[\[222a.6\]]gi gzugs dang rtags dang /_spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ngo /_/sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /_rtags dang /_spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ste/_sems can de dag thams 
[\[222a.7\]]cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/_zhabs 'bring du 'brang zhing dong ngo /_/yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri dang nye ba na gnas pa drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas/_de g.yog lnga brgya dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo'i drung na sdod pas 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi gzugs dang /_rtags dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam dang /_bkod pa de lta bus lam nas gshegs shing lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mchod pa byed par brtson par mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so/_/bden par 'di ni drang 
[\[222b.2\]]srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/_lha dang mis mchod par snang ngo /_/'di'i lus thams cad kyang bsod nams kyis mtshan gyis brgyan te/_mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so/_/bdag cag gnyis gang rgan/_gang mkhas pa de la ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste/_de nas yang 
[\[222b.3\]]'di ltar bdag gis mdun bsu la/_'di la rigs dang /_rus dang /_gnas dang /_brtul zhugs kun dri'o snyam du sems so/_/de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/thos ldan yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang /_/
[\[222b.4\]]ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhyen/_/khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor/_/yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad mnyan/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/
[\[222b.5\]]zhes smras so/_/de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/khyed su zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga ni bram ze'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[222b.6\]]khyod kyi gdung rus ci/_bka' stsal pa/_nga'i rus ni gau ta ma'o/_/gsol pa/_khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/_bka' stsal pa/_nga'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo/_/gsol pa/_khyod kyi spyod pa ci/_bka' stsal pa/_nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid la spyod do/_/gsol pa/_
[\[222b.7\]]khyod rab tu byung nas ji srid lon/_bka' stsal pa/_ma rig pa byung nas ji srid lon pa nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no/_/gsol pa/_drang srong chen po skar ma bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rig pa gsung ngam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid du'o/_/
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]'di ni 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste/_de la snying po ci zhig yod/_drang srong gis gsol pa/_mkhas pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar ma'i gnas gang yin/_drang srong gis gsol pa/_gang zla ba dang nyi ma la brten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i 
[\[223a.2\]]rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go/_/de la mdzub ni sor brgyad kyi tshad de/_mdzub de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub bcu gnyis mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/klad pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang /_rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang ste/_mdzub bcu bzhi ni skar ma rnams kyi gnas so/_/
[\[223a.3\]]gang de dag na gda' ba ni rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te/_skar ma gang dang gang la btsas pa de dang de dag na gda'o/_/yang gang zhe na/_de bshad par bgyi yis thub pa chen po gson cig_/smin drug la ni su btsas pa/_/de yi gdong gi sor bzhi na/_/g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis/_/spu can 
[\[223a.4\]]gnag la mdog kyang dmar/_/longs spyod bdog cing grags dang ldan/_/mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te/_/smin drug la ni skyes pa yi/_/mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so/_/gang zhig la ni sor bzhi na/_/sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de/_/snar ma la ni skyes pa ste/_/shes shing rtag tu 
[\[223a.5\]]chos la dga'/_/mkhas la longs spyod phun sum tshogs/_/rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan/_/dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs/_/dgra rnams rtag par rab tu 'joms/_/mgul pa yi ni mdzub phyed na/_/gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba/_/de ni mgo la skyes pa ste/_/dpa' zhing 
[\[223a.6\]]longs spyod ldan pa'o/_/mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa la/_/g.yon na sme ba gang mchis pa/_/lag la skyes pa khro ba ste/_/de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog_/mchan khung g.yon na sme nag mchis/_/nab so la ni skyes pa ste/_/nor dang 'bru rnams 'byor par 'gyur/_/de ni shes pa'i rgya yang 
[\[223a.7\]]chung /_/ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes/_/mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'/_/phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni/_/nyi ma lta bur rab tu mdzes/_/dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang /_/gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis/_/sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste/_/'dren pa khyed kyis nyon mongs thul/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]tshig 'dra gang gi snying ga mchis/_/skag la skyes te thab mo sred/_/tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs mi bde/_/de ni g.yem la dga' ba'o/_/'og gam brang ngam rgyab cig na/_/gang la byi sran 'dra ba gda'/_/mchu la skyes te nor dang ldan/_/btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi/_/
[\[223b.2\]]lte ba g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na/_/gang la rma 'dra gda' ba ni/_/de ni gre la skyes pa ste/_/ser sna che zhing tshe yang thung /_/lte ba man chad sor bzhi na/_/gang la sme ba rab gda' ba/_/spo la de skyes longs spyod can/_/khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris mchi/_/me bzhi la ni skyes 
[\[223b.3\]]pa dag_/sme ba dmar po chu sor gda'/_/rku zhing g.yo can sgyu ma ste/_/bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan/_/gang gi mtshan la sme ba ni/_/gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang /_/nag pa la ni skyes pa ste/_/'dod chags glu gar rtag tu dga'/_/mtshan gyi 'og gam steng na ni/_/
[\[223b.4\]]sme ba ser po rab tu gda'/_/sa ri la ni de skyes te/_/mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdang /_/brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub gang na/_/sme ba dmar po de bzhin te/_/sa ga la ste shor ba mchog_/skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor/_/mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul/_/rtag tu bde la 
[\[223b.5\]]gnas pa ste/_/ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan/_/shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye/_/brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub do na/_/gang la byi sran 'dra ba gda'/_/lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can/_/chos dang longs spyod ldan pa'o/_/gang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni/_/sme ba gda' ba snron la skyes/_/
[\[223b.6\]]mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal/_/dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so/_/pus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni/_/gang la rma chung gda' ba de/_/snrubs la skyes te dbang thang can/_/myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid/_/chu stod la ni skyes pa dag_/sme ba pus mo'i lha nga na/_/sbyin pa bgyid cing chos 
[\[223b.7\]]lam 'tshal/_/shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi/_/chu smad la ni su skyes pa/_/gru do la ni sme ba mchis/_/de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan/_/longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams/_/sme ba gnyis po gda' ba ni/_/gro bzhin la ste longs spyod rtag_/de bzhin nad med sems can byams/_/
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi/_/sme ba nag po rje ngar la/_/gda' ba mon gru skyes pa ste/_/de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chung /_/longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan/_/rje ngar la ni mdzub do na/_/sme ba nag po rab tu gda'/_/mon gre la skyes blun po ste/_/de ni chu yis 'chi bar 
[\[224a.2\]]'gyur/_/rje ngar 'og gi mdzub gang na/_/rma 'dra mchis pa khrums stod la/_/blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid/_/de ni dbul zhing rkun po bgyid/_/gang la sme ba mdzub gang na/_/khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims dran pa dang /_/shes rab 'jigs med snying rjer ldan/_/
[\[224a.3\]]gang gi rkang pa gnyi ga la/_/sme ba phra mo gda' ba ni/_/nam gru skyes pa ma rabs te/_/'dreg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags/_/gang gi mthe bo'i phrag na yang /_/sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni/_/rtag tu stobs ldan nad ma mchis/_/tha skar la ni de skyes so/_/rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni/_/bra nye la ste 
[\[224a.4\]]snying brtse med/_/gsod pa'i gshed ma'i ngang tshul can/_/shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi/_/gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba yi/_/skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags/_/'jig rten na ni rnam shes 'dis/_/sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu 
[\[224a.5\]]rtog pa'i spyod yul can/_/byis pa gang la chags 'dug pa/_/de ni byis pa rmongs pa ste/_/sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas/_/khyi dang sbrul dang ru sbal dang /_/srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po/_/skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa/_/de dag bde la sten ma yin/_/ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 
[\[224a.6\]]'phrul dang /_/thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin/_/nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na/_/ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri/_/de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad ces gsol to/_/drang srong mi yi gzugs su ni/_/mtshan mchog rnams 
[\[224a.7\]]kyang shin tu gda'/_/khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na/_/lha 'am 'on te khyod mi lags/_/gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni/_/tshangs pa chen po bzhin du gda'/_/spyod pa'i gnas dang tshul gyis ni/_/sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang 'dra/_/thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs/_/'di sngon ma mthong ma thos na/_/
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra/_/khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/pha rol tshu rol mi shes shing /_/mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa/_/de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcings/_/de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin/_/pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus/_/bram ze 
[\[224b.2\]]mngon shes drug dang ldan/_/yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing /_/dbang po drug ni rnam par bshig_/chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan/_/nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum/_/byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa/_/de tshe nga ni rab tu byung /_/mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs/_/mtshan ma med 
[\[224b.3\]]pa rab tu bsgoms/_/sems can med cing srog med pa/_/bdag med stong par mngon sangs rgyas/_/tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum/_/stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms/_/nga ni ye shes pha rol song /_/nga yi tshigs 'di gsungs pa med/_/gang dag mkha' bzhin ma chags par/_/byang chub 
[\[224b.4\]]phyir ni sems bskyed pa/_/de dag bzod stobs phun sum tshogs/_/ye shes 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur/_/chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing /_/rnam par smin pa 'dod med la/_/de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed/_/de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing /_/pha rol tshu rol mi 
[\[224b.5\]]rten par/_/yang dag mthar ni 'dir bsgoms na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/_/mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med/_/dmigs pa de ni rnam par spangs/_/chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/_/rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la/_/rang gi sems 
[\[224b.6\]]la the tshom spongs/_/nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su/_/nga 'drar sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /_rtags dang /_
[\[224b.7\]]spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur to/_/de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las pa med de/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob po/_/de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis 
[\[225a.2\]]mngon par bstod do/_/yon tan mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa/_/khyed kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad/_/rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa/_/sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 
[\[225a.3\]]'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/_/gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur pa'i/_/yon tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul/_/khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par gyur/_/tha ma'i spyod pa byang chub 
[\[225a.4\]]shes pa'i rgyu ni de ring mthar phyin to/_/sman pa chen po sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa/_/sems can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol/_/bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mo bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi/_/ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba mi yi dam 
[\[225a.5\]]pa lung bstan gsol/_/sdug bsngal chu bos bdas pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi/_/phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag_/de dag bdag gis dpang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[225a.6\]]gzhol bgyi/_/drag cing mi bzad rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun/_/dus gsum gyi ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des/_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'das 
[\[225a.7\]]par shog_/sems can thams cad nad zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skams par shog_/ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes dbang po'i snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig_/sems can gang dag gsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams/_/de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar bar shog_/
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig_/shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog_/de dag sdig pa'i rnam spangs lta ba mnyam nyid myur du bsten gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skye ba dran cing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog_/sems can de 
[\[225b.2\]]kun chos grus srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal gyur cig_/thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog_/bskal pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char pa 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog_/bdag gi lus 
[\[225b.3\]]dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dpang du gsol te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags/_/bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig_/rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bar shog_/
[\[225b.4\]]bdag gi bsod nams cung zad ci mchis deng de byang chub bsngo bar bgyi/_/sems can ched du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi/_/sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzud par bgyi/_/bskal par zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang bar bgyi/_/
[\[225b.5\]]gang du byang chub reg 'gyur zhing yang rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi/_/'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog_/smra ba'i seng ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shog_/'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pa lung bstan gsol/_/'jig 
[\[225b.6\]]rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo bsgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/_/me tog sil ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhags pa kun kyang dpang gyis shig_/sa rnams g.yo bar byed cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog_/de nas drang srong 
[\[225b.7\]]skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i steng logs su gtor ba dang /_me tog de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste/_drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde bas 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]tshim pa skyes par gyur te/_de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/_/drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi 
[\[226a.2\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang yid skyo zhing ltad mor gyur to/_/gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i 
[\[226a.3\]]gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur cing drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la gdugs su gyur te gnas pa dang sa g.yos pa de yang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/_/gang dag yang sangs rgyas 
[\[226a.4\]]kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong 
[\[226a.5\]]nas zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang /_mgu ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_phyang 'phrul dang /_rgyan ji snyed pa dag gis gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[226a.6\]]drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon/_/byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsung /_/mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing /_/nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug_/khyod ni 'jig rten phan phyir ston dbang po/_/rkang gnyis bdag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su/_/bsod nams 
[\[226a.7\]]mtha' yas nam mkha' tshad mnyam pa/_/khams gsum snying po 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na/_byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan par 
[\[226b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[226b.3\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing /_
[\[226b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur te/_khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro/_/'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba lung bstan pa de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 
[\[226b.5\]]bya ba'i las la mngon par brtson par gyur to/_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang /_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub 
[\[226b.6\]]kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba thob bo/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dag gis 
[\[226b.7\]]brgyan pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang dang gang nas gshegs pa de'i sgo de dang de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas brgyan to snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/_
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/_de ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/_/grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so/_/bdud 
[\[227a.2\]]bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa dang ldan pa/_bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang /_bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang /_sa'i phyogs de dag dang /_rtsig pa de dag dang /_
[\[227a.3\]]shing de dag dang /_sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to/_/bdud bye ba de dag dang /_bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas drang srong chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang /_rta babs dang /_ba gam dang /_skyed shing gi 
[\[227a.4\]]nang du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang /_gos dang /_ras dang /_ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /_lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni rab tu phab/_sil snyan dang /_dkrol ba sna tshogs ni dkrol nas 
[\[227a.5\]]bstod pa dang /_yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba/_khyad par du 'phags pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na bzhugs te/_zhabs 
[\[227a.6\]]g.yas pa'i mthe bos sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la reg ma thag tu/_de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/_/gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya 
[\[227a.7\]]byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang /_grong khyer 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]dang /_yul 'khor gyi lha dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang /_'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste/_sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad sa g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 
[\[227b.2\]]chen po kho ra khor yug tu bskor nas sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing me tog dang /_spos dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang /_phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re re na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab 
[\[227b.3\]]kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su ma dag pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa rnams su sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[227b.4\]]byung ngo /_/myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag ltos/_/byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod/_/khyod kyi 'khor ba'i gcong rong 'khyams pa yi/_/'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos/_/yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyis/_/g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thong la/_/'dir ni sngon 
[\[227b.5\]]gyi dam bcas yid la byos/_/byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan med/_/'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshegs/_/bdud stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad des/_/da ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor/_/grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad/_/dpa' 
[\[227b.6\]]mchog dngos po yang dag ston par mdzad/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas/_/byang chub tu ni de ring lung yang ston/_/rang byung mya ngan med pa grong khyer gshegs/_/de phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs la/_/de ltar mdzes pa de dag rab ltos te/_/rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos/_/
[\[227b.7\]]yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i tshal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_nyan thos dang /_nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag par 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la gzhes shing bzhugs 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pa mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 'khod pa dang /_bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de nas me tog dang /_phye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang 
[\[228a.2\]]byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su ma dag pa dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_nyan thos chen po 
[\[228a.3\]]gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/_yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/_ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/_dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/_tshim par byed par 'os pa 'di lta bu/_spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu'i yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dag dang /_
[\[228a.4\]]me tog dang /_phye ma'i char 'di dag ga las 'ongs snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang 
[\[228a.5\]]lhab lhub kyi rgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi rgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[228a.6\]]cad du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu dag snang ste/_'di lta ste/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing rdul bsags pa med ces bya ba yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_rtsig pa med la legs 
[\[228a.7\]]par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du yang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na/_shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs par snang ba ni ma gtogs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]zhing de dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag sgra thos pa des bskul ba dang /_phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'khod de/_de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug par mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis lha'i rnam par 'phrul 
[\[228b.2\]]pa'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang /_brtag pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[228b.3\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der 'dong ngo /_/der ni bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[228b.4\]]gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[228b.5\]]mi mjed 'dir phyin to/_/de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i bar ma lus par gang bar gyur to/_/
[\[228b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis ni 
[\[228b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so/_/la la dag gis ni mu tig gi char phab pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]shel dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_go shir Sha dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang /_shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni lhab lhub dang /_phyang 'phrul dang /_rgyan dang /_
[\[229a.2\]]ras dang /_ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sna tshogs bsgreng ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs so/_/
[\[229a.3\]]la la dag gis ni rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to/_/la la dag gis ni sil snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs dkrol to/_/la la dag gis ni glu dang gar dang /_rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to/_/la la dag gis ni sa phyogs der spos chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab bo/_/la la dag 
[\[229a.4\]]gis ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na thogs so/_/la la dag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo mas brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na thogs so/_/la la 
[\[229a.5\]]dag gis ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs lha'i gos dang /_rgyan dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'phang stod de thogs so/_/la la dag gis ni bdag nyid tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/_'khod pa 
[\[229a.6\]]nas rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no/_/la la dag ni seng ge'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang /_rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mig gi dbang pos gzugs snang 
[\[229a.7\]]ba rnams la thags thogs med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnams dang /_rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]dang /_lam dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas srang gi dbus na pad ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_phyag g.yas pa'i mthil gyis pad ma'i snying po la reg 
[\[229b.2\]]par mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so/_/pad ma de drangs te g.yos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang /_ri khor yug chen po dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang /_bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang g.yos so/_/bdud kyi gnas thams cad na gzhal med khang dang /_gnas khang 
[\[229b.3\]]dang /_mal cha dang /_stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so/_/de na gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang /_bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang /_bdud kyi tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to/_/rgyu med rkyen med par ni gzhal med khang 'di dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/_
[\[229b.4\]]bdag cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang /_bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang /_bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag go snyam ste/_de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lnga can du 
[\[229b.5\]]gyur na/_'di sus legs par brgyan cing shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo/_/de nas rang gi yul la gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag de na 'khod bzhin du yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing shin tu lham me lhan ne 
[\[229b.6\]]lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems can gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas sems can gcig 
[\[229b.7\]]kyang ngo mi shes te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_da ltar bdag cag gi jo bo dang /_g.yog tu bcas 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]pa gar dong ba yang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas 
[\[230a.2\]]bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rab tu rnam par dad sems kyis/_/bcom ldan bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/bdag khrol 'di nas myur du thong /_/chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[230a.3\]]'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba yang /_/ngas ni su la'ang bzlog pa med/_/gal te lam ni rab shes na/_/gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos/_/bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rang gi spyod yul gar dga' bar/_/gang tshe bdag ni mchi 'tshal te/_/bdag ni bcing ba lnga dag gis/_/bcings 
[\[230a.4\]]par mthong ngo gau ta ma/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga ni rtog pa kun spangs te/_/grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa/_/ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas/_/sems can bcings pa thar bar bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang 
[\[230a.5\]]nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang /_/the tsom thams cad rab spongs la/_/skad cig ci yang ma smra bar/_/khyod cag rnams ni da nyon cig_/rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[230a.6\]]rgyas 'jig rten dkon/_/chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon/_/dad cing mos pa 'byor pa dang /_/byang chub spyod pa shin tu dkon/_/'jig rten mgon po'i mngon sum du/_/chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkon/_/gang du bzod pa sten byed pa/_/de yi dus ni rnyed par dka'/_/gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi/_/
[\[230a.7\]]rtog pa thams cad rab spong ba/_/stong pa nyid ni bsgom pa dang /_/sems ni dul bar byed pa dkon/_/ji ltar ngas ni sngon spyad pa'i/_/byang chub spyod pa rnyed par dka'/_/de las me tog tsam tshod 'di/_/khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/_/gang gis byang chub 'byor byed pa/_/srid pa'i bcings las rab 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]grol zhing /_/mun pa'i phung po sel ba yi/_/lam gyi mchog ni bstan par bya/_/dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la/_/ston pas gsungs pa 'dir nyon cig_/chu bo rnams kyi pha rol rgol/_/rgya mo can gyi sred pa spongs/_/rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing /_/sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas/_/
[\[230b.2\]]khams gsum kun gyi nyon mongs gang /_/de dag ma lus rnam par chom/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchod dang /_/chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams/_/sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi/_/byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams/_/dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems/_/
[\[230b.3\]]bye brag tu ni rab tu spongs/_/khams gsum pa las grol ba yi/_/zhi byed bzod pa thob par byos/_/phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis/_/so so'i skye bo bslad pa rnams/_/dngos po med la rtog byed pa/_/de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin/_/mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis/_/lus dang 
[\[230b.4\]]ngag dang sems bsgribs nas/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams/_/'khor ba shin tu bsten par 'gyur/_/'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal/_/bsam gtan sgom pa byed pa rnams/_/de dag phyin ci log bzhi las/_/de ring rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/dbang phyug de dag sems 
[\[230b.5\]]can rnams/_/chu bo bzhi las thar bar byed/_/'chi 'pho skye ba rab shes pa/_/des pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dag_/sems can sred pas bcings pa rnams/_/yang dag shes pas gcod par byed/_/phung po lnga rnams yongs 
[\[230b.6\]]shes pas/_/zhags pa las grol zag pa med/_/yang dang yang du mi skye ste/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed/_/sdig pa dag ni myur du shogs/_/sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la/_/'jigs pa med par pha rol song /_/srid par yang dang yang skyes 
[\[230b.7\]]pas/_/sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni/_/'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i grogs po rab spongs te/_/sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nas/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas te/_/dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig_/btung ba'i dam pa 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]'thung bar byos/_/stong pa nyid kyang rab sgoms shig_/dam pa'i don la dngos po med/_/rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid med/_/'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste/_/byed pa po ni 'di la med/_/de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang /_/dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med/_/tshor ba drug 
[\[231a.2\]]dang sred pa drug_/reg pa drug las byung ba yin/_/de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug_/stong pa yin par shes par byos/_/rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par/_/dngos po nyid la brtag par byos/_/skye ba med cing 'gag med pas/_/'di na rdzas kyang med par ltos/_/gang gis chos kun tshul gcig 
[\[231a.3\]]ste/_/dus gsum du yang dngos med par/_/shes pa de dag nad med de/_/de ni bla na med pa'i lam/_/rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la/_/sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing /_/tshu rol pha rol rnam grol ba/_/de ni bzod pa bsgom pa yin/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[231a.4\]]bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang /_mi stong pa'i snyigs ma lnga can gang 
[\[231a.5\]]gA'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas/_/de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni shin tu zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang /_dad pa 
[\[231a.6\]]rnyed de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/la la dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa dang /_gzungs sna tshogs thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni don dang /_tshig dang /_yi 
[\[231a.7\]]ge 'di dag thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to/_/sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas pad ma'i khri la 'dzeg par bya ba'i phyir rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul ste/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi/_/'dam du bying ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la/_/rab tu gzigs te mi 
[\[231b.2\]]rgyu rgyur bcas kyi/_/'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs/_/thal mo sbyar ba'i sems can rgya chen brgyas/_/rab tu bltam pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su/_/chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bar gsol/_/rang gi mthu rtsal rab tu bstan du gsol/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i pad ma mngon 'dzegs 
[\[231b.3\]]te/_/mgon po shes rab dang ni thabs rnams kyis/_/chos chu sprin gyis char pa rab phob la/_/nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol/_/phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan/_/khyod kyi dpang du de dag kun bzhugs kyis/_/thub 
[\[231b.4\]]pa'i dpang po bdud rnams pham par mdzod/_/chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang /_/ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nas/_/sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la/_/bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol/_/chu bo bzhi dbus 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/_/mi yi seng ge 
[\[231b.5\]]de ring bsgral du gsol/_/khyod kyis chos rnams shin tu thugs su chud/_/srid gsum mtsho las 'jig rten bsgral du gsol/_/shin tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das/_/bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la/_/'gro ba gzud mdzod mtshungs med chos kyang ston/_/'jig rten 
[\[231b.6\]]nyes pa'i dri ma bsal du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sprul pa'i them skas de las pad ma'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te/_pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa/_bdud 
[\[231b.7\]]sdig can ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang /_rga shis gtses pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur rnam par thar bar 'gyur/_chu bo bzhi las yang dag par rgal bar 'gyur/_
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te/_'di la sdig can khyod ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyis khyod dga' bar gyis shig_/sdig can khyod kyis nga la chos bshad par 
[\[232a.2\]]gsol cig dang ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/ci ste sdig med khyod la tha ba zhe sdang rgyags med na/_/ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skrag par bya phyir chos kyang 
[\[232a.3\]]ston/_/de ste khyod la tha ba rgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni/_/thub dbang khyod kyi thar pa ci 'dra bdag la 'dir shod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga ni sa la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcur gnas pa/_/de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la bsad par rab tu sbyar/_/de tshe nga la khon dang tha ba 
[\[232a.4\]]cung zad tsam yang med/_/nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin/_/nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g.yo bar byas/_/nga gsad phyir ni rdo ba'i char pa rab tu dbab par byas/_/de nas khyod kyis nga yi ma yi nu zho myur skams byas/_/khyod kyis nga la gnod pa rnam pa du ma ci ma byas/_/
[\[232a.5\]]nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud med khrid de 'ongs/_/nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par spyod tshe zas kyang gcad par byas/_/khyod kyis rtag tu nga la rgyal srid mngon par rab tu bstabs/_/nga ni 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par gyur/_/de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong khyer kun tu bskor/_/
[\[232a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song tshe rdzing char drag por rab tu phab/_/sa ni 'dom do 'phang tsam rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas/_/zhi ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung /_/nga ni shin tu dka' ba spyod tshe grang ba'i rlung dang ni/_/'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang /_/nga ni gsad par bya phyir khyod 
[\[232a.7\]]kyis seng ge rab tu btang /_/de tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas la drag po'i dug kyang btab/_/nga ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba na/_/rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags spu gri mda' char khyod kyis phab/_/'gro la phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na/_/khyod kyis ngur smrig gos kyang 'jim rdzab dag gis rab tu bskus/_/
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]de na yang ni nga gan khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste/_/nga gsad phyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi/_/'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas cung zad med/_/ngas ni khyod btul nas su byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob/_/'on kyang ngo tsha bor te 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang smra 'am/_/sdig 
[\[232b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis 'od srung mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te/_/khyod kyis sems can bye ba du ma ma rung byas nas kyang /_/snying rje bor te 'dir yang nga la rgol zhing sgyu byed dam/_/nga yis zas ma zos pa de yi tshe yang khyod kyis su/_/nga gsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang /_/sa 
[\[232b.3\]]steng nga la lhas sbyin gyis ni rdo ba 'phangs pa dang /_/kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang /_phyar ka btang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang /_/me mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang /_/kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi/_/de 
[\[232b.4\]]la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin/_/khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su/_/nga gsad phyir ni mda' bo che dang ral gri mda' mang thogs/_/'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga yi spu gcig ma g.yos na/_/ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas da dung 'dug_/
[\[232b.5\]]ji snyed bdud ni stong phrag bye ba rgol du yang btsud kyang /_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ni 'dir yang lhags nas su/_/zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te/_/nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya/_/nga ni snying rje'i gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed 
[\[232b.6\]]pa/_/khyod ni shin tu gtum po nga la rtag tu bgegs byed de/_/thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga yi dbang yin gyi/_/da ltar tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya/_/rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don yang spyad par bya/_/smras par gyur kyang bzod pa yongs su gtang bar mi 
[\[232b.7\]]bya'o/_/nga la phrag dog tha ba rab tu khro ba'i yid med de/_/khyed ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson/_/nga la gsol dang khyod yid zhi phyir 'jig rten gsum dag tu/_/mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshad par bya/_/de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyi/_/
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dad par byos/_/khyod ni rtag tu 'di na gnod pa bya bar rab sems kyang /_/khyod dgrol phyir ni nga snying rtag tu byams par rab tu dang /_/sdig pa'i blo gros bor la dad bcas yid la byos shig dang /_/ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang 
[\[233a.2\]]lung bstan to/_/de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la rab tu khros te 'khrugs shing rngam nas de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /_bdag gi mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te/_'jigs skrag pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das dgrongs 
[\[233a.3\]]pa'i phyir rang khros pa'i mthus shin tu tsha ba'i dbugs btang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mngon par sprul te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de thams 
[\[233a.4\]]cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/_me tog gi gdugs 'di 
[\[233a.5\]]dag ga las mchis/_su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/_bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[233a.6\]]rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams 
[\[233a.7\]]cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]'grus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed pa/_dgra dang phas kyis rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par byed pa/_ngo mi mtshar dang /_bkra mi shis pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_mu ge dang /_'jigs pa'i tshogs dang /_'thab pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_
[\[233b.2\]]'ching ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_dus ma yin par grang zhing tsha ba dang /_rlung dang /_tsha ba dang /_nad dang /_sgra mi snyan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par byed pa rgyal rigs 
[\[233b.3\]]thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs pa/_rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa/_shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/_lam drang por rab tu ston pa khyim dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_yul 
[\[233b.4\]]'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa/_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_nyin par dang /_mtshan mo dang /_zla ba gcig dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_dus dang /_lo thams cad 'thun par byed pa/_lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman thams cad grub par byed pa/_bzo 
[\[233b.5\]]dang /_las kyi mtha' dang /_gnas dang /_byin gyi rlabs dang /_dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_rig pa dang /_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_mos pa dang /_dpa' ba dang /_brtan pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_spobs 
[\[233b.6\]]pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa/_'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa/_theg pa chen po ston par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_sems can chen po rnams dbugs 
[\[233b.7\]]'byin pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/_sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa/_dbang bskur ba'i chos dang /_byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa/_gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa/_chos kyi 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/_sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa/_bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/_chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/_chos kyi ros sems can rnams tshim par byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[234a.2\]]dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar bar byed pa/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa/_chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang 
[\[234a.3\]]tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /_tshig rab 
[\[234a.4\]]tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so/_/byin gyis brlabs so/_/gcig la gcig dgyes so/_/da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa 
[\[234a.5\]]nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung ngo /_/byin gyis rlobs so/_/gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu 
[\[234a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'dzoms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/byin gyis rlob par 
[\[234a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon ma 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]thos pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa/_gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa/_'di ltar yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la sgrib pa 
[\[234b.2\]]ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyid pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags/_chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa/_bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid 
[\[234b.3\]]pa nas/_phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad 
[\[234b.4\]]du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[234b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo /_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing /_nyan 
[\[234b.6\]]thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang lhan cig sems can thams cad la phan pa 
[\[234b.7\]]dang /_ngan par spyod pa las bzlog pa dang /_bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/_byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/_gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 
[\[235a.2\]]'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas te/_chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyis/_khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos 
[\[235a.3\]]lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang /_chos de yang nyan pa dang 
[\[235a.4\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha'i yul dang /_bdud kyi yul thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa de dag la blta ba dang /_sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma mthong ma thos pa blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang /_da nged lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin 
[\[235a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 
[\[235a.6\]]'chad pa na/_gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la yang phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_chos nyan par rngo thogs pa lta na de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de 
[\[235a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa'i 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]slad du mchis te/_der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o/_/de dag las chos kyang mnyan par bgyi'o/_/der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[235b.2\]]yul bkod pa bzhis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed legs par brgyan pa de yang blta bar bgyi/_'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so na rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[235b.3\]]dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams der 'jug pa'i gnas dang /_go skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tshom ma za zhig_/de ltar nem nur ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[235b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni mtha' yas so/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yangs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag yongs su brtag pa 
[\[235b.5\]]bzung ste sems can gang la la sems can gyi khams su bsdu bar bsdus pa/_khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du gyur du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig 
[\[235b.6\]]gi nang du chud par nus so/_/sems can re re zhing yang yul dang gnas kyi skabs yangs te/_sems can de dag phan tshun du mig rgyang gis kyang mi slebs so/_/yungs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba dang gang bar yang mi mngon te/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[235b.7\]]pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang sra ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sa'i khams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la/_rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bzhag kyang bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams 
[\[236a.2\]]cad skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chud par nus la skra'i rtse mo de gcig tu chu'i khams de thams cad bcug kyang bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni me'i khams te/_me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang /_'byung ba dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[236a.3\]]thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la me'i khams de thams cad rdul phra rab de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te/_rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 
[\[236a.4\]]des ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jug nus la/_rlung gi khams de thams cad ba spu'i khung bu de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te/_rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des ni gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 
[\[236a.5\]]kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang /_lhan cig tu rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog par nus te/_rdul gcig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyis mtha' rnams spyod kyang gnas shin tu yangs par rgyu ste/_phan tshun 
[\[236a.6\]]gnod pa yang med la rdul gcig gi rtse mo de yang bri ba'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skye mched drug dang /_spyod pa dang /_nye bar len pa dang /_
[\[236a.7\]]smon lam dang /_byin gyi rlabs dang /_tshig gi lam gyi sgra dang /_yi ge dang /_tshig brjod pa dang /_'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang /_phung po dang /_dpyod pa dang /_bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang /_gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas bzung ste/_dus gsum du 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na srid pa 'grub pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba 'byung ba dang /_sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du 
[\[236b.2\]]gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod pa dang /_kun tu spyod pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des skad cig gcig la 
[\[236b.3\]]rab tu mkhyen te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par dus gsum gyi mtha' yongs su mkhyen to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[236b.4\]]thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pas mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad med pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no/_/mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa na phyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub 
[\[236b.5\]]sems dpa' brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//bam po drug pa/_yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 
[\[236b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis gshegs par chas nas/_skad cig gcig 
[\[236b.7\]]tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]dpa' chen po de dag kyang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khod do/_/de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 
[\[237a.2\]]kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs cig tu de bzhin 
[\[237a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byon to/_/byon nas kyang pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so/_/yang de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po 
[\[237a.4\]]la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs so/_/yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o/_/
[\[237a.5\]]'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o/_/steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba byon nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[237a.6\]]stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de nas gshegs par chas pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 
[\[237a.7\]]dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang rang gi 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bsod nams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pad ma'i gdan sprul pa rnams la 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi 
[\[237b.2\]]char phab bo/_/gong du smos pa bzhin sbyar te/_la la dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor bar byas so/_/la la dag gis ni chos nyan pas bskor nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/_/la la dag gis ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs 
[\[237b.3\]]yid la byed cing gnas so/_/yang de'i tshe na zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/the tsom thams cad 
[\[237b.4\]]gcod mdzad pa/_/thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs/_/sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i/_/dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'di snang /_/byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang bas/_/zhing 'di mchod rten gyur pa ste/_/zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas 
[\[237b.5\]]so/_/gang na sems can smad pa yi/_/zhing ni snyigs ma lnga ldan 'dir/_/thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng mi gshegs/_/de ring bdud ngan tshar gcad cing /_/nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhom dang /_/spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir/_/de yi don du kun nas 
[\[237b.6\]]gshegs/_/yid ni rab tu dang byos la/_/bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa yi/_/chos nyid zhi bar rab nyon la/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos/_/theg pa chen po spyod pa'i lam/_/bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos/_/nyon mongs thams cad zad bya'i phyir/_/gzungs 'di de ring 
[\[237b.7\]]mnyan par byos/_/gdan rnams la ni bzhugs nas ni/_/bsrung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir/_/de phyir thams cad mgrin gcig tu/_/'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig_/dam chos yun ring gnas bya'i phyir/_/sgrib pa thams cad zhi byed pa/_/chos rnams thams cad sdud pa yi/_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pad ma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te deng thugs rje 
[\[238a.2\]]chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pas yongs su bsgom pa/_mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bshad pa chos thams cad sdud pa/_'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa/_bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa/_bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu 
[\[238a.3\]]snyol la chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyid pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa/_dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa/_'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar bgyid pa/_dgra thams cad bsrung ba 
[\[238a.4\]]bla na med pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_mos pa mi brjed pa/_spyod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun ston pa/_bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang /_byin gyi rlabs dang /_
[\[238a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa la 'jug pa/_snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang /_kha dog dang /_longs spyod dang /_stobs dang /_grags pa dang /_bde 
[\[238a.6\]]ba la reg par gnas pa dang /_spobs pa dang /_dran pa rnam par 'phel ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang /_dgra thams cad pham par bgyid pa dang /_lo tog mngon par 'grub pa dang /_bslab pa 'dzin pa dang /_dran pa'i snod du 'gyur ba dang /_spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[238a.7\]]byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs 'di da 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol/_chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang /_yun ring du gnas pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chud mi 'dza' ba dang /_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]lam mtha' dag bstan pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_nam mkha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang /_mun pa dang /_snang ba dang /_dmigs pa dang /_mi dmigs pa dang /_tshu rol dang /_pha rol dang /_rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_
[\[238b.2\]]gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang /_chos thams cad mi skye ba dang /_mi 'byung ba dang /_mi 'gag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po ma mchis shing yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_
[\[238b.3\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon 
[\[238b.4\]]mchog gsum mngon sum du gyur cig_/sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan par bgyid par gyur cig_/sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[238b.5\]]lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang nas pad ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams 
[\[238b.6\]]cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i phyir dran pa dang /_dad pa dang /_dang ba dang /_mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 
[\[238b.7\]]la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_lta ba ngan pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_nye bar len pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can so so nas 'di snyam du 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi 'di na gzhan su yang med do/_/bdag gcig pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do/_/'di na gzhan sus 
[\[239a.2\]]kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btab bo snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[239a.3\]]dbang po thams cad bstan te thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/_btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/_bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[239a.4\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin tu lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[239a.5\]]thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag pa rin po che dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[239a.6\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir 
[\[239a.7\]]byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol/_bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sems can bsam pa nyams pa/_lam rab tu stor ba/_ma rig 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/_ngan song gsum du bzhugs pa/_mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa/_dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/_mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa/_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba/_'phags pa 
[\[239b.2\]]la skur pa 'debs pa/_snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du snying brtse ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang /_dro ba dang /_rlung dang /_tsha ba dang /_ngal ba dang /_chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_
[\[239b.3\]]grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul dang /_yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro bar bya'o/_/sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsub pa dang /_nyung ba dang /_ro med pa shin tu smad pa/_mi 'thun pa'i zas bza' bar bgyi'o/_/de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du sbom pa rtsub 
[\[239b.4\]]pa/_reg na mi bde ba/_sha na dang /_shing bal dang /_gso ma'i ras dang /_phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o/_/ri dang /_ri sul dang /_nags stug po dang /_grong stong dang /_dur khrod du gnas par bgyi ba nas rtswa'i mal cha dang /_gso ma dang /_shing gi 'dab ma/_rtsub pa/_dri mi 
[\[239b.5\]]zhim pa/_reg na mi bde ba'i mal cha spyad par bgyi'o/_/bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyi ste/_rgyal rigs rnams la ni rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi gtam bgyi'o/_/bram ze rnams 
[\[239b.6\]]la ni rig byed dang /_skar ma'i gtam dang /_blon po rnams la ni yul dang las kyi mtha'i gtam dang /_sman pa rnams la ni khams dang /_sman dang /_bsgrub pa'i gtam dang /_tshong pa rnams la ni nyo tshong gi gtam dang /_dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa'i gtam dang /_bud 
[\[239b.7\]]med rnams la ni kha dog dang /_rgyan dang /_bu dang /_phyug pa dang /_'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang /_dge sbyong rnams la bzod pa dang /_des pa dang /_las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang /_mngon du ma bgyis pa mngon du 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]bgyi bar gzud do/_/ma thar ba rnams rab tu thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yul thams cad du rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de na bdag la gshe'o/_/mi snyan pa zer ro/_/
[\[240a.2\]]phrag dog gi chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa 'debs so/_/kha gsag dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_sgyu dang /_g.yo dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba dang /_zhe gcod pa dang /_bud med kyi tshig dag gis skur pa 'debs so/_bdag la sas 'thor ro/_/bdag la gsad pa'i phyir 
[\[240a.3\]]mtshon dang /_dug dang /_me dang /_'khor lo dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mda' dang /_ral gri dang /_mdung dang /_dgra sta dang /_rdo dang /_mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so/_/bdag gsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_glang dang /_ma he dang /_spyang ki dang /_phag 
[\[240a.4\]]rgod dang /_tshan po che rnams kyang 'gyed do/_/bdag gi gnas dang /_gnas khang dang /_gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang /_dri nga bas 'gengs so/_/bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du bzhugs pa rnams la 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis glu dang gar tshul ma yin pa byed du 
[\[240a.5\]]'dzud do/_/thabs brgya stong du mas bdag gsad pa'i phyir brtson no/_/bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang /_chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma gsad pa dang /_chos kyi gru bshig pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang /_bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no/_/da sangs rgyas 
[\[240a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/_ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /_
[\[240a.7\]]bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi 'thab 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_'ching ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rgol ba dang /_dus ma yin par grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_char pa dang /_rlung dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi nyes pa dang /_lta ba ngan pa ya nga ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang /_
[\[240b.2\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang /_khyim dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor thams cad bsrung ba dang /_g.yo dang /_dug dang /_byad dang /_rmongs byed dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas 
[\[240b.3\]]ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzud pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems rab tu 
[\[240b.4\]]bskyed pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzud pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_mos pa dang /_dpa' ba dang /_brtan pa dang /_spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_dbang bskur
