[\[240b.5\]]ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba 
[\[240b.6\]]la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs te/_gcig la gcig dgyes pa des 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag 
[\[240b.7\]]thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bsrung ba'i slad du chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /_bdud kyi 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /_ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse bar mdzad de/_gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas 
[\[241a.2\]]shing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/_byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_
[\[241a.3\]]bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa/_lags kyang bgyi ste/_chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /_
[\[241a.4\]]bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa nas sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du byin gyis brlab cing chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[241a.5\]]grangs 'di bshad kyis gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad nyon cig_/'di lta ste/_aM ka ra/_aM ka ra/_b+haM ka ra/_pra b+haM ka ra/_b+ha ya mi ha/_mi tra ma b+ha se/_a khe/_a kha/_aM ba re/_do me/_do mad te/_ke bad Te/_ke yU re/_sa ma bA ha ne/_sa man ta b+ha dre/_d+harme/_d+harme/_
[\[241a.6\]]d+harma ke/_dza pha le/_mi tra a nu pA le/_pha la ba te/_ga Ne/_ga Ne/_ba rAn te/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li ke/_dzam b+ha ba te/_Ta ka Te/_Ta ka ba rAn te/_hi rin te/_shi rin te/_bin du ba te/_go b+ha he/_dzu re mi tra/_dzu re/_dzu she/_a gre/_a ba me/_sa s+ya ta tha tA na/_hu lu hi le/_tsan dre/_sa ma d+hi/_
[\[241a.7\]]me d+harma/_ku tsu ru/_mu tsu ru/_a tsid ta/_tsi li tsi li/_li tsa bA ha/_tsu lu tsu lu/_me tra bA ha/_ku lu ku lu/_sa ra sa ra/_ku Tu ku Tu/_ma hA sa ra sa ra/_tu Tu tu Tu/_ma hA sat+ya/_hr-i da ya/_puSh+pe su puSh+pe/_d+hu ma pa ri ha re/_a b+ha ye/_ru tsi ne ka ra k+She/_a ya ma stu/_bi ba ha/_ti ti la/_
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ma ma le/_bA sha ka/_shi shi ra shi shi ra/_lo ka bi nA ya ka badzre badzre d+ha re badzre ba te/_badzre ma te/_badzre da de/_tsakra badzre/_tsakre tsa ba te/_d+ha re d+ha re/_b+ha re b+ha re/_pu re tare/_hu hu re/_b+haM ga baM ba re shwa ra sha tsa tsi li tsu ru pU re/_man tra Ne/_man tra Ne/_ga ga ra Ne/_mu dra Ne/_sarba mU ha ne/_d+hi d+hi ra ya ni/_mu khe 
[\[241b.2\]]shwa ra la ya ni/_r-i Sha ni dza ni/_d+ha ba ba tsi/_tsaN Da la sa me/_sarba sat+ya a d+hiSh+ThA na/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_sid+h+yan tu ma ha nI/_ni ni/_pA la ra ti/_o dzo gre/_bi tsi ni/_bA na ha ra/_bu bu re/_gu ru gu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_hi li hi li/_ha ra ha ra/_ka ka nA da ba ha/_hi hi ta ma/_a yur ha na kaN Da dz+wa la/_b+ha se ga da ne/_a ta ha ni/_
[\[241b.3\]]mArga a b+hi ro ha ni/_pha la sa t+ye/_a ro Sha ba ti/_hi li hi li/_ya thA ba dza ya swA gra ya thA/_ba ra Na tsa hr-i da ya bA ha sa t+ya pa ri b+hA ba/_marga a b+hi ro ha Ne/_a tsa la bud d+hi da da pra tsa la pa tsa ya/_piN Da hr-i da ya/_tsan dra tsa ra te/_a tsa le sho d+ha ni/_pra kr-i ti mArge/_i li i li li/_pra b+he sa ra pra te/_sarba tra ta thA ta/_
[\[241b.4\]]sat+ya a nu ga te/_a na ba ra Na bra te/_a la tha/_aM gu re/_sha mi ni mi bra h+ma pa yo ha/_a hi ta/_a b+ha hi/_ni ba ra ya ba/_a tsi ra mArga/_la na largu sa re/_tri ran na bang she/_d+harma kA ya/_dza la ts+tshan dre/_sa mu dra ba ti/_ma hA da b+hU ta bya ya/_sa mu dra be gA ba d+ha ra Ni/_mu dre Na/_mu khi mu dra/_su ra pra ti sam bi d+ha/_
[\[241b.5\]]sa mu dra/_abarta ni/_saM mo ha ska ra/_bid+yu ta ra se na k+Shi ti/_mu dri to si/_ye ke tsid pra ti b+hi bA ha/_ba ha ba ha ba ha/_ki Ta/_ka ba Ta/_she la pra tI t+ya hr-i da ye na mu dri tA d+ha ra Ni na/_d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/_dA na ti la hu k+Sha sarba hr-i da ya/_mu dri to si dzu da du dza ba da ta/_dza kha ba ta/_su ma ti pa ti/_ma hA ad b+hU ta mu dri ta/_ye ke tsid/_
[\[241b.6\]]Sha DA ya ta na ni shri ta b+hu ta/_i na mi ne/_sa tsa ne/_go Sha sa tsa ne/_mu dri ta/_Ar+ya a d+hiSh+Than b+ha ba thA nA/_n+ya th+wam hA puN+ye sa mu ts+tsha ya/_a ba tA ra ma hakA ru DA ya/_mu dri ta sarba saM myag pra ti bad tsi rA rA tra na dz+wa la tu d+harma ne/_tri sarbe mu ni b+hi Sha b+h+ra/_ma hA kA ru Na/_sa mA d+hi/_dz+nyA na la b+ha ba le na/_mai tri t+ya ga_/a b+hi 
[\[241b.7\]]bIr+ya ba le na a d+hiSh+Thite/_sarba b+hU ta u pa tsa yA ya swA hA_de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]zhes lan gsum smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/kye ma'o thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/kye ma'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i 
[\[242a.2\]]chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs byin gyis rlabs ston pa/_bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa/_bdud kyi 
[\[242a.3\]]zhags pa kun gcod pa/_dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/_chos kyi phyogs bsrung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyis snying po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_
[\[242a.4\]]'byung ba chen po thams cad dang /_'du byed dang /_skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya ba nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs 
[\[242a.5\]]kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/_/gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs 
[\[242a.6\]]nas thal mo sbyar te kun tu rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor/_/'di 'dra ba ni rnyed par dka'/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtul 
[\[242a.7\]]zhugs che/_/mkhas pa 'di ni rnyed par dka'/_/gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi/_/mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pa/_/phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang /_/mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o/_/bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang /_/dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa/_/dkon mchog gsum 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]rgyun mi 'chad pa/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs/_/sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/_/bzod dang des pa rab 'phel ba/_/sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa/_/rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong /_/'di na ngan byas zlog byed pa/_/lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa/_/
[\[242b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa/_/byang chub lam yang rab ston pa/_/pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa/_/bzang por spyod pa rdzogs byed pa/_/thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams/_/'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs/_/dkar po'i phyogs ni sdud byed pa/_/gzungs 'di 
[\[242b.3\]]gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/byang chub lam las mi g.yo ba/_/chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i/_/gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni/_/bsal nas lhag par mos par byos/_/gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba/_/'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no/_/chos smra rnams ni 
[\[242b.4\]]bsrung ba dang /_/nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa yi gzungs/_/bdag gis da yang bshad par bya/_/sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang /_/sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/_/su dag 'di la dad pa 'bul/_/
[\[242b.5\]]yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo byin gyis rlob bo//_//rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 
[\[242b.6\]]'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te/_gos gtsang ma bgos la me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/_spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug pa/_ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ras dang rgyan dang ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/_gdugs 
[\[242b.7\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng bas shin tu brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su seng ge'i khri reg na 'jam pa la 'dug ste gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na su yang de'i sems 'khrug pa'am/_khams 'khrug pa'am/_lus 'khrug pa'am/_yid 'khrug par mi byed do/_/de'i 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]lus la su yang dbugs mi gtong ngo /_/klad pa na bar byed mi nus so/_/mig na ba dang /_lce na ba dang /_so na ba dang /_rus pa na ba dang /_mgul pa na ba dang /_dpung pa na ba dang /_rgyab na ba dang /_rgyu ma na ba dang /_lto na ba dang /_chu so na ba dang /_brla na ba dang /_byin pa na 
[\[243a.2\]]bar byed sus kyang mi nus te/_de ni gnas med do/_/de'i skad 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/chos smra ba de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa'am/_skad 'gags par gyur na yang des gzungs 'di bklags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur te/_las yongs su byang 
[\[243a.3\]]nas bde bar 'gyur ro/_/chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang su yang khams 'khrug pa'am/_skad 'gags par byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang /_khams 'khrug pa dang /_skad 
[\[243a.4\]]'gags pa de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[243a.5\]]'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_gzungs 'di la dad pa stsal du gsol/_'di lta ste/_kha shAn te/_a sa mA ro be/_mai tre sau ma ba te/_e hi/_na ba kun dza be/_na ba kun dza be/_mU la sho d+ha ne/_ba ha kha/_ba ha kha/_mA ra ba ta thA tA/_pa ri ts+tshe da ba ha sa ba ha sa/_a mU la/_a tsa le/_
[\[243a.6\]]tsa tsa le/_pra tsa lA/_d+hi d+hi le/_e ka na ya sa pa ri ts+tshe de/_tsaN Di Na ba ra sa tri ne/_kha ga su ra tri Ne/_sta ba su ra tri Ne/_b+hu tA ko T+wi pa ri ts+tshe de/_dz+wa la kha/_dz+wa la kha ba ye/_dz+wa la kha nA ma kha sha kha ka ka kha ha hA ha hA hu hu hu spar Sha be da na ba ri ts+tshe da na/_a ma mA n+ya ma ma khya ma ma sa mu dra/_mu drA ba kha/_saM skA 
[\[243a.7\]]rA Na ma pa ri ts+tshe da Na/_bo d+hi sa twa k+ShA ti bi ma ma ma hA ba mi b+hu ta ko Ti A ka sha shA sa pa ri ts+tshe da swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po de dag dang /_sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[243b.2\]]de dag gis kyang 'di skad du kye ma gzungs 'di ni stobs che ba drag shul dang ldan pa ste/_dgra thams cad bzlog pa/_'jigs pa dang /_nad dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed pa nas sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_bsod nams dang /_ye shes 
[\[243b.3\]]chen po bsags pa/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad do/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/yang de'i tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_lha'i las 'das pa'i gos dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan dang /_
[\[243b.4\]]me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_rgyan chen po mchog rnams kyis lus brgyan nas bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur te/_tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul bkod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[243b.5\]]tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas/_thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir dbyangs kyis go bar bgyi ba la der bdag la bgegs cung 
[\[243b.6\]]zad kyang mi 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang /_chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsrung ba bshad par bgyi ste/_ci nas slad ma'i 
[\[243b.7\]]dus na bdud dam/_bdud kyi 'khor tam/_lha'am/_klu'am/_klu mo'am/_klu rgan po'am/_klu rgan mo'am/_klu'i 'khor tam/_klu'i 'khor mo'am/_klu'i bu pho'am/_klu'i bu mo'am/_de bzhin du rgyas par bgyi ste/_sha za'am/_sha za mo'am/_sha za rgan po'am/_sha za rgan mo'am/_
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]sha za'i 'khor tam/_sha za'i 'khor mo'am/_sha za'i bu'am/_sha za'i bu mo'am/_mi'am mi ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba rnams dang /_chos nyan pa rnams la glags lta ba'am/_skabs tshol ba'i dgra phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te/_tha na chos smra ba'am/_chos nyan pa 
[\[244a.2\]]rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang 'tshe ba'am/_gnod par bgyid dam/_'jig par bgyid dam/_mdangs 'phrog gam/_lus la dbugs chen po gtong ngam/_tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na/_bdag gis bdud nas mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar de dag 
[\[244a.3\]]bzlog pa dang /_chad pas gcad pa dang /_tshar gcad pa dang /_rmugs pa dang /_rengs pa dang /_rmongs par bgyi/_bri stsal bar bgyi na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig 
[\[244a.4\]]brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_/'di la su zhig bdag gi grogs su 'gyur/_de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin ces bya ba 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi rgyan gyi 'od kyis lus brgyan nas 
[\[244a.5\]]ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go/_/de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug shig_/che zhe 'dir bag med par ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 'das la ma 'tshe zhig_/
[\[244a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byis pa rnams ni spros la dga'/_/de bzhin gshegs la spros mi mnga'/_/de dag skye 'jig mtshan nyid kyi/_/'dus byas dag kyang ston pa mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang /_yi ge dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa ste/_che 
[\[244a.7\]]zhe de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta ste/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mdzad de/_nam mkha' la ni 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid sgro btags pa med do/_/ji ltar 'du byed rnams la nam mkha' mi rtog cing rnam par ni rtog pa de bzhin du de bzhin 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]gshegs pa yang 'dod pa'i yon tan la spro bar mi mdzad/_mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog_/mi gnas/_mngon par mi zhen te/_de bzhin du srog la ma yin/_skye ba po la ma yin/_gso ba la ma yin/_skyes bu la ma yin/_gang zag la ma yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la yang 
[\[244b.2\]]spro bar mi mdzad/_mngon par mi zhen na/_che zhe khyod kyis ji ltar na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spro bar byed/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang po rtog rtogs te tshig smros shig_/khyod la des mi sdug pa'i 'bras bur gyur ta re/_skyes bu dam 
[\[244b.3\]]pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/_/skyes bu dam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par brgyan nas/_bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis 
[\[244b.4\]]'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma brjod cig_/de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod par gsol/_'di skad smras pas bdag 'bras bu mi sdug pa thob par ma gyur 
[\[244b.5\]]cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de slar ma bshags na/_de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te des slar ma 
[\[244b.6\]]bshags su zin na/_tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud med kyi dngos po yongs su blangs par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig 
[\[244b.7\]]brjod pa byin gyi rlabs kyis khyod spobs par gyis shig_/de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te/_phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring 
[\[245a.2\]]du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos smra ba rnams dang /_chos nyan pa rnams dang /_nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar 'dir dad pa stsal du gsol/_gang slad ma'i dus na bdud nas/_mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar gyis/_de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyid par dad pa stsal du gsol/_de 
[\[245a.3\]]nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang /_mnas bsgag pa'i phyir/_dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas/_sgra des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so/_/yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 
[\[245a.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo/_/bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i dus na gzungs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba dang /_nyan pa de dag dang /_nan tan dang ldan 
[\[245a.5\]]pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul gyis skyes bu dam pa gsungs shig_/de nas tshangs pa phun sum 
[\[245a.6\]]tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_'di lta ste/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_ga Na Sha Na De/_ha re tsaN De/_
[\[245a.7\]]ma hA tsaN De/_tsa me ha/_tsa me/_sau /[{]mye[,]me[}]/_s+tha me/_A ba ha/_bi ba he/_aM ga dzA ne tra/_kha kha/_mU la pa ri ts+tshe de/_yak+Sha tsaN De/_pi shA tsa tsaN+De/_a brta ni/_sa ma brta ni/_sam ka ri Ni/_dzam b+ha ni/_stam b+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_uts+tshA Ta ni/_ha ma hA/_ha ma hA/_ma hA saM ku tsa ne/_kha ga sha ba/_a ma le/_a mU la pa ri 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]brte/_a sa ra khA ba swA hA/_gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' zhing /_/mang po tshogs par mi spyod na/_/mig mi mthong zhing mgo yang 'gas/_/yan lag tha dad 'jig par 'gyur/_/'di lta ste/_a tsa tsa a ba ha/_tsa tsa tsu/_khra kha sha tsa Ta Ta kha tsa tsA na/_kha ga tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa 
[\[245b.2\]]tsa na tsa ha/_mU la tsa tsa tsa/_mU la tsa tsa/_ha mU mu la tsa tsa ha mU ha mu/_ba u ba ha swa hA/_de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad nas sha za'i dbang po'i bar gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/stobs chen stobs kyi shugs shin tu 'joms pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 
[\[245b.3\]]'di bshad de/_phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'dis btab na de dag 'tsho bar ga la 'gyur/_tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'byung po gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa can/_snying rje med pa byas pa mi gzo ba/_sems 
[\[245b.4\]]can la 'tshe ba rnams sam/_bdud dam/_bdud kyi 'khor glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs tshol du nye bar 'ong ba dang /_btsun mo dam pa dang /_bu dang bu mo dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[245b.5\]]rnams dang /_blon po dang /_shor ba dang /_dpung dam pa dang /_'khor rnams dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos nyan pa rnams dang /_dge slong 
[\[245b.6\]]dang /_dge slong ma dang bsam gtan dang /_kha ton la 'grus pa rnams dang /_zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs tshol du 'ong zhing tha na sems kyi skad cig gcig la spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la 'tshe'am/_gnod par byed dam/_'jigs par byed dam/_mdangs 'phrog gam/_lus 
[\[245b.7\]]la dbugs gtong ngam/_sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na/_bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar lus dri nga ba de dag gi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/de dag gi mig kyang long bar 'gyur/_snying yang skams par 'gyur/_sha bkra can du 'gyur/_lus rul cing dri nga ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]yang yongs su bri bar 'gyur/_de dag sa gas par ltung bar 'gyur/_rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhir gtor bar 'gyur/_rdul gyis kyang yog nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'thoms par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sa la rgyu ba de dag ni sa'i khung bur 'jug par 'gyur te/_sa'i 
[\[246a.2\]]'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag chu na rgyu ba'i 'byung po sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa/_de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal rigs nas zhal ta byed 
[\[246a.3\]]pa la brtson pa'i dge slong gi bar la 'tshe ba'am/_gang dag sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da' na de dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas pa nas/_de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/yang yul gang du bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag 
[\[246a.4\]]rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung ba der bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o/_/der chos 'dod pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bskrad par 
[\[246a.5\]]bgyi'o/_/yul de na 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma lags pa'i char dang /_rlung dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_nad thams cad slar bzlog par bgyi'o/_/bde ba dang /_'dum pa dang /_lo legs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 
[\[246a.6\]]'thun pa rnams bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba rnams dang chos nyan pa rnams la nad ma mchis pa dang /_grags pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bsti stang chen po nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/yang de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[246a.7\]]po sa bcu la gnas pa/_tshangs pa'i nang du ni tshangs pa kun gyis bkur/_bdud kyi nang du ni bdud kun gyis bkur/_brgya byin gyi nang du ni brgya byin kun gyis bkur ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam thos kyi bu dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_dbang 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]phyug chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni de dag kun gyis bkur ba/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa bud med kyi gzugs dang /_rtags dang /_spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[246b.2\]]thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lag pa gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la mig mi 'dzums par 
[\[246b.3\]]bltas te/_gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa ci yang ma yin par bltas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye khyod mig mi 'dzums par ci yang ma yin pa'i bar du nga la ci zhig blta/_ci 'di 
[\[246b.4\]]la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang yod dam/_de bzhin du 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod do zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos po ni rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do/_/mtshan nyid kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa'o/_/ma rig 
[\[246b.5\]]pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas 'gog pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ma mchis pas na de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das gal te ma rig pa ma mchis na srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag ga las skye bar 'gyur/_
[\[246b.6\]]ci nam mkha' las skye zhes bgyir ni nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/ji ltar nam mkha' rdzas ma yin/_mtshan nyid ma yin/_mun pa ma yin/_
[\[246b.7\]]snang ba ma yin/_rtog pa ma yin/_rnam par rtog pa ma yin/_rnam par rig pa ma yin/_grub pa ma yin/_brjod pa ma yin/_ci yang ma yin pa cha shas med pa/_dngos po thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/_sangs 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yang dag pa'i mthas yongs su bcad pa'o/_/bri ba med pa dang /_gang ba med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni pha rol dang tshu rol la reg pa med pa'o/_/cha shas med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni brjod du med pa'o/_/mi g.yo 
[\[247a.2\]]zhing rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang /_dngos po dang /_mtshan nyid thams cad med pa'o/_/tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa/_kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yan 
[\[247a.3\]]lag rnams skyes so/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/_gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing 
[\[247a.4\]]brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/_de ci'i slad du ye shes dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_thabs dang /_pha rol gnon pas khyod 'di ltar bdag la 'tshe/_bdag gi bdud yul 'joms/_bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren/_'gro ba med pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_
[\[247a.5\]]ci yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob tu 'dzud pa/_gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyis bslab pa la slob pa na de dag la nyon mongs pa skye ba'i spyod pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slad du grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[247a.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[247a.7\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dag gang bar bgyis/_snying rje med pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag klad pa'i nad mi bzad pas btab ste/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing /_lus kyang 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]rul la dri nga bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad/_yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang /_bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang /_de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum dang /_sha za de dag thams cad kyis kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di 
[\[247b.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag kyang thos ma thag tu klad pa na bar gyur te/_lus kyang rul zhing dri nga bar gyur nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can khyod kyis 'das pa de dran par byos shig_/nga 
[\[247b.3\]]byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/_khyod kyis nga bsad pa'i phyir dpag tshad brgyad cu tshun cad kyi sa dang nam mkha' bdud kyi sdes bkang ste 'ongs pa nas/_da ltar bdud bye ba 'khor dang bcas te nga bsad pa'i bar du bkye bas/_de bas na khyod yongs su gdul ba dang /_zhi bar bya ba dang /_
[\[247b.4\]]yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_de bzhin du bdud gzhan rnams nas/_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang /_zhi bar bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa/_ci yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad du 
[\[247b.5\]]'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba'i 'khor ba'i chu kun bskam pa dang /_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa nas/_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar 
[\[247b.6\]]rnams bsogs kyis/_sdig can khyod da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig_/de ltar na khyod klad pa na ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba 'di las thar bar 'gyur te/_mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu mngon du 'gyur/_bdud kyi 
[\[247b.7\]]yul las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang /_bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang /_sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas lus srul po sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]bdag cag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi na/_ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de dag mngon du 'gyur/_thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di yang 
[\[248a.2\]]thob par 'gyur/_de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du klad pa na bar gyur kyang /_bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo sgyus byang chub tu sems mi skyed do/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[248a.3\]]bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bstan pa'i chos kun gzung bar spro'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bos gtad pa gzung bar bgyi ste/_da yang shAkya 
[\[248a.4\]]thub pa'i nyi ma nub kyi bar du bdag gis bstan pa 'di la chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o/_/yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba der bdag gis 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/gang du byung ba der ni shin tu lhag par 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/grong 
[\[248a.5\]]dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul de dag na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/_gnod pa las bzlog par bgyi/_don dang dge ba la gzud par bgyi'o/_/gang dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub 
[\[248a.6\]]pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na bris nas/_'chang ba rnams dang /_gang na chos smra ba'i seng ge'i khri la mchis te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshal ba/_de dag gis der thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bgyi'o/_/gsang 
[\[248a.7\]]sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag 'gugs par 'gyur te/_bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs der mchis nas/_chos smra ba de dag dang /_chos nyan pa de dag bsrung ba dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/'di lta ste/_a ba me/_a ba me/_a ma ba re/_a ma ba re/_pa ri kuny+dza/_nA Da nA Da puSh+ka ra 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]ma hA/_dza lu kha/_ma kha ya/_i li mi li/_ki li mi li/_kIrti tsa ra mu dre/_mu dra mu khe swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis la/_bdag gis kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shin tu yongs su dag pas thos 
[\[248b.2\]]te der ma mchis na/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bslus par 'gyur zhing /_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur bas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis la 
[\[248b.3\]]chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba de'i spobs pa rigs pas nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba dang chos nyan pa de dag gi nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/_lta ba ngan pa dang /_bya ba ngan pa dang /_the tsom thams cad bsal bar bgyi/_bcom 
[\[248b.4\]]ldan 'das phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa der ba dag 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_dus 
[\[248b.5\]]ma lags pa'i rlung dang /_tsha ba dang /_lta ba ngan pa dang /_bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma lags pa dang /_dur khrod rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bkra mi shis pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_brlang 
[\[248b.6\]]ba dang /_zhe gcod pa dang /_ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_dri nga ba dang /_reg na mi bde ba'i dug de dag thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/_/der tsha ba dang mu ge'i gnod pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o/_/glang po che dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_ma he dang /_spyang ki 
[\[248b.7\]]dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang /_rkun po dang /_g.yon can dang /_mi dang mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/_/der sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang /_kun tu spyod pa'i slad du nor dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_ro dang 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_mal cha sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_'chad pa der bdag cag gis sems can rnams kyi gnod pa 
[\[249a.2\]]thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/_/sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa'i slad du phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/sems can de dag kyang chos 'dod pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa la gzud par bgyi ste/_'di ni bdag 
[\[249a.3\]]gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/_skyes bu'i mthu 'di nyams 'og tu chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[249a.4\]]kyis bdag la yid bzhin du bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/_de nas de'i tshe de'i mod la shAkya thub pa la sogs pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa de la thugs brtse bar dgongs te 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[249a.5\]]stsal to/_/tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dis gang gi phyir/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin rnams bkug ste/_
[\[249a.6\]]skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed par 'gyur gyis/_nged kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di la sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la grub 
[\[249a.7\]]par gyur cig_/'di lta ste/_tsa muN De/_muN Da pa ri tshe de/_ha mU ha/_ha mU ha/_saMrak+Sha ba la/_krISh+Na mi kha/_pa ri ba ha/_tsa ma ra ya tha tsa/_su bi kha/_a mu hu la pa ri tshe de/_sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swa hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]kyi bu bdud dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /_gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams dgug cing 'dun par byed pa'i gzungs 
[\[249b.2\]]'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing /_byin gyis brlabs kyis khyod 'di skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus par 'gyur ro/_/dbyangs dang ldan pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag bud med kyi cha byad 'di lta bus chos kyi tshul bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bud med 
[\[249b.3\]]rnams kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bud med la la zhig bu 'tshal te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par bgyid dam/_bris te 'chang na bdag gis bud med de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/yang bud 
[\[249b.4\]]med gang 'di lta bus sems yongs su skyong bar gyur te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang zhing klog pa nas nyan pa'i bar du bgyid na/_de 'dod pa na spyod kyang de mngal du mi chags so/_/yang bud med gang brnyas shing smad par gyur pa'i longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa dang bral 
[\[249b.5\]]ba des/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bklags na bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing /_bde ba thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/_bdag gis nor bu rin po che 
[\[249b.6\]]'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la dbul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_bsrung ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_gzungs kyi le'u ste 
[\[249b.7\]]drug pa'o//_//bam po bdun pa/_yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]pa nor bu 'od 'bar ba dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_de yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i cha byad dang /_skad cig gis bdud kyi gzugs su snang ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_brgya byin gyi gzugs dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dbang po'i gzugs dang /_'phrul dga' 
[\[250a.2\]]dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'thab bral dang /_rgyal chen bzhi dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_
[\[250a.3\]]bram ze'i rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_seng ge dang /_glang po che dang /_ma he nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo /_/skad cig gis bya dang /_shing dang /_ri dang /_'bras bu dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_
[\[250a.4\]]snam bu dang /_snod dang /_phyang 'phrul dang /_rgyan dang /_sman rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i gzugs dang /_yud tsam gyis dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'i gzugs dang /_skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su snang ngo /_/skad cig gis kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_
[\[250a.5\]]dbyibs dang /_gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir snang ngo /_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang 
[\[250a.6\]]lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu mthu che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul gang la gnas nas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin 
[\[250a.7\]]par byed cing /_shes rab kyi mig sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su ma dag pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bsam pa dang /_sems pa ji lta bu dang /_spyod pa ji lta bu dang /_ci 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang /_gang la gang 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]skyabs su song ba'i sems can ji 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_spyod lam dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs de lta bu dag gis 
[\[250b.2\]]sems can rnams theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang /_sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te yo byad dang longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'dod pa de dag gi chags pa spang ba'i phyir yo byad rnams byin nas phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang /_nad kyis 
[\[250b.3\]]btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la sman sbyin te/_phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis nyin gcig la gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar byas te/_theg pa gsum la phyir 
[\[250b.4\]]mi ldog par 'god pa'i dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin/_bgrod pa ma yin no/_/gang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'dis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/_skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[250b.5\]]mthu chen po brtsams nas ci srid cig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gang dag gi pha rol tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni grangs med de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi 
[\[250b.6\]]rdul snyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskal pa gang dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams nas bskal pa grangs med pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das so/_/gang pos gsol pa/_'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[250b.7\]]gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag nyi shu rtsa drug 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po sgrol ba zhes bya ba la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_skye dgu'i tshe lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na mtshams med pa byed pa nas/_mi dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[251a.2\]]'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/des lo bzhi khrir sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir theg pa gsum 
[\[251a.3\]]po dag la sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'dis sngon sems can gang dag 
[\[251a.4\]]yongs su smin par bgyis pa de dag gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam ris su chad pa med de/_des smon lam 'di skad du/_nam phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 
[\[251a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad med par mthong bar ma gyur tam/_bdag gis sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/_sems can gang dag thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud pa dang /_yang dag par 
[\[251a.6\]]'dzin du bcug pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[251a.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang gzhan dag na yang /_sems can gang dag mtshams 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]med pa byed pa dang /_the tshom can nas mi dge ba'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par gyur pa de rnams de dag nas shi 'phos nas/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes la/_bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du/_de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya ste/_phyir mi 
[\[251b.2\]]ldog pa la so sor bkod nas/_de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu rgyun du bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub 
[\[251b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa rnams ston pa 'di lta bu dag kyang mnyes par bgyis/_byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu yang mthong /_'das pa dang /_ma 
[\[251b.4\]]byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byin gyi rlabs sngon ma thos pa 'di yang 
[\[251b.5\]]chos mnyan pa'i slad du/_rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste/_bdun pa'o//_//yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas/_thams cad 
[\[251b.6\]]dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bos te/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po nas 
[\[251b.7\]]mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa 'dir lhags pa khyed cag thams cad ngas spro bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di lta bu 'di dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pa 'di dang /_brgya byin dang /_
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa 'dus pa 'di lta bu ni dkon no/_/de bas na da khyod kyis 'di mthong nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'di dang /_chos 
[\[252a.2\]]kyi tshul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'di 'bar bar byed par spro ba dag gis/_de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed so so nas rang rang gi smon lam thob shig_/yang de'i tshe bdud dge sbyong me tog ces bya ba sa me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_
[\[252a.3\]]lo tog dang /_myu gu sna tshogs kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi bre bo byur bur bkang ste/_bud med kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par bsgyur nas/_bud med kyi gos dang /_rgyan mchog gis brgyan te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[252a.4\]]'das gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa thams cad dang /_gang gzhan yang su dag 'dir 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog dang /_myu gu 
[\[252a.5\]]thams cad kyis byur bur yongs su bltams shing rgyas pa'i bre bo 'di 'bul na sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi bre bo me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog dang /_myu gu thams cad kyis yongs su bltams 
[\[252a.6\]]pa 'di bzhes su gsol/_'di ltar bdag bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir bud med kyi gzugs kyis/_sems can rnams la zas dang /_skom dang /_'bras bu dang /_me tog dang /_lo tog gi sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyi/_de dag 
[\[252a.7\]]kyang yongs su smin par bgyi/_bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa des bdag pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/_sems can gang dag bdag gis 'dul ba de dag kyang /_yo 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]byad kyis mi brel bar bdag gis rim gro bgyi na/_bdag gi bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par dngos grub stsal du gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di ltar sems mngon 
[\[252b.2\]]par dad pas sbyin pa che zhing mtho ba byas pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa byas pa legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi bre bo me tog dang /_'bras bus yongs su gang ba 'di yang bzhes so/_/khyod kyang me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_lo 
[\[252b.3\]]tog la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang /_ji tsam 'dod pa dang /_gang gi phyir 'dod pa rnyed par gyur cig_/khyod kyi re ba yid kyi brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub par gyur cig_/'byor pa yang phun sum 
[\[252b.4\]]tshogs par gyur cig_/de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis yang gsol pa/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_ri brags gang dag na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/_ston tam/_'chad dam/_glegs bam la bris te/_bsti 
[\[252b.5\]]stang bgyi ba'i grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_ri brags de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o/_/de dang de dag tu shing ljon pa rnams kyi me tog dang /_'bras bu nas 'bru dang /_lo tog gi bar du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de dag thams cad na me tog dang /_
[\[252b.6\]]'bras bu 'tshal ba'i sems can rnams kyang tshim par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na/_tshe bas pa ma gtogs par gal te de na sems can me tog dang /_'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig me tog dang 'bras bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slad du/_'gum pa'i dus bgyid 
[\[252b.7\]]par gyur na/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /_'dus pa chen po ma lus pa 'di bdag gis bslus par gyur gyis bdag kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/gang 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]yang de na sems can rnams me tog dang /_'bras bu 'tshal ba de ni bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de na me tog dang 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas gang sems can de dag gcig la gcig phan pa dang /_
[\[253a.2\]]mnyen pa dang /_snying rje ba'i sems su 'gyur ba de ni bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/gang me tog dang /_'bras bu 'tshal nas/_brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ni/_de dag gi brtson 
[\[253a.3\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/gang sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/gang me tog dang /_'bras bu 'tshal 
[\[253a.4\]]nas tha na bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyang chos 'tshal bar gyur cing stong pa nyid la gnas na de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang du 'byung ba der sems can rnams kyi 'bras dang /_gro dang /_nas dang /_til 
[\[253a.5\]]dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_rgya sran dang /_sran chung dang /_sran ma dang /_gang dag lo tog tu gyur pa de dag 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o/_/'bru dang lo tog mang po dag gis kyang mdzod dang /_bang ba thams cad yongs su bltam par bgyi'o/_/
[\[253a.6\]]de na sems can gang tha na bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag gis kyang 'tshal bar gyur na/_de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/der bdag gi bu ram shing dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_bal po se'u'i khu shugs shin tu mang po bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/der 
[\[253a.7\]]bdag gis sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang /_bum pa dang /_bya skyogs rnams yongs su bltam par bgyi'o/_/gang de la tha na bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pas 'tshal na yang de ni bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/_de ltar bdag gi pha rol tu 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis bdag gi byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[253b.2\]]spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di la rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog ces bya bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa 
[\[253b.3\]]khyod 'di lta bu'i mthu chen po byed nus kyis/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_spro ba dang /_rtul ba de lta bus sems can thams cad gnyer bar gyis shig_/de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de las dbugs 
[\[253b.4\]]'byin pa de thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_gang la la zhig na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi spyod pa der ba dag mi gnas kyi/_gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der ba dag gnas te/_sa phyogs 
[\[253b.5\]]de na 'bru dang /_sman dang /_'bras bu dang /_me tog gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa'i slad du/_rab tu snum bag can dang /_shin tu che ba dang /_shin tu mang ba dang /_shin tu ro bda' ba dang /_shin tu yongs su kha dog dang ldan par bsgrub par 
[\[253b.6\]]bgyi/_sems can de dag kyang bza' ba dang /_btung bas tshim par bgyi/_sems can rnams kyi mdzod dang /_bang ba dang /_bum pa dang /_rdza ma dang /_bya skyogs rnams shin tu yongs su bltam par bgyi/_tha na gang bya dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyis de la 'tshal kyang /_de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi 
[\[253b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang /_bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal pa stong thams cad du/_sems can rnams la zas dang skom gyi longs spyod 'di lta bu dag gis tshim par bgyi/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa snyigs 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]ma lnga dang ldan par gyur pa grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams su bskal pa stong re re la yang /_skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu bgyi zhing /_de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[254a.2\]]rgya bar bgyi na/_bdag gi las yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dngos grub stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni rang gi smon lam gyis 'gugs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig lags so/_/'di lta ste/_tsa me kha/_tsa me kha/_tsa me kha/_bi bri ta ha te/_ba ha ba ha ba ha/_sma ra asma 
[\[254a.3\]]ra kA nu/_sa ra Te/_bi ba ba sa be/_sa ra sa ra/_in dre/_sa ra ma hI na dre/_sa ra badzren dre/_ta ra badzren dre/_ta ra pa ya asma ka na/_hu hu hu/_hu hu hu/_a sang ga dza be/_ha kha kha ba yu ba he/_u pa na ya/_san ta ra ba ya/_bi dza pha la puSh+pa/_o Sha d+hi/_d+ha na d+ha n+ye na tsan dra a k+Sha ye/_dza 
[\[254a.4\]]la ba ha ne/_sma ra asma ra kan/_saM myag pra ti pan na pa ya sa Ta ta kA li/_ya ma me/_ma mi ma med tsa ba ra swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/_gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_gsang sngags kyi 
[\[254a.5\]]tshig 'di dag bshad pa de dang de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o/_/de nas yang de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_bdud kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad 
[\[254a.6\]]dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum dang /_sha za dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang /_
[\[254a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa legs so legs so/_/kho bo cag gi bsod 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]nams dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_stobs dang /_pha rol gnon pas skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu mngon par grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa 'di'i grogs byed par snying brtse ba can du spro'o/_/de nas bdud 
[\[254b.2\]]dge sbyong me tog gi 'khor gang yin pa des mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag 'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing mdza' ba dang /_rjes su 'thun pa'i grogs bgyi'o/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[254b.3\]]'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/_khyod kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig_/bdud dge sbyong me tog gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de bzhin du gyur cig_/sems can gang dag gis sa la sa bon rnams btab ste/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_
[\[254b.4\]]dri kun tu spyod par gyur pa de yang bdag cag la phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la bdud dge sbyong me tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa lags kyi chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa lags te/_'di 
[\[254b.5\]]nyid du thog mar mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_nan tan cher bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/_de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 
[\[254b.6\]]'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdud dge sbyong me tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bde gshegs sras po dpa' bo pad ma'i gdong longs shig_/khyod kyis de ring byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po btab/_/
[\[254b.7\]]rtsa lag gcig pu snying rje skyes te bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/_/gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkrol nas ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/_/chos rnams rang bzhin dri med dag la nam mkha' 'dra ba dang /_/stong nyid mtshan ma rnams dang smon pa'i yul las rab grol bar/_/rtogs 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]nas zhing 'dir ring por mi thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba'i/_/sangs rgyas dgra thul blo gros shin tu bstan pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das de dag la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor to/_/
[\[255a.2\]]yang de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba stan las langs te/_thal mo sbyar nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs 
[\[255a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bskal pa bzang po byung nas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste/_sems can rnams kyi nad brgya rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar bgyi 
[\[255a.4\]]ba'i slad du/_bud med kyi gzugs kyis sa'i bcud las byin blangs te/_rtswa dang rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to/_/sems can rnams longs spyod du bgyi ba dang /_nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_sman bcud kyis len brgya rtsa bzhi sbyar te/_/rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /_
[\[255a.5\]]'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /_mar las sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang /_'bru mar las sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang /_bkru sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /_sman nad med ces bya ba brgya rtsa bzhi nas bska ba'i phye ma dang /_ril bu dang /_snar stsal ba'i bar du stong rtsa bzhi bstan to/_/sems can 
[\[255a.6\]]yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_nad zhi bar bgyi ba dang /_sems can rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas pa la kun spyad pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/_der ba dag byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal 
[\[255a.7\]]ba dang /_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po 'byung ste/_der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 
[\[255b.2\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis kyang de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i 'og tu 'od srung gis kyang bdag la de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_de'i tshe bdag gis sems can nad pa rnams kyi slad du/_bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[255b.3\]]snyed kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sman chen po bcud kyis len gyi lhar gyur cig_/der yang bdag gis sems can kun spyad pa dang /_nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_sa'i bcud rgya chen po blangs nas/_rtswa dang /_rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog 
[\[255b.4\]]dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to/_/de na sems can gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te/_'tshal nas sems can de dag sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par so sor rtog par gang 'jug pa de 
[\[255b.5\]]yang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes pa'i mthu chen po bgyid pa de bzhin du/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal pa 
[\[255b.6\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_bdag gis bud med kyi gzugs kyis spro ba chen po dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rtul ba 'di lta bu dang /_sems can nad pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 'di lta bus bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[255b.7\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/ces smon lam btab bo/_/da ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid do/_/skal ba chen po dang ldan pa/_pha rol gnon pa/_brtan pa dge sbyong me tog 'di'i grogs su yang gyur cig_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog gcig tu bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/bud med rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang /_rgan po rnams kyi nad 
[\[256a.2\]]rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_sa'i bcud las byin blangs la zas dang /_skom dang /_kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa sbyar bar bgyi ste/_bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig_/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[256a.3\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la legs so/_/zhes bgyi ba stsal du gsol/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol 
[\[256a.4\]]de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so zhes de la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed ni 'jig rten nad pa'i sman pa gcig_/de bzhin dbang 
[\[256a.5\]]po rnams la bde byed pa/_pad ma ldan pa zhing gtsang dam pa der/_/rnam par snang mdzad ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin ces bya ba/_lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_bud med kyi gzugs kyis sa la yongs 
[\[256a.6\]]su spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod ni ri dang sa 'dzin gcig pu ste/_/khyod kyi re ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur/_/rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs par ni/_/ye shes dbang phyug 
[\[256a.7\]]ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba/_lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_bud med kyi gzugs kyis chu la yongs su spyod pas/_smon lam btab pa dang /_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]stsal to/_/khyod kyis 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab kyis/_/me tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas/_/zhing mchog rnam par dag pa sgo ldan du/_/nyi ma mchog gi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thal ba ston zhes bya ba/_lung 
[\[256b.2\]]bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod pas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_smon lam btab pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni/_/
[\[256b.3\]]skye bo byang chub yongs su smin byas nas/_/skye bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags par/_/me yi sgron ma bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la g.yo zhing /_rdul dang bral ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_bud med 
[\[256b.4\]]kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongs su spyod pas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_smon lam btab pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/g.yo bas sems can rnams la dga' sbyar te/_/khyod ni nyon mongs rab 
[\[256b.5\]]tu zhi byed cing /_/rnam dag zhing du mnyam nyid don mthong ba/_/zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i sgron ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_bud med kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' la yongs su spyod pas/_sems 
[\[256b.6\]]can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_smon lam btab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mi gnas ye shes ston pa mya ngan med/_/yang dag byang chub lam mchog don smra ba/_/sgrib pa bsal cing chags pa med zhing du/_/
[\[256b.7\]]ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spos mchog smra ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me tog la yongs su spyod pas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_smon lam btab pa dang /_de 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas lam mchog ston pa rnams la ni/_/me tog spos mchog dag gis mchod byas nas/_/me tog 'byung gnas zhing mchog rnam dag tu/_/kun nas spos kyi bde bar 
[\[257a.2\]]gshegs par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha dog ngur smrig lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pas tshon sna tshogs la yongs su spyod pas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_smon lam btab pa dang /_
[\[257a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten ngur smrig gos la btsud nas su/_/dkon mchog gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas nas/_/sngon por snang ba'i sangs rgyas zhing mchog tu/_/rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs 
[\[257a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du sa bon dang /_nags tshal dang /_'bras bu'i lha du ma nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba 
[\[257a.5\]]dang /_bud med shin tu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang /_de dag tshigs su bcad pa re res lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_pho mtshan gyur te mo mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyed 
[\[257a.6\]]par sla la/_mo mtshan gyur te pho mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshe na lha dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/_byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo/_/de bzhin du lha 
[\[257a.7\]]ma yin dkrigs phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /_lha dang mi'i bu mo mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu dang /_bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas/_mi dang mi ma yin 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]pa'i bar dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa dang /_tshigs 
[\[257b.2\]]su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo/_/mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za bgrang ba las 'das 
[\[257b.3\]]pa sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni sems bskyed par gyur to/_/sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[257b.4\]]dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa dang /_gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/_/sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni 'bras bu thob nas/_'dod chags dang bral te zag pa zad par gyur to/_/sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[257b.5\]]rgyas kyi theg pa las sems bskyed nas/_sangs rgyas nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du dam pa'i 
[\[257b.6\]]chos 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba nas/_'chang bar bgyid pa'i bar gyis gang zag de dag kyang /_rig pas yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_lung 
[\[257b.7\]]bstan pa'i le'u ste/_brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gshegs pa thams 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis gos dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_sman dang /_yo byad kyis sems can rnams shin tu tshim par bgyis te/_bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyi ba 
[\[258a.2\]]dang /_ci nas 'di dag sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/_sems bskyed ma thag tu ci 'tshal ba dang /_gang gi slad du 'tshal ba dang /_ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_sman dang /_yo byad rnams sprul pa'am/_bsham pa 'byor bar 
[\[258a.3\]]'gyur ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag_/skyes bu chen po'i mthu 'di lta bu bgyid pa dang /_sems can rnams la longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pas rim gro bgyid nus par 'di dag la dgongs su gsol/_de nas 
[\[258a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_thugs rje chen po dang /_bsod nams dang /_ye shes dang /_bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa yid la mdzad pas/_skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed kyi bsam pa dang /_yid la re ba yongs 
[\[258a.5\]]su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag sbyin no/_/'di lta ste/_dz+yo to ba ba/_d+h+ri ti ba ba/_mu ni ba ba/_sa t+ya ba ba/_
[\[258a.6\]]sU n+ya/_a lang ka ra ba ba/_d+h+ya na ra sa ba ba/_ma ha kA ru Na ba ba/_ma hA pra ti ba ba/_a mo ha ba ba/_ru ti ba ba/_k+Shi ti ba ba/_sa li la ba ba/_kha ga ba ba/_ba yu ba ba/_brta ba ba/_a d+hiSh+ThA na ba ba/_a ma ba ba/_a ha na na ba ba/_ta thA ba ba/_b+hU ta ko Ti ba ba/_ni ra bri ti ba ba/_
[\[258a.7\]]tri ya lan ba ba/_trai d+hA tu ka ba/_tri bi mo k+Sha ba ba/_tri shU kla ba ba/_raSh+Ti a d+hiSh+ThA na ba ba/_ba ba ba ba ba/_sa ma tra yan n+ya sa ma tA/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Ta Ta Ta Sh+Ta/_sid d+hi sarba kun la sha la mu la/_a d+hiSh+Tha na ya swA hA/_skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi/_gsang 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]sngags kyi tshig bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di dag_/sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa dang /_yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_khyed kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zung shig_/yang de'i tshe/_dge sbyong me tog dang /_
[\[258b.2\]]dpal gyi lha mo dang /_rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang /_lha mo sa 'dzin la sogs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyis/_sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa dang /_yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/_de dag 
[\[258b.3\]]thams cad mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis/_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs pas na/_byin gyi rlabs 'dis bdag cag sems can thams 
[\[258b.4\]]cad la rim gro bgyid nus so/_/bdag cag bla na med pa'i ye shes de bsgrub par nus so/_/bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson pa drag pos spro bar bgyi'o/_/yang sems can 
[\[258b.5\]]thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad du da de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rang rang gis dam bcas pa la gnas par bgyi'o/_/lha'am klu nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ma mchis par bgyid dam/_zhig par 
[\[258b.6\]]bgyid dam/_rnam par ma rungs par bgyid la/_bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/_gal te de ma bzlog gam/_nan tan ma bgyis na bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig_/
[\[258b.7\]]bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/kye grogs po dag lha nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma la 'tshe la/_gal te bdag cag gis 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]de dag ma bzlog gam/_bdag cag gis de dag gi 'khrug pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan ma bgyis na/_bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig_/bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[259a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang /_chab dang /_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_byad dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_
[\[259a.3\]]zhag gsum pa dang /_zhag bzhi pas 'jigs pa nas/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lus srul po dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze'i rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_nad dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom 
[\[259a.4\]]pa dang /_'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa las/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran na/_sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa 
[\[259a.5\]]ni ma gtogs te/_bdag cag gis de dag gnod pa rnams las yongs su thar bar ma bgyis na/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur cig_/bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[259a.6\]]'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/de'i tshe gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legs so legs so/_/khyed kyis skyes bu dam 
[\[259a.7\]]pa'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/thub pa gshegs pa 'di dag la ni dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de/_/de ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhol 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]byos/_/sdig can khyod ni rang gi yul nas rab tu grogs med mthu med kyis/_/thub pa la ni khyod kyis sdo zhing snyog par byed pa gtang bar byos/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/_khyod kyi tshig gis byang chub dri med dad pa'i sems gcig bdag mi bskyed/_/thub 
[\[259b.2\]]pa ma gsung bzhugs shig bdag la rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis/_/de dag lhan cig bdag gis yul na dpung dang bzhon par gnas par bgyi/_/phun sum mchog 'dzin bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho bar khyod kyi dbang mi mchi/_'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi 
[\[259b.3\]]gzungs las/_snying brtse ba'i le'u ste/_dgu pa'o//_//bam po brgyad pa ste tha ma/_yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA ra ba'i dri mos kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/ji ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin 
[\[259b.4\]]gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byon te/_nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni legs par byin gyis brlabs/_bdud bye ba ni pham par mdzad/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje 
[\[259b.5\]]chen po'i spyan gyis sems can rnams la ni gzigs/_sdig pa'i lta ba las ni rab tu thar bar mdzad/_shes rab kyi sgron ma ni 'bar bar mdzad/_zhi ba'i lam la ni bkod de/_chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 
[\[259b.6\]]phyag rgya dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bshad/_nag po'i phyogs ni pham par mdzad/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni btsugs pa de bzhin du/_da ltar phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams 
[\[259b.7\]]kyis kyang /_sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'du ba chen po mdzad de/_chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs pa nas/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa'i bar du mdzad na/_shAkya thub pa nyi 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ma khyod ni nub nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyid par 'gyur/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur/_'dus pa chen po 'dir yang 
[\[260a.2\]]bgrang bar chud par 'gyur/_bdag gis su'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA ra ba'i dri mos la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[260a.3\]]'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams sam/_brgya byin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_'jig rten skyong ba'am/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang 
[\[260a.4\]]po'am/_gang su yang rung ste/_chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang /_gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi po 'di dag na gnas pa/_chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba nas/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar 
[\[260a.5\]]de dag gi lag tu gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par mdzod cig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA ra ba'i dri mos kyis/_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs pa med pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag khyab par 
[\[260a.6\]]mdzad nas/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po dag gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[260a.7\]]ldan 'das thams cad gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa 'di yang shin tu dkon te/_khyod la thugs brtse ba dang /_sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_bla na med pa'i lam la bkod pa'i phyir/_
[\[260b\]]
