[\[260b.1\]]sangs rgyas 'di dag thams cad 'dus te/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba nas 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/_da ltar sangs 
[\[260b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/_dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so/_/chu'i khams thams cad dang /_me'i khams thams cad dang /_rlung gi khams thams cad dang /_nam mkha'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so/_/
[\[260b.3\]]de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/_gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha 
[\[260b.4\]]ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang /_gang dag yang gzi brjid che ba/_gzi brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang /_gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces 
[\[260b.5\]]bka' stsal to/_/kye grogs po dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te/_khyed kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyis ci nas 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'jig pa dang /_nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i 
[\[260b.6\]]chos 'di yid la gyis shig_/'bar bar gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/_yi ger bris te/_'chang ba'i bar du byed pa dang /_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_
[\[260b.7\]]dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongs su bsrung zhing bskyang ba'i phyir/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis chos smra ba dang /_chos la dga' ba dang /_bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang /_chos mnyan pa dang /_dam pa'i 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung bar bya ba nas/_yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
[\[261a.2\]]thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang /_mi nub par bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/_
[\[261a.3\]]brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad do/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_phyogs bcur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig gis 
[\[261a.4\]]'dus te/_sems can la phan pa'i phyir/_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur/_chos kyi tshul 'di yang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur zhing /_chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig 
[\[261a.5\]]rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nged kyis kyang da ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang /_gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa 
[\[261a.6\]]dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu 'di shin tu gtad kyis/_ci nas myur du mi 'jig cing /_nub par mi 'gyur ba/_
[\[261a.7\]]de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shig_/rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig_/bsrung bar gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar 
[\[261b.2\]]bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ri brags sam/_pho brang 'khor dang /_dgon pa'i gnas nas 
[\[261b.3\]]dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod de 'chad dam/_lung 'bog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tha na glegs bam la bris te/_'chang na chos kyi bcud des sa'i bcud dang /_sems can gyi mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur te/_khyed des mdangs dang 
[\[261b.4\]]ldan zhing /_gzi brjid dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_khyod kyi g.yog 'khor dang /_gzhal med khang yang 'phel bar 'gyur/_mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi rgyal srid dang /_dbang phyug kyang 
[\[261b.5\]]'phel bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang chos kyi bcud des tshim nas gcig la gcig phan pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang mngon par yid 
[\[261b.6\]]ches par 'gyur/_dge ba'i sems su 'gyur/_ser sna med pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems nas/_yang dag par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/so so bdag gi yul la yang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[261b.7\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'di yang skye bo rags pas gang bar 'gyur/_shin tu lo legs pa dang /_shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur/_mi'i skye bo mang pos gang zhing sa yang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_'bras bu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang /_shin tu zhim pa dang /_'o ma'i sman dang /_lo tog gi 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]sman dang /_nor dang /_'bru rnams shin tu 'byor pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dug dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_phye ma leb dang /_
[\[262a.2\]]sbrul gdug pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po ma rungs pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_spyang ki dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_skar ma dang /_nyin mo dang /_mtshan mo dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_lo dang /_dus rnams 
[\[262a.3\]]kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur/_sems can rnams kyang phal cher dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur/_'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag kyang khyed kyi g.yog tu 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gzungs kyi 
[\[262a.4\]]phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste/_sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen pos byin gyis brlabs te/_grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bud 
[\[262a.5\]]med kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi dngos po myong bar 'gyur bar 'phangs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam 
[\[262a.6\]]pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par gang gzhan lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te/_'chang 
[\[262a.7\]]na yang 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus/_de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_yan lag 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/_lta ba ngan pa thams cad spong ba dang /_dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod pa dang /_
[\[262b.2\]]zhi zhing phra ba'i las thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus sa phyogs de shin tu snum par 'gyur/_
[\[262b.3\]]'bras bu mdangs dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu zhim pa dang /_ro dang ldan par 'gyur/_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_ro med pa spong bar 'gyur/_me tog dang /_'bras bu shin tu 'byor pa dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_bang ba dang /_mdzod dang /_rdza phru dang /_bya skyogs 
[\[262b.4\]]rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_gos dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_sman dang /_yo byad rnams shin tu mchog tu 'gyur te/_de na sems can gang dag zas dang skom gyis 'tsho ba de dag ni shin tu nad med pa dang /_nor dang ldan pa dang /_kha dog dang ldan pa dang /_stobs dang 
[\[262b.5\]]ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_dge ba tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa dang /_sdig pa'i lta ba yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/_de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis khyed kyi g.yog 'phel nas/_
[\[262b.6\]]stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogs su 'gyur gyis/_chos kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye ba'i tshogs yongs su bskyang bar gyis shig_/sems can rnams chos kyi don la tshud cig_/de ltar na khyod kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[262b.7\]]ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA ra ba'i dri mos kyis/_'dus pa chen po'i mdo'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung ba dang /_bshad pa dang bsrung ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]don dang /_tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_brgya byin gyi dbang po nas tshangs pa'i dbang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar du gang dag sangs 
[\[263a.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa phal cher gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa rnams la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas spro ba mdzad do/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu 
[\[263a.3\]]rtsa bdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i slad du/_chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[263a.4\]]'di rigs pas ston par bkur zhing /_gus pa chen pos bzung bar bgyi'o/_/snying rjes sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba nas/_bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal 
[\[263a.5\]]dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o/_/dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 
[\[263a.6\]]gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar thams cad dang /_gang 
[\[263a.7\]]dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa/_sems can gzi brjid che ba/_gzi brjid che ba/_bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus pa 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bgyi ba nas rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o/_/yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/chos 'tshal ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[263b.2\]]yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mu ge dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus 
[\[263b.3\]]ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char pa dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_gdug pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_ro ma mchis pa dang /_sra ba dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/bde ba dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_'dum pa bsgrub par 
[\[263b.4\]]bgyi'o/_/chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan cher bgyi'o/_/chos nyan pa'i rgyal po de dag kyang shin tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas 
[\[263b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag legs so legs so/_/khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i phyir nan tan gyis shig_/de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i 
[\[263b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar khyed kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar dang /_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson na khyed ring por mi thogs par 
[\[263b.7\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar dang /_
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]gang dag yang sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'dus te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang /_chos kyi tshul 'di bstan par 
[\[264a.2\]]bgyi/_bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rigs pas blang bar bgyi ba nas/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_
[\[264a.3\]]yul dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o/_/dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/gang dag yang chos bsrung bar gnas pa'am/_chos smra ba'am/_chos 
[\[264a.4\]]nyan pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam la bris te/_'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang /_bsam gtan la brtson pa de dag bdag cag 
[\[264a.5\]]gis bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/_stang du bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_ri mor bgyi/_mchod par bgyi/_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_ba dan dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_byug pa nas sman dang /_yo byad thams cad kyi bar gyis bsti stang du bgyi'o/_/chos 
[\[264a.6\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba'am/_klog pa'am/_ston pa'i drung du bdag cag nyid nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par 'du shes pas/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis bsti stang du bgyi/_bla 
[\[264a.7\]]mar bgyi/_ri mor bgyi/_mchod par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/_chos kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_stobs dang ldan/_brtson 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]'grus dang ldan/_mthu dang ldan/_dran pa dang ldan/_ye shes dang ldan/_phyogs dang g.yog tu ldan zhing /_chos dang mthu thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bdag cag gis yul thams cad du 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed 
[\[264b.2\]]pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /_char dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_brlang ba dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_
[\[264b.3\]]ro ma mchis pa dang /_mi dge ba'i phyogs bgyid pa'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/shin tu bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_nad ma mchis pa dang /_'dum pa bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/rlung dang /_char dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba rnams 
[\[264b.4\]]dus gsum du 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/mtshan mo dang /_nyin mo dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_lo dang /_dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba rnams kyang legs par rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/'bab chu dang /_chu 
[\[264b.5\]]mig dang /_rdzing dang /_lteng ka yang shin tu bltam par bgyi'o/_/gang du sems can rnams chu'i klung gis gnod par gyur pa yang bdag cag gis bsal bar bgyi'o/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs de dag tu yang sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/_
[\[264b.6\]]bdag cag gis 'dab ma dang /_yal ga dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_sdong bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_ro dang /_lo tog rnams shin tu snum pa dang /_bda' ba dang /_kha dog dang /_ro che zhing mang ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/sems can rnams la nor dang /_'bru dang /_
[\[264b.7\]]sman dang /_gos dang /_lhab lhub kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i sems dang /_sdig pa yongs su spong ba dang /_dpal dang /_bsod nams 'byung bas tshe ring po 'grub par bgyi'o/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor gang dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/_tha na glegs bam la bris te/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_mchod dam/_bsti stang bgyid cing /_
[\[265a.2\]]'chang ba de dag tu rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba de dag kyang /_bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/_de dag la gnod pa bsal bar bgyi/_phan pa bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ltad mo dang /_bkra mi shis pa dang /_lta ba ngan pa dang /_
[\[265a.3\]]byed pa ngan pa dang /_byin rlabs ngan pa dang /_smon lam ngan pa dang /_skyabs ngan pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_g.yo dang /_sgyu dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_khro ba dang /_ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba'i 
[\[265a.4\]]lam drang po dang /_dad pa dang /_dul ba dang /_kun sdom pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa la gzud par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang /_blon po dang /_rtsis pa chen po dang /_grong rdal pa nga /_zho shas 'tsho ba 
[\[265a.5\]]dang /_ljongs kyi mi rnams dang /_rigs bzhi rnams dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams kyang bsrung zhing bskyang bar bgyi ba nas ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi'o/_/tha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung 
[\[265a.6\]]bar bgyi'o/_/gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba nas glegs bam la bris te/_bzhag pa'i bar du bgyid na/_sems can de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang rtul ba chen pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi tshul yang 
[\[265a.7\]]dag par bstan pa'i slad du/_bskal pa mtha' yas par nan tan cher bgyi'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag legs so legs so/_/khyed kyis de bzhin 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]du gyis shig_/khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi nub par nan tan byas na/_de lta na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi 
[\[265b.2\]]gzungs las/_kun tu bsrung ba'i le'u ste/_bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_lus ngan po rnams la bka' 
[\[265b.3\]]stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag nga sems can la snying rje'i smon lam gyis nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sems can ma rig pa'i 
[\[265b.4\]]mun par zhugs pa/_nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang /_g.yon can gyis gtses pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni pham par byas/_dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng /_sems can tshad med pa dag ni sdug bsngal rnams las 
[\[265b.5\]]yongs su thar bar byas/_dam pa'i chos kyi char ni phab/_ngas bdud bye ba ni pham par byas so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gang gi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[265b.6\]]chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang /_sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang /_
[\[265b.7\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su grub par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/_chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]pa/_lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la srungs shig_/gang nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bsrung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang /_gang 
[\[266a.2\]]lung 'bogs pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_dran pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang /_
[\[266a.3\]]gang bsam gtan dang po bsgom pa nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgom pa'i bar dang /_gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par 'du bya ba'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /_gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dge 
[\[266a.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba da lta na byed pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byed par 'gyur ba nas/_nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i tshogs de dag thams cad khyed kyi lag tu gtad do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[266a.5\]]thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gis bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/_tha na glegs bam la bris te/_'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag 
[\[266a.6\]]kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag grong ngam dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na chos smra ba shin tu khrus byas te/_gos sar pa bgos nas/_me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su/_spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa 
[\[266a.7\]]ras bcos bu dang /_ras sna tshogs bting ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chad dam/_tha na glegs bam la bris te/_klog pa der gal te khyod chos nyan pa dang /_chos smra ba bsrung ba'am/_chos nyan pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba'am/_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga mi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir der ma dong na de'i phyir khyed kyis bslus pa dang /_lam bskyed pa la rmongs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[266b.2\]]ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi bar du nub par gyur pa na/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ri brags sam/_pho brang 'khor tam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[266b.3\]]ngam/_bram ze'i khyim 'am/_tshong dpon gyi khyim 'am/_dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang /_gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/_yan 
[\[266b.4\]]lag shin tu byugs nas gos sar pa 'tshal te/_me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs bting ba ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/_lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di 
[\[266b.5\]]gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad dam bris te/_klog pa der chos nyan pa nas/_chos smra ba de bsrung ba'am/_chos nyan pa de dag dang /_bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'am/_dge ba'i chos yongs su smin par 
[\[266b.6\]]bgyi ba'am/_chos kyi tshul chen po yang dag par 'bar bar bgyi ba'am/_ye shes kyi snang ba chen po mchog gi lam la 'jug pa'i slad du/_bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor te/_der ma mchis sam/_grong nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag yongs su bskyang ba 
[\[266b.7\]]dang /_sems can de dag gi nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po rab tu dgang ba'i slad du/_der ma mchis na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis/_sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/'di 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]lta ste/_aM gu ha/_aM gu ha/_D+hang ga pu ra ha na/_ya mi kha kha kha kha/_kha kha kha ba kha ba/_klin na kha ba swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag chos nyan pa'am/_chos smra ba bsrung ba nas/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po 
[\[267a.2\]]rnam par 'phel bas/_tshim par bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du/_der ma mchis na/_yi dam las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_lha dang /_
[\[267a.3\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no/_/de nas kau shi kas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /_ma mchis pa'i dus na grong ngam/_grong khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[267a.4\]]'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'di lta lte/_kha ba mri kha/_kha ba mri kha/_na la g+ha/_a mud nya/_a mu ba ha/_a ka Ta Ta/_a kha/_a sha kha/_
[\[267a.5\]]dzi na bra khe swa hA/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/_'di ni bdag gi bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba nas/_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dag gis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o/_/
[\[267a.6\]]de nas 'phags skyes pos kyang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur lags so/_/'di 
[\[267a.7\]]lta ste/_u kha na ba na ba sa ba na/_sa mu dra sang ngid gadz+nyA ta tha ts+yud ta/_ba ru Na ba ba rA dzA swA hA/_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no/_/de nas mig mi bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar ma bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/
[\[267b.2\]]'di lta ste/_dzalau g+ha/_a to g+ha/_a ma ma/_mo g+ha/_a ma sa rA dza na tsar+ya ya mu dza swa hA/_de nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no/_/de nas yang yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[267b.3\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/'di lta ste/_bin 
[\[267b.4\]]du dza ba kha ba/_dza ba ra mu kha/_k+Sha sA ra/_pu ka ba ha/_a mArga ba Ta swa hA/_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no/_/de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /_
[\[267b.5\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/'di lta ste/_k+Shu tre k+Shu k+Shu 
[\[267b.6\]]k+Shu tre/_kha k+Shu tre/_a ti k+Shu tre/_a na ya na k+Shu tre/_hr-i da k+Shu tre/_sa ga ra hr-id k+Shu tre/_saM ku su k+Shu tre/_d+harma k+Sha ya mu tre swA hA/_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin to/_/yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[267b.7\]]khams 'di na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'di na yongs su skyong ba stong nyis brgya dang /_gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang /_gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i bar du nub par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_grong ngam/_grong khyer 
[\[268a.2\]]ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ri brag gam/_pho brang 'khor tam/_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_bram ze'i khyima'am/_tshong dpon gyi khyima'am/_bdag nyid chen po'i khyima'am/_dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/_
[\[268a.3\]]dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang /_gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/_yan lag shin tu byugs nas/_gos sar pa bgos te/_me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su ras bcos bu sna 
[\[268a.4\]]tshogs bting ba/_spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/_ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bltam pas brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la mchis te/_gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad dam/_glegs bam la bris te/_
[\[268a.5\]]klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas ma mchis sam/_der chos nyan pa'am chos smra ba bsrung ba dang rang gi 'khor bsrung ba dang /_sems can gzhan yang bsrung ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du grong ngam/_
[\[268a.6\]]grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam/_'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam/_yongs su ma bskyangs sam/_der sems can rnams kyi nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po rab tu ma bltama'am/_der ma mchis sam/_
[\[268a.7\]]der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma lags pa'i char pa dang /_rlung dang /_shin tu grang ba dang /_tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na/_bdag cag gis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus pa dang /_'khus pa dang /_mnyes par ma bgyis par 'gyur te/_lus la sha bkras btab pa dang /_lta ba yongs su nyams pa dang /_lus rul bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag g.yog dang bcas pas/_da ltar dang 
[\[268b.2\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung 
[\[268b.3\]]bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/ngan par bgyis pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par chos smra ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba dang /_chos nyan pa de dag gi nor dang /_
[\[268b.4\]]'bru dang /_longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin 
[\[268b.5\]]no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags/_gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[268b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/_ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no/_/
[\[268b.7\]]bdud sdig can g.yog stong yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob ste/_'khrugs shing yid mi dga' nas da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du 'di glags lta zhing skabs tshol te/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]par byed do/_/de bzhin du g.yog khri sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang /_g.yog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyis brgya po 'di dag kyang g.yog dang bcas pa dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob ste/_'khrugs shing yid mi dga' bas 'di dag da ltar dang /_
[\[269a.2\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du 'di dag nga'i bstan pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol te/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang /_nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon chad khon du bzung ba dang /_dge 
[\[269a.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang /_dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi 'dod pa dang /_smon lam ma btab pa'i phyir/_sems dang sems mtshams mi sbyor/_dad par mi byed/_gnas par mi byed/_rab tu gtong 
[\[269a.4\]]bar mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang /_gzungs zab mo 'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de nyid kyis phyin chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/_
[\[269a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par gyur pa na yang /_de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das shin tu ngo mtshar to/_/bde 
[\[269a.6\]]bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de drang srong 
[\[269a.7\]]chen po'i cha byad du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas de stan las langs te/_kun tu bltas nas thal mo sbyar te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis stobs bskyed pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar byas te 'di skad 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_
[\[269b.2\]]bdud g.yog dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi tshig 'di la gson cig_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma can thams cad rnam par gcod pa/_yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di 
[\[269b.3\]]sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dam pa'i chos spong ba 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa 
[\[269b.4\]]mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ngan par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_ngan song gsum las shin tu bzla ba dang /_theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang bzod pa la dgod pa dang 
[\[269b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyis de la khyed kyis kyang ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di yang rnam par mi 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang bsgrub pa dang mi 
[\[269b.6\]]ldan pa ma gtogs par da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la sems can 'ga' yang 'tshe ba'am/_rnam par 'jig pa'am/_nub par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang gang dag yang dam pa'i 
[\[269b.7\]]chos 'di 'dzin pa dang /_chos la nan tan bgyid pa dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos nyan pa'i dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo las gsum la mngon par brtson pa bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dga' ba/_
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa/_khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par brtson pa/_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bgyid par gyur pa/_de dag la yang bdud dam/_bdud kyi 
[\[270a.2\]]bu'am/_bdud kyi bu mo'am/_bdud kyi 'khor tam/_bdud kyi 'khor mo'am/_bdud kyi pho nyas gtse ba'i bsam pas glags lta ba'am/_skabs tshol du mchi zhing g.yeng ba dang /_dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig_/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[270a.3\]]ldan 'das thams cad la gsol lo/_/bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[270a.4\]]mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig_/gang su dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam pa'i 
[\[270a.5\]]chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig_/bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub stsol cig dang /_bdag gis bdud dang /_bdud kyi 'khor de nan tur gyis tshar gcad pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_lus la gnod pa dang /_
[\[270a.6\]]lus spa bkong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i sngags bshad par bgyi ste/_des bdud dang /_bdud kyi bu dang /_bdud kyi bu mo dang /_bdud kyi 'khor dang /_bdud kyi 'khor mo dang /_bdud kyi pho nya gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems ma dad pa gcig tsam skyed 
[\[270a.7\]]dam/_dge slong la 'tshe ba'am/_tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sems 'khrug par bgyid pa nas/_dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'dri bar bgyid pa'i bar du nan tan bgyid pa dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_ri brags de rnams ma 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]rung bar bgyid par sems bskyed pa dang /_gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag tu tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /_char dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha 
[\[270b.2\]]ba dang /_chu bo dang /_sa g.yo ba dang /_sa 'gas pa dang /_skar mda' ltung bar bgyid pa dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_ro skye bar mi bgyid dam/_ma rungs par bgyid par 'tshal na/_bdud des de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu bdud nas 
[\[270b.3\]]bdud kyi pho nya'i bar de dag rims nad kyis tsha bar 'gyur/_lus lci ba dang /_rngul ba dang /_lus rul ba dang /_dri mi zhim pa dang /_las su mi rung ba dang ldang mi nus par 'gyur/_bcing ba lngas bdag bcings par mthong ba nas/_de'i yan lag thams cad 'khums pa'i bar du 
[\[270b.4\]]'gyur zhing /_slar [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}\u0f72] nus pa dang /_de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur nas/_nyi ma snang ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba dang /_de'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas sems 'khrug par 'gyur/_de'i dbang po drug kyang spyod yul la 'jug mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_a ma le/_
[\[270b.5\]]a ha ma ma le/_a dza ba ba/_mU ra sa le/_bya kha sa le/_dza ma sa le/_hA hA/_hA hA/_hA hA/_go ra sa Da Ta/_dza na kha ga_/dz+nye ya kha ga_/bid dz+nye ba sa kha ga_/a mu k+Sha ra/_k+Sha k+Sha k+Sha/_k+Sha k+Sha k+Sha/_mU la ba ha kha ga sba/_khad nya sba/_ba ri brta mUr/_ad dz+nyA dz+nyA/_ba yu dz+nyAd dz+nyA/_tsan dra sU ro dz+nyA dz+nyA/_na ba ha dz+nyAd 
[\[270b.6\]]dz+nyA/_khu rak+Sha dz+nyAd dz+nyA/_ba ba dz+nyAd dz+nyA/_b+hu ta ko Ti/_ta tha tA dz+nyAd dz+nyA/_sarba de dz+nye bi/_a d+hi Sh+Thi ta dz+nyAd dz+nyA/_ba kra ma/_tri ga Na tA k+Sha ba k+Sha ma ma k+Sha ma dz+nyA k+Sha bi ta ma ra bi shA ya swA hA/_thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis skad cig tu bdud kyi yul thams cad med par byas te 'bras bu med 
[\[270b.7\]]par gyur to/_/gang su yang rung gnod par 'dod pa dag kyang de bzhin no/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_lha thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]ba rab tu byin no/_/de nas de'i tshe sa ni g.yos/_sprin ni 'khrugs/_/ri'i rgyal po rnams ni rab tu g.yos te/_gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par bdud 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[271a.2\]]'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang 'khrugs so/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdud ri byi 'di'i stobs ga las 'ong /_mthu ga las 'ongs na/_gang snying rje med pa 'dis rang gi phyogs thams cad dang /_nga'i stobs kyi yul 
[\[271a.3\]]dang /_pha rol gnon pa thams cad ma lus par bcom ste/_nag po'i rtsa lag ni pham par byas/_mi 'thun pa chad par smra ba dang /_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i phyogs ni mtho bar byas/_bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu lus dri mi zhim pa dang /_lus rul ba dang /_las su mi rung bar gyur/_bdag gi 
[\[271a.4\]]phyogs thams cad kyang mun par gyur te snang zhing mthong ba med par byas nas/_yongs su gdung ba chen pos kyang bdag gdungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_sdig can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_mi dang mi ma yin 
[\[271a.5\]]pa thams cad kyi stobs bskyed pas/_bdud ri byis bdud kyi stobs kyi yul dang /_pha rol gnon pa 'dir thams cad rnam par 'joms shing /_des gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bshad kyis sdig can khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad par gyis shig_/
[\[271a.6\]]ci nas khyod lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi sdug bsngal 'di dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed cig_/bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/_bdag ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu grangs med par 'di bas kyang ches sdig pa'i lus dang /_
[\[271a.7\]]ngag dang /_yid kyi sdug bsngal rnams la spro'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni bdag sems mi bskyed do/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul bsrung ba'i le'u ste/_bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]'brog gnas ni/_gnod sbyin 'jigs 'jigs lta bu'i gzugs su/_yang dag shes ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gzugs su/_shes pa'i sgron ma ni spre'u'i gzugs su/_sred spong ni ra'i gzugs su/_rgyun bcad pa ni glang po che'i gzugs su/_sems can chen po lnga po de dag de bzhin 
[\[271b.2\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung nas/_ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/_de bzhin gshegs pa kauN+Di n+ya 'od 'phro ba'i spyan sngar 'khod nas de dag gi lus thams cad las rnam par dag cing /_dri zhim pa'i 'od phyung ngo /_/de nas sems can chen po lnga po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[271b.3\]]mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nor bu rin po che chen po me'i 'od ces bya ba lag pa gnyis na thogs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis de dag gis bsam pa tshul bzhin rnam par dag pa la bltas te/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[271b.4\]]chen po'o snyam nas/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas de la bos te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu dam pa don gyi dbang gang mthong na khyed 'di lta bu'i spyod lam gyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed/_'brog gnas kyis 
[\[271b.5\]]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshes pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i tshe bdag cag lnga spun drung du gyur te/_de na bdag cag 
[\[271b.6\]]gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byas so/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[271b.7\]]'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung gi bar du de na yang de bzhin du bdag cag sngon gyi smon lam gyis spun drung du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bdag cag gis mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur rnam pa mang po byas so/_/de nas yang der sems can chen po dge bsnyen yang dag shes bsam gtan la 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]mngon par dga' bas der 'di 'dra ba'i smon lam btab ste/_bdag bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por gyur la/_de na 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa ma rungs pa/_sems can rnams la snying rje dang /_snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa/_byad gzugs tha dad 
[\[272a.2\]]pa'i gnod sbyin dag nas lus srul po'i bar du de dag la bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad par bgyi ste/_'di ltar dad pa thob par byas nas/_bslab pa 'dzin du btsud la zhi ba'i lam la bkod pa nas/_de na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_spyang ki dang /_dgo ba dang /_
[\[272a.3\]]phag la sogs pa la yang chos bshad pa nas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i bar la chos bshad pas yongs su smin par byas nas/_theg pa gsum po dag la so sor bkod de/_de nas gdod bdag 
[\[272a.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par shog shig ces byas so/_/de bzhin du gnod sbyin shes pa'i sgron mas spre'u'i gzugs kyis spre'u yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab po/_/sred spong ra'i gzugs kyis mi khom pas nyam nga bar gyur pa'i 
[\[272a.5\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab po/_/rgyun bcad glang po che'i gzugs kyis glang po che yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste/_de bzhin du gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po pa gling bzhi pa na gnas pa khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang 
[\[272a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs btab par gyur nas/_bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de'i spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing bskal pa bzang po 'di 
[\[272a.7\]]thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo/_/'di na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa/_snying rje med pa/_mi gzo ba/_ya nga ba spyod pa/_sdig pa 'dod pa/_snying rje dang mi ldan pa nas lus srul po sems can la 'tshe ba/_mdangs 'phrog pa/_sems 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]'khrug par byed pa/_mi dge ba'i sems su byed pa/_srog gcod pa nas log par lta ba'i bar dag dang ldan pa/_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze'i rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs kyi sems 'khrug par byed pa/_yul 'khor dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 
[\[272b.2\]]rdal dang /_ljongs 'khrug par byed pa/_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_nyin par dang /_mtshan mo dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_dus dang /_lo 'khrug par byed pa/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma yin 
[\[272b.3\]]pa'i rlung dang /_char dang /_rab tu grang ba dang /_tsha bar byed pa/_sa bon dang /_sman dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_ro ma rung bar byed pa/_sems can gyi bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_'dum pa dang /_dge ba'i chos la mos pa dang /_sa'i bcud dang /_
[\[272b.4\]]mdangs dang /_don dang /_chos kyi ro dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ro nub par byed pa rnams bslab pa 'dzin du btsud de/_phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas/_gang tshun chad bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de tshun chad bdag rtag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi 
[\[272b.5\]]nang du skyes te/_gnod sbyin sdig can nas lus srul po'i bar dag theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas nas/_phyir mi ldog pa la bkod cing de tshun chad sems can rab dang 'bring dang /_tha ma mthong yang brnyas par mi dran gyi sems can ci 'dra ba mthong ba de nyid kyi tshul gyis de dag 
[\[272b.6\]]la smras/_yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/_sdig pa las bzlog_/byams pa dang /_snying rje'i sems la bzhag ste/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag la phyir mi ldog par so sor bkod do/_/bdag gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gang dang /_gang 
[\[272b.7\]]dag tu phyin pa de dang der de dag gnod sbyin 'brog gnas bde bar 'ongs sam/_zhes tshig tu 'bod do/_/de bas na bdag gi ming 'brog gnas zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gang dag da ltar chos rnying pa dang bral zhing sdom pa la mi gnas te/_gcig tu las nag po spyod pa'i mi de dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas/_
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ngan song gsum du skye ste/_mi'i nang du ni nyung zad cig skye'o/_/gang dag las 'dren mar spyod cing /_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob pa/_de dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas phal cher gnod sbyin sdig can dang /_gnod sbyin lus srul po'i nang du skye'o/_/de bas 
[\[273a.2\]]na da ltar 'jig rten na gnod sbyin sdig can nas gnod sbyin lus srul po'i bar du shin tu phal cher rnam par 'phel te/_de dag thams cad kyang dkar po'i phyogs nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa sha stag go/_/de lta bas na da ltar shin tu dus ngan pa la bab pas/_bdag gis 'jam pos ni/_
[\[273a.3\]]dus thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas/_lus srul po ma rungs pa'i bar dag chos dkar po la dgod mi nus/_bdag gis rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze'i rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_dge sbyong dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo 
[\[273a.4\]]'khrugs pa rnams kyang slar zhi bar bya mi nus/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor 'khrugs pa yang zhi bar bya mi nus/_bdag gis 'byung po rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba yang phyir zhing rnam par thar pa'i ro la dgod 
[\[273a.5\]]par yang mi nus te/_rigs kyi bu gnod sbyin dang /_lus srul po thams cad kyi snying la g.yo sbyor ba mi drang ba'i shes pa yang bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis shes so/_/rigs kyi bu 'byung po rnams kyi snying po/_rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i rig pa'i 
[\[273a.6\]]gsang sngags kyi gzungs kyi tshig drag pa mi bzad pa chen mo yod de/_gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis btab na/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_gnod sbyin rgan po'am/_gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor 
[\[273a.7\]]pho'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/_srin po'am/_srin mo'am/_klu dang /_klu mo dang /_grul bum dang /_grul bum mo dang /_brjed byed dang /_brjed byed mo'i bar dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa nas srul po'am/_srul mo'am/_lus srul po'am/_lus srul mo'am/_lus 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]srul rgan po'am/_lus srul rgan mo'am/_lus srul gyi bu'am/_lus srul gyi bu mo'am/_lus srul gyi 'khor pho'am/_lus srul gyi 'khor mo'i bar dag gis phyi phyir zhing rgyal rigs dkrug pa nas/_ljongs kyi bar du dkrug par byed mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu grong ngam/_grong 
[\[273b.2\]]khyer ram/_grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba/_'byung po thams cad kyi snying po drag pa mi bzad pa chen mo rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par gyur pa der gnod sbyin dang /_lus srul po ma rungs pa de dag gis sngon khon 
[\[273b.3\]]du bzung zhing mi dge ba'i las byed pa de dag thams cad btang nas/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_sems 'jam pa dang /_'byung po thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_phan pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/_/yul 'khor dang /_dmangs dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lus 
[\[273b.4\]]srul po'i 'khrug pa thams cad dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_chad pa dang /_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_byad dang /_'khrug pa thams cad dang /_lus kyi rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_'dus pa dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin 
[\[273b.5\]]gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa'i rims dang /_mdze dang /_rkong pa dang /_g.yan pa dang /_lud pa dang /_'brum bu dang /_lto na ba dang /_yan lag na ba dang /_nying lag gi nad dang /_'khrug pa dag zhi bar byed de/_de na mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya la sogs pa las dkar 
[\[273b.6\]]po'i mtha' la mngon par brtson pa/_'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa/_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang /_dge ba dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_lus dang /_sems mi 
[\[273b.7\]]ngal bar byang chub kyi lam tshol ba la brtson par byed do/_/yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te/_rigs kyi bu ci ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi las kyi dngos grub 'di stsal cing /_byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/_rjes su yi rang bar mdzad nas/_bdag gis 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_ma rungs pa thams cad dad par bgyid pa/_mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad bzlog par bgyid pa/_dge ba'i phyogs thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa/_'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug 
[\[274a.2\]]ces bgyi ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma lus par dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i yi ge 
[\[274a.3\]]dang sgras gang bar bgyis la/_de bzhin du ci nas kyang 'dir lhags pa'i 'khor rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i don dang tshig dang yi ges tshim par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog 
[\[274a.4\]]gnas la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nag po'i phyogs skrag par bya ba dang /_dkar po'i phyogs 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis khyod kyi rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang 
[\[274a.5\]]sngags kyi gzungs 'di'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyis skyes bu dam pa khyod spro bar gyis la/_'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa rdo rje nam mkha' 
[\[274a.6\]]rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smros shig_/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas stan las langs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis go bar byed pa/_gsang 
[\[274a.7\]]sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/_/'di lta ste/_d+hu ma d+hu ma/_d+hu ma d+hu ma/_d+hU ma d+hU ma/_ni li na na la/_no la nI la/_ku Ta ni/_ma hA ku Ta ni/_Ta Ta Ta To/_ma hA ta Ta/_a bA sa/_a b+hi/_a b+hi/_ri Ni ri Ni/_ma hA ri Ni ri Ni/_ri mi ri mi ri mi/_da ri mi/_r-i Shi ma ha ri Shi/_shu lu shu lu/_ma hA shu lu shu lu/_shu lu d+hu/_ma hA shu lu shu lu/_u gu 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]ma/_ku ma gu ma na/_ri mi ri mi/_hi ri hi ri/_hi ri hi ri/_hi ri hi ri/_hi ri hi ri/_hi ri hi ri/_hi ri hi ri/_ni mi ni mi/_hi ni hi ni/_mu ni mu ni/_bud d+hi li/_pra ba ra casriSh+Ta/_lo kA tsar+ya/_dzi ni dzi ni/_dzi na ri Sha b+he/_dzi na dzi na dzi na r-i Sha b+ha swA hA_bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs 
[\[274b.2\]]nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na/_'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bgyi ba/_gsang sngags kyi tshig rig pa chen mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas/_lus srul po ma rungs pa'i bar du gang dag sems ma dad pa dang /_lus 
[\[274b.3\]]dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis bslab pa'i sdom pa yongs su mi len pa dang /_sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems nye bar mi gzhog pa de dag gi don du bdag gis yang shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad do/_/'di lta ste/_ad tse/_ad tse/_mu 
[\[274b.4\]]ne/_mu ne/_a ga ne/_hu hu/_mu ne mu ne/_ma ha rI Shi b+ha/_hu hu/_a gra da Na De/_a ta a ta/_a b+hi b+hu ta/_hi ni hi ni/_hi ri hi ri/_hi ri hi ri/_hi ri hi ri hi ri/_dri gu ma/_gu ma gu ma gu ma hi/_hi li/_ni li ni li/_ma hA ni li/_sa mu dra/_me kha/_ha Ta ha Ta ha Ta/_
[\[274b.5\]]d+ha ra Na me/_d+ha ra Na me/_kha k+Sha ba/_kha k+Sha ba/_pr-i thi bi/_a ba te dzo ba ra yu A k+Sha sha_/tha tha tha/_gum b+he b+ha/_gum b+he/_a ga shi gum b+he/_dzi dwa gum b+he/_sarba da ka gum b+he/_rA dzA gum b+he/_sa ma ta gum b+he swA hA/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis gsang sngags 
[\[274b.6\]]kyi tshig 'di dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lus srul po thams cad 'khrugs te skrag nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas dang nam mkha' la gnas pa thams cad 'dar ro/_/de nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad 
[\[274b.7\]]kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/_lan gsum du 'di skad ces sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis shin tu mi bzad pa 'byung po thams cad kyi snying gnon pa'i 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras so zhes brjod do/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_'brog gnas kyi le'u ste/_bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bzhengs pa'i brda dang /_
[\[275a.2\]]rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i brda bstan to/_/de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /_sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu 'dar/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yang g.yos/_nam mkha' las kyang 
[\[275a.3\]]me tog gi char 'bab/_bar snang las kyang sil snyan bye ba'i sgra byung /_spos dang /_bdug pa thams cad kyang shin tu byung /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par byas nas/_'khor thams cad thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[275a.4\]]gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri chen po la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya 
[\[275a.5\]]cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_bris nas 'chang bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam dang ldan par 'gyur/_sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/_chos du zhig gis byin gyis brlabs 
[\[275a.6\]]par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri chen pos mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa ci nas bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcad pa dang /_'thab pa'i rnyog pa thams cad rab 
[\[275a.7\]]tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /_lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams drug byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_chos kyi 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas bris te/_'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos bcus byin gyis brlabs so/_/bcu gang zhe na/_tshangs pa 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[275b.2\]]cad kyis lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum de dag la khyod kyis sems can de dag rtag tu srungs shig_/gnod pa las zlog 
[\[275b.3\]]shig_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las dge ba la tshud cig_/zas dang /_skom dang /_longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa mang po dang /_nad med pa la mkhas pas bdag gi srog dang yang bsdos la/_sems can de dag bzung bar gyis shig_/
[\[275b.4\]]ces rig pas gtad nas de dag gi dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_spobs pa la mkhas pas skyon med par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gnas par mi 'gyur te/_de dag stong pa nyid la gnas par 
[\[275b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag sems sa dang mtshungs shing zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la yang brtson par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i chos la gnas nas/_sems can gyi 'khor gyi lus la snying po blangs te/_dngos po gsum yongs su dag pa'i byang 
[\[275b.6\]]chub kyi spyod pa nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyal mtshan yang thob par 'gyur te/_ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i shes pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sems can de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[275b.7\]]ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston cing bzhugs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las don dang /_tshig dang 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]yi ger ldan pa'i chos bshad pa de lta bu yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du thob nas/_las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba de dag thams cad rnam par shes pa tha ma la chos dang ldan 
[\[276a.2\]]pas mgo mnyam du 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'tsho zhing gzhes la bzhugs te/_theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig 
[\[276a.3\]]'chad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can de dag theg pa chen po la gnas shing /_sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can de dag dang mtshungs par 'grogs par 'gyur te/_ring por mi thogs par yon tan de dag dang ldan par 
[\[276a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par phyin chad nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[276a.5\]]tshangs pa da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar byed cing /_gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bcu po de dag 
[\[276a.6\]]gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[276a.7\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/_kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su phyogs bcu nas 'dir byon pa de dag thams cad kyis khyed la thugs brtse ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]par sbyangs pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang /_bdud kyi phyogs pham par bya ba dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par bstan pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba 
[\[276b.2\]]dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /_'jig pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang /_lta ba ngan pa thams cad spang ba dang /_byang chub kyi lam la gzud pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_las dang nyon mongs 
[\[276b.3\]]pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa gzungs kyi tshig zab mo rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di bshad de/_des chags pa med pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang /_ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la gzud pa dang /_tshul gcig 
[\[276b.4\]]ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/_khyim dang /_grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul bsrung ba nas gling bzhi bsrung ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa bsrung ba dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog rnams 
[\[276b.5\]]bsrung ba dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos nyan pa'i bar dag bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dngos po re re yang snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa rnam pa bcus byin gyis brlabs 
[\[276b.6\]]so/_/grogs po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa yongs su spyod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa/_bla ma'i gnas ston par kun gyis 
[\[276b.7\]]bkur ba phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste/_'di ltar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa spangs nas dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par 'gyur te/_
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]grogs po dag de lta bu ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skyes bu'i mthu chen po'o/_/grogs po dag khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bsti stang du byas te/_dam pa'i chos 'di gzung bar bya/_bsrung bar bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos 
[\[277a.2\]]'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag khyim na gnas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_chos la nan tan byed pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bya'o/_/de ltar na khyed la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis de'i tshe 
[\[277a.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan dang /_phan yon rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang gis zhing kun gser gyis rab tu bkang nas ni/_/skyob pa mgon po dag la mchod pa phul ba bas/_/gang zhig dam pa mchog gi mdo 'di 
[\[277a.4\]]'dzin byed na/_/'jigs med des ni bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs kyi dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/brgya tshad pa yi gser rnams las/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_/khyu mchog thub la 
[\[277a.5\]]phul bas ni/_/mdo 'di'i bsod nams mtshungs mi thob/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/me tog tshogs kyi gdugs mchog sprin rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khebs byas te/_/gang gis mchod phyir dga' mgu'i yid kyis 
[\[277a.6\]]sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas/_/gang zhig phyin chad zad 'gyur 'jigs ldan dus na mdo 'di 'dzin byed na/_/de yi bsod nams tshad dag sems can kun gyis brjod par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[277a.7\]]thub pa'i spyan sngar mar me'i snying po dri zhim til gyis byugs pa ri rab tsam/_/mar me bus pa 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gus par bskal pa bye bar bzung ba bas/_/gang gzhan la la bsod nams 'dod pa bsgribs pa srab par smon pa de dag gis/_/zad pa'i dus tshe 'khor du mdo sde'i gtam byas pa ni 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros 'chang ba gang gis bzod pa bsgom zhing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom/_/rtag tu bsam gtan gzhol zhing mnyam gzhag lus kyis shes rab spel ba babs/_/zad pa'i dus 
[\[277b.2\]]ngan tshe na gang zhig dam chos phyag rgya 'di 'dzin pa/_/de yi bzod dang brtson 'grus 'di ni mtshungs med shes rab gzhal du med/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rdul dang bral ba'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang gis mdo 'di bshad nas 
[\[277b.3\]]bzung dang mngon par bris pa dang /_/gzhan dag 'dzin bcug gus par rtag tu klog pa dang /_/bdug pa me tog phreng ba gos mchog rnams kyis mchod/_/bsod nams gang thob de ni brjod par mi nus so/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag 
[\[277b.4\]]gis/_mdo sde 'di'i bsngags pa dang /_yon tan dang /_phan yon dpag tu med par brjod nas/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag la bos te/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye grogs po dag las kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[277b.5\]]pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/_phyi ma'i dus na gang thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_/thams cad dang ldan 
[\[277b.6\]]pa'i 'khor dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/_mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste/_bcu gsum pa'o//_//'phags pa 'dus pa 
[\[277b.7\]]chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]{D139}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya badzra maN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[278a.2\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gangs kyi ri dang nye ba sna tshogs kyi grong gi rtswa'i spyil po na/_dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms kyi zan phyis len pa spangs te/_rtswa'i spyil por skyil mo krung 
[\[278a.3\]]bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste/_dran pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dge slong 
[\[278a.4\]]gi dge 'dun thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das da ltar ga la bzhugs pa'i sku ma mthong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[278a.5\]]la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'di snyam du/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs snyam du sems pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i spyil po'i nang na ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de dag gis mthong ngo /_/
[\[278a.6\]]mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cang mi smra bar skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang cang mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga de nyid du skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/de nas de'i tshe 
[\[278a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/_/ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag theg pa la gsar du 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas ring du lon pa'am/_phyir mi ldog pa'am/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yang rung ste/_ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang /_rtswa'i spyil po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[278b.2\]]mthus mi gang tsam gyi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_sems can thams cad kyi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 
[\[278b.3\]]'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_sems mgu ba dang /_sems rangs pa dang /_sems shin tu tshim pa skyes so/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas chos thams cad rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[278b.4\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad kyi dbang po rnams rab tu zhi bar gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog ces bya ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' drug khri 
[\[278b.5\]]nyis stong dang /_lhan cig tu sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang /_rtswa'i spyil po ga la ba der song ste/_phyin ma thag tu bdag nyid steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la 'dug pa snyam du shes te/_de steng gi nam mkha' de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems 
[\[278b.6\]]dpa' rin po che'i tog bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas bar snang thams cad me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos kun tu 
[\[278b.7\]]khebs nas/_nyi ma dang /_zla ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha' las sna tshogs kyi grong khyer ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa la 'dug ma nus nas/_de byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma de dag dang /_lhan cig tu steng gi bar snang nam mkha' la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/'dug ma thag tu de'i tshe 
[\[279a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas 
[\[279a.3\]]'khor de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha 
[\[279a.4\]]dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas steng gi bar snang la gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i 
[\[279a.5\]]lha nga bar snang de nyid la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thar mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[279a.6\]]pa/_'jam dpal bar snang 'dir sangs rgyas khri rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs zhes bya ba bshad de/_yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams la 
[\[279a.7\]]rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chog go/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la byang chub kyang med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang med na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la 'khor ba yang med/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang med na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la dge ba yang med/_mi dge ba yang med na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[279b.2\]]'di dag ni mi dge ba spong bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la pha rol yang med/_tshu rol yang med na/_'di dag ni pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la zhing yang med/_zhing yongs su grub pa yang med na/_'di dag ni zhing yongs su bsgrub par 
[\[279b.3\]]'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la bdud kyang med/_bdud du gdags pa yang med na/_'di dag ni bdud 'dul bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la nyan thos kyang med/_nyan thos su gdags pa yang med na/_'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos las 'da' bar 'dod do/_/
[\[279b.4\]]rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la rang sangs rgyas kyang med de/_rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med na/_'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos las 'da' bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la sems can yang med/_sems can du gdags pa yang med na/_'di dag ni 
[\[279b.5\]]sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la don kyang med/_don ma yin pa yang med na/_'di dag ni don byed par 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la 'dod chags kyang med/_'dod chags su gdags pa yang med na/_'di dag 
[\[279b.6\]]ni 'dod chags spong bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la zhe sdang yang med/_zhe sdang du gdags pa yang med na/_'di dag ni zhe sdang spong bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la gti mug kyang med/_gti mug tu gdags pa yang med na/_'di dag ni gti mug spong bar 
[\[279b.7\]]'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la shes pa yang med/_mi shes pa yang med na/_'di dag ni shes pa mngon sum du byed par 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/_kun nas nyon mongs par gdags pa yang med na/_'di dag ni kun nas nyon 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]mongs pa spong bar 'dod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la rnam par byang ba yang med/_rnam par byang bar gdags pa yang med/_'dul ba yang med/_'dul ba ma yin pa yang med/_byams pa yang med/_snying rje yang med/_dga' ba yang med/_btang 
[\[280a.2\]]snyoms kyang med/_sbyin pa yang med/_ser sna yang med/_tshul khrims kyang med/_'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyang med/_bzod pa yang med/_gnod sems kyang med/_brtson 'grus kyang med/_le lo yang med/_bsam gtan yang med/_rnam par g.yeng ba yang med/_
[\[280a.3\]]shes rab kyang med/_'chal ba'i shes rab kyang med/_ltung ba yang med/_mi ltung ba yang med/_nyan thos kyang med/_rang sangs rgyas kyang med/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang med/_chos kyang med/_chos ma yin pa yang med/_zab mo ma yin pa yang med/_sla ba 
[\[280a.4\]]yang med/_shes pa yang med/_mi shes pa yang med/_thob pa yang med/_mngon par rtogs pa yang med/_'khor ba yang med/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang med/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang med/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang med/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[280a.5\]]pa rnams kyang med/_dbang po rnams kyang med/_stobs rnams kyang med/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang med/_lam yang med do/_/'jam dpal rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la gnas par mi bya'o/_/
[\[280a.6\]]so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gzung bar mi bya/_dor bar mi bya/_rnam par bsgrub par mi bya/_'da' bar mi bya/_'pho bar mi bya/_btang snyoms su gnas par mi bya/_bsam par mi bya/_mngon par 'byung bar mi bya/_le lor mi bya/_chags par mi bya/_mi chags par 
[\[280a.7\]]mi bya/_yongs su yi chad par mi bya/_reg par mi bya'o/_/so so skye bo'i chos rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par 'du shes bskyed par mi bya/_sbyin par 'du shes bskyed par mi bya/_btang bar 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o/_/so so skye bo'i chos rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]chos su ma gtogs par blta bar mi bya/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so so skye bo'i chos rnams dang sbyar bar mi bya/_so so skye bo'i chos rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyar bar mi bya/_so so skye bo'i chos rnams dmigs par mi bya/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /_rang 
[\[280b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyar bar mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzung bar mi bya/_so so skye bo'i chos rnams kyang dor bar mi bya/_so so skye bo'i chos rnams bsrung bar bya/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la yang gnas par mi bya ste/_smon lam
