[\[280b.3\]]yang mi gtong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste/_'dod chags su yang dag par 'du ba/_zhe sdang du yang dag par 'du ba/_gti mug tu yang dag par 'du ba/_bud med du yang dag par 'du ba/_skyes par yang dag par 
[\[280b.4\]]'du ba/_lhar yang dag par 'du ba/_klur yang dag par 'du ba/_gnod sbyin du yang dag par 'du ba/_dri zar yang dag par 'du ba/_lha ma yin du yang dag par 'du ba/_nam mkha' lding du yang dag par 'du ba/_lto 'phye chen por yang dag par 'du ba/_sangs rgyas su yang dag 
[\[280b.5\]]par 'du ba/_chos su yang dag par 'du ba/_dge 'dun du yang dag par 'du ba/_nyan thos su yang dag par 'du ba/_rang sangs rgyas su yang dag par 'du ba/_sems can dmyal bar yang dag par 'du ba/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su yang dag par 'du ba/_gshin rje'i 
[\[280b.6\]]'jig rten du yang dag par 'du ba/_ngan par yang dag par 'du ba/_bzang por yang dag par 'du ba/_sar yang dag par 'du ba/_chur yang dag par 'du ba/_mer yang dag par 'du ba/_rlung du yang dag par 'du ba/_mig tu yang dag par 'du ba/_rna bar yang dag par 'du ba/_
[\[280b.7\]]snar yang dag par 'du ba/_lcer yang dag par 'du ba/_lus su yang dag par 'du ba/_yid du yang dag par 'du ba ste/_'jam dpal rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs ni chos thams cad du yang dag par 'du ba'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]gang yin pa dang /_lho phyogs kyi gang yin pa dang /_nub phyogs kyi gang yin pa dang /_byang phyogs kyi gang yin pa dang /_'og gi gang yin pa dang /_steng gi nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de dag thams cad nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[281a.2\]]bzhin du 'jam dpal rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs 'di yang chos thams cad du yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'dod chags 
[\[281a.3\]]gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'dod chags 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs nas 'ongs te sems can rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/_lho phyogs nas ma yin/_nub phyogs nas ma yin/_byang 
[\[281a.4\]]phyogs nas ma yin/_'og nas ma yin/_steng gi phyogs nas ma 'ongs te/_sems can rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin no/_/nang nas skyes te/_sems can rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/_phyi rol nas kyang ma yin no/_/'jam 
[\[281a.5\]]dpal gal te 'dod chags nang nas langs te sems can rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par byed na ni/_de'i phyir sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa can nyid du 'gyur te/_phyis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal chos ni mi 'ong /_mi 'gro_/
[\[281a.6\]]nang na mi 'dug_/phyi rol na yang mi 'dug_/gnyis ka med par yang mi 'dug ste/_de la bgrang ba gang yang med de/_des na 'dod chags ni gzungs kyi gzhi zhes bya'o/_/zhe sdang ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na zhe 
[\[281a.7\]]sdang gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal zhe sdang ni ca co bton pa las 'byung ste/_ca co bton pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gal te 'das pa las chos 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]rnams byung du zin na rtag par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i rkyen rnams las kyang zhe sdang 'byung ba med do/_/da ltar gyi rkyen kyang 'dug pa med cing ma 'gags pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos gang 'das pa las ma byung /_ma 'ongs pa las kyang ma yin/_da ltar gyi las 
[\[281b.2\]]kyang ma yin pa de ni dus gsum yongs su dag pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal gti mug ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gti mug gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[281b.3\]]gti mug ni ma rig pa las byung ste/_ma rig pa de yang sa'i khams dang ma 'dres/_chu'i khams dang ma yin/_me'i khams dang ma yin/_rlung gi khams dang ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams dang ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa'o/_/'jam 
[\[281b.4\]]dpal ma 'dres pa'i chos ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur zhing rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te ma 'dres pa'i chos de kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur du zin na/_nam mkha' yang kun nas nyon mongs pa can 
[\[281b.5\]]du 'gyur zhing rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang ma 'dres pa ste/_'jam dpal gang ma rig pa dang ma 'dres pa/_mi 'pho ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa/_yod pa ma yin pa/_ma byung ba/_dngos po med pa/_mi mthong 
[\[281b.6\]]ba/_mi snang ba/_gzung du med pa/_ma bcings pa/_ma grol ba/_tshad med pa/_ya ma brla/_gsob/_gsog stong pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa zhe'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes brjod par bya'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[281b.7\]]'jam dpal ma rig pa ma rig pa zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de'i thog ma med do/_/rtag tu gcig pa nyid kyang med do/_/thog ma'i mtha' yang med/_tha ma'i mtha' yang med/_da ltar byung ba yang med de/_des na ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal chos gang med 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]cing mi rnyed/_rnam par mi rig_/mi snang /_mi chags/_rnam par mi chags/_zhe mi sdang /_gti mi mug pa ste/_chos gang la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_sgrib pa'i bya ba byed dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[282a.2\]]bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ni ma rig pa'i chos gang la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_sgrib pa'i bgyi ba mi bgyid na/_ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig pa kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bka' stsal/_bcom 
[\[282a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_gtsub shing dang gtsub stan la yang brten/_mi'i lag pas gtsubs pa la yang brten nas du ba 'byung zhing me mngon par 'grub ste/_me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/_gtsub stan la yang mi gnas/_
[\[282a.4\]]mi'i lag pas gtsubs pa la yang mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du skyes bu gang zag rmongs pa la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis yongs su gdung ba'i me 'byung ste/_yongs su gdung ba de yang nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_
[\[282a.5\]]gnyi ga med par yang mi gnas mod kyi/_'jam dpal 'on kyang gti mug ces bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni shin tu grol ba yin pa'i phyir te/_chos gang shin tu grol ba de ni gzungs kyi gzhi zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam 
[\[282a.6\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sgo gang dang ldan na/_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgo 'ga' mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[282a.7\]]'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sgo gang dang ldan na/_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i gzungs thob pa'i chos kyi sgo yod de/_yi ge gcig las yi ge 'bum du bshad kyang yi ge de'i mtha' mi rtogs te/_chos kyi sgo gang dang gang gis bshad pa'i chos kyi sgo de dang 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]de las chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa dag snang bar 'gyur zhing spobs pa yang thogs pa med do/_/de spobs pa yang thogs pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi sgo thams cad brjod do/_/chos kyi sgo'i tshig gcig la chos kyi sgo'i tshig thams cad rjes su 'jug par byed do/_/chos kyi sgo'i tshig 
[\[282b.2\]]thams cad la chos kyi sgo'i tshig gcig rjes su 'jug par byed do/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgo de ji lta bu zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni lha'i sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/
[\[282b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'dul ba'i sa la gnas pa ste/_de ni lha lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni klu'i sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs 
[\[282b.4\]]kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni ming med pa/_yi ge yongs su chad pa/_yi ge med pa/_yi ges yongs su brjod pa ste/_de ni klu lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi 
[\[282b.5\]]gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni gnod sbyin gyi sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'i phyir mi zad pa'i rnam par zhugs 
[\[282b.6\]]pa'i sgo ste/_de ni gnod sbyin lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dri za'i sgo ste/_de ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad 
[\[282b.7\]]ni tshad med/_grangs med/_dpag tu med/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir bgrang ba las 'das pa ste/_de ni dri za lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni lha ma yin gyi sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni med pa'i sgo ste/_ming du rig par bya ba ma yin/_gzugs su rig par bya ba ma yin/_sgrar rig par bya ba ma yin/_drir rig par bya ba ma yin/_ror rig par bya ba ma yin/_
[\[283a.2\]]reg par rig par bya ba ma yin/_yid du rig par bya ba ma yin/_sangs rgyas su rig par bya ba ma yin/_chos su rig par bya ba ma yin/_dge 'dun du rig par bya ba ma yin/_nyan thos su rig par bya ba ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas su rig par bya ba ma yin/_so so skye 
[\[283a.3\]]bor rig par bya ba ma yin zhing /_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni shin tu kun nas ma skyes pa'i tshul gyis rig par bya ba ma yin pa ste/_de ni lha ma yin lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lding gi sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs 
[\[283a.4\]]kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa ste/_mi rgyug pa/_rnam par mi rgyug pa/_mi 'bros pa/_mi 'gro ba/_mi 'ong ba/_mi 'pho ba/_mi 
[\[283a.5\]]skye ba/_mi rten pa/_mi gnas pa/_mi chags pa/_mi 'ching ba/_zhe mi sdang ba/_gti mi mug pa/_mi 'grol ba/_mi gnas pa/_rab tu mi gnas pa ste/_'jam dpal nam mkha' la chags pa med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad ni gnas pa med pa'i sgo ste/_de ni 
[\[283a.6\]]nam mkha' lding lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni mi'am ci'i sgo sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni byed 
[\[283a.7\]]pa po las log pa ste/_ma byas pa/_mi 'gyur ba/_byed pa po kun tu bsal na mi rnyed pa ste/_'jam dpal de ni mi 'am ci lta bu'i sgor 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni lto 'phye chen po'i sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dri ma dang bral zhing shin tu 'od gsal ba ste/_sems can thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du bya ba'am/_rnam par byang bar byar mi nus pa de ni rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[283b.2\]]gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_de ni lto 'phye chen po lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni bud med kyi sgo ste/_'di ni 
[\[283b.3\]]gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir mi bden pa/_skyes pa'i dbang po dang /_bud med kyi dbang po dang bral ba ste/_de ni bud 
[\[283b.4\]]med lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni skyes pa'i sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal rnam pa thams cad du skyes pa nyid ni mi 
[\[283b.5\]]dmigs te/_thog ma'i mthar yang mi dmigs/_tha ma'i mthar yang mi dmigs/_da ltar byung bar yang mi dmigs so/_/'jam dpal gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de la skyes pa yang med/_bud med kyang med de/_gzhan du na ming gi brdas brjod par zad do/_/ming de 
[\[283b.6\]]yang dben pa ste/_gzungs kyi brdas de dag btags so/_/gzungs de yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa ste/_'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams kyi skye ba yang mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_
[\[283b.7\]]de ni skyes pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sgo ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi gzhi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]dpal sems can dmyal ba gang du yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba ni nam mkha' yang dag par 'du ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[284a.2\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can dmyal ba rang gi rtog pa las byung ngam/_'on te ngo bo nyid las byung /_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so skye bo rang gi rtog pas/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[284a.3\]]rten du rig ste/_de dag ma mchis pa la sgro btags pa'i slad du/_ngan song gsum du gnod pa tshor zhing sdug bsngal myong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dmyal ba ji ltar mi mthong ba de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba pa rnams mi mthong ste/_sems 
[\[284a.4\]]can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na bdag sems can dmyal bar ltung ba snyam du rig nas/_de de na lcags kyi bum pa rab tu khol ba/_shin tu 'bar ba 'dom du ma 
[\[284a.5\]]mchis pa'i nang na bdag bcug nas de de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar rab tu 'tshal te/_de yid dngangs shing yongs su gdung bar rig nas 'jigs skrag ste dngangs nas/_de slar sad pa dang /_kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/kye ma sdug bsngal lo zhes cho nges 'debs 
[\[284a.6\]]na de'i mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_phu nu rnams kyis khyod cis sdug bsngal zhes dris pa dang /_mi des de dag la 'di skad ces bdag ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ba myong ngo /_/zhes smras nas/_yang de mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_phu nu rnams la gshe 
[\[284a.7\]]zhing 'tshig ste/_bdag ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ba myong na/_khyod kyis slar phyi phyir zhing nga la cis sdug bsngal zhes drir ci yod ces mchi la/_de nas mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_phu nu de dag gis mi de la 'di skad ces/_kye ma 'jigs shig_/ma 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]'jigs shig_/mi khyod ni gnyid kyis log ste khyim 'di nas gar yang ma song ngo /_/zhes bgyis pa dang /_mi des slar dran pa rnyed nas bdag ni gnyid kyis log ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa dngos po med pa de la bdag gis brtags par lta zhig ste/_dngos po ci yang med do 
[\[284b.2\]]snyam bgyid nas/_de slar yang yid bde ba rnyed na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi de gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/_ma mchis pa la sgro btags nas bdag sems can dmyal bar mchis so snyam du rig pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so skye bo thams cad 
[\[284b.3\]]mchis pa ma lags pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun tu dkris pas bud med kyi mtshan mar rtog go/_/de dag gis bud med kyi mtshan mar brtags nas/_bud med dang bdag lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod par rig ste/_de dag 'di snyam du bdag ni skyes pa/_'di ni bud med do/_/
[\[284b.4\]]'di ni bdag gi bud med do snyam nas/_de sred pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun tu dkris pa'i sems kyis de longs spyod tshol bar sems gtad do/_/de gzhi de las 'thab pa dang 'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa skyed de/_de'i dbang po rab tu khros pas 'khon byung ngo /_/de 'du shes phyin ci 
[\[284b.5\]]log pa des gum ma thag tu bskal pa stong phrag mang por bdag sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba snyam du 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_mi de la mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_phu nu rnams kyis 'di skad ces ma 'jigs shig_/ma 
[\[284b.6\]]'jigs shig_/mi khyod ni gnyid kyis log ste/_khyim 'di nas gar yang ma song ngo /_/zhes mchi ba ltar/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyin ci log bzhis rnam par myos pa'i sems can rnams la chos bstan te/_'di la bud med kyang med/_
[\[284b.7\]]skyes pa yang med/_sems can yang med/_srog kyang med/_gso ba yang med/_gang zag kyang med/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni med pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni rnam par bsgrubs pa'o/_/chos 'di dag 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]thams cad ni brtags pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni stong pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni skye ba med pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni 'gag pa med pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni ma 
[\[285a.2\]]'brel pa'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni chu zla lta bu ste/_'di la su yang mi chags mi sdang mi rmongs te/_yang dag pa ma yin pa la ma rtogs shig ces bstan pa dang /_
[\[285a.3\]]de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de thos nas/_chos thams cad la 'dod chags ma mchis par mthong ngo /_/chos thams cad la zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang /_gti mug ma mchis pa dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang /_chags pa ma mchis par mthong ngo /_/chos 
[\[285a.4\]]thams cad shin tu grol ba dang /_gtan tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas/_de dag sems nam mkha' la gnas te/_'gum pa'i dus bgyis so/_/'gum pa'i dus bgyis ma thag tu phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya 
[\[285a.5\]]ngan las 'da' ba de yang de dang 'dra ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dmyal ba de ltar mthong lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so/_/legs so/_/'jam dpal ji ltar khyod 
[\[285a.6\]]kyis sems can dmyal ba mthong ba de bzhin du blta'o/_/ji ltar khyod rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du mi brtag par bya'o/_/'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba de ltar mthong na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba nges par bstan pa 
[\[285a.7\]]'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/_de dag tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces/_'di ltar sems can dmyal ba'i chos rnams las/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnyed par rung ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ngo mtshar te/_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]legs so/_/zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis pa'i sgo gang gis/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su rtogs shing gnyis lta bur 
[\[285b.2\]]mi bgyid pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa' rnams las bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir kun nas nges par bstan pa zhes bya 
[\[285b.3\]]ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di ni chos kyi sgo gang gis/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par bgro bar byed pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis pa'i sgo de ji lta bu zhig lags/_
[\[285b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo 'di ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_
[\[285b.5\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal ma rig pa ni byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_ma rig pa byang chub lags/_bka' 
[\[285b.6\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal med pa'i phyir/_ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/gang med pa de la skye ba med do/_/gang ma skyes pa de la kun nas nyon mongs pa med do/_/'jam dpal kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni byang chub ste/_rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rtag tu ma skyes pa'o/_/
[\[285b.7\]]'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/_ma rig pa dang byang chub gnyis su med par ston to/_/'jam dpal ngas ma rig pa 'di ma rnyed de/_de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bstan to/_/'jam dpal de ni ma rig pa lta bur 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]kyi sgo ste/_'jug pa gang gis spobs pa myur bar 'gyur ba/_/spobs pa rno bar 'gyur ba/_spobs pa zab mor 'gyur ba/_spobs pa ma chags par 'gyur ba/_spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal 'du byed rnams ni byang chub ste/_'di ni 
[\[286a.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'du byed rnams byang chub lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'du byed rnams ni grangs med pa/_bgrang du med pa ste/_de'i phyir de dag gi tshad mi dmigs so/_/mi dge ba dang mtshungs par ldan na/_
[\[286a.3\]]sems can dmyal bar skye ba ston mod kyi 'di nas kyang mi 'gro'o/_/der 'pho ba yang med do/_/'jam dpal mi 'pho ba ni byang chub ste/_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba med pa'o/_/'jam dpal de ni 'du byed lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal rnam par shes pa ni byang 
[\[286a.4\]]chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par shes pa byang chub lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa las byung bar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[286a.5\]]ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo yang dag pa ma yin pa la gnas pa rnams kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam par shes pa brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs nas bsdus pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis brtags shing /_
[\[286a.6\]]rnam par bsgrubs nas bsdus te/_de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs shing /_bdag cag sangs rgyas su gyur cig_/bdag cag sems can grol bar byed par gyur cig_/bdag cag 'jig rten gyi mchog tu gyur cig snyam du de dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 
[\[286a.7\]]nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la brtags nas rab tu spyod do/_/'jam dpal ngas ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas/_sangs rgyas sam/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_so so skye bo'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/_'jam dpal de ni rnam par shes pa lta bur 'jug pa'i 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal ming dang gzugs kyi byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming dang gzugs byang chub lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ming ni dngos po med par sgras brjod pa'o/_/'jam dpal 
[\[286b.2\]]gzugs kyang byed pa po med pa ste/_'jam dpal gang na byed pa po med pa de la bdag med do/_/'jam dpal bdag med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/_ming gis bstan pa'o/_/ming de ni phyogs bcu kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed de/_'jam dpal de ni ming dang gzugs 
[\[286b.3\]]lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal skye mched drug ni byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na skye mched drug byang chub lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal skye mched thams cad ni rang gi yul dben 
[\[286b.4\]]pa ste/_mig gi dbang po yang bdag gis gzugs blta'o snyam du de ltar mi sems so/_/rna ba'i dbang po yang bdag gis sgra mnyan to snyam du de ltar mi sems so/_/sna'i dbang po yang bdag gis dri la mnam mo snyam du de ltar mi sems so/_/lce'i dbang po yang bdag 
[\[286b.5\]]gis ro myang ngo snyam du de ltar mi sems so/_/lus kyi dbang po yang bdag gis reg pa tshor ro snyam du de ltar mi sems so/_/yid kyi dbang po yang bdag gis chos rnam par shes so snyam du de ltar mi sems so/_/mig kyang gzugs yul du mi shes/_gzugs kyang mig 
[\[286b.6\]]gi yul du mi shes/_rna ba yang sgra yul du mi shes/_sgra yang rna ba'i yul du mi shes/_sna yang dri yul du mi shes/_dri yang sna'i yul du mi shes/_lce yang ro yul du mi shes/_ro yang lce'i yul du mi shes/_lus kyang reg bya yul du mi shes/_reg bya yang lus kyi yul du mi 
[\[286b.7\]]shes/_yid kyang chos yul du mi shes/_chos kyang yid kyi yul du mi shes te/_'jam dpal skye mched rnams ni phan tshun mi 'thun pa g.yo ba med pa/_byed pa med pa/_phan tshun sems pa med pa/_phan tshun ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos gang ngo bo 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]nyid kyis stong pa de ni byang chub ste/_de ni skye mched drug lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal reg pa ni byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na reg pa byang chub lags/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[287a.2\]]'jam dpal reg pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs su 'dus te reg pa dang /_sgrar 'dus te reg pa dang /_drir 'dus te reg pa dang /_ror 'dus te reg pa dang /_reg byar 'dus te reg pa dang /_chos su 'dus te reg pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzugs su 'dus te reg pa nas/_chos su 
[\[287a.3\]]'dus te reg pa'i bar gang yin pa de ni rten pa'o/_/gang brten pa de ni rkyen mang po las skye'o/_/'jam dpal gang rkyen mang po las skye ba de ni tshogs kyi tshul du gnas pa'o/_/'jam dpal tshogs kyi tshul gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma'i tshul lo/_/sgyu ma'i tshul gang yin pa 
[\[287a.4\]]de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshul lo/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshul gang yin pa de ni med pa'o/_/med pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'o/_/mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni mi 'gag pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/_
[\[287a.5\]]de ni reg pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal tshor ba ni byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na tshor ba byang chub lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal tshor ba zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum ste/_bde ba'i tshor 
[\[287a.6\]]ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'o/_/'jam dpal bde ba'i tshor ba ni nang na yang mi 'dug_/phyi rol na yang mi 'dug_/gnyi ga med par mi dmigs so/_/'jam dpal sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang 
[\[287a.7\]]nang na yang mi 'dug_/phyi rol na yang mi 'dug_/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/'jam dpal bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yang nang na yang mi 'dug_/phyi rol na yang mi 'dug_/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i tshor ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang /_bde ba yang ma lags/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags pa'i tshor ba dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam 
[\[287b.2\]]dpal 'du shes phyin ci log gi phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i byis pa so so skye bo rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rkyen sna tshogs kyis bde'o snyam du 'du shes/_sdug bsngal lo snyam pa'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin snyam du shes mod kyi/_'jam dpal 
[\[287b.3\]]tshor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/_ma byas pa/_ma skyes pa/_rtag tu ma byung ba ste/_'jam dpal rnam grangs des na/_tshor ba ni byang chub ste/_de ni tshor ba lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal sred pa ni byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/
[\[287b.4\]]gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sred pa byang chub lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sred pa kun nas nyon mongs pa lags par bka' ma stsal lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi bu med pa'i bu'i sred pa'i nang na 'dug 
[\[287b.5\]]gam/_'on te phyi rol na 'dug gam/_'on te phyogs dang mtshams rnams na 'dug_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de'i bu nyid kyang ma byung na/_bu'i sred pa nyid lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe 
[\[287b.6\]]mi de 'du ba dang ldan te bu skyed cing sred pa skyed pa'i dus de yod/_tshigs de yod na/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi de'i bu la sred pa shar phyogs nas 'ongs sam/_'on te lho phyogs nas sam/_'on te nub phyogs nas sam/_'on te byang phyogs nas sam/_'on te 'og 
[\[287b.7\]]gi phyogs nas sam/_'on te steng gi phyogs nas sam/_'on te nang na 'dug gam/_'on te phyi rol na'am/_gnyis ka med par gnas sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sred pa shar phyogs na mi dmigs/_lho phyogs na yang ma lags/_nub phyogs 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]na yang ma lags/_byang phyogs na yang ma lags/_steng na yang ma lags/_'og na yang ma lags/_nang na yang ma lags/_slad rol na yang ma lags/_gnyis ka ma mchis par yang mi dmigs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[288a.2\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_sred pa de sus kyang /_byas sam/_byed du bcug pa yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sred pa ni ma bgyis pa ste/_sred pa la byed pa po gang yang ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa 
[\[288a.3\]]so so'i skye bo log pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis yang dag pa ma lags pa la btags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_yang dag pa ma yin pa de yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma 
[\[288a.4\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal med pa de la ci kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos gang shar phyogs nas mi rnyed/_lho phyogs nas kyang 
[\[288a.5\]]ma yin/_nub phyogs nas kyang ma yin/_byang phyogs nas kyang ma yin/_nang nas kyang ma yin/_phyi rol nas kyang ma yin/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ba ste/_'jam dpal de ni 
[\[288a.6\]]sred pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal len pa ni byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na len pa byang chub lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis len pa 'ching ba lags par bka' ma stsal lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci yang skyed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyed lags te/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan 'di lnga skyed lags so/_/bka' 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyis gzugs skyed dam/_gsol pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci tshor bas tshor ba skyed dam/_'du shes kyis 'du shes skyed dam/_'du byed rnams kyis 'du byed rnams skyed 
[\[288b.2\]]dam/_ci rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa skyed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_/chos gang zhig chos gang skyed par byed pa de yod dam/_gsol pa/_
[\[288b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos gang zhig chos gang zhig la 'ching ba'i bya ba byed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de ltar chos thams 
[\[288b.4\]]cad skye ba med pa/_'gag pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa ste/_'di dag ni gcig la gcig mi skyed do/_/gcig la gcig mi dmigs so/_/mi smra'o/_/bems po yin pa'i phyir ngag gis las 'byin par mi byed do/_/'jam dpal rnam grangs des na/_len pa ni byang chub ste/_
[\[288b.5\]]de ni len pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal srid pa ni byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na srid pa byang chub lags/_bcom ldan 'das srid pa dgag pa'i slad du/_nyan thos rnams la bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288b.6\]]kyis chos ma bstan lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ngas srid pa bshad pa de ni dngos po med pa ste/_des na srid pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba de ci yang skyed par mi byed do/_/'gog par mi byed do/_/chos thams 
[\[288b.7\]]cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du mthong nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang mi dmigs mi 'dor ro/_/'jam dpal rnam grangs des na srid pa byang chub ste/_de ni srid pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal skye ba ni byang chub ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na skye ba byang chub lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis skye ba las yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du/_chos ma bstan lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas skye ba yongs su btsal na skye ba med pa/_'pho ba 
[\[289a.2\]]med pa/_'byung ba med par mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal rnam grangs des na skye ba byang chub ste/_de ni skye ba lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/'jam dpal rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la 'jug pa'i sgo 'di ni 'jug pa'i sgo gang gis/_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur 
[\[289a.3\]]du 'thob cing /_spobs pa rno bar 'gyur ba dang /_spobs pa zab mor 'gyur ba dang /_spobs pa chags pa med pa dang /_spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'di byang chub 
[\[289a.4\]]sems dpa' gang rnams kyi sa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ni gang dag byang chub la ma zhugs pa rnams dang /_gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi dmigs pa dang /_gang 
[\[289a.5\]]dag 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug las bskyod par mi 'dod pa rnams dang /_gang dag 'khor ba las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa rnams dang /_gang dag sems can dgrol bar mi 'dod pa rnams dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams khong du chud par mi 'dod pa'i byang 
[\[289a.6\]]chub sems dpa' de dag gis yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_
[\[289a.7\]]klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la tshe 'di la yon tan ji snyed cig mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za rnams srung bar shes par bya'o/_/de 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]chos thams cad la the tsom med par shes par bya'o/_/de chos rab tu dbye ba'i shes pa dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni mtha' yas te/_bskal pa brgyar yang zad par byar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[289b.2\]]bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' khris rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs 'di 'thob bo/_/las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal 
[\[289b.3\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za de dag dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen 
[\[289b.4\]]po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D140}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya 
[\[289b.5\]]a nan ta mu kha sa d+ha ka nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul 
[\[289b.6\]]yangs pa can/_tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na/_dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe zla ba gsum po 'di dag 'das nas/_de 
[\[289b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed dag btang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod song la 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir bsdus shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no/_/zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[290a.2\]]'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_skad cig de nyid la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'dug ste/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skad kyis go bar byas pa/_bde gshegs slob ma sems can gang su dag_/'jig rten khams 'dir gnas pa kun nyon cig_/deng 'dir ston pa 
[\[290a.3\]]chos kyi char 'bebs kyis/_/gang dag nyan par 'dod pa 'dir shog cig_/de'i tshe tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]dge slong bzhi khri 'dus par gyur te/_de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[290a.4\]]'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba gang mngon par 'du bya bas/_
[\[290a.5\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/_theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/_dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'du bar 'gyur ba/_de 
[\[290a.6\]]'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu mngon par 'dus byas te/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de mngon par 'dus byas pas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[290a.7\]]khams na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/_theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/_dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'dus par gyur te/_de dag lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]mthong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig de nyid la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bka' 
[\[290b.2\]]stsal pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song thams cad spong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan 
[\[290b.3\]]thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad kyi mun pa nges 
[\[290b.4\]]par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[290b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpag med dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[290b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[290b.7\]]chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed deng la phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[291a.2\]]ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'am/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'am/_phyir mi ldog pa'am/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'am/_dad pas mos pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir bsdus 
[\[291a.3\]]shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/zhes gsol nas/_skad cig de nyid la ltas de lta bu byas te/_ltas de byas pas tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang 
[\[291a.4\]{]bzangs su[,]bzang du[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dag lhags par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag 
[\[291a.5\]]khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pas mos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad lhags par gyur to/_/
[\[291a.6\]]de dag thams cad lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dus 
[\[291a.7\]]pa chen po de mthong nas/_skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/_zhus pa lung bstan pa ji lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis som nyi thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang spobs pa myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang /_thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[291b.2\]]rgyas kyi bar du brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa bzhi po de dag rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can yongs su dag pa dang /_chos yongs su dag pa dang /_smon 
[\[291b.3\]]lam yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/_de dag rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_gya nom pa yid du 'ong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus yid du 'ong ba dang /_ngag yid du 'ong ba dang /_
[\[291b.4\]]sems yid du 'ong ba dang /_skye ba yid du 'ong ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa bzhi rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgo mi zad pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi dbang po la mkhas 
[\[291b.5\]]pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang /_las dang rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa 'dus ma byas kyi gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang /_chos zab mo la bzod pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba/_de lta bu'i zhu ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[291b.6\]]sangs rgyas la bdag gis zhu gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus zhu ba ji skad smos pa ji ltar yid la bzung ba/_ji ltar yid la byas pa/_ji ltar kun chub par byas pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol to/_/'di skad ces kyang gsol te/_bcom ldan 
[\[291b.7\]]'das la zhu ba ji skad smos pa ji ltar bzung ba/_ji ltar yid la bgyis pa/_ji ltar kun chub par bgyis pa 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi spyod pa ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de skad ces 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu bar sems pa khyod yang legs so/_/shA ri'i bu de'i phyir khyod legs par 
[\[292a.2\]]rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[292a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad khas mi len cing len par mi byed pa des/_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bya'o/_/tad+ya tha/_oM a Ne ma hA ra Ne/_a khe/_mu khe/_mu khe/_sa man ta mu khe/_sau me sa/_sau r+yar me/_sauM ti yu ga me/_ni ru ga ti 
[\[292a.4\]]pra b+he hi le hi le/_ka la pe kel pa/_si sa le/_sa ra pa ti/_hi le hi le/_hi le hi le/_hi li hi li li/_ma hA hi le le/_tsaN De tsa pa ne/_tsa ra tsa ra Ni/_a tsa le/_ma tsA le/_a naM te/_a naM ta mu khe/_a naM ta ga te a ra Ne ni ra ma la de/_nir ba la ne/_nir ba d+han te/_d+ha rma 
[\[292a.5\]]d+hare/_nir ha re/_gi me le shrI ma bi sho ng+ha ni/_pra kr-i ti ng+hi pa ne/_b+ha ba be b+ha ba ne/_a saM ge a saM ge/_bi ha re/_da me sa me/_bi ma le/_bi ma la pra b+he/_saM kar Sha Ni/_ng+hi re ng+hi ng+hi ri la hA ng+hi ng+hi re/_ye She ya Sho pa ti/_tsa le a tsa le/_ma tsa le/_sa ma tsa le/_Ta ng+hi Tu ng+ha 
[\[292a.6\]]san ng+hi s+thi ra/_a saM ge a saM ge/_bi ha re/_a saM ga ni ra ha re/_ni ra ha ra/_bi ma le/_ni ra ha Ta sho ta ni Da ng+hi so me/_s+thi re s+thi me/_s+tha ma ba ti/_ma hA pra b+he/_sa man ta pra b+he/_pi pu la pra b+he/_bi pu la rasmi saM b+ha be/_sa man ta mu khe/_sarba tra ya bu ga te/_tshe d+ya ya na ta tshe d+ya pra ti b+ha 
[\[292a.7\]]ne/_d+ha ra Ne/_Ni De na/_ng+harma ni ng+ha na go tra/_sa man ta b+ha drai/_sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya a ng+hiSh+ThA na a ng+hiSh+Thate swA hA/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed/_dmigs 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]par mi byed/_smon par mi byed/_btang snyoms su mi byed/_len par mi byed/_brtson par mi byed de/_de dag thob par bya ba dang /_spang bar bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba dang /_rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi byed/_'gyur bar mi byed/_mngon par 'du mi byed/_mtshungs par ldan 
[\[292b.2\]]pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang mi mthong ngo /_/chos rnams kyi skye ba yang mi mthong /_'gag pa yang mi mthong /_'das pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_
[\[292b.3\]]chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'bri ba yang mi mthong /_chos gang yang sogs par yang mi byed/_'grib par mi byed/_'dogs par yang mi byed/_rnam par rig par yang mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'ba' zhig sgom ste/_de bsgom pa na/_gzugs su ma yin/_gzugs 
[\[292b.4\]]med par ma yin/_mtshan du ma yin/_mtshan ma med par ma yin/_dpe byad bzang por ma yin/_dpe byad bzang po med par ma yin/_rnam par shes par ma yin/_rnam par shes pa med par ma yin/_nyon mongs par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa med par ma yin/_tshul khrims su ma 
[\[292b.5\]]yin/_tshul khrims med par ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin du ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin med par ma yin/_shes rab tu ma yin/_shes rab med par ma yin/_rnam par grol bar ma yin/_rnam par grol ba med par ma yin/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar ma yin/_rnam par grol 
[\[292b.6\]]ba'i ye shes mthong ba med par ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_skye ba med par ma yin/_rigs su ma yin/_rigs med par ma yin/_rus su ma yin/_rus med par ma yin/_'khor du ma yin/_'khor med par ma yin/_gnas par ma yin/_gnas med par ma yin/_thob 
[\[292b.7\]]par ma yin/_thob pa med par ma yin/_mngon par rtogs par ma yin/_mngon par rtogs pa med par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa zad par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa ma zad par ma yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye skye mched du ma yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]mched du par yin/_shes par ma yin/_shes pa med par ma yin/_chos ston par ma yin/_chos mi ston par ma yin/_bdag rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_gzhan rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_sems can rnam par dag par bya bar ma 
[\[293a.2\]]yin/_sems can med pa rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_bdag gi don du ma yin/_gzhan gyi don du ma yin/_chos su ma yin/_'dul bar ma yin/_lus rnam par dag par ma yin/_ngag rnam par dag par ma yin/_yid rnam par dag par ma yin/_spyod pa rnam 
[\[293a.3\]]par dag par ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_bdag gi rnam par dag par ma yin/_gzhan gyi rnam par dag par ma yin pa 'di ni/_shA ri'i 
[\[293a.4\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/don dam pa bsgrub par chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/gcig tu 
[\[293a.5\]]nges pa thob pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ye shes bsgrubs pas/_chos kyi gter mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rigs zil gyis mi non par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[293a.6\]]gzungs so/_/dam pa yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pas bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di'i don thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni phyir mi ldog cing 
[\[293a.7\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad ni chos dang yon tan gyi gter nges pa'i phyir ro/_/dmigs pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di nyid 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/chos rnams stong par dogs med cing /_/byang chub ched du spros mi byed/_/chos dbyings 'khrug par 
[\[293b.2\]]mi byed na/_/de'i phyir gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di ni nyan par bya/_/'di la gzungs ni zad pa med/_/ye shes 'byor 'di 'di la ste/_/de nas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/gzungs 'dir rab tu 
[\[293b.3\]]bzung byas na/_/phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos bstan pa ni thos par 'gyur/_/don dang tshig 'bru bskyod kun gyi/_/mchog gi chos ni rnam par shes/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer ji snyed pa/_/de snyed tshig rnams shes par 'gyur/_/gang dag chos kyi 
[\[293b.4\]]mchog 'gyur ba/_/rlabs chen gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin de la/_/thams cad rtag tu mngon du 'gyur/_/gal te sems can thams cad kyis/_/de la bskal par dogs dris te/_/the tshom thams cad chad gyur kyang /_/de yi ye 
[\[293b.5\]]shes mi zad do/_/mdo sde 'di la gang dga' ba/_/de ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_/byang chub mchog la nye ba ste/_/yid brtan gyur dang chos 'dzin pa'o/_/gzungs 'di 'dzin par su byed pa/_/de la sems can thams cad da dga'/_/sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[293b.6\]]kyang de la dgyes/_/grags pa 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/_/su zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/de ni 'chi ba'i dus byed tshe/_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong /_/lag pa de la nye bar 'jog_/gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams 
[\[293b.7\]]su/_/sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa/_/zla ba gcig gis byang bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang /_/bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun/_/gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yis/_/zla ba gcig gis zil gnon 'gyur/_/khams 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]gsum sems can ji snyed pa/_/gal te thams cad bdud gyur kyang /_/mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/de la bar chad byed mi nus/_/byang chub 'tshang rgya bar du ste/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs ldan 'gyur/_/gzungs kyi dam 
[\[294a.2\]]pa gang yin pa/_/de yi lce yi rtse mor gnas/_/ji ltar mdo sde 'dzin de la/_/gzungs 'di so sor nges pa bzhin/_/'di las thams cad mkhyen pa bstan/_/'di las byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang /_/mar me zhes byas nga lung 
[\[294a.3\]]bstan/_/skad cig de la sangs rgyas ni/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed mthong /_/gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/bstan pa 'dir ni rtogs 'dod cing /_/mdo sde 'di la bsten pa des/_/thams cad myur du thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang /_/
[\[294a.4\]]nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/'od dang mtshan kyang rnam dag pa/_/mdo sde 'dis ni byed par 'gyur/_/de bas bag ni yod gyur na/_/zhag bdun bar du 'di sems pa/_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu yis/_/de yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin 'gyur/_/bsam bya sems 
[\[294a.5\]]par mi bsam ste/_/bsam bya min pa'ang mi bsam mo/_/soms shig 'gal bar ma sems shig_/de yi 'og tu gzungs thob 'gyur/_/dper na rgya mtshor phyin pa'i mi/_/nor la som nyi med pa ltar/_/de bzhin gzungs 'di thob gyur nas/_/bde ba la yang som 
[\[294a.6\]]nyi med/_/'di las rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye/_/de bas 'di la sbyor bar gyis/_/zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[294a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa med pa yin/_sems can thams cad la phrag dog med pa yin/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]zhing 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can yin/_nyin mtshan du chos la dga' zhing chos 'dod pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[294b.2\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ngan cing bdud kyi spyod yul ba/_/'dod pa dri nga spang bar byos/_/de dag sems can dmyal ba'i rkyen/_/ngan song rnams kyi rgyu yang yin/_/shes kyi khe dang rnyed dang grags pa'i phyir/_/pha rol dag la 
[\[294b.3\]]phrag dog mi bya ste/_/dga' ba'i mig gis sems can blta byas na/_/mthu che ba dang gzugs kyang mdzes par gyur/_/sems can gang dag kha cig rtsod 'gyur ba/_/de yi gzhi rtsa yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_/de ltar gang la sred par 'gyur ba spongs/_/sred pa 
[\[294b.4\]]spang ba byas na gzungs su 'gyur/_/gal te byang chub 'dod na gzhan ma sems/_/nyin dang mtshan du chos ni btsal bar byos/_/chos tshig 'di 'dra 'di dag rten byed na/_/de la gzungs ni mngon du 'gyur bar 'ong /_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[294b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgon pa dang dben pa la gnas pa dang /_chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dag la 
[\[294b.6\]]lhag par chags pa med pa dang /_sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta zhing tha na lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong ba ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[294b.7\]]'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas par gyis/_/de la gnas pa gzhan la brnyas pa med/_/zab mo'i bzod pa 'dun pa bskyed nas su/_/bag yod mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis/_/'di ltar 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhir gyur pa/_/shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed/_/bya dang 'dra bar ngan ngon dag gis chog byas te/_/mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par byos/_/kye ma sangs rgyas bstan pa legs par rnyed/_/sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba 
[\[295a.2\]]khyim yang spongs/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyang yongs dag pas/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos la gus par gyis/_/rnyed 'dod dran pa ma yin shes rab min/_/dad dang tshul khrims ma yin chos sems min/_/de ni byang chub ring ste gnam sa bzhin/_/de ltas rnyed pa yongs su 
[\[295a.3\]]spang bar bya/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don khong du chud par bya'o/_/brgyad po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pa zhes bya ba don 
[\[295a.4\]]dam par chos thams cad la bdag med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_la zhes bya ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_ba zhes bya ba byis pa'i chos rnams 
[\[295a.5\]]dang /_mkhas pa'i chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_dza zhes bya ba skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba med pa'i 'gro ba'i mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_ka zhes bya ba las 
[\[295a.6\]]kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_ng+ha zhes bya ba gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_sha zhes bya ba zhi 
[\[295a.7\]]gnas dang lhag mthong dang /_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong med par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_k+Sha zhes bya ba chos thams cad skad cig pa ste/_gzod ma nas zhi ba'i phyir zad pa med pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_rgyu ba med pa dang /_
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa khong du chud pa ste/_de ltar yi ge 'bru brgyad po de dag gi don khong du chud par rtogs par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa dang po'o/_/gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te/_gzung bar bya ba 'di ni don khong du 
[\[295b.2\]]chud pa gnyis pa'o/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu klog pa dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gsum pa'o/_/gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[295b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /_yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la gzud pa'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa bzhi pa ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[295b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/yi ge 'bru brgyad 'di dag bsam par bya/_/mdo sde 'di ni bris nas bcang bar bya/_/
[\[295b.5\]]zla ba phyed cing rtag tu bklag par bya/_/sems can rnams kyang 'di 'dzin gzhug par bya/_/shes rab rgya chen byang chub nye ba ste/_/phyogs bcu rnams na sangs rgyas gang su dag_/bzhugs pa thams cad des ni mdun du mthong /_/de'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed de 'di 
[\[295b.6\]]la bslab/_/shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de la dgongs pa dang /_
[\[295b.7\]]de la bdud kyi las mi 'byung ba dang /_de'i las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byang ba dang /_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa myur du 'thob pa ste/_shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin no/_/de nas 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis de ni yid la mdzad/_/de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/de yi las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byang /_/spobs pa mtha' yas rnams kyang thob 
[\[296a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_yangs pa rgya cher gyur pa/_tshad med dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 
[\[296a.3\]]dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[296a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po snang ba 'dzin zhes bya ba mi'i dbang po rin po che sna bdun 
[\[296a.5\]]dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i bu yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang /_des sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[296a.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de las thos te/_des gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/des lo bdun khrir rmugs pa dang /_gnyis kyis non par ma gyur to/_/de lan 'ga' 
[\[296a.7\]]yang rgyal srid la dga' ba'am/_nor la dga' ba'am/_bdag la dga' bar ma gyur to/_/de lo bdun khrir lan 'ga' yang sa la glos ma phab ste/_gcig tu nges par nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos te/_
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]thos nas kyang thams cad bzung ngo /_/bzung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de nyid las rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas de lo dgu khri 'das pa dang /_
[\[296b.2\]]des sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs 'di bsgrubs te/_bsgrubs nas kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/_/des tshe gcig po de nyid la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[296b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du btsud cing /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu 'khor de na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/_des sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs 
[\[296b.4\]]kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba'i dge slong de las thos so/_/thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/_de rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos so/_/thos 
[\[296b.5\]]nas kyang thams cad bzung ngo /_/thams cad du yang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_tshig btsun pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi chod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/des bskal 
[\[296b.6\]]pa gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mnyes par byas so/_/mnyes par byas nas kyang /_bskal pa gsum 'das pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[296b.7\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za bar gyur na/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/_/shA 
[\[297a.2\]]ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/_yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i chos smra bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi dang /_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za bar gyur na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[297a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong chos smra ba yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/_/shA 
[\[297a.4\]]ri'i bu nga dang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de'i tshe/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/_/thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang ste/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_
[\[297a.5\]]ngas bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag bzhi khrir 'khor ba phyir bsnyil to/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las chos bstan pa yang thos te/_thams cad du yang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_tshig btsun pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_
[\[297a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[297a.7\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_tha na gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su yi rang bar yang brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang /_chos smra ba dag mgu bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/_gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bogs pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[297b.2\]]dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos te/_bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tshad ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyis kyang shes pa'am/_bsam par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[297b.3\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mdo sde thos nas rjes su yi rang dang /_/yi ger bris dang bzung dang bklags pa yis/_/bsod nams chu bo ji tsam bskyed pa ni/_/sems can kun gyis shes par yong mi nus/_/
[\[297b.4\]]de ni tshe rabs kun tu rgyal ba mthong /_/de dag las kyang dad pa bsam yas rnyed/_/mdo sde zab mo tshul yang shes par 'gyur/_/de ni myur du byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/_/bla med byang chub ma reg bar du yang /_/de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 
[\[297b.5\]]mngon shes dang /_/gzungs rnams dang ni gzugs dang longs spyod dang /_/sangs rgyas mthong las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/_/rjes su dran pas sngon gyi tshe rabs na/_/tshong dpon bus ni gzungs 'di thob gyur nas/_/sangs 
[\[297b.6\]]rgyas gang gA'i bye snyed mthong gyur te/_/des ni 'dod bzhin byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/_/mar me mdzad pa de tshe tshong dpon bu/_/sngon tshe tshe rabs 'od zer mtha' yas gyur/_/de tshe chos smra sangs rgyas tshe dpag med/_/nga ni bskal pa 
[\[297b.7\]]bzang dang bcas yi rang /_/byang chub myur du reg par su 'dod dang /_/bdud rnams myur du gzhom par su 'dod dang /_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan bzang su 'dod pa/_/'di la brtson na rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/gang gA'i 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]klung gi bye snyed 'jig rten khams/_/gang gis rin chen bkang ste sbyin byin yang /_/bris dang gzung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa/_/de la sbyin pas dper yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltas thos na rtse gcig 
[\[298a.2\]]bag yod par/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas 'di bzung ngam/_/gzungs 'di bris shing sems pa de dag ni/_/byang chub rnyed pa dka' ba med par bshad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan par shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal 
[\[298a.3\]]pa/_shA ri'i bu sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la/_gangs la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin brgyad po gzi mdangs 'jug cing nyin mtshan du srung ba dang /_
[\[298a.4\]]skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed do/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang /_brtan po dang /_bdag po dang /_sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang /_spyod pa'i blo gros dang /_thub dka' 
[\[298a.5\]]dang /_'jigs su rung ba dang /_gnod sbyin lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba dag ste/_gnod sbyin rgyal po brgyad po de dag 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir shin tu khrus bya ba dang /_gos shin tu gtsang ma bgos pa dang /_'chag sar 'gro 
[\[298a.6\]]ba dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yid la byas te/_de ltar yid la byas na de la gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag myur du bzhin ston par 'gyur 
[\[298a.7\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa brgyad po 'di dag kyang de la sems par 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang /_snang byed dang /_shes rab 'od dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_yang dag skul byed dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs byed dang /_skar ma'i rgyal po 
[\[298b.2\]]zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag des gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir/_mngon par brtson par 'gyur 
[\[298b.3\]]ro/_/gzungs 'di la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /_bden pa'i dam bca' bar bya'o/_/byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba can dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_chos la dga' ba dang /_
[\[298b.4\]]zab mo'i chos la bzod pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la brtson pas/_kun 'gyed pa'i ngang tshul can du byas te/_de la ji ltar chung ba dang /_ji ltar nyung ba las kyang sbyin pa sbyin par bya 
[\[298b.5\]]na mang po las lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sum cus ni/_sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub 
[\[298b.6\]]pa'i gzungs 'di thob ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi skye dgu sngon sems ma bskyed pa dkrigs pa/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[298b.7\]]phrag drug cus ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de'i phyir/_khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar 
[\[299a.2\]]yang zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu nges par mngon par 'phags par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bdud thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/gcig tu nges par rnam pa thams 
[\[299a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu thob par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha 
[\[299a.4\]]dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa zhes bya 
[\[299a.5\]]ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D141}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya Sha Da mu kha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_
[\[299a.6\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang ma'i steng nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu rnam par phye bar spras 
[\[299a.7\]]pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]ba'i phyir/_sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zung shig_/de ni 'di lta ste/_'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye gnas gzhan dag tu bdag gis sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba de sems can thams cad dang mnyam nyid mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig_/
[\[299b.2\]]bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci myong ba de/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su shes par byed par spyod par gyur cig_/bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang ci byas pa de/_so sor bshags 
[\[299b.3\]]pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig_/bdag gis bdud kyi las gang ci byas pa de yongs su byed pa/_bla na med pas yongs su mi shes par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig 
[\[299b.4\]]rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa yang rung /_gang ci yod pa de thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig_/bdag gi rnam par grol ba gang ci yod pa des/_sems can thams cad rnam par thar bar gyur cig_/
[\[299b.5\]]'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par ma gyur cig_/tad+ya tha/_oM k+Sha me k+Sha me/_k+ShAn te k+ShAn te/_da me da me/_dAn te dAn te/_b+ha dre b+ha dre/_su b+ha dre su b+ha dre/_tsan dre tsan dre/_su tsan dre su tsan dre/_
[\[299b.6\]]tsan dra ki ra Ne/_tsan dra ba ti/_te dzo ba ti/_ya sho ba ti/_ng+harma ba ti/_brah+ma ba ti/_sarba kle sha bi sho d+ha ni/_sarba ar+tha sA ng+ha ni/_sarba ar+tha pra sha ma ne/_pa ra mAr+tha d+ha ni/_kA ya bi sho ng+ha ni/_bA ka bi sho 
[\[299b.7\]]ng+ha ni/_ma naHsa~M sho ng+ha ni swA hA/_rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bklags na/_de'i las 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas/_skye ba bdun gyi bar du de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[300a.2\]]dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[300a.3\]]mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//shu b+ham stu sarba dza ga tAM/_//
[\[300a.4\]]ye ng+ha rma he tu pra b+ha wA he tun+te Shan ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro ng+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH//_maM ga laM b+ha b+ha ban+tu//_//
